item.text: 'dzad 'aa ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rgya/ bram pe Tisha sna brgyad pa/
bskur ba dang phrad par bdag gis bya'o// sa dargyal po shar pa dang lhan cig phrad
ut+pa@#// par byas te/ nor lhas byin de dang lhan cig shin tu chags par gyur pa dang/
gser 'phreng can gyis sbyor ba 'chang la lhan gsen te/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang ga sras mo
nor lhas byin la/ glang po che'i cho ga slob bo zhes sprang ngo// des kyang rgyan lnga ma mngon par
byas nas bdag nyid gos hrul bo bgos te ming dpyid ldan zhes bya bar btags nas/ smyon pa'i
chalugs kyis 'phags rgyal du song ngo// de dur lam po che dang srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo/
dag tu rgyug mchong rgyal zhing dpyade ldan dga' bo dpyod ldan rtaga' bo zhes smon tshig kyang skya'o// gang dag gi
'di sbyor ba 'chang yin no zhes de ngo shes pa de dug la ni dus rgyun byin pa dang/ do dag gis de blangs nas
cang zur par 'a gro'o// gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni 'di smon pa zhig go zhes yal bar gtong ste//
rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang khyim bzang po gang du zhugs pa der bza' ba dang/ me tog dang/ shes dag
kyang rnyedacing/ shar pa dang lhan cig gsang ste gros gcog go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nor lhas
byin gyis rgyal po shar pa'i bu la snus pa/ lhagal tanabadrag ga phas tshor du mchis tshur spyona'abros so// des smras pa/
lhame gal te de lta na song la pha la 'di skad ces/ ya ba bdag gis mang po che'i cho ga ni lobs na/ 'on kyang las su bgyi ba ma mthong/
ste/ pa'i slad du lhas bdag la glang po tsha mo bzangaldan cibedir bgyid du stsol cig dang/ dal 'khaMl nas las drag blta bar bgyi'o
zhes gyis shig/ dasong nas rgyal po la de pa zhin smos pa dang/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang glang bo che'i rje rnams la/
shes ldan dag glang po che mo ba zang ldan bu mo nor lhas byin la ci bdar gyis la/ de la zhon nas las dag ltar chug cig ces bsgo'o//

tsa de dag gis de la glang po tsho mo ba zang ldan ci bder byas pa dang/ de rgyal po shar pa'i bu dang lhan cig de la zhon nas 'bros pa'i thabs shom par rtsom ste/ res 'ga'ani snga dro song zhing nyi//
khyadan slar 'ong/ res 'ga'an nyi ma byed na song zhing phyi dro slar 'ong/ res 'ga' ni phyi dri song nas dgongs su slar 'ong/ res 'ga'ani dgongs song nas mtshan mo nam phyed na slar 'ong/ ras
laga'ani 'jid la slar 'ong/ res 'ga'ani snga tshigs la slar 'od/ res 'ga' nom chung na ra 'ong/ res 'ga'ani skya rengs shar nas spur 'ong ngo// shar bas sbyor ba 'chang la 'bros
ba'i thabs smras pa dang/ des glang po che'i lci ba dag phyir dbyung bar brtsams so// chab sgopa dag ga gis smras pa// dpyid ldan 'di ci yin/ des smras pa// shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos
su byas pa 'di dag der la tur 'gyur rozhes byas pa dang/ de dag gis bgad nas 'din spyod pa'i snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ des kyang de dag khyer tuko'u sham ba'i lam gyi bar bar du
shing gi yal ga la spungs so// yang glang po che'i gcin dag gis bumakha bkang ste bkur bar brtsams dad dang/ sgo ba dag gis de bzhin du dris pa dang/ des smras pa// shA ldan dag rgyal
po'i bshos su byas te 'din der skyems su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang/ de dag de bzhin du 'di ni smyon pa yin no snyam nas bgad de 'khod do// des kyang de khyer te ko'u sham ba'i lam gyi bar bar
du shing gi yal ga la spyas so// rgyal bo shar pa dang sbyor ba 'chang dang gser 'phreng can gyis nyi ma che ge mo zhig la/ phyob/sa che ge mo zhig tu thams cad 'du bar bya'o zhes

dus btab nas/ rgyal bo shar ba'i bu dang ner lhas sbyin glang po tshem bzang ldan l zhon nas phyogs der song ste/ sbyor ba chang dang gser 'phreng can yang de nyid la zhon te/ de rnams pi wang snyan ba lan

zhing dang ban/ rgyal po shar ba'i bus pa wang snyan pa blangs pa dang/ sbyor ba'achang dga' ba skyes te glu blangs pa/ bzang ldan ma dang dbyangs snyan dang// nor lhas byin dang shar pa dang// gser 'phreng
thacan dang dpyid ldan dang// 'di dag don mthun 'dong ba yin// dus gang du de dag slar 'ong ba'i dus de yang myur du thag/ dus za ma gang yin pa de yang thal nas/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis/
gsos pa la smras pa/ gsos ba nor lhas byin deng thog san 'di ci las gyur ces byas ba dang/ gsos pas btsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/ des rgyal bo la smras pa/ rgyal po shar pa'i
busaglang po che mi bzang ldan la 'tshal te nor lhas byin khridinas bres 'khas so// rgyal bos rngams nas smras// gsos pa myur du song la/ glang po che'i 'dam bu'i ri la zhen pa'i ng pa dang nang
! lhas byin khrid de khog cig/ de rings paringes par glang po tshe 'dam bu ri la zhon nas bsnyogs so// des bsnyegs te slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis glang bo tsho'i lci ba'i ma bo bse pa
ma/dang 'dam bu ngas de mnam par brtsams so// ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo khazang ldan gyis dpag tshad bcu 'das so// yang 'dam bu'i sa slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis gcin
gyi bum pa bcag pa dang/ 'dam bu'i se de mnam par brtsams go// ji srid sgom pa de'i bar du glang bo che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad gzhan bcu 'das te/ gzhan gyi lul du phyin par gyur ba
dang/ gsos pas bsams pa/ 'di'i gzhan gyi yul yin pas/ glang po che 'dam bu'i ri lang shor du 'ong gis ldeg ge snyam nas de re thag chad de slar la go/ rgyal po ba gtum po rab snang
gis smras pa/ gsos pa ci grag/ des smras pa/ lhaci zhig gdab bros lags mod ces byas pa dang/ rgyal bo lag pa 'gram ba la gtad nas sems kho ngas su chud cing 'dug go/ rgyal po shar
ba'i bu yang srog stor ba las slar rnyed de/ ko sham bar 'ongs nas/ ge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkren pa dang/ bongs pa dang/ mdza' bo dang/ phu nu dang/ gnyen rnams la sbyin pa dag
byin zhing/ dga' ston chen po byas nas/ ra lhas byin dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dgabadagur spyod par byed do// dus gzhan zhig na khang bzangs kyi thog tu byung nas/ nor
lhas byin dang lhan cig tutre mo gtam dbakher zhing 'khod pa las smras pa/ lhamo khyod kyang ngas de ltar sgyus phrogs pa yin no// des smras pa/ lha khyod kyang de bzhin du bdag gis bsazabs kyis
tsa @#/// bzung ste bzhag pa lags so// des smras pa// lhago jis khyod kyi ma 'di bkug ste tha ga ba'i las slob tu ma bcug na nga rgyal po shar ba'i bu ma yin du zad ces byas pa dang//
de khros bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ rgyal po shar pas sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa// nga'i dga' ba khyod kyis bsal bar nus sam/ lhatsazhig bgyi/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang

mgul pa nas thog gas te 'dir khug la/ tha ga pa'i las slob tu chug cig de des smras pa/ lha gang gi tshe khyod kyis nor lhas byin dang/ glang bo che mo bzang ldan phrogs pa'i tshe don gyison khyod kyi mi
dgyes pa bsal lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba gal te ngo thog kyang gdas bsams te bgyi'o zhes byas te des 'phags rgyal du 'go pa'i bong dag sta gon byas nas/ dad dbon spro ba bskyed de/ smad 'tshong

ma lag khrugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhig kyang/ ded dpon gyi chung mar byas nas/ de rim gyis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang rnams su

tshong dus dag lta zhing 'a gsargyal du phyin te// rgyal bo ba gtum po rab snang gis nor mang po dang ldan pa'i ded dpon zhig 'ongs so zhes thos so// des thos nas kyang bdag nyid nor rtsi song ste/ des
'gron ba de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/ de dag gis ded dpon gyi khyim ni 'di yin no zhes byas ba dang/ rgyal po der song ste sgor 'dug nas/ ded dpon gang na 'dug

za0 ces dris pa dang/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sgor byung ste song ngo// des smras pa/ 'di na su 'du// de rnams kyis smras sa/ ded dpon gyi chung ma mchis so// des sgo gtan phye ste nang du zhugs pa dang/
ji tsaman ded dbon gyi chung ma gzugs dang tshod bzang bas 'phags rgyalen gnas pa'i bud med thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhig mthong ngo// des de mthong nas kyang rab tu chags par gyur te smras
ba/ bzangamong dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyodan/ ded dpon gyi shog m btang ngo// des smras kha/ gal ted rten/ mal 'dir 'dug cig ces byas pa dang/ 'dod chags kyis long bar gyur/
bsani mi bya ba ci yang med pa 'iphyir/ de der 'dug pa dang/ rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis sgo bcad de/ phyogs su bcug nas mi bzhis btug ste/ glu len cing sgo zhig nas 'phags rgyal du rob tu zhugs
so de na kha cig ni thal mo go/ khagazhi rgod/ kha cigan 'ad skad du glu len te/ sbyang mi dag gis zla ba zes// rnam thos bu ni gnyor bas ded// sa gzhin gas bcas mkha' la 'bags/
smad 'tshong masazhirag snang khrid/ ces byas ba dang/ 'phags rgyalan gnas ba rnams kyis bsams pa/ ci'i phyi tshong pa 'di dag de skad ces zer snyam pa las/ de rnams sgo gzhan du byung ste/
skyags bcad de bros te song ngo// gsos ba yang phan tshun du rgyal po tshol zhing de rim gyis ko'u sham bar song ngo// blon po dag gis rgyal re shar pa la smras pa// lha dgyes par mdzad du gsolaM/
rgyal po gtum po rab snangani 'dir khugs lags so zhes byas pa dang/ rgyal po shar pas smras pa// shes ldan dag dengal de thogs te tha ga ba'i las slob tu chug cig/ rgyal

po rab snang 'diri 'os par nor lhas byin la gu lang ma zer cig par khrims su yang chos shig ces bsgo'o// ji tsam dusagazhan zhig na rgyal bo shar ba'i khu nor lhas sbyin dang lhan cig tu khang bzangs kyi

steng du byung ste 'dug pa na/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang thags kyi gragang nas bya ba zhig gi phyir sgo byung ba dang/ rgyul po shar pas de mthong nas/ des nor lhas byin la smras pa/ mi 'o ni su yin khyod
thA kyis shes sam/ des kyang ring zhig tu brtags pa dang/ rgyal po de spyi cer zhig ga yin pas ngobasanas/ de mchi mas brnangs bzhin du 'dug ga ste des bsams pa/ rgyal bo ngan pa 'dis bab pa 'di
'dra ba'i gnas skabs su byas kyis/ gal te rgyal bo ngan pa 'di ma bsod na/ nor lhas byin ma yin du zad/ ji ltar bsad pa yang bdag nyid kyis ma tshor ba de ltar gsad do snyam mo// rgyal po de yang

ts+tsA yid rnobazhi pas/ de khros par shes nas/ des sbyor ba 'chang ba kha slob/ sbyor ba 'chang dgra la shalon zin gyis song la rgyal bo gtum po rab snang khrol te khrus gyis ga zan byin la// bkur sti chen pos
'phags rgyal du skyol cig ces bsgo ba dang/ desakyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'phags rgyal du bskyal lo/ dar lhasabyin gyis bsams pa gal te bdag gis bad de nyid gsad pa'i
thabs brtsamasan/ g.yon can 'dis 'phrigs par 'ong bas/ dus cung zad cig gi par du byed do snyam nas/ des de la re zhig cung zad cig bgad pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rtsa ba dang dga' dgur

spyad pa dag gis brid do// de nas de gas dri ma can gyon te/ khri'u dra ba can la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang/ rgyal po shar pa'ibus smras pa// lha mo 'di ci tha tshig/ des smras pa// lha lha rnams 'khrugs
lags so// des smras pa// lha mo tsho 'dog gam ci/ ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin gyis shig/ des spyas ba/ lha gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de ma 'grub lags med/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyod
kyiso dmaci bcas/ gang gis khyod mi dga' bar gyur pa smros shikho dang/ thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod mi deg bar ma byed cig/ des smras pa/ gang gi tshe bdag gi bas lha
bzung ste bzhag pa de'i tshabadag gis lha la 'di skad du jis lha dang bdag lhan cig bde legs su ko'u sham bar byonan/ deng lha dang bdag lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du thas ma tho zhing zhag bdun
'das nas lha me tog gi 'phreng bas rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du dkris te/ ra ba'i ra 'dug par bya'o// bdag ni dka' thub rdzogs nas bram ze stong gab byin la/ mchod pa dang bkur stacher
bya'o zhes dam bcasan/ da lha btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur bas/ ci'i slad du 'di lta bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te/ mdor na 'gum lags su bas so// rgyal pos
sbas pa lhamo khyod kyis lha la gsol ba btab pa yang/ don gyisan pa'i ched kho na yin pas/ longs shig dang thams cad bsgrub par bya'ozhes byas pa dang/ de las

te des khyi gu gnyis shis ra ba'i drung du ba rtags te bzhag na/ de ji tsam mi tsam gyisha zanus ba de tsam du sha gong nas gong du bskyed de no/gang ba tsho khyi gu de gnyis reb de tsam banus pa de'i tshe rgyal po dang/

lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za/ rgyal bo shar pa ni chung ma de la chags pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar dum thos pas de 'dus skya bo bseng bsang por gyur cing/ sha khri na
ba dang nyamachung ba dang/ rgyabar gyur te// zhag bdun len pa dang/ nor lhas byin gyis me tog 'phreng rgyud mkhan rnams la yang/ rgyus pa dgags me tog dri zhim po dag brgyus la myur du
khyer la shog cig ces bsgo'o// sbyor ba 'chang yang deng du lha'i dga' thub gas kyis/ khyod kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la/ bram ze stong dang/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang/
ga zhonan dang/ blon po dang/ grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i gzan sbyor cig ces pa sgo'i/ blon po gzhan dag ni mi tshor bar bya ba'i phyir gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu las su bskos
song sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal bo la snying nyo zhing rjes su chags pas/ grong khyer de rdo dang gsog ma dang gyononamid bar byas/ tsan dan gyi chusani chag chag btab/ bdug pa dri zhim po'i rig

borani ba zhig/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan ni bsgreng/ mu tig dang/ dar gyi chun po dang/ lha ldani spyas/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni bkram ste/ lha rnams kyi spyod mos tshal dag ga 'a ba'i tshal khazhin
du dga' dga' ltar byas nas/ gnas dang gnas rnams su rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs ni bsgrags/garamakhan dang/ snyan dngags mkhan dang/ 'tshotshor can gyi bro mkhan rnams kyisan bri gang bya/

bar brtsams so// cace tshen po byung ba de'i tshe nor lhas byin gyis rgyal bo shar ba'i khur ba khar rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me tog gis dkris nas bsnyal lo// de nas r ba'i kha nas phul
nas lhung ma thag tu gson por byi dag gis rus gong 'ba' zhig lus par byas te/ bya reg dang/ bya rgod dang/ wa dang/ ba ri lo za ba'i srog chags gzhan dag kyang 'thag par gyur to//
kolu'am b.ro lha ra ba'i kha nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las lhung ste khyi dag gis zos so zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur ba dang/ dan kha cib ni du/ khacig ni dga'/ kha cig ni tha mal par 'dug/
kha cig ni 'phrog rlom byed bar gyur to// ku tse tshan bo byung ba de'i tshe ke'u 'am bi na gnas pa'i dge slong dag so sor brisanas/ kha cig na mnyan yod du song ngo// kha cig ni gnas gzhan dang
gzhan du song ngo// skabs der sbyong ba 'chang dang/ blonodi khagazhan rnams dang/ kosham bin gnas pa'i mi'i gtso dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis ku tse zhi bar byas te/ de
nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal bor ba'i khar song/ ji ltar ra ba'i dung na/spyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tubartag par brtsams so// des de ltar brtags pa dang/
nor lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis gsad pa rtsad ched do/ de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so// ge slong dag the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom
thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po shar ba'i bus las tsazhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/ khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las
'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bu nyid kyi las tshogs rnyed pa// rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba// 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi
za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/ dge slong dgargyal bo shar pa'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan susaM so sor nyams su myong bar gyur/ dge slong dag las
byas shing bsags pa rnams n phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams lam yon/ me'i khams lam yin/ rludagi khams lam yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge
ba'i las byas pa dag ni thon pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang skya mchod dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang// las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te// tshogs/
[GV TT-T4 N55555555F x IẤT THIẾT BỊ AN 1H 300iss EN5vs 5 5 5 1 SY5NVIEN]
ba dang dman pa la thugs rtse ba bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/ sbyin ba gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas/ sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing ri bong der
phyin pa dang/ gas shig tunubamo gnas so// de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thegasanasari bor gyi grong khyer der bsod snyoms ' gzhugs M pa daraM/ mdunan 'don

de yang khyi khridenas phyir byung ste/ des rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la khyi rbad do// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po

shar ba'i bu 'di yin te/ 'dasen de'i tshe de'i dusana'adra sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod pa ma byed pa la khyi chad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par sminengs tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyis zosanas
dus las 'das te/ da ltar gyi bar du yang khyis thos te dus las 'das par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar las gcig/duganag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tuganag/ gcig
dudakar ba rnams kyi gang gcig tu dkar/ 'drenam rnams kyi yang 'dren ma ste/ dge slong dag de lta bas na las gci'i tu gnag pa dang/ 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tudakar ba
bdag kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/ dge slongade dag bcom ldan
'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs ta mngon par bstod do// rgyal po shar pa'i bu dus las 'das nas/ rgyal bo khagatum po rab snang 'gran zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur
to de dus gzhan zhigan khang bzas kyi stong du byung nas/blon po'i tshig sa kyis bskor togatam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod do// shes ldan dgagrong dang/ grong khyer dang/ gnas

gangan smad 'tshong ma bzang mo yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi la mkhas pa zhig mchis
te de mthong ma thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i stongan 'ga' yang mamachis so// rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa thos nas/
zla thosal thagadu chags par gyur te smras pa/ gsos pa ci byas kyang mi phan/ de lta bu'i khung med la dga' dgur spyod dgos pas/ rdo 'jog song ste de dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod par bya'o//
des smras pa/ lha rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po can ni yun ring bonas khyod kyi kha shed mar gyur pa/ phyir rgolo bar gyur ro/mi mdza' bar gyur pa lags la/ de'i rtag tu rdo 'joganamachis lags pas/
jiste rdo bgo/ tu gshegs na gdon ma 'tshal bar des lharlag par bgyid lags so// des smras par// mi rnams kyi nang na mig thu lums can dag lta yodamod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni 'din 'dug cig nga
ni 'gro'o// des smras pa// jiste lha de lta bur dgyes na/ lha[']nyid mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang ngag mdzad pa'i rigs so// rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas/ des de'i tshig
mamanyananas/ glangapo che'i gtseb 'dam bu'ing la zhon ti 'jogatusong ngo// de ma gyis song nas gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang/ des de glang po tshegatseb 'dam bu'i bzhag nas rdo 'jog
du song ngo// de nas mu tig bde deshal srang brgya stong ra ba mgul nas bkrol te/ bzangam gzugs kyis 'tsho ba'i gan du song nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
dgur spyod par byed de// 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag gang dag shes ldan dag rgyal po mi snang na/ gang bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang/ de na kha cig gis smas ba/
de ci'i mi phal pa yin nam/ des na mi mngon mngon ra ram 'gyur du zad kyi/ de gar yang nim bzhud de// gzhan dag gis smas pa/ de ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgyatshapa yin pas/ ci'i phyir phyi rol
khya'abyang ste/ btsun mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' ba dang/ rtsed mo se sog nyams su myong bar byed do// kha cig gis smras pa// 'di'i the tshom bu ci yod/ tshungashog gsos pa la 'dri 'dong ngo// kha
ga gis legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/ de dag thams cad 'dus te/ gsos pa'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ gsos pa lha mi snangan ga shed du ma bzhud grang/
des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci ris/ mthong bar 'gyur ro// de dag gis smras pa/ gsos pa ji srid ci na mthong bar 'gyur/ des smras pa/ le bcugs lenanas so// de dag khros
nas smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir de skad smra ba lasan ba don ma the par khyod kyis lha bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal srid byed par 'dod do// de'i phyir re zhig gal te zhag bdunan lha ltar yodan/
de ltan legs/ ji sta medan ni yid kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes byas pa dang/ de cung zir bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de/ sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa ba glang skyong
gi ma zhi bas thos nas/ des de bos te dris pa/ gsos pa khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ des smras pa/ lhamo bram ze dag 'di skad ces mchin/
tshiltar sems khongs su chud cing ma mchis/ des smras pa/ gsos pa gal te de lta na song nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsus pa gser snod kyi nang du blugs te/ rtamang bo la la brgyus pa

zla gang yin pa de gi mdun du zhog la 'di skad ces/ gang zhig deng nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba des nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsus pa 'di dag tho zhib ces smyos la/ de ltar byas te rta bzing po
gang gis zos pa de nga la spyon cig/ gsos pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du byas na/ 'ga' yang tha bar spro ba med de// phyogs gzhan zhig na rta 'di skye ba/ lus smra bar gyur pa/ nam bab dbugs

rgodo ba/ rna ba chag pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas/ gang zhig deng nyid rdo'athob tu 'gro bar spro ba de/ nas kyi chasamar dang sbrang mas bskus pa 'di dag khro zhig/ ces
smras pa dang/ des de dag thos so// gsus pas song nas/ ba gang skyong ga ka zhi pa la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ gses pa song la stod cig/ gal te stod pa'i tshes sun
byed na khyod kyis ma 'jigs par spungs skyed cig/ sems stobs dang ldan pa la ni sus kyang ma rdzi'o// de song nas de bstad par brtsams pa dang/ de skyod pa'i tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'o
gzugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/ kA ya mi khyod kyis sngonachad 'di ltabu'i mthong ba 'ga' yod dam zhes smras so// des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigasanas/ kakA ye lta'i srin gakhyod

kyis sngon chad rta zhen pa su la yang lcag 'di lta bu mthong ba yod dam zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ kyagi sngon mthong ngo// des kyi rta'i srin po gol te re zhig ma sun mi byed na de ltan lags/
ji lta byed namago drung nas bcad de sa la dor bar bya'o// des smras pa/ kyei ji sta de ltan gal te bdag ga phyir 'dir khrid de mi 'ong bar dam 'cha'an 'gro'o// des smras pa/ lags kyis/ de bzhin
dubyas 'dong ngozhes smras nas/ des de la zhon te song nas rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin to// rgyal po rab snang gis mthong nas smras kha/ gsos pa 'ongs sam/ des smras pa/
lhamachis so// gos pa ci zhig gicur zhes khyes pa dang/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// rgyal bos smras ba/ gsos pa re zhige zhag bdun gyi bar du rtses la/ zhag bdun 'das pa dang/
dus shes par bya'o zhes byas nas/ zhag bdun gyi par du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad de/ zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo// tun shing rir phyin nas bdag nyid kyis
glang bo che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i bstad par brtsams pa dang/ des bstad ban skad phyung ba/ de dang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan lang ba zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ des smras pa/ glang

bo tsho'i gtso bo 'di'i skad dang spyin/ bad ni 'di nas dpag tshad brgyar song nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur// de nas rgyal bo rab snang dang gsos pa gleng ba tsho'i gtso
[“]3 bo 'dam bu'ing la zhon te song ngo// re zhig cigan phyogs shig na ljamakhan zhig 'dug pa de'i snod sol btang pa dgacig 'am bu'i mi'i rkang pas brdzisanas/ rdzakhan gyis mya ngan bya bar
brtsams pa dang/ gsos pas smras pa/ gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar gyur ro// rgyal po rnams ni grwa bzhin khu 'grig za ba yin pas/ rgyal po rab snang gis bsams pa// gsos pa 'di
bdag la zur tha ste/ bo dag gcig bu sas 'tshob yin nam/ mjal lo snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo// yang phyogs shi na mkhring yigyis lam skar tshang bcas pa de'i sgo nga dag 'dam
khu'iri'i rkang pas bcom nas/ des kyang mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang/ gsos pas smras// gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur// rgyal po rab snang de bzhin du
rtog pa skyes s bsams pa// yang 'di dag la zur bra ste/ ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gi spyod yul ma yin nam/ mjal kho snyam du bsams nas cang ma bor bar song ngo// yang 'dam bu'i shing drung
na mar song pa dang/ shing de'i yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des brlabs nas/ rgyal po rab snang bza' bar brtsams so// re zhi'o/nagasos nga sa mthong nas/ des de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste
dum bu dum bur gtubasanas sa la bor ba dang/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba gsos pasabaltas te smras l/ bgang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ rgyal
po rab snang de kho na bzhin du rtog pa skyes nasakhasams pa/ 'di bdag la lan gsum gyi bar du zur za ste/ ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gis don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam/ 'jul snyam du bsams
nas cang mi zer bar song ngo// dus gzhan zhigan 'damabu'i ri bang theg lta song nas/ rgyal pos de bzung ba dang/ ma thubanas/ gsos pas smyos pa/ lha bram ze ltas mkhan gyis 'di dpag tshad
[7 ]/brgyar song nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyis/ de'i slad du myur du shing gi yal ga la 'jus te/ glang po che thoge ces
byas pa dang/ des myur ba myur ba shing gi yal ga la 'jus so// gsos pas kyang yong gi yal ga la 'jus pa dang/ 'dam bu'i ri 'das te song ngo// rgyal pos/ gsos pa lasmras pa// gsos

ba song la mtshor bar shi ba lo lha ni byon nas skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig/ de song nas myur bar de la brjod pa dang/ de dga' ba skyes nas cang mi zer ba 'dug go/ rgyal pos kyang stor
[%]khung nas 'dzul bar brtsams pa las/ re zhig na bu mo gnyis shig bsangasar byungab dang/ de na gcig gis smras pa// grogs mo lha 'ongs so zhes grag go/ cig shos kyis de stor khung nas
'dzul 'a zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bos shes nas des bsams pa// gsos pa la bdag gis khyed kyis ma tshor bar zhi ba la smos shig ces bsgo na/ des khyim na 'dug pa la smras se snyam du bsams
wA tu de khros nas des gsos pa ji lta ji ltar gyur pa dran par byas nas klan kabatsal ba/ gsos pa khyod ka nga la gnod pa byed par zhugs pa lta nga gcig bu sa 'tsho ba yin nam cin/ gang gi

phyir khyod nga la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu gang dag sas batsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur ba/ smad 'tshongam pa'i spyod yul ma yin nam ci la phyogs shig tug nga dgag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de

dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur po zhes zur za/ smad 'tshong ma sa don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam ci// yang phyobagasanga'i gtumang gang dag don du nyer bar bya ba ma yin pa den du gnyer ba de dag 'di ltar 'gyur ro

zhes thung tha/ da gzod kyang nga skyed mos tshal na 'dug bas/ khyod song la ma tshor ba zhi ba 'alha byon te skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes kyi shis ces bsgo bgon/ khyod kyis khyiman 'dug pa de'i la smras
pas khyod ni nga la gnod pa byed par zhugs so// de degs shing ma dag 'anas/ yid ches par bya ba'i phyir smras pa// lha sdig pas ni brlag ste/ bdag gis lha la thung bgyis pa ma mchis so//
bdag bas lha la ji ltar zur bgyis/ lha 'di skad du gnas che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni/
phyogs der rdza mkhan gyi snod sa ma btang ba dgacig 'dam bu'i rkang pas brdzis nas/ rdza mkhan des mya ngan bgyi bar brtsams pa dang/ bdagagis de las khasams nas 'di skad du/ gang dag sas

'tshob de dgan 'di ltar 'gyur re zhes bgyi bar byas so// phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang
lags pas/phyogs der srog chab sa mthing ril gyi sgo nga dag 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas/ de yang mya ngan byed par brtsams pa dang/ bdag gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du/ gang dag spyod
yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par byas so// phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag don du gnyer pa ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag
ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/ zhes thur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni/ phyogs der shing gi yal ga la sprul zhig gnas pa des banabs nas/ lha bslab bar brtsams pa dang/ bdag gis
ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur bcad nas de sa la ltung ba dang/ bdag gis de lasar sams nas 'diskyod du/ gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer pa de dag ni 'di ltar/
zla 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par byas so// sa khyod la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes kyis shig ces byas nas/khyod kyis khyim na gnas pa ril la smras so/ zhes gsungs pa gang/
lags pa de yang bdag gis ma tshor ba kho nar zhi ba la bgyisan/ bdag ji ltar lha la gnod pa bgyid par zhugs pa lags/ rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa khyod kyis nga la lan thams cad legs
par banan/ da gzod nga ster khung nas 'dzul pa na nga bdag nyid kyis bud med gnyis shig las gcig gis grogs mo lhani byon no zhes grag go zhes byas pa dang/ cig shos na re/ de ster khung nas
kyi 'dzul la zhes zer ba thosan/ de sus byas shig ga gu/ lha de dag ni 'phra men ma lags na/ lags kyang 'tshal mod/ der yang bdag gis lha la gnod pa ma bgyis so// rgyal pos smras pa// gsos
pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de de ltar yin mod kyi/ sa khyod bgams par zad kyis/ mi dga' bar mkhyed cig/ 'on kyang nga rdo'og tusong ba'i tshe bram ze gang dag gis gzhan zhig rgyal po ma dam pa
bskur bar brtsams pa de dag thag gzhug pa'idus 'di yin pas/ de rnams gsad par bya'o// des smras pa/ lha bram ze rnams re zhig gzhag tugasol/ 'phra men ma de rnams ji dgum par
bgyi'o rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa de rnams ji ltar gsad par nus/ lha bdag gis de rnams khums pa'i thabs shig bgyi'o// gsos pa legs kyis/ de bzhin du gyis shig/
ces byas pa dang/ gsos pas mdun na 'don gyi khye'u rig sngags smrab makhas pa zhig yod pa de'i drung du song nas/ bu 'phra men ma 'di dag skye bo mang po gsedapar byed na/ de dag gzung bar bya
ba'i thabs de 'ga' yod dam/ zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ yapa ci bgyir mchis bdagagis gzung bar byas so// bu legs so zhes byas pa dang/ des mi la gang la ut+pa
la 'dra par bsgyur nas mi'i lag tu bskul nas smras pa// kye mi khyodaseng la srung du phyin nas 'dug la/ su yin gyis nyo ba de la ma sbyin par/ gang zhig ma shong na dgod pa de'i ming dris te glegs
bu la bris shigaM/ des de thogs te 'dug nas khang zhig ni gyis nyob de la mi ster/ gang zhig mthong nas dgod pa des nga ni dris nas glegs bu la 'dri bar byed de/ des de ltar 'phags rgyal
gyi 'phra men ma lnga brgya'i ming sa nas bris so// de nas gsos pa la bstan nas// gsos pas kyang rgyal po la bstan pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/
gsos pa 'phramen ma mang po 'di dag ji ltar kha gdag/ des smras ba/ lha de rnams ji ltar dgum pa'i thobs bdag 'tshal gyis/ lha thugs khral ltung du gsol/ des smras pa/
shA gsos pa legs te khyod nyid shes so// des 'phags rgyal gyi phyogs shig tu 'khor gyi khyams shig byas nas/ des lhan mamo'idimatshig la 'jug gis/ 'phags rgyalane srin mo
snyad gnas pa thamasacad 'khor gyi khyams su 'du par gyis shig ces dril bsgrags pa dang/ de dag gis bsams kha/ lha 'khor gyi khyams su ma mo'adim tshig la 'jug pa der bdag
zlacag la rdzas bzang bo mang du ster gyis/ 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ gang dag mi mngon par 'dug 'dug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa la chags pas bdag nyid nye bar bstan to/ srin mo lnga brgya lhag tsam
'khoragyi khams su lhags so// de nas mdunan 'den gyi bu des/ de dag thams cad rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang/ gsos pas kyang de rnams kha btag go/ rgyal pos 'phag
rgyalan gnas pa'i bram ze rnams bos nas/ shes ldan dag bdag gis 'phramanam 'di snyad cig bsad pas/ bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed kyis/ khyod kyis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa de
las dbyung ba'i phyir/ nyin gcig bzhin 'khor gyi khyams su 'du zhing gzan tho zhig ces bsgo ba dang/ de rnams kyis shis pa brjod pa byas nas khas blangs so// rgyal bo rab snang gis/ sgo bal
bsgol/kyi skyes bu bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su ga ban thos nas 'gro ba de dag thams cad khyod kyis legs par bgrangs te nga la stod ga/ des smras pa/ lha de ltar bgyi sta gsol bar
'tshal go/ rgyal pos/ blon po rnams la yang bso ba/ shes ldan dag 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su gzan za ba thems cad la/ kha zas bsod pa phal
cheng ne'i/ bram ze rnams na phal cher lta 'dun can yin pas/ rgyal po des de ltar byed du bcug go zhes thosanas/ thams cad lhags nas gzan bza' bar brtsams so/ de rnams
gzan zosanas 'khor gyi khyams nas phyir byung ba dang/ sgo bas bgrangs nas lhag chad med par bram ze brgyad khrikhyung ste/ desargyalapo la lha lhag chad mamachis par bum the brgyad khri mchis
so zhes gsol to// rgyal pos gang gis na 'di rnams dus gcig tu mgo khacad pa'i thabs de gang yin snyam du bsams nas/ des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo kha/ bram ze gzan khra ba re re'i
rgyab tu gshed ma mi ral gri thogs pa re re 'og la/ gangagi tshengs zhe 'on cib ces smras pa de'i tshe/ thams cad kyi mgo da cig/ rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de ltar byas ba dang/ 'phags
do rgya lan gnas pa'i bram ze rnams las 'badag gi zhags pas zin pa brgyad khri tham pa 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus pa de dag sbyor ba des cig cur mgo bcad do// des
na'aphags rgyalan gnas pa'i bram ze las bram ze brgyad khri rgyal po rab snang gis bsad do//des de dag bsadanas/ nub mo ma chen por nyal ban/ rmi lam du sa bla'i sgra
drug dang/ bar snang gi sgra drugan shis/ rmi lam rnam pa brgyad ni mthong ngo// sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drug med bag ngan sems bdag cag 'di rnams zhes
bya ba ste/ 'di dag na 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ga dang po nin/ de la dug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ lan stong phrag drug cu dang/ lenibargya phrag drug cu ru//
sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi// nam zhigamathan phyin par 'gyur// med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pane de mtha mdamatha' ltag la yod// nga dang khyed cag nyidakyis/
mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyub// de ltar sdig pa'i las khyasaso// bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pani/ bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag/ mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs
pa gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/ bdag cagasdug bsngal skal can 'gyur// ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pani/ 'di na bdag cag 'tshob na/ bdag cag khang pe dog de ma
ba0 btang khongs spyod dag na yod pa'i tshe// bdag nyid lan banam byas/ sems zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad bzhi/ sems kyis su zhibaslus gyur cing// mi shes pas ni bu dus gyur pa//
sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi// gan ni su zhig byed par 'gyur// 'di rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag 'di rnamaMs bde 'groru// song ste dge ba tshong byas
nas/ de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing/ shis pa byas rnams mtho ris dang// bar snang gi sgo drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams tsad/ sugang dand rnams 'di dganyis
bya ba ste 'di dag nags su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang bo yin no// de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pan/ thams cad gsog tuphyang khrin te// 'di la snying po ma
zhig lus// rgyal po srin desnyingal// dag 'bamed pas re ba bog/ su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ su zhig gnyen len tshul ngan po'i// mig gcig kyang 'byor byed
pa// des bdag 'a bu tsha dang// bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas// gang zhes bya ba las tshags su bcad pani/ rdzong 'di nya dang rus sbalani// mang po dag gis gang ba
las da ni sprul pas 'tsho mod kyi// bdag gis gnas mi 'dor ro// dan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pani/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la// bdag la rkang pas nom byed
ba'i lab nyon mongs de dag ni// da ni mgon yang med par gyur// de rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las// chun/
bsil zhing zhim pa dag/ bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur// bdag kyang da ltar der dga' 'o/ 'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ 'di dag khrus byas bros nas ni// phyogs dang
phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bdag ni yis bzung gyur ba// ston go sdig kha cizhig byas// rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhen 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang/ tsan
dan dmar pos gtong ba dang/ klad la me 'bar pa dang/ 'chan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang/ rkang pa gnyis la nyakhar ba gnyis ldag pa dang/ ngang pa gnyis nam mkha'
la 'phur ba dang/ ri nag po zhige 'dun na tshur 'ong pa dang/ chu sbyar dag mgo la rtag pas 'thor ba mthong ngo// de gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed nas/
gzhi 'di la sa bdag rgya'asrid las nyams pa 'am/ srogal bar chad du mi 'gyur gang snyam mo// des rmi lam de dgabram ze tshilam gyi dpyad shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bos te snyad pa dang/
de dag gis bsamasapa/ lhas rmi lam de dag bzang po zhig mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang bsngags pa ni mi bya ste/ gal te bsngags na 'di ji lta ba ngan pa gyur nas/ bram ze lhag ma gang dag yin
ba de dag kyang ma lus bar byed bar 'ong ngo snyam du rig nas gros byas te smras pa// lha rmang 'am mi bslang pa dag cig go/ des smas ba/ shes ldan dag gang gis 'bras bu cir 'gyur/ de dag
gis smas ba/ gzhi de las lha rgyal sride las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro// rgyal bos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na nga rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur
zhing srogagi bar chad du yang ma 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta 'ga' yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa// lha khyod kyis sdig pa chen po byas te// bram ze brgyad khri bsad ngas de'i slad du/ gal
te spyodan thabs gcig ci mchis so// de bram ze bsad pa dran nas snyi kun bdar te smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci bya smosashig/ de dag gis smras pa// lha skyodachos tshal du rdzing bu brkor
sul te/ brkos nas/ rdo thal gyis nyug tu stsol cig/ de nas der yan lag gi mchog lta bo gsos pa dang/ mdun na 'don dang/ ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang/ skya bsang gi khu mo sgrol
ma dang/ gzhon nu ba glang skyong rnams bsad de bcug la/ de rnams kyi khrag gis khrus mdzad de/ rdzing bu nas byung 'dus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas/ bram ze rnams kyi rkang ba la lces bldag
na de ston khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par m 'gyur shing/ srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro// rgyal bosaM bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis yan lag gi mchog lnga po gses pa dang/
mdunan 'don dang/ ba glang skyong gis zhi ba dang/ skya bseng gi bu mosgrolom dang/ gzhon nu ba glangaskyong rnams bsad nas/ bdag rgyal byas te yang ci rung snyam du bsams
nas/ bram ze rnams la smras pa// shes ldan dag khyed kyis gang smras pa de ngas blos kyis/ des shig dang/ re zhig bsams tabya'o/ bram ze rnams dong pa dang/ de lag pa 'gram pa'i
gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa/ ba glang skyong gis zhi bas mthong ste/ des smras pa/ lhaci'i slad du phyag 'gramang la ba gtad de sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ des ji ltar
gyur pa thams cad de la bsnyad pa dang/ des smras pa/ ]lhabram ze de dag ni rtag du mi shigs pa ston pa lags pas/ de dag 'tshal/ bzhud la 'phags pa sa'i bu chen po la zhus shig/
des smras l/ zhib legs so legs so// khyod kyis dus su 'phags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la gtad pas 'gro'o zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu ga la ba der song ngo// de der song ste
song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po la gtum po rab snang gis/ tshe dang
dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// slob dpon ka t+yA'i bu chen po 'di na bdag mtshan mo mal chen po zhig na nya' zhing mchis pa'itsho/ rmi lom du sa bla'i sgra dug dang/ ga
ba'i/ snang gi sgra drugan thos/ rmi lam brgyud rim nga ste/ saba'i sgra drug gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ drug mod/ bdag/ na sems bdag cag 'di rnams zhes bya ba ste/ 'di dag ni 'dir
tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lags so// de la gtsos bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ len snyi phrag drug cu dang// lo ni brgya phrag drug cu ru// sems can dmyal bar
'tshod rnams kyi/ donam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur mod ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/mtha'amed mtha' lta ga la yod// nga dang khyod cag nyid kyis ni// mtha'anyid
dmigs bar mi 'gyur ba// de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so// bdag ces bya ba 'as tshigs su bcad pa ni/ bdag cag gisani longs spyod dag/ mthun da nga mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa//
gzhan dag ga bde bas dga' byed kyi// bdag cag sdug bsngalaskal can gyur// ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pani/ 'dun bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/ bdag cag gang bdog di ma gtang/
les spyod dgan yod pa'i tshe// bdag nyid lan u0f7ana ma byas/ sems zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pan// sems kyis sunabaslus gyur cing// shes pas ni bdas gyur ba//
sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi/ kha/tani su zhig byed par gyur/ 'di rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pani/ bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru// song ste dge ba mang
byas nas// de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing// shis pa byas rnams matho ris 'dong// bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad su gang
dan de rnams 'di dag/ces bya ba ste// 'di dag ni tshigs su bcad ba drug gi yi le dang po lags so// de la thams cad skyes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pan/ thams cad gsog du byung
zin te// de la snying po tsam zhig lus// rgyal po srin de snying bo la// dga' ba med pas re ba bor// su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ su zhig gnyen len tshul nganabo'i mig
yacig kyang 'jog byed pa// des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/ dgang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pan/ rdzong 'di nya dang rus sbal ni/ mang po dag
gis gang ba lags// danusbalangs 'tsho med kyi// bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro// da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/ gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la// bdag la rkang pas nom
byed pa'i// long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/ da ni mgon yang med par gyur// de rnams zhes bya ba lasatshigs su bcad pa ni/ de rnams mtshon bcad ngo las// mun bsi'o zhing zhim pa/
zi/ dag/ bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang da ltar der dab/'a 'o// 'di dag gces bya ba las tshig/sa su bcad pa ni/ 'di dag khrus byas thos nas ni// phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro
0 bar byed// bdag ni ri yis bzung gyur pa// sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas// rmilam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tsan dan dkapos lus byugs pa dang/ tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba/
dang klad lan 'bar ba dang/ mchan khung gting nas sbrul gnyis 'thung ba dang/ rkang ba gnyis la 'khor ba gnyis ldab pa dang/ ngang ba gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang/ rinag po
zhig mdun na tshur 'ong ba dang/ chu skyar dag mgo la rtog pas 'thor ba mthong ste/ gnyid sadanas 'jigs par gyur/ bag tsha bar gyur cing/ spu zing zhes bgyid nas/ gzhi 'di las
bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'i m srog gi bar tshad du ma gyur grang snyam bgyid do// 'phags pa ka ta'i bu chen po la bdag don 'di zhun/ gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams
pa 'am/ srogagi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags grang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka ta'i bu chen pos smras pa// rgyal tshon po khyod kyis sgra de dag dang/ rmi lam de dag gzhan 'ga' zhig la bsnyad dam/
des smras pa/ 'bags ba bsad do// su zhig la/ bram pho rnams la'o/ de dag gis khyod la ji skad du lung bstan/ des jo ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad pa dang/ des smras// rgyal po chen
bo de dag ni rtag tu 'dod pa la longs spyad pa dang/ lha'i 'jig rten mngon par 'dod pa yin te/ de dag shes/ khyod kyis sgra bzang po dag cig kyang thos/ rmi lam bzang po dag cig kyang mthong gis//
khyod ma 'jigs shi ga dang/ gzhi de las khyod rgyal srid las nyams par yang mi 'gyur/ srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po khyod
kyi rmi laman/ sa ba'i sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de ga nga gi ltas yin zhe na/ khyod kyi mdun rol gyi rgyal bo drug/ cig gis chos dang chos yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pas/ lus zhig
nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyin ng du skyes so/ 'dul ba phran tshogs kyi gzhi// bam po nyi shu rtsa dgu pa/ de na gcig gis sems
can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyenanas tshigs su bcad pa// len stong phrag drug cu dang/ la ni brgya phrag drug gcu ru/ khems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi// nam zhig ga mthar ni phyin
khar gyur// zhes bya ba smras so// gnyis pas tshigs su bcad pa/ ma 'amadamatha' lta ga la yod// nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni// mtha' nyid dmigs par ma 'gyur ba// de ltar
sdig pa las byas so// zhes bya ba smras so// gsum pas tshigs su bcad pa/ bdag cag gis ni las spyod dag man dang mi mthunapas bsgrubs pa// gzhan dag bde bas dga'
byed kyi// bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur// zhes bya ba smras so// khazhi bas tshigs su bcad pa// 'di na bdag cag 'tsho pa na// bdag cig kha gang bdag de ma btang// les/
spyod dgan yod pa'i tsho// bdag nyid la ni bsam dus// zhes bya ba smras so// lnga pasatshigs su bcad pa/ sems kyis lus ni bslus gyur cing// mi shes pa ni bdas gyur ba//
soms can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi// gnya' ni su zhib byed bar gyur// zhes bya ba smras so// drug pas tshigs su bcad pa/ bodag cag 'di rnams bad 'gro ru// song ste dag
ba mdu byas nas// de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing// shis pa byas rnams mtho nas 'dong// zhes bya ba smras te/ de dag ni de'i ltas yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bar snang 'ag

sgra dag thos pa la/nga yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhen khyod kyi tshigyi gdung ma de la srin bu zhig gnas pa des// de'i snying po ma yin pa thams cad zos nas/ snying bo nyi tshe lus pa dang/ de de ltar mngon par mi
dga' nas tshigs su bcad pa// thams cad gsog tu byung zin te/ 'di la snying po tsam zhig lus// rgya bo srin de snying po la// dga' ba med pas re ba bor// zhes bya ba smras so//

nam mkha'i sgra dang ngan de yin te/ de bas na khyod kyis phung la gdung gzhan zhig chug cig/ rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi rta rdzi gnyen len zhes bya ba des/ bya rog mo'i sgo du byung zhing byung ba
rnams bcom pa dang/ de bu dang bral bas yid mi bde ba skyes ti/ snying rje rje skad du nga zhing dal bus tshigs su bcad pa/ su zhig gnyen len tshul ngan po'i// mig ya cig kyang bar byed pa/
des ni bdag gi tsha dang// bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas// zhes bya ba smras ta/ nam mkha'i sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyis/ khyod kyis de 'joms su
gzhug cig/ gzhan yang khyod kyi khyiman rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slebs tsam du chus kha da chad du gang ba nya dang/ rus sbale dang/ sbal pa mang po gnas pa den/ chu skyar gcig
ga ta dag ba zhing 'dug pa las/ de da bskams te/ tshumed par gyur ba dang/ chu skyar des de lta bu de mthong nas/ mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad b/ rdzong 'di dang dus sprulani/ mang
bo dag gis gang ba las// da ni sba bas 'tsho mod kyi/ bdagagis gnas niam 'di'i// zhes bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de chus kheng
zhig/ gzhan yang khyod kyi yul na ra bo bdun ldan zhes bya ba de la/ glang bo chodang/ glang po che mo dmus long zhig la gnas te/ de gnyis la bu gcig yod pa de/ de dag gi'i
gro byed de// de de gnyis kyi bras kyi phyir song ba dang/ glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa las/ de khyod kyis thabs kyis nges te khrid de 'osanas btags te pazhig pa dang/
de ma dang pha'i rjes su chu ngan byed cing rtsa yang mkhra/ duyang m 'o thung bar/ de dag rjes su dran zhing mi dga' bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad pa/ gang zhigari bo gtum ldan la/ bdag lang
sab/ bsanom byed pa'i// leng ba nyon mongs de dag ni// da ni mgon yang med par gyur// ces bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra bzhi pa na de yan gyis/ pha ma'i grogs byed pa shin m rung bas//
khyod kyis de thong tshe// gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ri dgas shig bzung ste 'dug ba de khyu dang khral bas/ dgon pa'i ri dgas rnams dran nas tshigs su bcad pa// de rnams mtsho nibabrang bo
las/ chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag/ bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/ bdag kyang de ltar der dga' 'o// zhes bya ba smras te/ bar snang gi sgra lnga pa ni de yin gyis/ khyod kyis de
thong zhige// gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ngang ba dag cig bzung ste 'dug pa de dag gis/ ngang ba gnam la 'phur ba dag mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/ 'di dag khrus byas thos/
nas niI// phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bdag ni rnyi yis bzung gyur pa// sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas// zhes bya ba smras te/ nam mkha'i sgra drug pa de yin pas/ de dag kyang
khyed kyis gtang bar bya ste/ de na de dag gi ltas yin no/ rgyal bo chen po khyod kyis rmi lam brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ci'i lnga ltas yin zhe na/ re zhig tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs par
mthong ba gang yin pa ni/ khyod la lus 'phags kyi rgya la bos gos be'u ras yug po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de zhag bdunan byin par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyi
rmi lam dang po ni de'i snga ltas yin no// khyod kyis lus la tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni/ khyod las 'dzin gyi rgyal pos la pa rin po che zhig
skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdun na byin par 'gyur bas/ rmi'o ma gnyis pa'i de'i ltas laneno/ khyod kyis klad pa la me 'bar bar mthong ba gang yin pa
ni/ khyod la yul ya bzhi'i rgyal bos gser gyi 'phreng ba shig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing bdug ste/ de yang zhag bdunan byon par gyur bas/ khyod kyi lam gsum pan di'i
zla lnga ltas yin no// khyod kyi lochan khung lags nas sbrul gnyis 'byung pa mthong ba gang yin bani/ khyod la rgya'i rgyal bos ral gri zung tsage skyes su bskur ba 'amadu zhug shing 'dug ste/ de
mang zhag bdunan phyin par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyi rmi lam bzhi ban de'i snga ltas yin na/ khyod kyi rkang pa gnyis la lha khang paganyis ldag pa mthong ba gang yin pa ni/ khyod lasang ga la'i rgyal
N+NaM bos nor bu'i lham zung gcigoskyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de ya zhag bdunan byin par 'gyurabs/ khyod kyi rmi lam lnga pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no// khyod kyis ngang pa gnyis
mamakha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni/ khyod la bag le'i rgyal pos rtaganyis shig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdunan phyin par 'gyur bas/ khyod kyi

ma drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no// khyod kyis re zhig kho zhig mdun nas tshur 'ong ba mthong ba gang yanipa den khyod la ka ling ka'i rgyal bos glang nge po'i ga tse po zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing
'dug ste/ de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas/ khyed kyi rmi lam bdun pa'i de'i snga ltas yin no// khyod kyis chu sbyar dgag mgo la rtag pas 'thor ba mthong ba gang yini pa de ni/ khyod dang ba
glang skyong ba ma zhi pa she bar 'gyura'o// khyod kyis bram ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang/ rgyal po rab snang srog ster ba las phying red pa bzhin du dga'
ba dang/ mgu ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ ras pa dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos bshad dka' rjes su yi rang nas/ rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
'tshal te/ stan las langs te song ngo de rang gi khyim du song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bsgrubs te/ gdung ma yang gzhan zhig bcug rta leganyen
len yang de ltar byed du ma bcug/ rdzing bu yang chus bkang/ glang po che dang/ ri dgas dang/ dad pa rnams kyang btang ngo// zhag bdunan de'i skyes ji skadabastan pa klams cad kyang phyin nas//

de nor rnyed pas yid bde ba skyes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la rje sems mngon par dad par gyur pa bsams pa/ bdag gi khyiman dbal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod/
ma@#// ba de thams cad ni'aphags bkatu'i bu chen po la brten nas byung ba yin no// de'i phyir re zhig gos re'u sa phug po che 'di bskur la/ byis rgyal srid bstabs par
[o]bya'o snyam du rig gnas/ zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod tshur gos de ras yug po tshe 'di khyer la/ 'bags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la phul cig ces byas pa dang/ des gos be'u ras yug
po che de khyer nas/ 'bags pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la byin no// de nas bslang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang/ skya bseng gi bu mo sgrolam dang/ gzhon nu ba glang skyong dang/ gsos pa dang/ mdun don
la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngal yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis skyes 'di dag bskur gyis/ khyod ngaji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khyer go/ de nas glang skyongagi ma zhi bas
ni gser gyi 'phreng ba khyer/ skyakhaseng gi bu mo sgrol mas ni la ba rin po che/ gzhon nu ba glang skyongag se ni rtogs/ gsos pas niral gri zung gag/ mdun na 'don gyis na ning khu'i
lham khrungogacig khyer te/ glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro// de nas rgyalaM po rab snang yan lag gi mchog lnga la rin po che dag gis bgo bsha' byas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka ta'i khu
chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po rab snang gis/
wa tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/'phags pa na 'dogs shing gces spras mdzad pa lags te/ de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa la rgyal srid stobs na/ thugs brtse ba
bar bzung ste rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/tshodang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/ rgyal bo chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag ge/ rgyal pos smras pa//
'phags pa gal te de lta na 'dod pa thams cad stobasan/ 'dod pa thams cad yos su spyad du gsal/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa thams cadekyakhakago
rgyal bos smras pa/ 'phags pa gal te de ltan 'khongs spyod dang/ las spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs na/ bas su spyad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po re zhig bcom ldan 'das
la zhus te bya'o// rgyal pos smras ba/ 'bags pa de ltar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'daso'i mnyan yodan rgyal bu rgyalakhyed kyi chal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
rab n bzhugs so/ skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang/ mi gzigs pa dang/ mi sa ba dang/ rnam par mi ge ba cung zad kyang mi tshong 'a ste/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ dge slong ka t+ya'i bu chen po longs spyod dang/ longs spyod kyi mtshega rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin modakyi/ 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma rnams la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs
nas bag rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/ srog chags grog
spur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// gagi tshi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa'i tshe na/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang
bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/ byol song gi skye gnas su song ba rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dona'adi la ni bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen po'i
N+NaM thugs dang sems su 'phrod pa'i 'jig rten ba'i thugs bskyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA'i bu chen pos lha'i mig dang/ lha'i na pa mngon par bsgrubs nas/
phan tshun lta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi ched du longs spyod
wA dang le sa spyod kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ ka t+yA'i bu chen po skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang/ sbyin pa po rnams kyi longs
spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rung ste/ de bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang/ longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang gi/ gang bag lan ma yin no// de la longs spyod ni 'di dag yin te/ grong dang/
wa zhing rnams so// longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba glang dang/ ma le dang/ ra dang lug rnams so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la zhusanas/ rgyal po rab snang la 'di
skad ces smras so// rgyal bo chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phur dang/ sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge 'dun la longs
spyod dang/ longs spyodakyi mchog rnams ganang ngo// de nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po las brten nas// yo khyod phun sum tshog sapa'i gtsug lag khang byed du
bcug ste/ phyogs banI'i dge slong gi dag bdun la phul nas/ las spyod dang/ los spyod kyi mchog rnams kyang phul la// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka'
stsal pa// dge slong dag pa'i dag pasnyan/ nga'i nyan thes dge 'dun la thog mar 'dod pa thamasacad stobs pa rnams kyi nang na mchogani 'di lta ste/ 'phags rgyalagyi rgyal po rab snang 'dis no//
dge slong dag pa'i dge bsnyen/ 'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thogamar bshes 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di ltaste/ rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal bo bzo sbyas gzugs can snying po 'di yin
na/ dge slong dag 'i dag na 'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gnasama' 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ mnyan yod kyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di/
yin no// dge slong dag nga'i dag bstan/ nga'i nyan thos dag dun la thog mar gtsug lag khang byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di ltaste/ yul wA rANA si'i khyim
ba bdag bzang ldan 'di yin no// bar sdom ni/ 'dod pa kun gyis rab snang ste// dge 'dunabashes kyis bzo sbyangs yin// gnas mal mgon med zas sbyin te/ gtsug lag
khang ba bzang ldan no rgyalapo rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du res kyis gzan za ste/ nyi ma gcig ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i drung du/ gcig ni skyo bsang ga bumo sgrol ma'i drung du'o//
de dus gzhan zhig na dgos ba glang skyong gi ma shi ba'i thad du gzan za ban/ rgyal po de zhe la dga' bas ba glangaskyongagi ma zho'i khor pa thogs te/ de gzin za ba'i mdunan 'dug go/ ji tsam na

phyogs der skya bseng ba bum sgrol ma song ste/ des la b.rin po che bgos pa dang/ des glog byung ba lta bur rgyal po de ba glang skyong gi ma shi bo dang bcas te snang bar byas so// zhibasu snang ba de
mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/ lha 'di ci logs/ glog tsag glo bur du byung ngam/ 'ga' zhig gis zhugs mar 'tshal/ des smras pa/ zhi ba 'di'i klog gi 'od kyang ma yane/ mar me yang

ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma phyogs 'dizhes song ste/ des la ba rin po tshe bgos pas/ 'di ni de'i 'od yin no// khyod kyis 'kha rin po che de lta bu btang ste/ gsar gyi 'phreng ba bas
ba ni khyod blun no// ci bdagagi khyim na gser gyi 'phreng ba med dam/ nyisan rig ngan ba las skyes pa de thegi'o// des smras kha/ lha de la de lta bu'i shes rab ga la mchis gdon ma 'tshal bar
khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che lang zhig ces bstan te/ des na des blangs lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ ngas de lamasmos te/ das rang gi blos blus so// khyod kyis smras so// sa ma/
smras so zhes de gnyis 'thabs par gyur nas/ zhi bas de'i mgor zho'i phor pas bstan pa dang/ rgyal bo de spyi cer zhig pas/ de'i klad pa shom mo// des lag pas bsnams te bsams pa/
bdag gi klad pa zhom/ bdag gi klad rgyas kyang lug pas/ 'dis ye bdag bsado kyis/ jigyi srog dang ma bral gyi bar du rje 'di gsad do snyam nas/ des gsos pa la bsgo ba/ gsos pa
sa ba glang skyong gi ma zhi po yongs su btang gis/ sod cig/ gsos pas bsams pa/ de 'di la shin tu 'phangs na/ 'ad khro ba'i kun nas dkris pas 'di skad du zerab r zad pas/ 'phral la
gsad par mkhye'i/ kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas bsamang shes par bya ste// gsad kyis/ re zhig gnas dban pa zhig tu gzhagago snyam du bi nas smras pa/ lha de ltar 'jal te/ dgum mo
zhes byas nas/ des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhi g go/ rgyal po kun nas dkris ba dang bral nas smras pa/ gsos pa ba glang skyong gi ma yab ga re/ dase smras pa/ lha khyod kyis/ ngas ba glang
skyongagi ma zhi nga yongs su btang gis/ sod cig ces bka' stsal pas/ bdag gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lags so// des smras pa// gsos ba legs
so dan nga dang/ skyabasang gi bu mo sgrol ma dang/ gzhon nu ba glangaskyong dang mdun na 'donakyang sod la/ khyod nyid cod pan chis te rgyal srid byed la gage/ ngasakodis nga la ma gus pa byas
bas/ sa de nan tur byas la phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsam bsam na/khyod kyis modakho na la bsad pa lta zhige/ des smras pa/ lha 'din skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig sbas pa'i don dpas kyang
kun 'a6la par 'gyur bas/ re zhig dang gsan du gsol/// bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ khra bo dang ni skrunamo dang/ red par dka' dang bsu ba dang// mi ngoms pa dang gnyid
zla gtogs par// bsdus pa'i sdom yang dag bsdus// sdom ni khra bo spre'u dang 'jig rtazhan// long ba dag ste tha ma yin// rgyal po chen po sngon byung/
ba ri'i phyogs mi 'du ba dang/ rigs pa ma mchis pa/ shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa/ seng ge dang/ stag dang/ dred dang/ byi la dang/ ri dag/sa dang/ phag rgod rgyu ba/ bya'i tshogs
sna tshogs kyis bstan pa/ gag cig tu srog chags thi khas shing chen po zhig gi khar tshang bcas te/ des de 'bras bu smin pa rnams kyis bkangonas/ chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo khyed kyis
'bras bu 'di dag bzab par mi bya ste/da lta ni gang yang rung bas bdag nyid 'tsho bar bya'o// nam rlung dang yul ngan byung ba de ri 'di dag bza' bar bya'o// des smras pa// legs te/ de bzhin
bya'o ji tsam na rlung dang nyims bog pas 'bras bu rnams bskams te/ tshang de 'gribs par gyur pa dang/ thabis smras pa/ bawang mos khyod la khyed kyis 'bres bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya
sto rlung ngas yul ngan byung ba'i tsho bza' bar bya'o sam bkagagam/ 'o na ci'i phyir khyod kyis thos/ des smras pa/ bdag gis ma thos so// des smras ba/ sa tshang 'di bkang ste bzhag
na gal te khyod kyis ma zos na/ 'on tshang 'dici'i phyir 'gribs par gyur/ des smas la/ tshang 'di ci phyi 'gribs ma shes/ bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu gcig kyang ma bros so// khyod kyis
blos so// sam zos so// zhes de gnyis lan dang yang lan 'debs pan 'thaba'akhyung ste/ des thi ba mo demachus bsnan nas/ srog dang bral te/ de de de na 'phun zhing 'dug go/ re zhig
cigan dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab pa dang/ mang tshang de de kho na bzhin du 'bras bu de dag gis gang gdes bsams pa/ tshang 'di 'bras bu dag gis yang ngag lasan/ des 'di dag ma zes so snyam
nas des de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/ khratshe sdug ba las shago/ 'di dag khyod kyis ma gros te/ bdag gi tshang 'di ba gang giso/ nyos pa gcig bzod pa'i madacig ces byas pa/
dang lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gas tshal rgyu dka' ba ni// 'dabam khra bo mgeg dmar ba// rang gi sdug pa bsad nas nii// blo ngan ci zhigomya ngan byed// ji ltar sbe
tsha ba babatse' spyod pa yis// 'din sdug pa nyesamed bsad nas ni// blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes// de la bshams te nyes gcig bzod gsol ba// de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa
yis// zhi ba yid dang 'bad pa 'dir bsad nas// blo rmongasamya ngan byed cing bzang po zhes// de la bshams tanyis gcig bzod pa gso// zhes bgyi ba lags te/ lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don ni
bdag dpe de dang 'dra pa snyam bgyid do// lha gzhan yang khyim bdag cig dbyar 'das pa dang/ ston gyi dus su sranama'i khur 'tshal nas zhing thog tuchas so// des sun ma'i khur
de shing dung zhig tu bzhag nas/ ba zad du bshang ba'i sar mchis pa dang/ jicoman sgru'u zhigashing de 'as babs nas/ sranam las spar gangablangs te/ yang shing de la 'dzegs so// de 'dzeg
wA ban sranam 'brum bu gcig shor tis la lhung nas/ des sran ma spar gang bo de bor te/ sran ma 'bum khugacig po de btsa'akhar brtsams pan/ khyim bdag des de la bong ba zhig bsnan te/ de dus
las 'das pa dang/ lhas tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ sran ma spar gang bo nas su// gang zhig 'bum bu ga tsho'akha// shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi// spre'u 'di khyim re mi mdzangs//
zhes bgyi ba lags te/ lhas gsudas pa'i don gang zhig pa glangaskyong gi ma bkum nas/ yang bzod pa gsol bar bzhed pa na/ bdag dpe de dang 'drab snyam bgyid do// rgyal bos smras ba/
gsos pa khyod kyis tshig gcig kho na'i kha la ba glang skyong gis zhi ba bsad do// des smras pa/ lhu ston ba gang zag bla med pa// gcig bu tshig ni gcig gsungs to// gsung ba de ni
sa lags pas// 'di 'badag blo 'gyur ma mchis// zhes bgyib khyod kyis ma gsanam/ rgyal bos smras ba/ gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir bgrang skyong gi mo zhi ba bsad pas/
ngalang bar byas so// des smras pa/ lha lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'dire/ leng ba gnyis res grub pa// rang bzhin gyis ni dedus long dang// gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o//
'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// gzhan yang lang ba gnyis lags te// gang 'a sdib lta de yod dang// gang zhig khrims lami brtan pa'o// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanam//
stomani sgron mo cir yang mi rung dang/ ma spyod gtun dang lan cig dang// nad dang bag tsha bar s pa dang// de bzhin du na bags kyis so// byis ba dang ni bshes dag
dang/ skyes bu tha shalanyid dang ni// shing rtayin 'khor 'dang// g.yo rtogs par niyongs su rdzogs// rgyal pos smas ba/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang
skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ daklonamor byas so// des smras pa// lha sgron lo kha sum mi mdzes pa khyod kyis ma kha/san nam/ rgyal pos smras ba/ gsos pa gsum gang
yin/ lha krungani chumed sgron mo ste// yul 'khor 'gron chad sgron lo/ gal tamang po bcu yod kyang// khyo med bud med sgron ma'o// zhes bgyi ba la gsaso// rgyal pos smras pa//
gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong la zhi ba bsad pas// cir yang mi rung bar byas so// des smras pa// lha 'jig rten na ci yang rung ba la gsum mchis par khyod kyis me gsan nam/
des smras pa// gsos pa gsum gang yin/ lha rtabo thal kar bang bul dang// ston mo bya na med pa dang// bud med gang zhig khyimo sun 'byin// 'di gsum cir yang mi rung ba'o// rgyal
pos smras pa/ gsos pa ba grang skyog la zhi ba les ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do// des smras kha/ lha/ sol ba byed pa'i gos dang ni// bkru bshal byed ba'ilham ga dang// rgyal po 'ditsur
mo'i 'khor rnams ni// lesam spyad par des bar 'gyur// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam/ lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ gzhan yang gsum ste/ nags kyi shing gi ma tog dang//
dka' thub can gyi lang tsho dang// shing rtamakhan gyi chung ma dag las ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur// rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis bgrang skyong la zhi ba bsad pas/khyod
ni tun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o// des smras pa/ lha shing makhan rtsang rtsing 'jog pa dang// bzung mkhan skud pa ring bo dang// kha lo sgyur ba mi'i rgyabyung// de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu
'o zhes bgyi ba khyodakyis ma gsonanam/ lha de dag 'ba' zhig tum zad/ gzhan yang gsum ste bo nya'i bo nya gang yin dang/ chog gzhug pa yi mag gzhug dang// bud med phyon/
ma byed pa gang// de ba gsum gtunagyis brdeg rgyu'o// lha de dag 'ab 'azhigatum zad/ gzhan yang gsum ste/ gnag rdzi gronganargyu pa dang// 'dreg mkhan nagasan rgyu ba dang// dmag
ba rtag tu'od byed pa// de gsum khardzunagyis brdeg rgyu'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba mang skyong gi mazhib lan cig gis bsad do// des smras pa// lha rgyal po smra ba lan
cig ste// bu mo na po lan cigag/ 'phags pa'i gzigs pa lan cig ste// de gsum lan re lan re 'o// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma la gsanam/ rgyal pos spyas ba// gos ba khang gi
phyir khyod kyis bgrung skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ khyod rang gis nad glas go// des smras b/ lha sngaramasna tshogs go gyon dang// rtsa mjing chung du noratshang dngo// rgan po chung ma gzhon
len pa// de dag rang gis nad blangs so// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras l/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad bas/ nga ni khyod la bag
tsha'o/ des smras pa// lha dka' thub can ni blunam thong dang // dpa' bo rnamtshan med pa dang// bum chen mo mthong nas ni// snying la bag tsha skye bar 'gyur// zhes
bya ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyas pos smras ba/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad bas/ nga bar s so// des smras pa/ lha ca le co lo smra ba dang// gnyis
ba gos ngan gyon pa dang// bskra zhing za ba khang yin pa/ de gsum brnyas par bya ba yin// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gosan nam/ rgyal pos sas pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba
glangaskyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ ngas khyod dag zhig bags kyis stsal la// des smras la/ lha nyan bags kyis bza' bar bya// ri bo'i ni bags kyis 'dzeg/ don rnams bags
kyis bsgrub bya ste// 'di gsum bags kyis pags kyis bya// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam// rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad
pas khyod ni byis pa'o// des smras pa/ lha ga 'dris pa la yid rten dang// ma rungs pa la ston pa dang// gya tshom du ni yongs gtong ba// byis ba'i mtshan nyid rnam gsum me//
zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyongagi mazhib bsad pas/ khyod nibashes pa 'byed pa yin no// des smras pa// lha bshes/
0 rnams la mi rten dang// gnyis pa ha cang ston pa dang// dus ma yin par slong byed pa// des ni bshes rnams 'byed par byed// ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa/
gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba gang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ khyodan skyes bu tha shal yin no// des smras pa/ lha rtag tugazhan gyi nor dngani// bdag nyid 'dod pa rtog byed dang//
de bzhin sdug bsngal la dga' ba// de gsum skyes bu tha shal yin// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanenAm/ rgyal pos smras ba/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi
ma zhi ba bsadangs/ khyod ni shing rta'i 'khor las gsad rgyu yin no// des smras pa// lha mo kha khAnani tshonab/tong mi shes dang// 'khrul 'khor mkhanan 'byor kha ma shes dang//
gyad kyi bu ni der thabs mi shes pa// gsad bya gsad par rtag tu bzlog pa med// ces bgyi ba lhas ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras kha/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis bklung sbyong gi
ma zhi ba bsad pos/ khyod ni g.yon can yin no// des smras pa// lha bud med khyo gsum brgyud pa dang// dge slong phyi na 'os pa dang// bya ni rgya las shor dang gsum// g.yon can
nang na de g.yon// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam/
pa nyid dang ni// mi 'tsham pa dang den med de/// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma red dka' ba bsad do// des smras
pa lhari bong rwa can rnyed par dka'// rus sbal spu can red par dka'// smad 'tshong gcig pu 'dug pa deng// bzo ba drang por spu rnyed dka'// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyisam la gsananam/
rgyal bos smras pa// gsos pa khyod kyis gzhan gyi ched du ba glang skyong ba de ma zhi ba bsad do// des sma pa/ lha gtamasar len dang gnya' ba dang// g.yon can gyin che bzhi dang// smin byed
blo zhan bzhi po dag/ gzhan gyi don du ma rung 'gyur// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis glang skyong gi ma ba bsad pas/ ngagacib/
dbur byas so// des smras pa// lha skya ban yang 'di gcig skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'chiban yang 'di gcig 'chi/skye bo gcig pus 'di na sdug bsngal myong// 'khor ba lan grogs yod/
ma yin no// zhes bgyib khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa// gses pa khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhe ba tshogs bsags pa bsad do// des smras pa/ lha 3sgo a ma'i mi tog
dang/ sdug bsnga la gyur pa'i don gnyer ba// dper na ston ka'i sprin pazhin du// bsags pa rnams kyang don med 'gyur// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma khasan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa//gsos

0 pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi kha shi ba bsad pas/ khyod na mi mthun pa yin no// des smras pa/ lha nyim grib mar mi mthun zhing// snang ba dang ni mun pa dang// nyin par mtshan mor mi
mthun te// chos dang chos min rtagam mthun// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyob ma zhi ba bsad pas khyodazhi brdung
rgyu'o des smras pa// lhagos rnams brdungs na 'jam po dab tugyur// bong bu brdungs na de dag mgyogs par 'gyur// bud med rnams brdungs na dbang du 'gyur// rje dag ma
brdungs sgra 'byin 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam/ rgyal bos smras pa// gsos pa la gang gi phyi khyod kyis ba glangaskyong gi ma zhi kho bsad pas/ khyod ni med par bya ba yin
no des smras kha/ lha rlung gis sbyin pa med par byed// skye bo'i sgra yas klu de bzhin// skyes bu ngan pa bstan pa dang// mi mdzes yon tanaed par byed// ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma
gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis bgrang skyong gam pa po bsad pas/ khyod ni 'tsham pa ma yin no// des smos pa// lha/ rgyal po brdzun du smapa dang/ smanang
gsung dang dge sbyong 'khruge/ blo dang ldan pa kun smos pa// bzhin 'tsham pa ma yino// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanam/ rgyal bos smras ba/ gsos ba khyod kyis don med par ba glang skyong
gi ma zhi ba bsad do// des smras pa/ lha nyin bar mar me khus pa don med do// rgya mtshong char pa bab pa don med do// 'grangs la ston mo byin ba don med do// rgyas
cha bu ngan pa bstan pa don med do// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis mi ga gsananam/ sdom ni bslu dang bltas dang mi lags dang// bshad dang 'jigs dang mi dga' gtang
srid dang ma bsams chungan gtogs// de ni tshoms su yang dag bsgrags// rgyal bos sas la/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas//
khyodazhi bslu ba yin no// des smras pa lha/ bsu ba bzhi mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ bzhi gang yin/ lha rnami 'dod pa la 'doms pa dang// gnyid kyis dub la 'chad pa dang//
don du gnyer min don gnyer dang// stobs dang ldan rnams 'gyed pa// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gal ni ba bsad pas/ khyod ni blta bar bya ba yin no//
des smras pa/ lha g.yul 'o dpa' bo blta bya ste// mi bzad dug la gsang sngagasabalta// bathab btung tshon nye du blta// don rtogs bya la mkhas pa blta// zhes bgyi ba khyod
kyis ma ba sananam/ rgyal bos smras ba/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis pa glang skyog ma zhi ba bsad pas/ ma legs pa byas so// des smras pa// lha/ khyim pa le lamalegs
0/ chagasam legs// rab byang yang dag sdom pa min ma legs// rgyal gsu khums spyod pa'i ng ma legs te// mkhas gang 'khrug byed de yang m legs so// zhes bgyi ba khyed kyis
ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhib pa nad pas/ khyod ni bshad par bya ba yin/ des smras pa/ lha mi mkhas shing rtag cog
ba dang/ khal chen 'gal bas glagasod dang// ha cang bshos pas be'u gsod dang// tadu'i khyim bdug chung ma bslad/ ces bgyi ba khyod kyis lags nanam/ rgyal pos smras pa//
gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyisab glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas// khyod mthong n nga 'jigs so// des smos pa/ lha dur ba dang ni musbyar dang// gsum pa phyag dar srin bu dang/ khazhi
pa lhamasu chug bar ni// 'jigs bya min la 'jigs par byed// ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanunas/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba med pas mi dga' 'o// des
smras pa/ lha spre'u ni grong na mi dga' ste// chusrin byiso ba gsod la// chos kun dge sbyong khyim du sku// byi bo rang gi khyim mi dga'// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam/ rgyal pos
smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ khyodazhig gtang bar bya ba yin no// des smras ba/ lha gsakyi phyir ni gcig gtang ste// grongagi phyir ni
rigs btang ngo// yul gyi phyir ni yul btang ngo// bdag gi phyir na yul gtang ngo// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras ba/ gsos pa
gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang sbyong ma zhi ba bsad bas/ 'i srid ba'achad du mi btub bo// des smras pa/ lha rtsa med gzhan gyi bud med dang/ lag pa gcig gis chu 'thung dang//
gzhan gyis chang blud gang yin pa// de dag srid pa 'chad pa med// nyes bgyi ba khyod kyis mgasanenam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis ma bsams pa kho nar bag skyong gi ma zhikha/
bsad do// des smras pa/ lha/ rgyal la rgyal po'i mdzod nas bsags par// lam du zhugs la tshom bo ma bsams par/ khyiman bud med 'thabagom bsags par// rab
tu byung ba'i rnyed pa ma bsams par// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanam/ rgyal bos smras ba/ gsos bgang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang sbyong ma zhi ba bsad pas/ myan bya ba yin/
no des smras pa/ lha chags can rgas pa'i ng chu bya ba ste/ mi bzang du ramo'ang mya na bya ba yin// smad 'tshong rgas pa'i ng mya ngan bya ba ste// rab byung gtum po'ang mya ngan bya ba
sdom ni/ blta bas mi ngoms yid 'bad dang// rtse bar mi byanor dngani/ smra bar mi bya rab sdang dang// mgon med bshes dang yid brtan pa'o//

rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa khyod kyis nga'i ba glang skyong gi mo zhi kho blta bas mi ngoms pa bsad do/ des smras pa// lha glang bo'i gtso dang rgyal bo dang// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang// sangs rgyas
smra ba rnams kyi mchog/ blta ba yis ni rigs yizhe// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis la gsananam rgyal pos smras kha/ gsos pa khyod kyis ba glang skyong gis zhib pa'i yidi dang 'phrad pa bsad
do/ des smras ba/ lha gzugs bzago dang rigs ldan dang/ des dang rigs 'phel byed dang// yel khab dang budachod lnga// rgyal chen yid dang 'bad pa yin// zhes bgyi ba khyod
kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod so pa klang skyong gi bzhi ba bsad pas/ khyod dang lhan cig rtse bar mi bya ba yin no// des smras pa/ lha byis pa sbrul
dang stsal pa dang// gang gi mgayem pa dang// mi gangamadza' ni mi rtag dang/ lhan cigartse kharami bya'o/ zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi
phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad dus/ khyodakyi sanor 'brog pa byas so// des smras kha/ lha lam mkhan dang dmag mi dang// sman pa tshos kun bson rje ste// de dag nyam thag
gyur ba la'ang// norani 'brog par byed pa yin// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis kha lags n nam/ rgyal bos smras ba gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyogi gzhi ba bsad pas/ khyod ni
smra bar bya ba ma yin no// des smos pa// lha hacad phyag dang tan dbul/ dma' dang ha cang mkhro gang dang// hacang ri dngahacang te// da drug smra bar byab
yin zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma la gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa/ ga sos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ khyod ni sems rab tu snang ba yin no// des
smras pa/ lha sbyin pa mi snang mi mthun byed pa dang// mthun par mi byed nyes spyod sgrogs pa dang// sbyin pa byin nas rim gyis ldeg byed pa// de dag rab tu sdang ba'i rtags yin no//
zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos nga gang gi [”]phyir khyodakyis ba glang skyong gi ma nib pasad pas/ nga mgon med par gyur to// des smras pa/ lha
gnas brtan rgyal po rgad de dang// tshul med bka' blo mi bde dang// blam lan gnod byed gang// de drug gamagonani med par bshad// ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam rgyal
pos smras pa// gsos ngad khyod kyis gang gi phyir bgrang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad ra sa/ khyod dang lhan cige bshes par bya ba ma yin no// des smras pa/ lha bzhad gad mkhan dang garamakhanang
po lha smad 'tshong chang dad can// ma'ang de bzhin gzhung nganab// de dag dang ni bshos mi bya// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ rgyal bos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis

bas/ ba glang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ khyod ni yid brtan par bya ba ma yin no// des smras pa// lha ska tsam nub pa'i chu dang rta dang ni// glang bo tshe dang spre'u dang sprul nas ga dang// spu 'agleng ba/
dang gdong gnyer gang ba dang// kha spu nyung la yid brtan mi bya// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam// sdomaniganyid med 'dod pa ma yin dang// kun#+
nas mnar sems dngos po dang// de bzhin snying rje tA ra ngan/ zlog thabs tha ma stebs in no// rgyal pos smras pa// gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi
ma zhi ba bsad pas/ nga gnyid med de// des smras l/ lha g.yem dang skems nad can dang ni// cham pas thebs dang sdug bsngal dang// don sems khros dang brtson pa dang// 'jigs
pa de ni rnam kun tu// gnyid mi 'ong ste 'jig rten// brgyad ni'i nga bzhin sdug bsngal lo// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsanonam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gagasos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang
skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas/ 'dod pa ma yin no// des smras la/ lha/ 'dod po ma yin pa'i das po brgyad ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ gsos pa brgyad gang yin/ nad dang na dang 'chi
ba dang sdug khral mi sdug phrad pa dang// ser ba thog dang mi rtag nyid// brgyad ni 'jig rten 'dedamin rab// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gangagi khyig khyod kyis ba glang skyong gi
zhi babasad pas/ nga khyod la kun nasazhanar sams skyes so// des sbal/ lha kun nas mnar sems dgu 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsananam/ gsos/
bdagu gang yin/ lha/ 'di ni bdag la gnodapar 'dod pa/ na ba ma yin par 'dod ba/ bde bam yin par 'dod pa/ reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin bar
'dod pa ste/ 'dis bdag la gnod pa byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mirang bas/ bdag
gi 'dikho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyab nas/ da de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do// 'di ni gang zhig bdag la gnod par
'dod pa/ phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ reg bam yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/ de la gnod par 'dod//
ban pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ bde bam yin par 'dod pa/ reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde bas yin par 'dod pa ste/ 'dis de la gnodapa byas so//
kyi byed do// byed par 'gyur ro sam mo// yang de 'disam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi diltar gyuran mi rung bas/ bdag gi 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di grub
bar ga la 'gyur snyam nas/ de de la 'dun nas mnar sems skyes pa se la bar byed do// 'di ni gang zhig bdag ga la ba nod bar 'dod pa/ phan pam yin par 'dod pa// bde ba ma yin par 'dod
kha reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/ grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod ba/ de la don du 'dod pa/ ban par 'dod pa// bde bar 'dodapa/ ga par 'dor/ grub pa dang bde bar
'dod pa ste/ 'dis de la phan par byas so// byed do// byed par 'gyur ro snyam tsho// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas/ bdag gi 'di
khon ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/ de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sal bar byed do// rgyal pos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod
kyis kha glang skyong gi ma zhu babasad pas/ khyod ni snying rjemado ba yin no// des smras/ lha khyod kyis snying rje med pa khacu bo/ shan pa dang/ bya'agag tshodapa dang/ phag 'tshong
dang/ 1ba dang/ ri dgasakyi rngon pa dang/ bya ba dang/ bod du rgyas 'chor ba dang/ chom rkun pa dang/ gshed ma pa dang/ baglangagasod ba las bar m gsan nas/ rgyal
bos smras pa/ gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba glang skyongag ma zhib bsad pas/ khyod ni lA lta bu yin no// des smras pa/ lha/ yan lag bcu dang ldan n khra lta bu lags so/
tsa @#// zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan nam/ gsos pa bcugang yin/ lha/ gcor ba dang/ mu cor smras pa dang/ thub tshod byed pa dang/ 'khu ba dang/ byas pa mig zo
