gas te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas shing/ rdzu 'phrul yang thob par gyur to// ko sa la'irgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ 'bags pa ku na dga' bos bden pa'i tshig ji lta ba
bzhin du byas pas// rgyal bu gzhon nag gu'i yan lag dang nying lag snga mkho bzhin du gyur to zhes thos so// khros nas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu nag gugangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal bu
gzhon nu nag gu la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu tshungasheg khyim du 'dong/ des smras pa/ lha bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur 'tshal zhing 'di nyid du mchis so// leb/sakyis//
de bzhin du gyis shig ces/ des kun dga'i ra ba'i nang der 'chag sa byas so// de de na 'du ba na de 'i yan lag dang nying lag dum bu slar 'byor pas/ de'i ming dum bu'i kun dga' ra/
0 ba dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bya bar chags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das khong na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu'adu gnas / kos la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal
sa' pa/ rgyal po chen po legs kyis gyis shig dang/ der gdon mi bro bar su 'tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes bkalasal pa dang/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan
ta bcom ldan 'das kyis gnan/ padagagis mnyan yod nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal jisrid pa de'i bar du tsho'aphrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
yod dang/ rgyal byed kyi tshal tshigs srid pa de'i par du sa gzhi yongs su spyas/ tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bshams te/ 'dun khang gos brgya stong ra bas g.yogs pa// tsan dan/
gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ dri zhim po'i bdug pa'i snod bzhag po/ ba dan dang rgyal mtshan sgrengs// dar gyi chun 'phyang gi tshogs sbyangs pa/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/
rtso rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du nyams dga' bar byas nas/ der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rdo rje dang/ brtu dang/ margad dang/ byu ru dang/ nir bu dang/ mu tig dang
an nI la dang/ mthon ka chen bo dang/ pad+ma ral gris brgyan cing smras pa'i gser gyi seng ge 'i khri yang bshams so// mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen rnams kyis
ka kyang rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i gos kyis g.yogs pa'i 'dun khang drug kyang byas/ stan dugakyang bshams nas/ de dag tumu stegs can rnams rang gi 'a khor gyis bskor nas snga
'ongs te 'dug nas rgyal po la/ lha bdag cag ni mchin lags n dge slong go'u dmadagug tu gsol zhes sku btang ngo// rgyal pos thos nas kyang btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ pho
byung 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du song nas/ des bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la// brachatha'i khyilu khyod tshur shog/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa der song la
phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bdag gi mchid nasaM/ gnod pa chung pas/ nyam nga ba nyung ma/ bstod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho bam/ stobs dang/
bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyan gsal 'di skad ces/ btsun pa mu stegs can de rnams tshogs shing mchis lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes kyang gsol cig/ lhade ltar 'tshal lo zhes bram ze'i khye'u bla ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das khong na
ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga lhan cig ban tshun yang dag bar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ yang dag par bgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig
tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'du gnas/ bram ze'i khye'u bla mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyi go'utam kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal go'u ta ma'i zhabs la
phyag 'tshalanas/ gnod pa chung ma/ nyam pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yadangs 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bud pa la reg par gnas sam/ khan ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyan gsol pa dang/

zhing mtsho zhes gsol pa dang lha la ko la'i rgyal po gsal rgya khadang khyod bde bar gyur cige/ ko sa la'i rgya la bo gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas/ kye go'u ta ma mu stegs can rnams cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du
lhagasanas 'dus shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes mchi'o// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bla ma song zhig/ nga yang 'ong ngo zhes bka'i stsal ba dang/ bram ze'o
khyo 'a ga ma song ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar ngangar 'i 'dab ma brkyang pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas// nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ srog chags brgya stong du ma ngo mtshar
gyis mig phyanas/ a la la zhes du co dang/ gzhe'i sgra bton te/ lta bzhin du nam mkha' la tsho'aphrul chen po'i 'dun khang du gshegs so// ko sa la'i rgyal bo gsal rgyal gyis 'byor pa de dag/
mtho nas/ ya mtshan gyis yide dad pa gyur to/ mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul bstan
zin te/ da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyis/ khyod kyis ston cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhes shig/ skya bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na/ cho 'phrul tshon po 'di ci dge sbyong
go'u ta ma'ilags sam/ 'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/ gang gi lags/ sus 'tshal/ de nas de'i mod la dum bu'i kun dga'i pa ba pa'i 'khrul gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing a lnga
la la lag dang/ 'khom dang/ 'dab ma dkar po du mar klubs pa/ bya'i tshogs du ma skad 'byin pa blangs nas/ cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi byang phyogs su bzhag pa dang/ de yang rgyal pos
mthong nas yid bde bskyes ta/ lan gnyis kyi bar du mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'aphrul bstan brin te/ dan khyod
N+NaM kyi ngos la bab kyis/ khyod kyis ston cig/ de dag gis smras pa// lhakhag cag gis khyod la sngar ma gsol lam/ lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'di'i 'dus logs na/ cho 'phrul chen po
ba 'dico dege sbyong go'u ta ma'i lags sam/ 'on te bdag cag gi lags samaM/ su'i lags/ sus 'tshal/ de nas de'iyod la khyim bdag na legs sbyin gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sum cu rtsa
gsum gyi lha'i dbag bsam gyi shing glangs nas/ tsho'abul chen po'i 'dan khang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su bzhag pa dang de yang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas/ yang shin tu/
dga' b dang mgu ba skyes nas/ lan gsum gyi bar du mu stegs can rnamaMs la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'aphrulabastan zin te/ dano
khyad kyi rjes la bab kyis khyed kyis ston cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis gsol med kyi/ 'on kyang lan gsum gyi bar du gsolabar bgyi ste/ lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir
dus 'gasan/ tshe'aphrul chen po 'di'i dge sbyong go'u ma'i legs sam/ 'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/ su'i lags/ sus 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen
po blta bar sbreba'i srog chag gas brgya stong du ma yang 'dus/ lha brgyasto du ma yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dus par gyur pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs
bkus te gtsul lag khang du gshegs nas/ gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas sgo 'phar gseb nas 'od gabrer byung bas cho 'phrul
chen po 'i 'dun khang thams cad bsreg par brtsams pa dang/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa// lhad ni dag srogo'u tama'i cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang tsheg cingamachis// gal te dge
sbyong go'u tums rdo thog na 'dir mchis la/ zhi bar bgyid grab zhis byas pa dang/ rgyal po cang mi zer bar sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de bzhin du btsun
mo 'thad ldan ma dang/ rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang/ phyi mkhan drang srong byin dang/ rnying pa dang/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang/ ri dgas sgra'il sa ga dang/ gzhan yang dud pa
can mang po dang/ bar mar gnas pa kha cig kyang m zer por 'dug go/ mu stags can rnams dang/ de'i slob ma rnams ni reb tu dga' bar gyur to// danas ma des cho 'phrulachen
bo'i 'dunakhang gi dri ma thams cad basregs nas/ rang nyid zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus tshe 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang
drim med cing gsal la mdzes par gyur cing 'dug go/ de nas yang rgyal bo srog shor ba las redapa lta bu dgab dang yid bde ba skyes nas mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so//
kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i tshos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan thin te/ ngani khyod kyi res la bab kyis/ khyod kyis ston cig ces byas pa dang/ de dag spobs pa med pas
cami zerab r 'dug go/ de nos bcom ldan 'das kyi se mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas par zhabs g.yas pa drigatsang khang gi nang du bsnan ba dang/ sa rnam pa drug du g.yos pa gyur/
nas sa chen po 'di g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'gul kun du'agul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur te/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma' nub phog/
mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon lha phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs doma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma' bar gyur to/ sa bgos
pa des gangs ri'i khrod kyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong rnams 'a bsul bas/ de dag phan tshun du shes ldan dag bdag cagal tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag gis mtshan
ma dag bstan gyis 'dang ngo zhes smras nas de dag dang pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba gabregs te/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od gasber dag
bkye bas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas drang srong de rnams kyi bar thag ji sridepa de/ gsarapa zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to// drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom/
ldan 'das nyim dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa/ gser mchog sbyangs pa'idul bu'i tshogs spungs pa lta bu/ me tog du ran dka dang/ mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i
mdangs can/ gsung dbyangs sprin chudang bcas pa dang/ rgya mtsho dang/ khyu mchog dang/ rnga sgra lta bur 'bo cing brtan la rnam par gsal ba/ mnyanan bde zhing snyan pa/ dbral ba'i phyogs
'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang/ mu tig gi do shal dang/ bad+ma'i rtsa lag dang/ ngang pa dang/ me tog kun dang/ shel sngas lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par
brgyan pa/ yon tan rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gras med pa'i tshogs kyi gnas/ srid pa'i dgab dang/ bde ba dang/ bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'ichags pa'i dri ma'i
'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba/ dus dpag tu med ba nas tshogs bsags pa'i ye shes ban med po phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can/ lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i
smyu gus zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang/ mi dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ rig sngags 'chang dang/ brang 'gro mchod 'os rnams kyis
rjod po mdoran sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyanapo/ dpakhyad bathong po brgyad nus rnam par sbas pa/ 'od 'dom gang bas brgyan pa/ 'od nyis stong bas
lhag pa/ rin po cher 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bathab mthong ngo/ ji ltar sems can dag pa'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyucan gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar/ lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas
kyi sems goms pa ma/ bumed pas bu bdadab 'am/ bkren pas gtera mthong ba 'am/ rgyal bo mngon par 'dod po dang borgyal por dbang bskur ba ni de lta ma yin bas/ drang srong de rnams
kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang rang bzhin/
mkhyon nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de ltabu'i chos bstan par mdzad pa dang/ de rnams kyis de shes nas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes
kyi dodris bcom nas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sumadu byas so// de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'a 'daskyid ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing/ bsnyan ng rdzogs pa dpe slong gi dngos po 'thoban/
bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rang tu byung/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ gdams ngag bog pa dang/
da rnams kyis 'bad brtsa la bsgrims pas/ 'khor ba'i 'khor legayo ba dang mi g.yob cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa dang/ ltung ba dang/ 'gyas pa
dang 'joms pa'i chos can du rtogs te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems bong
ba dang gser dumanyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba/ tsan dan dang lta bu mtshungs pa/ rig pas ma rig ba'i sgo nga'i sbyabs bcom pa// mngon par shes pa/
dang gas yang dag par rag bathab ba/ srid pa dang red pa la chags pa dang/ bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nyo dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang/ rjed par
bya ba dang/ gus par smra par bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgu bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig zla ba kham pa lta bur bskur nas/ tsha'aphrul chen po'i 'dun khang
ga la ba der gshegs te khyon nas/ 'khor ba phrag duma'i gung la seng ge 'i khri la bzhugs so// de nas dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
Aldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung du mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis mu stegs can
rnams dang lhan cig mi chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing/ mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi/ lhadwang ma rnamos dga' bar bgyi/ skye bo dam pa rnams glo pa rangs par
bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma khyod sogs khral chung du gyis shig/ khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i tshos bla ma rdzu 'phrul
0 gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing/ mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang/ su de dam pa rnams snying rungs par bya bar nus chos kyi/ 'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i
chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la ma 'bod kyi/ 'di rnams mi'i tshos bla ma'i 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'bod pas/ nyid kyis 'di dga' ma'i tshos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par

bya'o/ gal te khyod kyis 'di rnams dang lhan ci ma'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyitsho'aphul bstanan/ mu stegs can rnams dag skyengago'u tam la ma'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul mid kyi//

'on kyang 'di'i nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mi che ba zhig ngad dang lhan cig mi 'i chos bla ma rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'i phrul ston zhes smra bar 'gyulobs/ khyod
rang ga stan ji lta ba la 'dug/ tsog ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug ste/ khyim bdag ngan legs sbyin dang/ dge tshul bskul byed dang dge tshul ma brjod med dang/
dge slong ma ut+pala'i mdog dang/ gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa phal mo tshadag kyang de dngo'adra'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung dur mdzad du gsol/ bdag gisazhu
stogs cano rnams dang lhan cigami'i chos ma'i rdzu 'phrulagyi tsho'aphrul bstan par bgyi zhing/ mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi/
skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis paka' stsal ba/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod sems khral chung dur gyis shig/ khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang/
lhan cig ma'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi lho 'thul bstan cing/ mu stags can rnams sbag gzhug pa dang/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang/ skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar

nus mod kyi/ 'onakyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i tshos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la ma 'bodakyi/da 'di rnams kyis ma'i tshes bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pas/ nga nyid kyis 'di dag la
mo'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'thul bstan par bya'o// gal te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i tshes bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstanan/ mu stegs can rnams dge

sbyong go'u tam lan mi'i tshos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'aphrul med kyi/ 'on kyang 'di'i nyan thos dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tsheg/ 'di lha mthu cha gzhig med dang lhan cig mi'i
tshosabla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul ston to smra bar 'gyur bas/ khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig/ ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de yang rang bsten ji lta ba la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal ba// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul bstan par
gsol ba 'debs pa su yin/ de nas kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga lo ba dor 'bogs su thal mo sbyar ba
btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams dang thabs cige ma'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phul bstan cing/ mu stagos can
rnams thag stsal ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi ba dang/ skya bo dam pa rnams glob rangs par bgyi par gsol ba bdag lags te/ de ni dge slong dang bram brar bcas/ lha dang mir
bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur lags so zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang
ngo donas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyisacang mi gsung ba gnang bar rig nas/ rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar/
thugs mnyam par bzhag na nyidakyi gdan las mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/ gshegs pa dang/ 'breng ba/
dang/ bzhugs pa dang/ gzims pa mdzad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// mo'i khams la sogs par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das me ri khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar bo dang/ dkar bo dang/ bcod ka dang/ shel gyi kha dog
lta bu dag 'thon te// zung ga 'phrul sku'i smang sa ni mi 'bar/ sku'i skyid nas na chu grang mo rgyun 'bab pa dang/ sku'i stod nas ni ma 'bar/ sku'i smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab pa
dag kyang ston par mdzad do// shar phyogs su ji lta bar/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/ phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'grul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/ rdzu
'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa btang ste/ sangag gi khri la bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgya la la bka' stsal la/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin
wA gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thunamong ba yin no// rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stags can rnalas dang/ skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun
du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan par gsol ba 'debs pa su yin/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las las te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das
la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams dang/ spyi bo gi tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i
cho 'phrul chen po bstan cing/ mu stags can rnams zag sul ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzad pa dang/ skye bo dam pa rnams glo pa rangs par mdzad par/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
ba 'dobs pa bdag lags te/ de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde par 'gyur lags so zhes gso' pa dang//
bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsol rgyal la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba gnang bar rig nas/ rang
gi ston ji lta ba la 'dug go//bam po so gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang/ bkra shis dang/ g.yu byung
can dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs po// 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad de/ kyam klu rnams kyis pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor le
tsam 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che'i ru pa dang/ rdoN+Di'i ze ba can khyer te 'os kyang blan snyam du 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyod pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tsho/ srog chags grog sbyar rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
sams kyis shes par 'gyur la/ gagi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyod ba de'i ni/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams Mskyes kyang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis
shes par mi 'gyuran/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba kuku rnams kyis lta mos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad sa man/ cho 'phrul chen po ston par mthong nas/
de dag gis pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lotsam/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che'i chu ba dang/ rdo rje'i the ba can khyer te sa brtol nas byung pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das pad+ma de'i snying po 'bazhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas g.yon du pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byang par gyur to/ de dag re re la yang sprol pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
bzhugs par gyur to// de dag gi g.yasagayon du yang pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cing de dag la bgazhan/ de dgaM la yang ga zhan te/ de bzhan du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du
sangs rgyas phal po che sprul la// den sangs rgyas kha cigani 'bar/ kha cig ni gsal ba mdzad/ kha cig char 'bebs/ kha cig ni glog 'byin/ kha cig ni kun shes dang lung ston/ kha
cig ni zhu ba zhu/ kha cig na lan 'debs/ kha cig ni 'chag pa mdzad/ kha cig ni gzhes/ kha cig na bzhes/ khacig ni bzhugs/ kha cig ni gzims te/ ji ltar byis pa gzhon nu rnams
kyis kyang sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba de ltar yang byin gyis brlabs so// tsho'aphrul de mthong nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang/ gzhon nu dang/
blonabo dang/ pho brang 'khor gyi mo dang bcas pa dang/ yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang/ nam mkha'i dkyilan lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi cho
'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad par phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha' la gnas pa 'i lha rnams kyang dra dgardung ngo// gnas gnason yang dza be tshe rnams ni rdung/
dung sgra'i ma 'bud/ latsho'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed de// byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yade bdo
ba skyes nas/ rang gi rigs dang 'dra ba'isgraskyid rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste/ rta rnams ni 'tshor/ glang po che rnams ni dur/ rngamo rnams 'khang/ ba glang rnams 'bod/ rma
bya rnams ni 'gyur te/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchodam bya bar spro bar gyur to// den lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog
ut+pal dang/ bad+ma dang/ kumu to dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ man+da ra ba rnams gtor ro// lha'i a ru'i phyug dang/ rgya spos kyi phyi ma dang/ tsan dan gyi phye ma dang/
lhardzas kyi gos dag kyang gtor to/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dgakyang de bzhin no// de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ban/ gdul ba'i skye bos rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan
'dus nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bostan la 'bad par bya// 'dum bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag/
ste ni lo zhes pa dbya// gang zhig chos 'dul 'di la ni// bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa// skyeba'i 'khor ba rab sbyangs nas/ sdug bsngal gyi ni ma 'a khyed 'gyur// lhagam sprul pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ cig car du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' sul to// ji srid nyi ma shar ba// de srid srin bu me khyer gsal// mkha' la nyi ma shar ban// chog mog por
'gyur gsal ma 'gyur// ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung// rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang// rtog ge ma gsal de slob min// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal po/ dge slong dgacho 'phrul chen po ma snang bar 'gyur gyis/ mtshan ma zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsus ma thag tu med
wa lami snang bar gyur to// de mi snang bar gyur pa dang/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ mu stag gas can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i tshos bla ma'i rdzu
'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te// da ni khyedakyings la bab pa sa/ khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas 'od srus rdzogs byed cangami smabar/ kun tu gnag lhas kyi bul gru phugs byas so// desaM

kyang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o// des kyang mi pham skra'i la ba can la'o// des kyang ka t+ya'i bu nog can la'o// des kyang gcor bu pa gnyon gyi bu la// des kyang 'od srungs rdzog
byed la byas nas/ 'gal yang smra bar mi byed de// de dag la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skud ces smras na/ de bzhin du ba gcig la gcig khru phugs byed cing/ cang mi zer bar/
gyur yul yul por gyur/ ma zhum por gyur nas/ mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go/ de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdogs 'di snyam du/ rgyas
bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la mtho btsam bas/ de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu'abros par 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas/ des gang gsan

cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang daM/ de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab ba de lta bu'i rlung dmar dang char drag btang ba dang/ de na bcig ni khrid nas ri'i gseb tu zhugs/ kha cig ni rtsa tshang tshing du/
@#// kha cig ni nags thabs bor/ kha cig na 'dun khang du/ kha cu'i na lha khang du zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ni nyidakyi cho 'phrulachen po'i 'dun khang na bzhugs te/
tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/ 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni// phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang// kun dga' rab ljon shing dang// mchod rten rnams la skyabasasu 'gro//
spyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing// skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te// skyabs de dag la brten nas nii// sdug bsngalakun las rab mi ther// gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang// tshes dang dag
zla 'dun skyabs song zhing// 'phags pa yi ni bden pa bzhi// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang/ sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang// mya ngan 'das pa bder 'gro ba'i//'phags
gam yan lag brgyad pa dag/ shes rab kyisan ltakhyadan// skyobs de dag ni gtso yin zhing// sgrubs de dag ni mchog yin te// skyabs de dag la brtenunas nii// sdug bsngal kun
las rab tuthar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin thugs su chud nas/ de la brten te gangashes na sems can brgya
phragamang bos khyad par chen po thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pas/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ khacigasan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gisan nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// kha cig gis na thos kyi byang chub sems
bskyod do// kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu// khacig gis nablon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusams bskyed de/ 'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol bo dang/
chos la 'bad pa dang/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par len du bcug/ yang dag
par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// de nas 'od srungs rdzogs khyadal/ slob ma rnams kyis dris pa/ mkhan po de
kho na nyid ji lta bu lags pa gsungs shig/ des slob ma de dag kha cig la ni du 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten rtag pa 'din de khon nyid yin no zhes smras/ gzhan dag la ni mi rtag go/ gzhan dag la ni
rtag kyang rtag/ mi rtog kyang mi rtag go/ gzhan dag la ni rtog pa yang chu yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin no// gzhan dag la ni mtha' yod do// mthu'amadad// mtha' yod kyang yod// ma 'a
modakyang med do// mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/ mtha'abod pa yang ma yin no// srog de lus yin na// srog kyang gzhan la/ lus kyang gzhan yin no// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod de//
chad do// yod kyang yod la/ med kyang med do/ de bzhin song ba gi phan chad yod pa yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni bdenagyi/ gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes
rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis bslus so// de yang ngo tsha nas mgo smad de/ bya ngan gyis mos gdungs pas chu bsalab 'dod pa'i phyir jing du song ba dang/ de nas lam gyi nang du mning zhig
gis mthong nas/ desatshigs su bcad de smras pa// thug re rA mthu chag pa lta bu yi// mdos med khyod gcig g las rings par 'os// shAkya'i chos ni rnam par ma shes pas/
bong bu bzhin du 'dzem pa med par 'khun// des kyang tshigs su bcad de smas pa/ nga yi mdun na 'dug 'di 'chibadag ngas/// bdag gi lus la stobs dang brtsonapa med// dngos
bo thams cad bde dang sdug bsngal ston// thar khrin da ni bde ba byed du 'gro// nyibrer rab tutshabar byed rnams kyis// lus dang sems kun gdungs shing ngal gyur gyis// mi sun thong/
sh+tsa la rdzing rab bsil ba do// ga la yod pa bdag la myur du smos// des yang tshigs su bcad bcad de smras pa// bongan sdig can skyes mchogam yin pa// mtshe'u ltar pad+ma ngang pa dang
ldan zhing// gangs kyi chu ltar chu yongs gtsang ba yi/[“ ]rdzing bu shin tu bzang bo ma mthong ngam// des ya nga tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyang pho min ma yi chung ma'ang yin// dbarda
phrad kyis zung la lam phyi dang// rdzing bu chu bzang chu bsil gang bar// gdung ba bsal khar bya phyir bdag 'gro'o// de lam de nas gzur ba dang/ rdzogs khyadakya rdzing drung du song ste mgul du
bum pa bye mas bkang ba btagasanas de nubaste/ de nyid du dus las 'das so// de nas de'i slob ma rnams kyis gcig la gcig dris la/ mkhan po khyed sus mthong/ de rnams kyis
smras l/ ma mthong ngo// khyod la mkhan pos lung bstan pa su yod/ den kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag ga red lanumakhan pos 'jig rten rtag pa 'di ni bden gyi/ gzhan nirmongs pa
min no zhes lung bstan to// kha cig gis smras pa/ ded la ni mi rtag go zhes bstan to// gzhan dag gis smras/ nged la ni rtag kyang ga/ mi rtag kyang mi rtag go/ rtag pa yang ma yin/
mi rtag pa yang ma yin no// mtha' med do/ mtha' yod do// mtha' yod kyang yod/ mtha' med kyang med do// mtha' yod pa yang ma yin/ mtha'amed pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin song
pa'i phan chad yod de/ dmed do// yod kyang yod la/ med kyang med de// de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yodab yang ma yin/ med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni bden gyi/ gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no
zhi'o/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs su brtags pas/bdag cag thams cad mi mthun par gyur gyis/ mal bdag cag gis mkhan po kun tubatsalal/ de kho na
nyid ji lta bu yin pa 'di 'bri zhes de rnams dong pa dang/ de rnams kyis lam gyi dbus su bu mo zhig mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa/
chos kyagosan gyon pa de/ dka' thubanul bre gang zab// rdzogs khyod 'di nas sengagyuran// bzang mo khyod kyis ma mthong la// des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras// ngan song sogs
can dmyal ba pa/// lag pa brkyang nas 'gro ba yi// rdzogs byed de ni chus g.yengs nas// b.lag skya bor gyur cing 'dug/ de rnams kyis yang tshigs su bcad pas smras l/ chos kyi gos ni

gyon pa po// chos spyod thub pa de la ni// khyod kyis smras de legs min gyis// bzang mo de skad ma zer cig/ des yang tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ pho mtshan gyi ni rtogs skyes pa// blo ldan de sa su 'jig
rtenan rtag tu 'jig rten gyis mthong bar// gcer bur gong du bar byed// blo mtshan mdunanas sdod byed pa// gang gi chos na'adi 'dra ba// de ni rgyal po rnam thos bus// mda'ani snya'u
khas ba gcad 'dad cagi/ ces byas pa dang/ de dag cang mi zer bar de nas/ de dag rdzing bur byin pa dang/ rizhiganardzogs byed bum ba bya mas bkang ba mgul du btags nas/ dus las
'das pa mthong nas/ de rnams las gang dag las bslab pa 'dod pa de rnams kyis/ shes ldan dag 'di ni bden gyi/ gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes smras nas/ de dag kyang bum pa bye mas bkang
mgul du btags nas/ de nyid du dus las 'das so// lhag ma rnams ni slar log nas mtha' khob tu dong nas 'dug go/ gangag tshibcom ldan 'das skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blun
med pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyurabs/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bo de 'i tshe/
mu stegs can thams cad kyis/ mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'athul la spyan drang pa las/ mu stegs can thams cad thag la/ bam par mdzod/ rgyab kyis phyogs par mdzad/
spobs pa med par mdzad de/ de nas mtha' 'khob kyi ljongs rnams su rtan bod gyur to// de na dge slong rnams tho tshom skyes nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ blun
da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho 'phrul la spyan drangs pa las/ mu stag sa can thams cad thag stsal/ pham
bar mdzad/ rgyab kyis phyogs par mdzad/ spobs pa med par mdzad po la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar de'i dod chags dang bral/ sdang dang bral//
gtimug dang bral/ slob dang/ rga ba dang/ nab dong/ 'chib dang/ rgya ngan dang/ glo sngags 'donapa dang/ sdug bsngalab dang/ yid mibade po dang/ 'khrug la las yongs su grol/
thams cad mkhyen pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa// shes pa dang shes bya thams cad la dbang thob pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyub/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas/ chu stags can thams cad thag bcug pham par byas/ rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/ spobs pa med par byas pa 'di la ngo mtshar cachi/ 'das
ba'i dusan nga 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas/ gtimug dang bcas/ skye ba dang/ rgyab dang/ rab dwang/ 'ab dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba
dang yid mi bdeb dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol ba na yang/ ston pa drug po 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag thams cad thug bcug/ pham pa byas/ rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/
spobs pa med par byas/ tshar bcad d mtha'akhob kyi ljongs rnams su rten du bcug pa de bshad kyis/ legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
nyan/ lus 'phags zhes bya ba'iljongs na/ rgyal bo bskyod pa zhes byabargyal sradi 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa zhes bya ba nas/ bod du 'dud do zhes pa brgyas par ro// de nas rgyal po bskyod pas
btsun mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes ba blta na sdug pa zhig blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' dagur spyod par byed de// de nas btsun mo de sems can zhugs
bar gyur nas/ rim gyis zla ba dgu 'an pa dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bstan sdugapa mdzes pa zhig maMs so// gzhon nu da btsas pa na/ lus 'phags kyi ljongs rnams rigs pa
dang bza' ba dang btung ba med par gyur cing/ lhas kyang tshar dus bzhin du phab/ dus dang mthun pa'i rlung yang ldang ste/ des na rtag tubaza' ba dang btung ba yod par gyur to// de nas gzhon
nub btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gzhon nu'i mingecir gdags zhes rgyal bo sems pan/ gang gi phyir bzhin nu 'di btsas pan/ yul du bza'ab dang btung ba med par gyur pa de'i phyir/ gzhon
nu'imang bza' btubazhes btagasanas/ de nas gzhon nu bza' btung ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do// gang gi tshe de chen por gyur pa de'i tsho yi ga slob tu bcug pa dang/ ring po ma thogs
bar mthar phyin par gyur to// gosakyi bzo'i gnas la yang ring bo ma thogs par mkhas par gyur to zhes/ gong ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// gzhonan de yang dpa' ba/ tsham tsho/
med pa ba tul ba// rim pa gyur to// de nas btsunamo bu bsams nas rgyal po yab kyi bka' bzhin du mi nyan cing/ bzlog thabs byed par gyurato// mdog rgyal po yang ma dga' bas
gdungs pa dang/ de mi dga' ba blon po rnams kyis shes nas sbas pa/ lha ci'i slad du mi dgegs par gyur/ rgyal pos smras ba/ nga'i btsun mo bubasam 'a nas da ni nga'i bka' shin tu nyan
@#// cing/ bzlog thabs byed de/ rgyu des na nga mi dga' bar gyur to// de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lhagal te 'di bka' bzhin mi bgyidan/ dgazhan zhis/bang
bar bgyi ste/ des na 'di yang dbang du 'gyur la/ lha yang gzhon dang lhan cig dgyes pa btang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ ba gang nas blang bar bya/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ nyi 'og
gi rgyal bo 'di'i denas blang bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ de dang nga mi mthun pa yinen/ ji ltar de nas glang/ blon pos smras pa/ nyi 'og rgyal po 'dini chung bas/ gnyen du bgyi na/
bshes par 'gyur 'gasakyis/ thams cad du thugs khral chung bar bzhugs zhig dang/ 'di bdag cagagis bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas blon po rnams nyi 'og gi rgyal po de'i thad du song nas/
der de dag gis de shin tu rangs par byas pa dang/ des smras pa/ ngas dam zhig bcas nas bu mo spun te/ gal te nga'i tsho bo zhig yod la/ de rgyal tshab kyi thabs sbyin/ de lta na ngas sbyin par bya'o
de rnams kyis smras ba/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// rgyal bos smras pa/ re zhig sngar rgyal po de la kyis la/ de gal te dam bcas pa de bzhin du btub// de'i 'og tu sbyin par bya'o// de nas
ba'i blon po rnams kyis de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa// lhargyal tshab tusul bar blon po rnams kyis dad par bsams na/ ci nas lha'i dbon po zhig mchis na/ de rgyalatshapa tusul bar ye bgyi'o//
de nas thob ste dpal gyi 'byor ba chen pos bab/mar bla sa nas/ de dang rgyal po bskyed pa lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' ba skyed/ dga' dgar spyod bar byed do// de nas btsun mo de g.yer bag che
ba zhig pas/ ji ltar rgyal po dam pa de ltar ma nyes par byas pa dang/ rgyal pos smras la/ khyod la dam pa ci zhig sbyin/ des thal mo sbyar nas smyos pa/ gal te bdag la lhas skabs phyen/
bdag gi bu btsas ba gang lags pa de rgyal tshab tusul bar gsol/ de'i tshig thos ma thag tu rgyal bo mtshon gyis gnad du bsnan pa bzhin du ting zhes byed nas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di la
dam pa sbyin par skabs phye ba dang/ 'dis kyang de lta bu'i dam pa khams la/ bdag gi bu bza' btung 'di yang dpa' zhing brtson pa/ gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa// rigs dang
mthun par skyes pa'i bu gcig pa yin/ dzIwang na 'di btang ste/ gzhan rgyal thabs spyin par bya ste/ ra 'di la ltar bya zhes the tshom skyes nas/ sems dpa' la zhugs pa dang/ re zhig
na blon po rnams kyis rgyal po yid mi bde bar rig gnas/ lhaci dgongs zhes dris pa dang/ rgyal pos de rnams la rang bzhin smras te// ngas btsun mo la dam pa sbyin pa'i skabs phye ba dang/
des kyang bu zhig mchis par gyur na/ rgyal tshab tusal bar gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas/ de'i phyirang sems khongs su chud par gyur to// de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'dir
ya ma zad de/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po ba/nga 'a sa bdag cag gis 'di ba slas pa de las kyang dma'adi lta bu bcas bas sa la mod kyi/ lha 'on kyang mchis par 'gyur ram/
ma 'chis par 'gyur ram/ khye'u bam bu khor 'gyur ba da dung sus 'tshal/ re zhig de la mchog stsol cig/ de nas rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na/ btsun
tsho sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ zla ba dgu tshang ba na/ gzhon nu gzugs bzakha/ mdzes ba/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gzhon nu 'di'i
rig ming ci'i gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do// de nas rgyal po bskyod ngas bsams pa// gang gi phyir 'di ma bcos pa nyid nas/ rgyal srid mngon par 'dod cing mngon par dga' bas na/
de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming rgyal srid la mngon par dga' b zhes bya bar gdags so// dem ma brgyad po rnams la gtad nas/ de dag gis kyang dril ba dang/ phyi ba dang/ bkru ba dang
'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dkar rnams kyis bskyod nas/ gang gi tshe chen po ragyur kyang rgyal tshab tul ba ma bskur ro// de nas de'i ma mes nyi 'og gi rgyab ngos/ lus 'phags kyi
rgyal po bskyod pa la pho nya btang ste/ ji sa bdag gi tshabo rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab tu bcugan/ bodag dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba go bskon te/ khyod kyi gan du/
'ong ngo zhes sgreng ba dang/ des pho nya'i tshig thos nas/ 'jigs skrag nas/ yid mi bde zhing bdag gale/ de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po bskyod pa skrag ci mi dga' bar rig gnas sbas pa//

ci'i slad du 'di ltar ma dgyes par mdzad/ baspyod pas smras pa/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po des tsha bo'i phyi'i pho nya btang nas/ bo de 'di skad ces ni sa pa'i tshapi rgyalatshab tus kha/zhugan/ dngos de khyod
rgyal bo las phyudal/ nga'i tshabo gzhug go zhes zer ro/ de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa// lha rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab kyi thabs sAla'// gzhon nu bza' btung 'di
dgum par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po bskyed bas/ blon po rnams la smras l/ chos dang mi ldan pa'i tshig de lta bu ma smra zhig/ 'di ltar 'di na bu pa gsod pa thos kyi/ pha khu gsod ban
ma yin bas/ ngas de ltar gtan ma byed do// de dag gis smras pa/ ji snye ma de guman yan lagam mchis par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po baspyod pas/ blon po rnams la smras pa// gal te
yan lag med par byas na gsad pa kho nar bad mod/ de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po bskyod pa'i tshig thos nas/ rgyal po la smras pa// lha 'di la gzhan bgyis ci mchis/ bskrad par
bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ nyes pa med ba dziltar bslad par bya/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa// ci'i slad du khang pa sde ba ring po ma thog par gzhon nu lanongs pa 'byung bar rngo thog gis/
re zhig rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba la zabs sol cig/ de nas ni rgyal po batha' gtung rang nyid kyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po bskyed pas
dbang thang gi nyim shis pa la/ bkra shis dang/ shis par brjod pa byas nas/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab kyi thabs byin no// de thabs byin par gzhon nu bza' btung
gse khros nas bsams pa// lhasan bdag spangs par gyur gyis/ da bdag 'dir 'dug kyang su zhig rung ste/ bdag gsad par 'ong ngo snyam nas/ dema'i thad du song ste mi bde ba'i lo rgyus
bshad nas smras pa/ bdag rgyal po lnga len gyi yul du mchis mkhyen par mdzod cig/ de nas de yang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni myos/ bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni ldan/
bu'i mgulanas niib khyud de/ snying rje ji skad du smra sngags bton te smras pa// du gu la sa kyi gding bas mdzes byas pa'i// mal stan tsha 'os par bder nyal ba/ bu gcig dan sa
wA stong thang bu la// gos kyi phyogs gcig bting nas ji ltar nyal// mal du bde bar nyal nas rol mo dang// glasgra sna tshogs dag gis sad byed pa// grangadang tshaba'i chu yis khog gyur na//
mdangs can lus ni ji ltar nags na dga'// sngon chadargyal pos gnang ba'i bza' btung dang// snyan dang bzhon dang theg mchog la spyod pa// phyugs rgyan dang gos kyis 'bongs bzhin du//
su yi dbang gis sdug bsngal gyur par 'khyam// 'jig rten dang phrad skya bo'i tshogs rnams kyis// thal mo rab sbyar ngasgraglu dbyangs dag/ yid dang rna bar 'ong bas legs mchod pa// skom/
pas mngon bar gdongs bzhin gang du 'khyam// gzhonanus smras pa/ gtan du bde ba yang ni su zhig yod// gtan du sdug bsngalab yang su zhig yod// mi bde ma thob pa yang su zhig yod/
'thob par mi 'gyurang yang su zhig yod// 'gyur ba'i dbang gis mi rnams bde sdug ste// rgyu skar 'khor lemakha'al 'khor ba bzhin// bde bas dga' min sdug pas mi dga' med//
ma dbang rigs rjes 'gro ba'i rtags yin no// des ma la de lta burnamapa mang bo khong du chud par byas te/ yul lnga len na ba der song ngo// de der grong dang nye bar phyin nas/ lus la ba dang/
lus brje sa pas shing gi grib ma zhig la nyal zhing 'dug go/ ji tsam zhig na rgyal bo'i bya ba cung zad cig gi phyir/ lnga len gyi bkrabs pa dag cig phyogs der 'os pa dang/ bza' btung grib ma
del nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong nas smras kha/ 'di lta bur gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mkhrab/ sra ba/ legs par 'brel ba/ ro stod tshab/ dpung pa ring ba'i skyes bu bde su zhig/
ces de dag gis de bgrang nas/ khyod su zhig/ su'i bu yin zhes dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ bdag ni lus 'phags kyi rgyal po bskyod pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bya ba yin no// dgos pa
mi zhig gi phyir 'os/ des de rnams la ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ de nas bkrabs pa de dag gis rgyal po'i bu de skyes su khyer nas/ lnga len gyi rgyal po'i gan du song ste//
bza' btung de la phul nas/ lha 'di rgyal po bskyed pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bgyi ba lags te/ bas 'di lta bu zhigagi slad du bskyod nas 'dir byin pa lags so// de nas bza' btungagis kyang
lda len gyi rgyal po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do// yang smras pa/ mi yi bdag po bskyed pa ni// dbang po 'dra ba'i sras 'di ste// gzugs ldan yon tan phun tshogs ba// rgyal srid nyams/
nas 'dir mchis so/ de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos mgulas 'khyud de/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtama rnam pa sna tshogs smras nas/ dga' b khongadu chud par byas te/ de la bu mo dang yul dag
! kyang byin no// de yang de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' khar byed/ dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/ re zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo desems can dang ldan par gyur to// blob dgu tshang ba dang/
! khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bltan sdug ba mdzes ba tho kha seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ dpung rang ba/ ro stod seng ge 'drab zhig btsas nas/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/ gzhon nu'i
ming mir gdags snyam pa las/ bodag gi mang bza' btung yin bas/ 'di ni bza' btung mang po'o/ de nas ga zhonanu bza' btung mang bo la ma brgyad po rnams 'gatad pa dang/ de dag gis

00 bsu ba dang/ phyi ba dang/ bkru ba dang/ 'o ma dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar dkar rnams kyis bslad nas/ gang gi tshe chen bor gyur pa de'i tshe/ khye'u yi ge slob pa'i grwar ya lag slob tubatang ngo//
de'i pha batha'abatung nad kyis btab nas/ de sman pa dang/ sman dang/ nad g.yog rnams kyis kyang gso bar nus nas dus las 'das so// de dus las 'das pa dang/ rgyal bo'i bu mo
shin tu mya ngan gyis thebs nas tshe nges btab sta smra sngags 'don to// da nas lta len gyi rgyal pos ngasams ba/ budamed thams cad kyi bsam pa ni/ phal cher skyes pa 'dod pa yin pas/
dag la sbyin no snyam nas/ des de dang gzhon nu bza' btung mang po dang bcas par mdunan 'don la byin no// de nas mdunan 'don de de dang lhan cig dga' kha rgya chen po nyams su myong bar byed
dang ro zhig na mdun na 'don de'i khyim drung na/ bya gag gcig skad 'byin pa phyogs de na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig 'gro bas thos nas/ des mi gang gis de'i sha zos pa de rgyal par 'gyur ro
zhes smras pa dang/ tshig de mdunan 'don gyis thos nas// desakhram bu de 'dris te/ de nas mdun na 'don gyis bya gag bzung nas bsad de/ chung ma la smras pa// bya gag 'di 'phrul du/

tshos shig dang/ nga rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas/ de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo// jitsam na khye'u bza' btung mang ngegrwanas bkres te khyim du 'ongasan ma yang mi snang ngo//
de nas des bdag cagagis ci dag bcos/ zhig bza' snyam nas/ re zhig nam ni mi snang gi/ bltas na rdzobu zhig gi nang na phyogag gcig mgo gyen du byung zhing 'dug pa
mthong ngo// de nas des kyang rje ba'i nga du 'dug bzhin du mgo bcad de thos so// ji tsam nam 'ongs nas/ de la mgo sus thos zhes dris pa dang/ des bdag gis 'tshal te zhes byas pa dang/
de nas khye'u zan byin te grwar btang ngo// mdun na 'don kyang 'ongs nas/ bza'azhes byas ba dang/ bya gag gi mgrinabam snang nas/ 'di'i mgrin pa gare/ chums smyos pa/ khyos
'tshal tozhes byas ba dang/ de nas bya gag gi lhag ma thos nas bsams pa// cir zhig bya gag ril gyis zos pas rgyal por 'gyur ram/ 'on te yan lag ma tshang ba zos pas kyang rgyal por
gyur snyam du se tshom skyes nas/ chomagacad pa'i phyir thabs gzhan zhig gis bram ze ltas mkhan de nyid bos te/ kye bram ze chen po khyod kyis sngar gang gis bya ba ga zos ba de rgyal bor 'gyur ro
zhes bya ba yin log ma tshang ba bros bas de 'gyur ram/ 'on te ril gyis bros pas 'gyur/ des smras ba/ man lag ma tshang yang gang gis de'i mgo thos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na
gang gis de'imago wes pa de bsad de mgo thosan de nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas mdun na 'don gyi bloskyes pa/ gzhon nu 'di bsad nas 'di'i mgo bza'an mas shes par ma byas n ni
za0 gsud pa 'am bgra'abar 'dzinus pas/ re ba btub bam mi btub 'di nyidakyila'i nyam drod blang snyam nas/ des snyan pa'i tshig rnam pa du mas bshams te/ bzang mo ci khyos rgyal po byas na legs
ma/ 'on to bus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras pa dang/ des khur dang snol dag las legs par brtags bsams pa// gal te khus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras na/ 'di bdag
las gyed bar 'gyur bas/ can s kyang de dang mthun par smra'o snyam nas/ des khyos rgyal po byas na legs so zhes smras so// budamed de yang mkhas shing mdzangs la/ spyod pa can zhig pas/
des bsams na/ gag gi mgo'i phyir khon du bzung nas/ bdag gi bu gsad par chad par 'phrogs te/ da ni dus la babakyis/ nas kyadabu bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas/ des bu la gas pa/
bu khyod kyis bya gag gi mgozos pa nIm legs pa zhig byas kyis/ yul 'dinas myur du song zhig/ song nas mas po rgyal po byed pa de na/ khyod kyi rang gi skye bo'i tshigs yod pa der bde bar
'dug cig/ de skad smras pa dang/ de gros nas lus 'phags su song ngo// de ngal zhi bkres skom bas lus gzir te/ gnas kyi nya 'khor gyi skyed mos tshal gyi shing zhig gi drung du gos shig
bting nas nyal zhing 'dugego/ de'i tshe rgyal srid la mngon par dga' band kyis bas nas/ smin pa dang/ sman dang/ nadagayog rnams kyis gso bar ma nus nas/ de gi stargyal po bas
chad de/ 'di'i rgyal po'i chos nyid de/ ji srid du gzhan rgyal por dbang ma bskur ba de srid du rgyal po'i romi 'byin to// tsam na blon po rnams dang/ rgyal po'i mi
gzhan dang/ bram ze dang/ ltas mkhan rnams gal te bsod nams kyis dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can ga 'a zhig rnyedan/ dergyal srid la gzhag go zhes phan tshun tshol zhing song ste/ de
masakyis btsal ba'as/ grong khyer gyi phyi ro'angashing drung zhig na khye'u gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ thong kha sang ga 'dra ba/ nyim yo' yang shing gi grib ma
tsha shar phyogs su ma 'khor bar de'i lus ma gtong ba zhiganya' shing 'dug pa mthong ngo// de nas blon po drug po de rnams kyis de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te smras r/ bdag cag gis bsod
namasakyis dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can 'di las gzhan bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa ma mthong ngo// yang 'di gzugs bzang ba/ bltani sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ mtshan dang
ldan pa zhig pas/ 'dini rgyal srid lagazhag par 'os so zhes gcig tu nges par byas nas/ lengs longs zhes bslang ngo// de yang langs tadris pa/ nga bslang ste ci bya/ de dag gis/
smras pa/ rgyal bor bzhug go des smras pa/ rgyal po nya'akha de ltar bslang so/ blon po rnams kyis smras l/ 'on ji ltar bslang gzhon nus smras pa/ glu dang/ sil snyan dang//
[s]]rol mo'i sgra drag pas bslang yod/ de rnams kyis de thos ba dang/ 'di snyam du 'di'i rigs dma' ba las byung bas yin gyi/ 'di nges par rigasamathonabu las skyes pa yin no snyam nas/
de dag gis dris ba/ khyod su zhig/ nu'i bu yin/ des khye 'u gzhon nu des kyang seng ge bzhin dubasgyingasanos rang gi rigs smras l/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal bo bskyed pa zhes bya ba de'i
bu ni bza' btung ngo// bza' btung de'i bu ni bza' btung mang po zhes bya ste nga yin no// de nas blon po drug bo rnams 'dzum byung nas/ bdag cag gis ni bdag cag nyid kyi gzhonanu rnyed de
zhes smras so// de nas gnas de nyid nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor zhing glu dang/ sil snyan dang/ rol mo'i sgro dang/ shis par brjod pa la sogs pas mdun du drangs te/
grong khyer du bcug nas rgyal por dbang bskur ro// gang gi phyir 'dis rgyal bo'i brgyad chad ba bsabs pa de'i phyir/ ming bskyod pa kho nar brtags nas/ de'i nga bza' btung mang po
zhes bya ba gang yin pa de mad par gyur to// de nas de rgyal srid byed du 'jug pan byisaMpa'osnyam nas/ blon po rnams kyis de khyad du bsad de/ de la dbang cung zad kyang med do// de nas dus
gzhan 'i gzha/ rgyal bo bza' btung mang bo yul bltar song sta/ des grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ tshong dus rnams bltas nas/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ rikhor ba 'di rnams su'i
yin zhes dris ba dang/ de dag gis blon po drug kho na'i legs so zhes smras pa dang/ de ga ci lus bsams pa// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ri 'orapa 'di su'i
ya yin zhes de skad du gang dang bdung 'dris pa de dag thams cad deskad bar khas/ bdag lta zhigabaza' ba dang bgo ba tsam la dbang phyag byed kyi/ gzhan ci la yang ma yin no snyam du rang gi mig nas/
de sems khongs kyi rgya mtshor chud nas 'di ji ltar bya zhes sogs so// de de ltar sems ban lha zhig gis rgyal bo mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ 'di ltar khyod nyid kyi yul nar 'ong gang po'i mtshan
blo zhes bya ba den/ sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de la/ bu sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur gyis/ de khyod kyis blon por chug cig dang/ des yul bdag gir byas nas/ khyod
la 'bul bas khyod la phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ 'dod ba dang ldan par gyur po'os bsgo'o// de nas bza' btung mang bos ma dag mngags te/ ri'or gang bo'i mtshan don sna 'gatogs/
ba gang bo zhes bya ba de tsholato/ gal te rnyed pa dang de'i chung ma la bu yod dam med rtogs shig ces bsgo'o// de dag song ste mthong nas drisan/ des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras
ba dang/ de dag slar 'ongs nas rgyal po la gsol pa/ rgyal bo sna la gtogs pa de mchis te/ de'imachis brang yang sbyam lags so// de nas rgyal pos yi ge spris te/ gang po bkug
nas bshes pa'i tshig gis/ de la 'or de shi nas 'dis rang gi khu ma'i ston 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongs su skyongs la/ ci nas kyang de yan lag ga nga gang nyams par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/
ces bsgo'o// de nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes nga/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas/ 'byor pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khyobu 'di'i ming cir bdag
zhes byas na/ de'i mas smras pa/ bdag 'di ltar yun rings su nad bu can du 'gyur to/ sman ba dang/ sman dang/ nad g.yog rnams kyis nad zhi bar byas nus pa las/ gang gi tsho khye'u
ltar zhugs pa de nyid nas nad zhi bar gyur pas/ des na 'di'i ming sman chen boragadags so// smras pa/ sman rnams kun gyi nang nani// bdagagi bu ni sman chen po// 'di ni sman bas lhag
pa sman de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no// de nas sman chen po pa'i brag pa la bzhon te khrus bya ba'i phyir srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las/ re zhig na sa'i stengan ta'i dum bu/
zhig 'dug ba mthong nas/ des de la rin po che yin no snyam nas/ de'i rkang pa'i mthe bos sa'i sten gnas blabarakhartsams pa dang/ ji tsaman sma chen bos smras pa/ bayigang po rin chen lhung
snyam ste// lasabatang mig 'dzums bar nya dum la// rtog cing de nas rin chen yin par sems// bcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min// nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar bod//
rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin// de nas de rjed du song nas/ gang bos sman chen po dang/ gos rdzong 'gram du bzhag sku khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs ba na/ pad+ma'i

stang na mu gyur zhig 'dug pa dang/ des chu skyur de ba gzung ngo snyam nas/ de de'i drung du song ba dang/ de yang de nas 'phur ro// de nas sman chen pos smras pa/ bad+ma'i steng nas chu skyar 'phur/ chu
sbyar 'phur bas pad+ma lhags// pad+ma'i steng nas skyar mo// 'phur ba re zhig pha cig gzigs// de nas yang dus phyizhig na/ des sman chen po phrag pa la byang nas chu bo gdung khrus byed
du song ste/ des de dang gos mu 'gram du bzhag nas chur zhugs te khrus byed pa na/ khar gzhong zhig chubos khyer ba de'i stangan/ dang bo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo// de mthong nas sman chan
bos smras pa/ chu bo gang+gas khar gzhong khyar// khar gzhong de stong ngang mo 'dug/ khar gzhong ngang mo lhan cig tu// gangs khyer ba phra cig gzigs// ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig
na yang khyos byed cing/ sman chen bo chu 'gram du bzhag pa dang/ re zhig na chu bo ga'i rgyun phyogs su khum pa zhig khyer bde'i snying na/ chu srog cig 'dug pa de mthong nas/ smad chen pos/ ba
la sgras ba/ chu bo gang+gAs bum pa khyer// de yi sto ngan chu srog 'dug/ re zhig pha cig bumaM bani// chu srog g+hAdabacas gzigs// jitsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus khyad par 'dodonas/

[z]chu bo gar song ste/ des sman chen bo chu 'gram du bzhag nas/ nga khrus byed pa la zhugs pa dang/ dezhig na chu bo gang+gA'i rgyun phyogs su lug thul cig khyer ba de'i stangan/ bya dkar zhig 'dug gam
mthong/ de nas de sman chen pos mtho nas smras ba/ chu bo gangs lugathug khyor// de bzhin de steng bya dkar 'duge/ lug thug bya dkar lhan cig tu// gas khyor pa yab cig gzigs//
de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las/ rizhi'i byis pa de dag 'dus nas de rgyal por bcug go/ des kyang kho cig blon po bcug nas/ de de dag dang lhan cig rtse shing
'dug go/ ji tsam na bram ze rgud po zhig chung m gzhon nu dar la bab pa zhig dang/ khyo shug lhan cig tu 'am du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las/ re zhin bram ze bshang ga ci'i sar song ngo//
de nas g.yon can bo zhig gis 'phrigasanas/ bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bzamo khyod kyi pha de ga dra song/ bud med kyis smras pa/ gang zhig/ de nas g.yon can gyis smras pa/ dems/
po'anib lta zhige/ smos pa/ 'di ni zur ba zhig/ de nas gnon can gyis smras l/ de khyod kyi langams po yazhi pa lta zhig budamed kyis smras pa/ nga'i pha yang ma yin/ mas po yang
ma yin gang las kyang m yin gyi/ den pa'i khyo yin no// de nas g.yon can gyis cung bad cigag pagad de smras ba/ blunamo khyod grogasakhom/ ngotshashes pa gzhan gyi drung du 'di lta bu nga'i khyo
yin no zhes smra ba ngo mi tsha 'am/ sa skal ldan 'di'i snyingan skyes bu lha'i gzugs 'dra bas rab tu gang ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/ 'di lta bu'i ba gzugs mdzes pa chud zos
so ngas khyod kyi khyo byas tshur bdag cag lhan cig 'deng/ gal te khyod kyi phyir bram ze rgan po dang/ ba'akhrubamo byung pa dang/ der yang khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po la pa'i khyi 'di yin/
nozhis nga khyo yonepar pa zhig ces byas pa dang/ de dang g.yon can 'grogs te song ngo// bram ze yang bashang gci dang po krub la byas nas langs pa dang/ des de ma mthong ngo// re zhig na/
sga bu mthon po zhig gi steng du 'dzegs nas bltas na/ skyes pa gzhan zhig dang 'grogs tesangabamathonas/ bram ze des brgyugs te lag pa ya gcig gis bzung ngo// g.yon can gyis kyang
lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ba dang/ de nas bram bras smras pa// pa'i chungam ci'i phyir 'brog// g.yon can gyis smras pa/ 'dipi'i chung ma yin na/ kye ma khyod re 'obargyal/ bram bres kyang pa'i
yineshes smras nas/ de gnyis lam khar 'grubamo byung sta/ bar drangs tshu drangs pa dang/ g.yon can de dar la bab bas stobs che nas/ bram ze las drangs te brogs so// de nas bram ze bcom

kha pas 'brog der bram zer ma byas kyis ra mda' leg cis byas so// de'itsho smana chen po byis pa rnams dang lhan cig dgon pan rtse zhing 'dug pa las/ bram zer ma byas so zhes bya ba de yang byis pa dag
gis thos so// de nas byis pa de dag gis/ de la smras pa/ kyi sman chen po khyod cig na re/ ngargyal po'o zhin/ bram ze phagi khram wer ma byas so zhes 'bodan/ ci'i phyi 'jigs pa las mi
bsgrub/ de nas des byis pa rnams la song ste khrid de 'gaces bkya ba dang/ byis pa de dag gis de kun khrid de 'ongs so// 'dici zhig ces dris pa dang/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag grogs ma
mchis shing nyam chung ba'i chung ma/ g.yon can stobs po che 'dis brogs so// g.yon can gyis smras pa 'di brdzun mchi ste/ 'di ni bdag gi chung ba lags so// bud med des kyang bdag
gi khyo'adi lags so zhes g.yon can de nyid yin par phye'o// de nas sman chen pos bram ze de ma 'os par mi tshad par shes nas/ bgamakhar bya'o snyam nas/ kun ng rje khyod da gzod bud med 'di dang
grogs te gang nas 'ongs/ g.yon can gyis smras pa// gyos po'i khyim nas mchis so// der ci dag khros sam 'thus/ des smras pa/ sha dang/ snum khur dang/ bong tang dang/ tshang dag
'tshal to// sman chen pos smras pa/ gal tid rton skyugs shig dang/ bden nam brdzun blta'ozhes smras pa dang/ des mdzubam khar bcug ste skyugs ban/ khakhras de lta bu cang ma byung
'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi// gabal po so gsum la/ bram ze de la gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang/ bram ze des gyos po'i khyim nas/
mchis so zhes smras so// der ci thos/ der dar ba dang/ gzan dang/ la phug dang/ nas kyi khur ba rnams bros so zhes smras so// des skyogs shig ces bsgo
dang/ des skyugs pa dang/ ci bros chu 'thungs pa mngon du byung ngo// de ltar gyur nas sman chen pos skyes pa g.yonan 'dase ni gzhon num bslus te/ bram ze'i chung ma brogs sosnyam bsams nas/

g.yon can de dbyug pa dang khu tshur gyis brdagasan// mi nub pa'i dong brkos dmagrin pa man chad sa deng du bcu gnas / rma bya'imakhris pas dal bar bris te gang su yang rung bud med la 'di bzhin du sku
na/ smanachen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pas gcad do// gang gis bud med brkus pa bzhin du/ rgyas par byis pa rku ba dang/ glang zhu ba dang/ lab tu ba dang/ skud pa zhu ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu lnga
po brgya bzung nas/ dbyug pa dang khu tshur gyis brdegs te/ mgrin pa man chad sa dong du bcug nas/ dpral bar rmabya'i mkhris pas de rnams kyi ming dang/ gzhan gang yang rung rkun po byed pa thams
zhecad/ smanachen pos 'di ltar chadang sa gcad ces bris so// de nas blon po drug gi sha mngon du thos par rgyal pos mthong nas 'di snyam du blo skyes so// sman chen po de da ltar ci 'dra bar 'dug pa/
ltad mo blta'o snyam nas/ blon po rnams la nga ni ri dgas shor du 'gro'o zhes byas la/ ri brags kyi grong rdal du blta'o snyam nas/ ri dgas shor du 'gro ba ltar byas te/ 'khor mang po 'dus pa dang/
ri brags kyi grong rdal legs su chas pa dang/ g.yon can lnga brgyas 'i dong du bcug pas rgyal po de'athenas/ mang po kun gyis rgyal po zhes bos so// rgyal pos sgra de thos na/ mi mi snang nas kun tu
bltas kyang/ der skad kyi sgra grag nas/ de la g.yon can gcig gis mthong nas rgyal bo la bzlas te/ rgyal pos bltasar dang dpral ba la ma bya'imakhris pas bris pa klags tshan/
gang bud med zhu ba dang/ byis pa zhu ba dang glang rku ba dang/ la brku ba la sogs pa rnams/ sman chen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pa gcad dozhes bris so// sman chen po la sogs pa byis pa de
rnams rgyal po mthong nas/ kun tu bros so// de nas rgyal po des de'i las byas pa mthong nas/ sems dag bamagu ste/ byis pa yin mod kyi/ 'di lta bu byed pa las bltas na/ 'di dag/
tas pa ni ma yin no snyam bsams nas/ rgyal pos de dag phyung ste bkye'o// pukatsun gang pos rgyal bo der phyin pa mang nas/ bum pa chus bkang ba dang/ gdugs dang/ bdun dang/
rgyal mtshan la sogs pas bsu ba dang/ rgyal pos kyam 'jigs shig cesaMbyas nas gang po la khyod kyi bu blta yis khrid de shog ces smras pa dang/ gang bos lha byis pa chung chos las
na/ dalha'i sban star mi dgug go zhes gsol to// rgyal pos yang khrid de shog ces smras pa dang/ de nas phas khrid de 'ongs ba dang/ rgyal bos bltas na/ gzugs legs shing bstan
sdug pa dang/ bzang pa dang/ dpa' bo zhig gi byis pa de shed ma rdzogs nas/ de'i pha la rnam pa dumar bgo zhingegatad nas slar chas so/
na rgyal bos sman chen bo de blo mi bdog pa ba/man mi 'dra bar bya zhes bsams pa nas/ rgyal bo bskyod pas bANakatsA'i phrags kyi grong rdal du go dpon bang bo la pho ta btanas/ bye ma las/

byas pa'i thug pa cig 'dir skur zhigaces springs te/ ba nyade song nas ri brags kyi grong rdal du song ste gang bo'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/ bye ma lasabyas pa'i thag pa khru brgya
ba zhig skur zhig ces byas pa dang/ grong dpon gang pos de thos nas/ rab tu soms shing mi dga' sngangs skrag ste/ bdag 'di tsam du skyes nas ma mthong m zos pa'i klan kazhig bdag la tshol la zhes
smras te/ shin tu mi dga' ba dang/ gang po la sman chen pos ba cis te mi dga' zhes dris pa dang/ phas bu bdag gis tshe rabs kyang ma blos ma mthong ba rgyal pos bab na/ ci'i thabs g gis

[– ]chad pas gcod par byed dam/ mi shes so zhes smras pa dang/ de nas sman chen pos smras pa// mi de bdag dang spyod cig dang/ rgyal po bskyed pa la lan bdag gis spring ngo zhes byas pa dang/ phas pho
dang sprad pa dang/ smanachen pos pho nyal bdag ba gsol ba 'di rgyal bo lam brjed par gyis shig/ bdag cag yul 'khor pa blo rtseng la mi mkhas shing blun pas ma 'tshal te/ rgyal pos bka'
sul pa dka' bar 'tshalan/ lhas dpe khru gang pa cig bkal tob dag la bskur na/ dpe de la bltas la/ khru brgya 'am stong yang bkal te rdo thog par bgyis nas bskur bar 'tshal zhes spring/
ba dang/ de song ste rgyal po lha khong dag 'di skud mchi'o zhes smras pa dang/ rgyal bos smras pa/ 'di skad bgang po phyir ram/ bu zer zhes slar drisan/ pho nyas/ lha sman chen po ba gzhen na
'di skad mchi'o zhes smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal po ngomatshar skyes te bsam nga/ 'di ni lhas bstan pa yang dag pa ste/ 'dis ni bdag gi rgyal srid rgyas par byed par mngon no//
de nas yang dus phyi zhigan/ rgyal sman chen po la thagam par 'dod nas/ pukacu'i ri khrags kyi grong rdal du gang po'i dud du bo na btang ste/ 'bras chan gtun gyis kyang mabardungs/
dum bur chag pa yang ma bgyis te/ khyim kyi nang na yang ma yin/ phyi rol yang ma yini/ mas kyang ma yin/ ma mid pa yang ma yin par tshos la 'am du khyar mi 'ong lam ma yin par
yang khyar mi 'ong/ nyims kyang ma phog/ grib mas kyang ma yine/ bud med kyis kyang m bsur/ skyes pas kyang ma yin/ gzhon pas kyang mi bskur/ rkang pas kyang m yin par 'bras chan/
'on cig ces sring ba dang/ rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas/ bo nya des rim gyis grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal lta zhing/ rim gyis ri brags kyi grong rdal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gang po
@#// bos te/ gang po de dang dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas/ de nas rgyal po'i tshigs ji lta bu kun basgo nas/ rgyal dre'i bka' 'di skad ces sustsal tozhes smras pa dang/
des tshig de thos ma thag tud shin tu mi dga'/ rang mi dga' ba dang/ smana chen pos pa ci nyos te yi ma rangs zhes dris pa dang/ gang bos du cinyes dmi sams/ rgyal po bskyod pas rnam
'di lta bu dag bsgo'ozhes smras so// dzilta bu zhes dris pa dang/ gang pos snga ma bzhin du thams cad zhib tu smas pa dang de nas sman chen pos smras pa/ pha mi dga' bar ma byed cig/
bdag bas kun nus par bya'o// de nas smanachen pos 'bras nyi ma la bskabs nas// skyes pa dang bud med phal po tsho bsogs te/ mi mang po la 'bras spel ba re re byin nas/ sen mos shun pa ma
chag par byas ta/ 'bru re re nas sol cig de dag gis ma chag par bsal te/ rdzakhur blags tasgo'i them khor btsos nas/ mos kyang ma yin/ mi chod pas kyang ma yin par tshos shig pa
ni de'i sa suni/ steng nas nyims btsus so// lam du ba yin lam ma yin par yong ma yin par khyer tashog cig pa ni/ rgyus bu la bsgo ba/ rkang pa ya gcig lam du songal/
rkang pa ya gcig lam ma yin par se zhi'i// nyim la yang ma yin M/ grib ma la yang khyer tam ngazhig ba ni/ mi de la bsgo ba/ dbyug pa'i chu mo lo rje shu mchis pa gos srab mos g.yogs te
0 songazhigo/ bzhon pas kyang ma yin/ rkang pas kyang ma yin par khyer tashog cig pa ni/ mi de la bsgol/ rkang pa ya gcig lham gyon/ ma gcig lham med par byos la song zhig/ skyes bas
kyang ma yin/ bud med kyis kyang ma yin par khyer tashog cig gu pani/ mnang la bskur pa'o// rgyal po baspyod pa'i drung du de khyer te 'ongs nas/ rgyal bo brgyud pas mi do la dris ba/ des rgyal po la
zhib tu smras pa dang/ rgyal pos thos nas dga' sta/ cigang pos bsgo ste bskur ram/ 'on te sman chen pos bsgo zhes dris pa dang/ bo nyas sman chen pos bskur ro zhes smras so// de nas rgyal
pos smras pa/ sman chen po don rtogs pa dang/ lan ldan pa dang/ tshul dang/ chog la sogs par ldan no/// danas dus phyi zhig na/ bod gzhan zhig btang ste// 'di
ltar skyod mos tshal ldum ra dang/ bza' shing dang/ rdzing bur ldan pa skur zhig ces spring ba dang/ de nas pho 1de puNats+tsa'i grong rdal du phyin pa dang/ gang po la rgyal bos 'di skad ces bka'
su la to spyad mos tshal ldum ra dang/ bathang shing dang/ rdzing bur bcas pa zhig skur zhag ces bsgo ba dang/ gang bos da thos nas ma dga' sto/ skyed mos tshal 'di sngonom mthong n thabs ji lta
bur bya zhes lab tu sems pa dang/ de nas sman chen po gzhon nus pa sems pa mthong nas/ sman chen pos smras pa// pha zhig mi dga' zhes dris pa dang/ gang bo de la bu ci'i phyir mi dga'
bar mi 'gyur/ rgyal pos bdag la 'di skad du bsgo ste/ skye dmos tshal lcamar dang/ bzla shing dang/ rdzing bur ldan pa zhig skur zhig cen/ ji ltar sbyar zhes smras
pa dang sman chen pos smras pa/ mi dga' bar ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po ji ltar mnyis par 'gyur ba bdag gis de ltar bgyi'o// de nas pho nya bos nas smana chen pos smras po/ rgyal po
la slar 'di skad ces gsol cig/ ji sragasakyi skyed mos tshal 'di dag ni/ legs par na ci 'ang ba ma 'tshalan/ ji ltar b gyis namachi bar 'gyurab rgyal po'i pho brang gi skyed mos tshal shig/
rgyalapos skur bar gsol/ phas kyi spyod mos tshal de ji ltar mching la bltas te bslabs nas/ de'i rjes bzhin du gtang ba 'tshal lo zhes spring ba dang/ de nas pho nyade slar btang stargyal po
la des ji ltar spring ba bzhin du gsol to// rgyal po dga' ci gang po rang gi blos smras pa yin nam/ 'on te smanachen pos smras pa yin zhes dris pa dang/ de nas pho nyas sman chen pos
spying ba lags so zhes smras pa dang/ 'di ltar gzhon nu dani shes rab dang ldan pa zhig go zhes bsams nas/ yang dus phyi zhig na phonya de lta bu zhig btang nas/ rabregs kyi grol rdal der shice
skyod la 'gacig lon pa de lam rtog dang ldan pa/ 'bras bur ldan pa zhig skur zhig ces spring ba dang/ pho song stagang bo la bsgo ba dang/ gang bo sngam bzhin du rab tu sems nas mi dga'
basman chen pos mthong nas smras pa// pha ma dgu'i bar ma mdzad cig/ don de yi dka'a'o zhes smras nas/ des en Darishi ngo zhig bskyod nas bskur te// de'i lo ma dang/ 'bras bu dang/
ma tog byung ba rgyal bos mthong nas/ ngo mtshar che bar bsams te/ pho nya la 'di ci gang po'i thabs sam/ sman chen po 'am/ su'ozhes rgyas po dang/ pho nyas smras pa/ sman chen po'i
lags so// legs so legs so zhes smras nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug gro/ de nas dus phyi zhigan/ rgyal pos ri khrags kyi grong rdal der gang po la/ glang lta brgya
bdasanas 'di rnams rtswa byin te zhes la 'o ma dang/ zhodang/ mar dang/ smras ma dang/ chur ba rnams byos la skur zhig/ pho nya des rgyal po 'baka' mnyan te/ rimA kyis grong du song
nas gang po yid ches pa'i tshig gis byas nas bos pasmas pa rgyal pos ba glang lnga brgya po 'di dag bdas te 'di rnams zhes bcom dang/ zho dang/ mar dang/ sprisam dang/ churab
gyis la skur zhig cesabyung ngo// gang des de skad du thos nas yi chad de grong mi gzhan dag la smras pa/ rgyal posani thabs 'di lta bu s chad pas gcad par des nas/ glang las 'o ma gyis
shig ces gsung nas/ rab tusems shing 'dug pa dang/ sman chen pos smras pa/ pha khyod mi dga' bar ma mdzad cig dang/ bdag gis de'i 'dabamasal/ ji ltar rgyalapo mnyis par/
'gyur zhing/ de rnams kyang byed du ma gzhug par bya'o// de nas sman chen pos spradaganyis shig la bslabs tabatan gnas / khyod grong khyer chen por rgyal po las mi
ring ba zhig tu song la/ nga gi gzhing khung zhig ltar cher la gos kyis dkris te/ sa la phar 'gro tshur 'gro zhing du ba ltar byos shig/ de nas khye'u khyod kyis phyogs kun tugasol ba thob la/
ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bshes kyis phyogs bcur gtor 'a// pha 'di bde zhing legs la bkra shis par bu phyang zhag ces rjod cig/ der smad gnyis ji ltar bstan pa pazhin du//
ba/ yul pAThakat+yA'i grong rdal nas/ rgyal po bskyed pa'i drung du so'asi/ mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug nas/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshes dang/ smra zhing bu la sogs pa byas te/ gang 'jig rten na 'jig/
rten skyongobs bdag gab 'di sungs la/ bde zhing legs la bkra shis pa du btsas par shog cig ces de skad du bos ba/ rgyal po bskyed pas thos nas/ dos rtogs shig cesazhi zhige
ba btang ngo// de sang stabaltasan/ rgyas pa zhig gsus pa che las la 'gre ldog cing du ba mthong ngo// de'i bu yang gashin rje dang/ klu'i rgyal po dang/ galasos ba dang ra cas pa la
sogs pa lha'i dbang po rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ste/ de dag gso de ci'i phyir zhes dris na/ de nas khye'us bdag gi pha las bu dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir ro// de dgagis go
0 nas/ rgyal po la gsol pa dang/ rgyal pos de spyad gnyis bos pa dang/ khye'u des bdag gi kha las bu 'byung bar shog cig ces de bzhin du smras so// de nas rgyal pos khragadu de gungan
yang 'di ltar skyes pa las bu byung ba nam thos ma mthong pozhes smras pa dang/ de nas khye'u des lha khyod de bzhin du gsung ba bzhin lags sam/ de bzhinano// de nas khye'u des de ltar
ci'i slad du/ b+hu kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du glong lnga brgya bdas te 'di rnams las 'o ma dang/ zho dang/ mar sar dang/ bris ma dang/ chur ba dag skur zhig ces byung na/
khyod kyi grangasbrum stobu byung ba ga ngan gzigs/ gang nas gsan ces smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos bshad de cibang po'i yid brtan pa/ pha zer ram/ 'on te smon chen po 'tsho/
su zhes dris pa dang/ pho nyas lha sman chen po lags so zhes smras so// rgyalapo dang/ blon po rnams kyis shin tungo mtshar dang ldan par bzung ngo// de nas dus phyi
zhig na rgyal bos bgam pa'i phyir pho nya dre'agacig khrid de bdunas/ puN+DakatsA brigs kyi grong rdal du song ste/ gang bo' dra'u 'di la bcing bar srungs shig/ bla gab yod par
yang ma gzhug par tshos shig ces sgo zhig/ pho ba de rims bzhin du tu ka ts+tsa'i ri brogs kyi grong rdal du song ste/ gang bo la khyodakyis dre'u 'di srungs shig/ de lta bu'i tshul la brgya
la shor na/ lus chad pas che gcod de zhes bsgo ba dang/ de de skad zos nas sprug ste/ de dag thams cad ni bur rung gi/ da ni 'di mi rung ste/ des bdag la ci 'dra
babaka'astsal pa'i/ lhas kyang bde bar byed ma nus so snyam ste/ rab tu sems shing 'dug pa dang/ sman chen pos pha rab tu sems pa mgrong nas mi dga' bar m byed cig ces smras te/ dre'u
de ni mon gzas la ci bder btsasanas/ nubamo ni lo nyi shus bskoranas/ mi lnga las me'atshe thun re re byas nas/ rkang 'gal mi re res bzung dre'u de'i stod du rtag par mi gcig zhon te
'dug go/ thabs de lta bur gtishus bla gab med pa zhu srung zhing 'dug go/ rgyal ba bskyed ngas ma ga gzhug byed pa'i mi kha cige gang po'i drung du de ji ltar 'tsho skyes shig ces rtag tu btang ngo//
des ma thongs rgyal po pu lha 'di lta bu'i thabs subgyid do zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal bos de ltar bsrung na 'brasalanus kyis/ ma de rnams las gcig kha drang zhes smras pa da/ blon
bos gang khadrang bar bgyi zhes zhus pa dang/ rgyal bos nub mo stengan zhon pa de kha drangasanas/ gzhan gnyid log pa dang/ de khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos ston zhon pa
da brid de/ des kyang dre'u khyer der 'ongs so// namams pa dang/ gang po la dre'u de bros so zhes smras pa dang/ de da nibadag gi 'tshob ma rung bar gyur tozhis skra gnas / smra sngags 'don
00 bar byed pa ni/ gang ji ltar bya zhes de la dga' zhing 'dug la/ sman chen pos mthong nas/ de yang sems pa la zhugs te/ thabs de dag thams cad ni klabs kyis bsgrubastan/ 'di'i thabs
ni mi snang ngo zhes smras te/ de yang skrag nas de'i thabs soms pa las/ des pha la khyod kyis don de bsgrub par nus no/ thabs gcig cig yod de zhes smras so// pasu ci zhig yod ces dris pa/
dang sman chen pos ci nas bdag nyid lamatho btsam par bzod na/ gdod don de bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhes smras ba dang/ de nas gang des smras pa/ zhes bdag gi 'tsho ba dang bral bar mi
'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de nas sman chen pos pha'i mgo bo skra khem gnyer bdun du bregs to/ la kri dang/ snag tsha dang/ mthing shing dang/ dkar po 'bu sogs pas mgo ri mo sdus
nas bong bu la skyon te/ rims kyis grong khyer chen por dong ba dang/ sman chen po 'ong ngo zhes kun dusgra grags so// des pa'i mgo bo khrim gnyer bdun du bregs shing bong bu la zhon te
'ongs so zhes kyang grags so// de nas rgyal po dang/ blon po dag gis de lta bur gyur pA mthong nas smras pa/ demakhas pa'o// mdzangs bu'ozhes gtam snyan pa thams cad du grags pa
ni legasan/ ci'i phyir na desami rigs pa 'di lta bu byas/ de nas rgyal po bskyod pa blon po dang 'khor du bcas nas sman chen po ltar dong ste/ ci de 'dra pa drang bo'am/ 'on te ban/ rgyal
po 'khor dang bcas pas de lta bu mngon sum du mthong ba dang/ blon po dag gis rgyal po la/ lhaci'i phyir sman chen po la mkhas pa'o// gsal ba'o// mdzangs
ba'o// zhes bsngags te/ des mi rigs pa 'di lta bu brgyad pa gda' 'am zhes gsol pa dang/ de nas rgyal pos sman chen go la/ sman chen po ni 'di lta bu la mtho btsam par byas
zhes dris pa dang/ des smras pa// lha 'di ni mtho btsam pa ma lags kyis/ mchod par bgyis te/ bdag kyang mkhas shin tu mang du btsal bas na/ bdag gis 'di la rnam par mchod par
sgo bgyis go/ rgyal pos smras pa// ci khyod bzang ngam/ 'on te pazang/ des bdag bzang gi/ ngan nozhes smras pa dang/ rgyal pos smras pa// pha bas bu bzang ba ni/ ngas gang du/
yang mthosam mthong med t+yaM/ pas bu grags par byed/ mas ni bu gso ba dang/ skyid pa dang/ srung ba'i phyirati/ de bas na nged kyis ni ci nas bu bzang ba yin no snyam du bsams so//
de nas sman chen pos rgyal po 'khayang yade ltar lags sam ma 'gas/ shin turtogs shig ces smras pa dang rgyal po dang/ blonapos de bzhin yin gyi/ gzhan ma yin no zhes smras pa/
ba dang/ nas sman chen posargyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ lha de ltar lags mad na/ lhas bdag tsag 'dre'u 'tshor stsal ba de bros te/ lha dang blon po rnams kyis bka' su la pa yang/
0 bar bzang ngo zhes bstodan/ dre'u de'i pha ni ri bu 'di lags na/ sbyin par bzhes su gsol zhes smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal bo dang/ bon pos de'i tshig gi bas de lta bur spar bar shes
nas ya mtshan du bzung zhing/ a ma'i zhes de gas pa dang/ mi rigs par bya ba 'di lta bu mkhas so// de lta bu khong du chud de/ des rgyab go mgu/ rangs/ ba tudab 'o ba'i sems
skyus nas/ rnam pa mang por rgyunaklubs te/ bon po'i dbang byin no// ba la gad ri brags kyi grong khyer de byon no// bar gyi sdom ste/ ma bkal ba 'bras chan dang
i ran Da ling dang glang// dro'u dang de ru song ba dang// de la blon po'i thabs byin pa'o// de nas smanachen bo blon po'i bya ba dang/ ci bya ba dang/ rgyal bo'i don ji ltar
bya zhes rab tu bde bas sems pa la zhugs pa dang/ grong khyer kun tu yang sman chen po blon por bcug ste/ mdzangs pa mkhas ba'isgragrags so// de nas dus zhig na/ bram ze zhig gis
bumo zhig bag mar blangs pa'i yo byad du nor mang zhig brad nas/ de dang lhan cigazhag mang zhibe tu yongs su spyad de/ bdag gis bgam blangs pa'i yo byad du nor med du zad pa'/ dani 'di
ltar nor du gyur pa chen po med la/ khyim na 'dug na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams te/ bram ze de kha ton mang du 'bas la smra ba dang/ smragi yan lag dang ldan pas pha ro'o tu phyin
bder bsgrub pa'i phyir rdzong gzhan du song ngo// de yang de nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ba las/ das gsar gyi dong tsagana'am lnga brgya rnyed de khyer nas/ slar bdag gi
khyim du 'ongs so// des bdag sngar nodi khyer nas khyim du mi 'jug la// bud med kyi sams kyi spyod pa sus kyang ma rig ste/ bram ze mo do yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang bsun/
bdag med pa'i phyiren/ skyes pagazhan dang chags shing 'dug kyang srid kyis snyam du bsams nas/ des nam sros pa dang dur khrod du song nas/ shing na gro d+ha'i drung du khung brkos nas/ de'i nang du/
bcug ste/ nam sres nas khyim du phyin pa dang/ chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan bram zon bo che zhes bya ba de la chags te/ de'i tshe na lhan ci/kha zas zhim po bros nas/ dri bsung zhim pos lus byugs
tatal mal kyi ston de gnyis dga' ba myobashing 'khod pa las/ bram ze de yang bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ sgo phyi zhes bos ba dang/ bud med des smras pa/ kye khyod su zhig ces smras/
so das bdag gaming byung pa dang/ mo nyid kyis dga' ba dang mgu ba'i sgra byung nas/ no bo tsho nya' ba bslang sto/ mal khri'i 'og tu sbas nas/ sgo 'byed du 'os te// des khyo
la g.yokhyad cing rjes byas to'ongs nas sgo phye sta/ dus nas mgrin panas 'jus mchod yon phul la// zas bsod pa byin no// bram ze de za zhing 'di'iskyes po gzhan zhig 'chags par
0 ngas bsan/ 'di ltar mtshan mo kha zas 'di lta bu sbyar resnyan du bsams so// de yang drang ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste/ de la kyi bklangamo tshos grangs khyad par can ni ma yin/ dus kyi ston m
'kha grong khyer gyi dus kyi ston mo la ni ma bab na/ bza' ba 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang/ bdag la lhas khyod kyi khyo de 'ong nge zhes bstan pas na/ khyod kyi phyir 'di ltar sta gon
bgyis so zhes smras so// bram zes e ma'o ngani bsod nams can te/ bdag gi chung ma'i rmi mdu yang lhas bstan pa lta zhes smras te/ des ba/than thos nas khrus byas tamal du nyal
nas gcig la sgocig mdza' bas bde 'am/ nyonam longs sam zhes gtam 'dri'o// de nas chung mas jo bos cung zad cimachis sem zhes dris pa dang/ des smras pa/ cung zad cig
'ongs so// de nas chung mas brda tshig tusmras pa// 'di ni ci thor ba rna bas nyon rna bo che/ des smras pa/ gser gyi dong tshe lnga brgya'o// bdag la ma bstan na gang bzhag/ des smras ba/
rtogs thub par gyis dang yod do// de gang du bzhag/ des smras pa// sang bstun to// ngonas bud med des smras ba/ bdag khyod kyi lus phyed na/ ci'i phyir gsang/ bram we/
rang bzhin dra bsan/ grong khyer gyi phyi rolag tu bzhag go zhes smras pa dang/ bud med des smras ba/ nyon cig rna bo tshe de sa phyogs gang du bzhag ces smras pa dang/ bram ze des dung khrod kyi
ka@#// shi na gro d+ha'i drung du sa brkos te bzhag go zhes smras pa dang/ de nas bram ze mo desarolam nas brdabs brdabs tamanyal bas/ bdagagis kyang gatses te/ da
khyod mnol cig ces smras so// de nas de gnyid kyis phogapar rig nas/ rnabo tshe la gang khyod kyis thos pa de gyur du bsgrubs zhes byas ba dang/ de nas rna bo chedal bus brngub cing khyim de
nas khyung ste/ dur khrod du song de// des ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du dur khrod kyi shing na gro d+ha dung nas de byas te/ rnabo tshe bdag gi khyim du song// bram ze de de'i phyi de nyin par las
te dur khrod du song nas bltasan/ de'i phyogs nas ma rnyed do// de nas mgo dang brang chungashing khyim du phyin pa dang chung ma dang/ gnyan 'dun dang zhan grogs po dang/ phunu dag gis
nyes zhes dris pa dang/ des gser gyi dong tse lnga brgyabaslangs nas/ khyer te 'ongs nas lar tshang gi rgyun tshad pa'i dus su dur khrod du brkos te bzhag nas khyim du 'os so// de ring bdag gis
tsalanami snang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis sman chen po'i drung du song ba dang/ blon po'i mchog des mkhas shing shes pa brtags pa dang/ dpyod pa yang rtogs shing don rnams la rjes
dbog pas rig gis/ de la skyabs su song zhig dang/ das gal te thob par byed kyang srid kyis/ skyabs gzhan nimi snang ngo zhes bstan pa dang/ de nas bram ge de gdong la mchis 'dzag cing bzhin du/
smanachen po'i drung du phyin nas/ rgyal ba dang/ tshe ring bar shog ces brjod nas/ gsol pa// lha 'di ltar bdag gis blangs pa 'tshal tamachisanas/ khar tshangam rgyun chad pa'i dus na/
