khyim na gnas pa lo bcu 'apag/ gzhonanam lobaco brgyad ste/ mkhan mo ming 'di'isabagyibs 'phagasama'i dge 'dunu ma las leganyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brangaba'ichos drugagibaslab pa
gsolan/ de'i slad du 'phags ma'i dge 'dunams ming bzhis bgyi ba khyim na gnas ba lo bcu len pa 'am/ gzhonanam lekhacobargyad ma ste/ mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi bas dge slongama'i dag bdun lasu
la kha nyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brab 'i chos drug gi bslab pa gsolan/ gang ming 'dizhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa la bcu lon pa 'am/ gzhon num lo bco brgyud ma ste/ mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi
bas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa stsolan/ 'phagasama'i dge 'dun rnams gang bzod pan congam gsung zhig/ mi bzod pa rnams gsungs
shig/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyiman gnas pa lo bcu len pa 'ag/ gzhon num le bco brgyad ma ste/ mkhan mo mi 'di zhes bgyi bas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i
chos drug 'phagasama'i dge 'dun rnams kyis skul te/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams bzod du gnang sta/ cang mi gsung bsan de de bzhin du 'dzin to// de nas de la tshes
drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drugazhib tu ston cig/ chos drug gang zhen/ cig tu grong dum 'gro ba/ chu ba pha rol rgol lo// skyes pa dag dang reg mi bya// skyes pa dang yang gnas mi
dgi// smyan du 'gyur ba mi bya ste/ khanam tho ma btab bo// 'di ni di bzhin gshegs ba yi/ gsung rab ni chos drug gsungs// rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gang yin/ gser la sogs
bam gozung ste// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg mi bya// sa yang brko bar mi bya ste// sen mos rtsa sngonam kho cad do// byin lenam byas zas mi bza'// bzhag pa rnams
ni bozabam khyo// rjes su 'brangaba'i chos drug 'di// bde bar gshegs bsam gnang ngo// nama'aganyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drugazhibaslabs par gyuran/ das
tshas par spyod pa la rim gror ba'i sdom ba sbyin par bya'o// thog mar mkhan tshos chos gos lnga dang lhung bod shoms laM/ gsang ston pa dang las byed pa 'i dig slong ma gsolacig de'i
la/ 'og dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams 'dus shing 'khod pa dang/ nyungan yang dge slong ma bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i 'khor lan gsum du phyag byas nas/ mkhan mor gsol ba byas te/ de ste
mkhan tsho yin na ni 'di bzhin gsol/// dgosashigamakhan/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bamakhanamo lamakhan mor gso'an/ mkhan mos bdag gi mkhan mer
tho gyur cig/ mkhan mo sa bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo// de snya slob dpon ma yin na yang 'di skad du gsol bar bya'o// slob dpon m dgongs shig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
slob dpon ma las mkhan mor gsal te/ slob dpon mas bdagagi mkhan mor gyur cig/ slob dpon mo mkhamo las bsnyan par rdzogs par gsol lo/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum mo//
de nas tshes gos rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o// mkhan mo dgongs shig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos 'di sbyar bar byin gyis brlab ste/ byas pa rdzogs pa'i tshos gosakun tu spyad
ba'o de bzhin lanaganyis lan gsumo du'o// 'di bzhin du stod g.yogs dang/ bar du bgo ba dang/ shing dpung bcodadang/ rngul gzan rnams byin gyis brlab bo// de nas lhung bzed
dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma la bstan to// dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed bathang ngo zhes smos shig/ de nas lhung bzed byin gyisabarlab sto/ mkhan mo dgongs shig/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi/
ba'i lhung bzed 'di'i drang srongagi snod de/ bsrung ba'i snod du byin gyis brlab bo// bza' bar kun tu spyod pa'o// de bzhin lanaganyis 'dun gsum du// de'i 'og tu thos pa'i gnas
spangs nus mthong ba'i gnas su thal mo sbyar la mang po 'dus pa'i legs su ston la zhog cig/ de nas 'os byed pa'i dge slongams ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gsang ba ston par su 'gasol zhes
smyos shig/ gabs pa des kyang bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi'o zhes smos shig/ des las byed pa'i dag slengams thogam dad par byos shig/ mi 'dazhis bya ba khyodamakhan mo mang 'di
zhes bya ba ste/ ming 'dizhis bya ba'i gsang ba ston par dad dam/ de dadan des dad de zhes smros shig/ de nas las byed ba'i dge slong mas gsol ba nyi tshe byos shig/ gsen ge
'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/ mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi sku/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gsang ste ston pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dan/de ste 'phags ma'i
dge 'dunamanams kyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ 'phagasama'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnong zhig dang/ 'phags ma dge 'dunam rnams makhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong
khaming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'diming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gsang pa ston to/ dazhigasol ba'o// de nas gsang ba ston pa'i dge slong mas mdun du tsog bur zhog ste/
thal mo sbyor du chug la smos shig ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon ga/ 'din khyod kyi bden pa'i dus/ 'dini yang dag pa'i dus ti/ ngas khyod la cung khrod cig dris pa de thams
cad khyod kyisom 'dzem por byung ba lan byungazhes bya/ ma khyung ba lanI la byung zhes ma nor bar smos shig// khyod budamed dam/bud med do/ bud kyi dbang po dang ldan nam/
ldan no// khyiman gnas pa'ibcu gnyis pa 'ag/ gzhonanu ma'atsho tshang ngam/ tshang ngo// chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed rnams dang ldan nam/ ldan no// khyod kyi pa dang/
ma dang/ khyim zab rnams gsonanam/ gsonano/ ma dang/ ba dang/ khyod rnams kyis gnang bas/ gnang ngo// bran mo ma yin nam/ brkus pa ma lananam dbatsongs pa
[2 ]ma yin nam/ red btsan ma yin nam/ bcodapa med dam/ gzhan gyi chags pa med dal/ sprul pa ma yin nam/ dud 'gro ma yin nam/ rgyal po la gtses pa ma yin nam/ rgyal po//
dang 'khon ba ma yin nam/ rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed pa ma yin nam/ khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byas sam/ byed du bcugapas zhinam mi bsun pa ma yin nam/
mya ngan gyis gdungs pa ma yin nam/ sbrum ma ma yin nam/ mtshan med pam yin nam/ mtshan gnyis pa ma yin nam/ glo 'dams pam yin nam/ rtag tu 'dzag pa ma yin nam/
khrag med pa ma yin nam/ mtshan ma tsam yod pam yin nam/ dge slong bslus pa ma yin nam/ pha bsad pa ma yin nam/ ma bsad pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yani
nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam/ chu stags can m yin nam/ mu stegs can du 'gro ba ma yin nam/ rkun po'i rgyal mtshan can m yakhom
thabs su gnas pa ma yin nam/so sor gnas pa ma yin nas/ mi gnas pa ma yin nam/ ci khyodasngon rab tu byung ba ma yin nam/ da ste rab tu byung nga'o zhes sman/ 'on slar song zhig ces smos shig/
de ster gtum byung ngozhis sman/ ci khyod kyis da ltar rab tu byungadam/ byung ngo// ci khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad dam/ spyad do// khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge
'dun las lo gnyis su chos dug dang/ rjes su 'brang pa'i chos dug gi bslab pa gsol lam/ gsol to// khyod kyis log kyis su chos drug dang/ rjes
su 'brang ba'ichos drug gi bslab pa la bslab sam/bsrubs so// khyod la gzhan gyi dulenamang yang rung/ nyung yang dung chags pa med dag/ med do// khyod mi tsi/ khyod kyi mkhan mo'i ming
ci bdag gi ming 'di zhes bgyi/ don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi'o// khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba nyon cig/ budamed kyi lus la gnod 'gyur ba
lus kyi nad 'di 'dra ba yod de/ de 'di lta ste/ mdzes dang/ 'bras dang/ shu pa dang/ tshad pa dang/ sha bkra dang/ rkang pa dang/ bolamig dang/ glog pa dang/ rab tugaya'
ba dang/ skyigs bu dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ lo gzhang 'brum dang/ rims dang/ thadapa dang/ myos pa dang/ dubasgrags pa dang/ ngal ba dang/ rmong bu dang/ dbugs mi
bde ba dang/ lud pa dang/ skom pa dang/ brjod byed dang/ 'jus pa dang/ dkaramo'i nad dang/ rkang 'bam dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ skyonApa dang/ khragand dang/ ma bris pa
dang chub 'bum dang/ lhag pa dang/ yan lag tshab dang/ rtsib logs tsha ba dang/ rus pa zhig ba dang/ rigs drag po dang/ rims zhag gcig pa dang/ zhag ga nyis pa dang/
zhag kha sum ba dang/ zhag bzhi pa dang rims nyin re dang/ 'dus ba'i rims dang/ rtag pa'i rims dang/ rims ldang dub pa drang/ khyod kyi lus la 'di lta bu lus kyi nad dang/ gzhan
dag med dam/ de sta yongs su gtang bar gyuran/ gsang snya ston pas ji ltar bdag gis khyod la dris pa de nga [Q]nadu/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang smos shigacas bsgol/ 'dir 'dug ste/
ma bos kyi bar dum 'ong zhig/ de nas gsang ste ston pa lam gyi bar du 'dul dal 'di skad smos shig/ dgongs shig 'phags ma dgabadag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas bar chad kyi chos rnams bstan
cing drin/ yongs su dag go zhes nyid mchin/ ci mo zhig gam/ dge slong thams cad kyis kyang de lta yongs su dag par gyur na tshur pashog cig ces smyos shig/ de ltar smras na ni le/
ma smras na ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// de nas las byed pa'i dge slongams mdun du zhag la tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol cig/ gson cig 'phags
ma'i dge 'dun rnams/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las dge 'dun las bsnyenang ra rdzogs par 'tshal te/ de yang bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'phags ma'i dge 'dun
ma rnams la tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa'i sdom pa gsol gyis/ don gyi slod du mtshan nas smos te/ mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi sa/ don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ mkhan mo 'phags
ma'i dge 'dun gyis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bal/ tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsolacig/ brtse ba can bcu bar bgyi ba'i phyir ro/ de bzhin lan gnyis lan
gsum du'o/ de nas lasapyod pa'i dge slong mas gsol ba thob la las byos shig/ gosanacig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams/ ming 'di zhes bya baming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen bar rdzogs/
'aglo bar 'tshalate/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi sku/ 'phagasama'i dge 'dun rnams las tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsolan/ de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam
rnams kyis dus la bab cing bgrodon/ 'apagasam 'i dge 'dun rnams kyis gnongazhig dang/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyin ng du bar chad kyi chos 'dri ste/ 'dinagaso'aba'o/
ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ 'dan khyod kyi bden pa'i dus/ 'di'i yang dag pa'i dus te/ ngas khyod la cung zad cigs pa de thams cad khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byung ba la
sh+tsa ni byung zhes smos/ ma byung ba lanam byung zhes mnor bar smyos shig/ bud med dam/ budamed do zhes bya ba nas/ khyod kyi lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyi gnod pa dang/ gzhan yang mad dam/ des
med do zhes smras shig po'i bar du sbyar ro// de nas gsal bar byos shig/ gsan cig 'phags ma'i ga 'dun ma rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakhanamo mang 'di zhes
bgyi ba dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/ khyimana gnas ba lebcu gnyis pa 'am/ gzhonan mnyi shutshangal/ chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yaldan/ bar chad kyi chos
rnams kyang yongs su gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchiste/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhaname mang 'di zhes bgyi ste/ 'bagosama'i dge 'dun ma rnams laso tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i sdom pa gsol
na dasku 'phags ma'i dge 'dunama rnams kyis dus 'khab cing bzodan/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams kyis gnod la/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams kyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mkhan
moming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ de la tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa'i sdom pa sol cig/ 'din gsol ba'o// las kyang 'di bzhin bya'o// gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam
rnams mnge 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakhan mi mang 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun las bsnyen pa rdzogs bar tshal te/ khyim na gnas pa bcu gnyis pa'i m/ gzhon nu ma le nying shutshang la/
chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/pa chud kyi chos rnams kyang gtsang ngo zhes bdag tidamatshi// ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dim banamo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun
ma rnams la tshosar spyad pa spyod pa'i sdom pa gsalan/ 'phagasama'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis ming 'dizhisabagyi ba 'dimakhanamo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ de la tshangs par spyad ba skyed pa'i sdom/
pa gsolan/ 'phags ma rnams las ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakanamo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dal tshangs par spyod pa skye dpa'i sdom pa sul bar gang la bzod pa de
dganacingam gsung zhige/ gang mi bzod pa de dgan ge/sungs shig/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams kyisamang bdazhisapal/ mkhagamoming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ de la tshangs par spyad pa
skyod pa'i sdom pa stsal te/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dunuma rnams kyis bgrod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste/ de de bzhin du badzan to// de'i 'ogatu dge slong pha'i dge 'dun thams
cad 'dus shing 'khod de/ nyungan yang dge slong gi grangs bcu'i 'khor dang/ dge slong ma thams cad 'dus shing 'khod la/ nyung na yang dge slong ma bcu gnyis kyi 'khor du las byed pa'i dag/
slong pha'i mdun du chu chun po 'am/ stan khong tshangs can gyi steng du zhog la thal mo sbyar te/ dge 'dun gnyis ka lasabasnyen par rdzogs par gso'akhar bya'o// gson cig btsun pa'i dge
'dunasdugachos rnams/ bdag ming 'dizhes bgyi ba don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las/ dge 'dun sde gnyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/
bdag ming 'di zhes bagyi ba don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te// ma banamo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/ dge 'dun sdeganyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsolan/ btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyis
kas bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi bar gsol/ btsunaba'i dge 'dun gnyis kas bdag dbyang bar gsol/ btsunaba'i dge 'dun gnyis kas bdag rjes su gzung bar gsol/
btsun pa'i dge 'dunaganyis kas bdag la thugs brtse bar gsol/ thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba'i phyir ro// 'di bzhin lon gnyis lanagasum du bya'o/
da'i 'og tu las byed pa'i dge slong pas gsol bgyis shig/ gsonacig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyis rnams/ mi 'di zhes bya ba 'dimakhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi bas/ dge 'dun
sde gnyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dim khan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dge 'dun sde gnyis las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsolan/ de ste dge 'dun
gnyis ka'i dus la bab cing bzodan/ dge 'dun gnyis kas gnong zhig dang/ bdag gis 'di la dge 'dun gnyis ka'i na du mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi bas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la
bar chad kyi chos rnams dri ste/ 'di ni gsol ba'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ 'din khyod kyibaden pa'i dus/ 'dini yang dag pa'i dus te/ sa
khyod la cung zad cig dris ba de thams cad khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byung ba lan byung zhes ma khyung ba lanam byung zhes ma nor bar smyos shig khyod bud med dam/ bud med do// bud med kyi

nam ldan no// khyod kyi pha dang/ ma dang/ mi thab gsonanam/ gsonano// ba dang/ ma dang/ khyim thabakyis gnangam/ gnang ngo// bran mo ma yin nam/ brkus pa ma
yin nam/ red btson ma yin nam/ btsongs pa ma yaninam/ bcos pa mdadam/ gzhan gyi chags ba med dam/ sprul pam yin nam/ dud 'gro ma yin nam/ rgyal po la gtsis
ma yin nam/ rgyal po dang 'khen pa ma yin nam/ rgyu la la gnod pa'i las byed pa ma yin nam/ khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa byas pa 'am/ gnod pa byed du bcug pa ma yin nam/
mi bsrun pa ma yin nam/ mya nagyis gdungs pa ma yin nam/ sbrumam ma yin nam/ mtshan med pa ma yin nam/ mtshan gnyis ba ma lananam/ glo 'dams lam yananam/ rtag tu
'bag pa ma yin nam/ khrag med pa ma yin nam/ mtshan ma tsam du gyur pa ma yin nam/ dge slong bslus pa ma yin nam/ pha bsad pa ma yin nas/ ma bsad pa ma yin nam/ dgra bcom
thababasad pa ma yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku la na sems kyis khrag phyung bas yin nam/ mu stegs can m mnam/ mu stegs can du 'gro bas yin nam/ rkun po'i rgyal mtshan
0/ tsanam yin// sku thubs su gnas pa ma yin nam/ so sor gnas pa ma yanam/ mi gnas pa ma yin nam/ khyod sngon gtubyung ngam/ de ste rab tu byung ngo zhes sman/ 'on srong zhig/
ces skyes shig/ de ste rab tu ma byung ngo zhes zer na/ ci khyod ltar rab tu byung ngam/ byung ngo// ci khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad dam/ sbyod de// ci khyod kyis dge slong
ma'i dge 'dun gyis gnyis su tshos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i chos jug gi bslab pa byin nam/ byino// khyod kyis lo gnyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug
gi bslab pa la bslabs sam/ bsubs so// khyod la dge slong ma 'i dge 'dun gyisatshas par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa bog gam/ thogakhe khyod la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis
sngar bya ba'i las rnams byas sam/ bgyis so// khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun sems mgu bar byas sam/ mgu bar bgyis so// bar chad kyi chos rnams las yongs su dag
gam yos su dgag/ khyod la gzhan gyi bu lan mang yang rung/ nyung yang rung chags pa med dam/ med do// khyod kyi ming ci/ khyod kyi mkhan mo'iling ci/ bdag gi ming na 'di zhes
bgyi na gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/ mkhanama'i mngon 'di zhes bgyi'o// ming 'dizhis byab khyod nyon cig/ budamedakyi lus la 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyi nad gnod pa yod de/ de 'di lta
sta/mdzad ng/ 'bras dang shub dang/ pholamig dang/ tshor dad/ shabakra can dang/ kongab dang/ glog pa dang/ rab tu g.ya' ba dang/
skyugasapa dang/ zhang 'brum dang/ skyigs bu dang/ rims dang/ zad pa dang/ myos pa dang/ ngal ba dang/ mgo sbyang dang/ tshad pa dang/ lud pa dang/ dbugs mi bde ba dang/
skyomapa dang/ brjod byed dang/ 'jas pa dang/ nad da kar bo dang/ rkang 'bam dang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ skrun dang/ khragand dang/ mkhris pa dang/ rkub 'brum dang/
lhag pa dang/ yan logatsha ba dang/ ba legs tshe bdang/ dus pa zhig pa dang mas drag po dang/ mis zhag gcig pa dang/ gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa
dang rims nyin re ba dang/ 'dus pa'i mas dang/ mis ldang dub pa dang/ rtag pa'i mis dang/ 'di lta bu'i lus kyi nad lus la gnod par 'gyur ba dang/ de las gzhan yang
med dam/ de la khyod kyis yang dag par ji bzhinapar smros shig / 'dul ba phrama'i dngos po/// bam po so brgyadang/
de nas gsol ba byed pa'i dge slong gis gsol ba thob ste las byos shig/ gsenacig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyis ka rnams/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakhanamo mang 'di
zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gnyis ka las pa yin par rdzogs par 'tshalato/ ming 'di zhes bgyi bamakhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gnyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te// bud
med kyang lags/ bud med kyi dbang po dang yang ldan budamad khyilen gnas pa lo bcu gnyis sam/ gzhon nu ma le ti shutshang ba ste/ 'di'i chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/ pha ma dang
khyimo zab kyis kyang gnang bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag/ 'dis tshangs par spyod pa yang legs par spyad/ dgo slo ma'i dge 'dun gyis 'di la lo gnyis sutshos drug dang/ rjes su
'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa yang bog ste/ 'dis lo gnyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa yang bsubs dge slong ma'i dge 'dunam rnams kyis 'di la chos
gsum gyis tshangs bar spyad pa spyod pa'i sdom pa yang byin/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis 'di'i bya ba rnams kyang sngon du byas zi/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyi sems mnyes par byas zin/
bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchin/ ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dge 'dun gnyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsolan/ de ste dge
'dunaganyis kas dus la babacing bzodan/ dge 'dun sde gnyis kas gnong la/ dge 'dun gnyis kas ma ngo 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par
mdzod cig/ 'di gsol ba'o/ la gzhu'adi ltar byos shig/ gsodacig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyis rnams/ mi nga 'di zhes bgyi ba
'dim banamo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnyis ka'i dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakhan poming 'di zhes bgyi bas gnyis ka'i dge 'dun las bskyon
par rdzogs par gsol te/ bud med kyang lags/ bud med kyi dbang po dang yang ldan/ bud med khyiman gnas pa po bcu gnyis sam/ gzhon num la nyi'atshang ste/ 'di la chos
la gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/ pha ma dang khyim thab kyis kyang gnang/ bar chad kyi tshes rnams kyang yongs su dag/ 'dis tshangs par spyod pa yong legs por spyad/ dge slong ma'i/
dge 'dun gyisaM 'di la lo gnyis su chos drug dang/ rjes su 'brangaba'i chos drug gi bslab pa yang phog ste/ 'di la 'deganyis su chos drugodang/ rjes su 'brang bo'i chos drugagi
bslab pa yang bslabs/ dge slong ma'idog 'dun ma rnams kyis 'di tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa yang byin/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis 'di la bya ba rnams kyang sngon du byas byin/
tho 'dis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyisems manyes par yang byas/ bar chad kyi chos rnams gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchi ste/ ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'dimakhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi so/ dge
dunaganyis ka las bsan par rdzogs shing/ dge slong ma'i dngos por gsol na/ de'i slad du ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'amakhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dge 'dun gnyis kas bsnyan par rdzogs
bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ mkhan mo mang 'di zhes bgyi ste/ dge 'dun gnyis kas bsanapar rdzogs bar mdzad b gangal bzo ba de dag ni ca ma gsung
zhig/ gang dag mi khozodapa de dgan gsungs shig/ 'di las dang po'i tshig ste/ de bzhin du las kyi tshig rnams lan gnyis lanagasum du smra bar bya'o// mi 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan
tshoming 'di zhes bgyi sgo/ dge 'dun gnyis kas bstan par rdzogs pa mdzad de/ dge 'dun gnyis kas bzod cing gnan/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzinato//
denas grib ma gtsal bar bya'o// dag slobam dag gis rang poraring pos grib mkhagacal ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shing lcagam ring zhing ri bos grib mgacul bar ma byed cig ces bka' sul
to rkang pas gcalanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang bas gca' bar mi bya'o// shing bu sor bzhi pas gsol cig/ shing bu ji srid pa de tsam laskyes bu zhes bya'o// de'i 'og
dang dusatshod rig bar byos shig/ dbadunagyi dus dang/ dpyid kyi dus dang/ dbyar gyi dus dang/ dbyar zad pa dang/ dus ring po'o// de la dbu nagyi dusan zla ba bzhi'o// dpyid kyi dus
ni zla ba bzhi'o// dbyar gyi dus ni zla ba gcig go/ dbyar khridapan nyin zhag gcig go/ dusaling po ni nub ga cis pagis nyung ba'i zla ba gsum mo// dus kyang rig par bya
ste skya rengs dang po dang/ skyarengs par m dwang/ skyares thal dang/ zhim ma shar ba dang/ nyis shar b dang/ nyi ma shar ba'i brgyad tshe dang/ nyim shar ba'i bzhi cha dang/ nyim phyadapa
dang nyin byed yol ba dang/ phyi dro'i bzhi cha dang/ phyi dro'i brgya dang dang/ nyim ma nub ba dang/ nyi ma nub pa dang/ skar ma ma shar ba dang/ skar ma shar ba'o// de nas gnas gsum
smra bar bya'o/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gabrigs te/ 'di
ltar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma la gnas 'di gsum la sus te/ dge slong mas de ' gnas na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par
gas te dge slong ba'i dgo bor 'gyur bste/ gsum gang zhan/ chos gos kyi nang na rdul brod pa ni rub dang chodapa sku/ gang la gnas na dge slong ma legs par bshad ba'ichos 'dul

ba la rab tu byung zhing/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ba/ rdul khrod pa'ichos gos kyis tshe dang ldan maming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dus 'dinas nam 'tsho'i bar du chogag bar dad
ma des dad de zhes smos shig/ lhag par ridan dang ma/ sa sam/ glob ma/ seng ras sam/ ldumadu kana'i gos sam/ srin bu 'am/ ras a ma la 'am/ som la 'am/
ga kha'i kha dog srin bu smug po 'dra ba 'am/ ka shi ka'i phra mo 'am/ zur ma'i phra mo 'am/ rnadu ku la phra mo 'om/ ras kotamapa ka phra mo rnams te/ gang gzhan yang rung ba'i gos
dge 'dun las redadam/ gangabreg las kyang rung sta/ de dag las khyod kyis long la tshod zin par gyis shig/ srid 'drab 'i gnas sngon du yi dam 'cha'u 'am/ des kyang sngon du yi dam
'chab 'o zhes smos shig mi nga 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ thas kyi nang na bsed snyoms ba ni dung ba yodapa ste/ de la gnas ni dge slong ma legs par bshad pa'i
chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bstan par rdzogs te/ dgayA'i dngos por 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms pa'i zas kyis ming 'di zhes bya ba khyodadang nas niam 'tsho'i bar du chog par dad
ma dros dad do zhes smyos shig/ lhag par redan 'bras chananam/ skyom 'amaM/ thug pa 'am/ lnga ston nam/ rtagapa'i 'am/ mgron du bos pa'i lam/ brgyad pa'i 'am/
bcubazhi pa'i 'am/ nyaston nam/ 'phral la bos pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyi ste/ gangagazhan yang rung ba'ibasod snyoms dge 'dun las sam/ gang brag las kyang rung ste/ de dag las
kyang khyed kyis le la tshod zin par gyis shig/ ci'adi 'drab 'i gnas la yi dam 'cha' 'am/ des kyang yi dam 'cha' bo zhes gyis shig
ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bkus pa'i smanani rung ba dang yodapa ste/ de la gnas na dge slong mas legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas
dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ro// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod deng nas bzung nas nam 'tsho'i bar du bkus te bor ba'i sman gyis chog par dad dam/ des da dazhis smos shig/ lhag par med na
mar dang/ 'bumar nga/ sbrang rtsi dang/ bu ram dang/ rtsa ba'i sman dang/ sdong bu'i sman dang/ lo ma'i sman dang/ ma tog gi sman dang/ 'bras bu'i sman dang/ snga dro ba dang/ phyi dro ba dang/
'o bdunapa'i dang/ nam 'tsho'i bar du de lta bu la segs te/ gzhan yang rung ba'i sman dag dge 'dun las sam/ gang zag las rnyed kyang rung ste/ de dag las kyang khyodakyis leng la tshod rig par
gyis shig/ ci'adi 'dra ba'i gnas la sngon du yi dam 'cha' 'am/ des kyang yi dam 'cha' 'o zhes smos shig/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mkhyen cing gzigs nas/ 'di ltar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'i dge slong ma la ltung ba'i chos 'di brgyad
gsus te/ dge slong mas gnas de la gnas pas kyang rung ste/ stan cing du sag zig tu dge slong ma ma yin/ dge sbyongalam yani/ shAkya'i sras mon yin no// dge slong ma'i dngos med par/
'gyur dge sbyong ma'i yang med par 'gyur// medwapa'o// bsrubs pa'o// ltung ba'o// bsam pa ste/ de la dag sbyang mar slar dbyung du med de// 'di lta ste/ shing ta la'i
mgo bcad pa bzhin te/ sngon por mi 'gyur/ mi skye/ mi rgyug/ mi 'phal lo// cher skyaba'i skal ba med pa'i da ltar de bzhin du dog slongams gnas de brgyud las gang yang rung/ gnas
dbargyud la rten cingagyus na/ de la rten tsang byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma ni/ dag sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i sras mo ma ma yin/ go slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/ dag sbyong ma'i
yang med par 'gyur te/ med pa'o// bsrubs pa'o// ltung ba'o// phas pham pa ste/ de 'dag sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do// ming 'di zhes byas khyod nyon cig
brgyad gang zhen/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du ma las kyang 'dodapa smad pa ni 'dzin pa'o// 'dod pa ni chags po'o// 'dod pa ni sems pa'o// 'dod pa ni sdug pa'o// 'dod
'dod pa ni gnas so// 'dodapani gdon mi za ba'o/ 'dod pa ni shin tu chags pa'o// 'dod na bsngags pa so sor sbyangs ba'o// mar skyugs pa'o// bsal ba'o// zad pa'o/
'dod chags dang bral ba'o// 'phab sapa'o// rnam par zhi bko nub pa'o zhes bstod/ bstod du 'jug go/ bsngags so// bsgrags pa yin
sa mi 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis deng phan chad chags pa'i sems kyis/ skyes pa la mig gis mig tshugs su yang chags shing mi b.lan/ gnyis kyis gnyis phrad cing mi tshangs
bar spyod pa rgya ba'i chos su spyod pa lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la/ yang dge slong ma dge slong ma dang lhan cig tubaslab pa mtshungs pa ma tam par gyur pa las/ bslab pa ma
phul la/ bslab pa stobs chung ngam/ ma bshams par mi tshangs par spyod pa ba'i chos byas na/ chung dun byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa dang lhan cig pa ya rung ste/ de ltabu'i
glu/ gnas khang du yang rung/ dge slong mas na cing byas na/ dge slongams rten cing byas ma thag tudge slong ma yin/ dag spyi ba ma yin/ shAkya'i srasamo ma yin/ dge slongama'i dngos po
med par gyur/ dag sbyong ma'idangos po yang med par 'gyur te/ med pa'o// bsrubs pa'o// ltung ba'o// phas pham pa ste/ dgashongamar slar dpyad du mdado// 'di lta
sto/ shing rta' 'amago bcad pa bzhin sngon por mi rung sto/ skyor mi rung/ 'phel zhing rgyas pa ra mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du dge slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i gnas la natsangabyas na/ da rten
cing byas de bsam la/khyadag grong mam zhi rag sbyong bas na/ shAkya'i srasamo ma yin/ dge slong ma'i dngos bo med par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur te/ med pa'o//
bsrubs pa'o// ltung ba'o// phas pham pas/ dge sbyongamar slar dbyung du med do// de la khyod kyis deng phan chad mi spyod pa dang rtan cing mi 'jug pa dang/ mi spyodangar spyod pa
laskyur to/ sems myongs la dranang dang/ bag yod pa dang/ brtson par gyis shig/ rims 'dilta bu la mi spyodadam/ desam spyod do zhes smos shig mang
dozhes bya ba khyod nyenacig bcom ldan 'das kyis rnamagrangs dum las ma byin par len pa ni rnam par smad de/ mkhyin par len pa spangan bstod do// bstod du 'jugago bsngags
so bsgrugs pa yin gyis/ deng phan chadamange 'di'i bya ba khyod chub 'i sems kyis/ pha rol po'imakhyin par til gyi phubam tsam yang ma blangan ma sha ka lnga 'am lnga las lhag pa lta ci smos/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba/ dge slongams grongan 'dug pa 'amaM/ dbyen 'dug pa yang rung/ gzhan gyis ma byin bar zhu bar grags pa bsan ji tsam min par blangs pas/ de
rgyal bo ma/ blon pos kyang rung/ bzung nas bsad pa dang/ bcingab dang/ sprugs kyang rung/ de la 'di skad ces zer ro// kye khyod ni rku ba/ mishes pa/ blun po'o zhes 'di lta bu'i
thas @#// gnas chun cing byas na/ de rkyen cing bsam thagatudage slong ma yin/ dag sbyong lam yin/ shAkya'i sras mo ma yin no zhes bya ba nas sdom bzhin te/ dran pas bag yod
ba dang ban par gyis shig pa'i khor du sbyar ro// ci nas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/ des mi spyod de zhes byos shig/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan
'das kyis srog gcodapani rnam grangs dum las kyang rnam par smad de/ srog gcod pa spangs pa la bstod do// bstod du 'jug go/ bsngags so// bsgrags pa yin gyis/ ming 'di
gzhis bya pa khyod kyis deng bdachad srog chags grog sbur yang bsams bzhin du srog mi gcad na/ mi 'am mi'i lus su gyur pa lta ci smos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungasapa/ gang yang dge slong
tho masam mami'i lus su gyur pa yang rung/ bsams nas rang gi lag gis srog gcod dam/ da la mtshon byin nam/ de la mtshon thogs pa gnyor ram/ de la 'chib la skul lam/ de la
'chiba'i yon tan bsngags kyang rung/ de la 'di skad ces zer to kyami khyod 'di ltar sdig pa mi gtsang bar stag cing 'tshob ci rung gi/ kye skyes bu 'tsho ba bsachesangazhin logs so zhes
zla/sems la bsam/ sems rten cing rnam grangs du mar 'chi bar de la skul lam/ sa 'chiba'i yon tan bsngags kyang rung ste/ de yang de lta bu'i thabs shig gis dus byas te/ de lta bu'i
ca/ gnas su dge slong mas rtan cing byas na/ da zhan cing bsam brag tu dge slongam ma yin/ drag sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i sras mom yin/ dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur nas/ sngal
bzhin te/ dran par gyis la bag yod pa dang/ brtson pa'i bar du sbyor ro// gnas 'di ltabu lami spyod dam/ des mi spyod de zhes smos shig/ tshong 'dazhisabya ba khyod
nyon cig brdzun du smra banabcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du ma las kyang rnam par spyad do/ brdzun du smra ba spos pa ni bstod do// bstod du 'jug go/ bsngags so// bsgrags

ba yin gyis// mi 'di zhis bya ba khyodonacig/ chung du na rtsed mo'i phyir yang shes bzhinapa'ibardzu nomi smra bar byan/ med la kun medabazhin du mi'i tshos bla ma brdzun du smra ba lta ci smos/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang yang dge slong ma mngon du mi shes/ kun tu mi shes shing/ med la kun mad bzhin du mi'i blamatshos spyi bab 'phags pa'i khyad par chud pa shes pa 'am/ mthong
ba ma/ reg par gnas pa yang rung sosarangashes te/ 'dishes so// 'di mthong ngo zhes zer ba las ci shes shen/ sdug bsngal shes/ kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam
shes ci mthong azhin lha mthong ngo// sku dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang po/ sha za dang/ yi dgas dang/
grul bum dang/ lus srul po mthong ngo// lha rnams kyis kyang bdag mthong ngo// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi'am
ga cing 'phya chen po dang/ sha bra dang/ yi dgas dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams kyis kyang bdag mthong ngo// lha rnams kyi sgra thos so// kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/
'a/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri bro dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ shwa khra dang/ yi dgas dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams kyi sgra thos so// lha rnams kyis kyang/
bdagagi sgra thos so// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri ba dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ sha za dang/ yi dogs dang/ grul bum dang/ lus
sul bo rnams kyis kyang bdag gi sgra thos so// lha rnams la ltar 'gro'o// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/
sha za dang/ yi dgas dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams la ltar 'gro'o// lha rnams kyang bdag la ltar 'ong ngo/ klu dang/ gnod spyani dang/ dri ba dang/ nam mkha'
N+NaM lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ sha za dang/ ya dogs dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams kyang bdag la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo// lha rnams dang lhan cig
smra'o na smra'o/ so sor dga' bar byed/ rtog tshulhan cig tu 'dug go/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ nam mkha' ldang dang/ dri bro dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/
she za dang/ yi dgas dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams dang lhan cig tu smra'o// kun tu smra'o// so sor dga' bar byed/ rtag tu lhan cig tu 'dug go/ lha rnams kyang/
bdag dang lhan cig tusla'o// kun tu smra'o// so sor dga' bar byed/ rtag tulhun cig tu 'dug gi/ glu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri ba dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/
lta 'phya chen po dang/ sha za dang/ yi dgas dang/ grul bum dang/ lus srul po rnams kyang bdag dang lhan cig tutab tusmo'o// kun tu sma'o// so sor dga' bar byed/ rtag tu
lhan cig tu 'dug go/ 'di ltar m theg bzhin du ngas mi rtag pa'i 'du shes thob bzhis zer ba dwang/ mi rtag la sdug bsngal bar 'du shes sdug bsngal ba la bdag med nga gi 'du shes/
zas la mi mthun par 'du shes/ 'jig rten thams cad la ma khos par 'du shes/ nyes pa 'i dmigs su 'gyur par 'du shes/ sdang bar 'du sheso/ 'dod chags dang bral par 'du shes/
'gog par 'du shes/ 'chi bar 'du shes/ mi gtsang bar 'du shes/ rnam par bsdus par 'du shes/ rnam par rnags par 'du shes/ rnam par bab par 'du shes/ rnam par 'bus
gzhigs par 'du shes/ rnam par bros par 'du shes/ rnam par dma' bar 'du shes/ rnam bar 'thor bar 'du shes/ dus gong du 'du shes/ stong ba nyid du so sor
rtog pa'i 'du shes thob bo// ma thob bzhin dus thob bo zhes zer ba bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang/ bzhi ba dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga'
ba dang btang snyoms dang/ nam mkha'am 'a yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mtha' yas sku mched dang/ cung zad yod pa'i skye mched dang/ 'dushes med 'du shes med min skye mched
na rnams so// ma thob bzhin du ngas thob bo zhes zer ba rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
zlu 'bras bu dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang [.]lha'i na bodang/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang/ sngonagyi gnas dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba dang/ brag pa bod pa dang/ dgra bcom
[– ]b rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa dang/ chaganyis las rnam par grol bde 'dra ba'i gnas la dge slong mas chun cing byas na/ des rtan cing byas mthalag tudage slongam ma yin/ dge sbyong la
zi yin shAkya'i sras mo ma yin/ dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma'i dngos po yang med par 'gyur te/ med pa'o/ bsrubasaba'o// ltung ba'o// phas pham pa ste/
0 dag sbyong mar mar dubyung du med de// de 'di lta ste/ shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin te/ sngon por mi rung/ skyor mi rung/ 'phel zhing rgyas par mi rung ngo// de ltar de 'dra ba la dge slong
mas tshon cing byas na/ dos rten ci byas ma thag tu dge slong mam yin dag sbyongam ma yin/ shAkya'i sras mon yin/ dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/ dge sbyong ma'i dngos po yang
med par 'gyur te/ med pa'o// bsrubs pa'o// ltung ba'o// phas pham pa ste/ dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do// de las khyod dang pan chadam spyod po dang/ rkun cing mi
'jug pa dang/ mi spyod par sbyor la sbyar tasams bsrungs la/ dran pa dang/ bag yodapa dang/ brtson par gyis shig/ gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/ des ma spyod
dozhes smros shig/ mi 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// gang yang dge slong mchab sa bzhin du chags naas skyes pa dang lhan
gi migaman chad dusao yan chad reg cing kun regab la dga' par tshor sa/ dge slongams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas la rtan cing byas na/ des rgyun dbyas ma thag tu dge slongam ma yin/ dge
sbyongam ma yano/ shAkya'i sras mom yin no zhes bya banas/ tshun cing ma 'jug pa dang/ mi spyod par spong ba la sbyar tisems bsrungs la/ sa pa dang/ bag yod pa dang/ brtson pa'i
bar du sbyar ro// gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/ dusam spyod do zhes smos pa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom
ldan 'dasakyis kha/sungasapa/ gang yong dge slongamachags shing chags nas skyes po dang lhan cig tu rtsi pa'i tshogi rtsa ba dang/ dgod pa dang/ dregs pa dang/ rgyug pa dang/ lus la
'a 'tshig par byed pa dang/ stan nam/ lus 'dor ram/ mtshan ma 'dzugs pa dang/ skyes pa 'ongs sam/ song yang dung dga' bar tshor nade 'dra bas/ phyogs der lusu phab
rgyur cung skyes pa'i dbang du bud med gyur te/ dngos po de lta bu brgyad dang ldan zhing/ dge slong mas 'di 'drab 'i gnas la rten cing byas na/ des rkyen ci byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/
dag sbyongam ma yin/ shAkya'isras mom yin pa nus/ gang rtan cingam 'jug pa dang/ mi spyod par spong ba la sbyar pasoms srung ba la/ dranapo dang/ bag yod pa dang/ brtson pa'i bar
du bya'o// gangasu zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyodadamadasam spyod do zhes smyos shig @#/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba/
gang yang dang ga slong ma dge slongam zhig gis sngon phas pham pa byung zhing mi gnas par gyur pa dge slong ma zhig gis shes kyang/ des gang ba tsho'achib gyur pa 'am/ slar babs par gyur pa 'am//
0 yul gzhan du bros ba de'i 'ogatu'adi skad du/ phagasam dag sngon bdag gis dge slongan de ji ltar bas pham sta/ gnas su mi rung bar shes zhes smras te// dge slong mkhan mtho ba bcabs
ba de 'dra ba'i gnas la cun cong byas na/ des rten cing byas m thag tu dge slob ma yin/ dag sbyong mam in/ shAkya'i srasamo ma yin pas/ sngam bzhin te/ ma spyod dam/ des
ba spyod do// skyob dang rob tu bsams pas kun tu bsus te/ nopa dang/ bag yod pa dang brtson pa'i bar du bya'o// khang su zhig kha nas 'di lta bu lam spyod dam do dos mi spyod de
zhes smosashig mi nga 'dazhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa gang yang dge slong mas 'di ltar dge slong pas dag zlog dge 'dun 'dus pas
sngasakhor gyur pa'i las byas/ dge sloma'i dge 'dun 'dus par gyur pas kyang de la phyagam ster ba'i sdomapa bcasapar gyur nas/ das 'jad pa dang nyal bzhin dge 'dun rnams 'os sbya nyul
bar byed/ babyung bar 'jug/ phyag byed par ston/ mtshams kyi nang du 'jugatsi bzedapa gsol par shes bzhin du da labade skad the'o/ wags pa khyod sa nyal ba dang langs bzhin du/
dge 'dun la spu lapa dang// 'byung bar 'jug par yang byed cig/ phyag byed par ston pa dang/ mtshams kyi nan 'dug cing 'phrod a khab/ da cig/ bdag gis 'phags pa
khyod kyi ltung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ dra ba dang/ bong bu dang/ ska rags dang/ klog pa dang/ kha tonadang/ rnal 'byor yid la bya ba dang 'phags pa

la laci dang cis bral bar gyur pa de dang de dgo thams cad kyis mkhril bar byed pa'i dge slong ma de la/ dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad sgo zhig/ 'phagasab khyod dge slong pha de ni 'dus pa'i dge 'dun
gyis spas pa'i las byas pa yin/ dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang de la phyagamibya ba'i sdom pa stsal ba yin te/ dge slong pha de skra langs pa dang 1la bzhin dge 'dun la spu nyal bar M
byed= 'byung bar 'jug/ phyag byed par ston/ mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzed ba gsol bar shes bzhin du/ de la 'phagasam khyod kyis 'di skad cesam smra zhig/ 'phags
h+pha pa khyod sku nyalo pa dang langs bzhin du dge 'dun la spu nyal ba dang/ 'byang bar 'jug par ma byed cig/ phyag byed nges ston pa dang/ mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzod pa gsol bar yang
ma byed cig dang/ bdag gis khyod la kun sbyar te/ lhung bzed dang// chos gos dang/ dru ba dang/ phor bu dang/ ska rags dang/ klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ rnal 'byor yid
labya ba dang/ ci dang cis 'phags pa khyod la brel bar gyur ba de dang de dag thams cad bdag gis mi brel bar sbyar ro// 'phags ma khyod spyas pa'i 'jug pa'i tshig gi lam 'di lta bu theng
zhig ces/ dge slong ma de la de lta bur dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgoste/ donade slar btanganan legs/ de ste ma btang na lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo 'ang ston cig/ don de slar spang pa'i phyir
lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlo zhing bstan pa las/ don de slar batang nan legs/ da snyam btang zhing dge slong spus pa'i rjes su 'jugacing/ de lta bu'i gnas su rten cing byas na/ de rkyen cing
byas ma thug dge slong ma ma yin/ dgi sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i srasamom yin panas/ snga ma bzhin te/ mi stod dam/ mi spyod do// skyob dang ragatubasams pas kun tu bsrungs ta
na pa dang/ bag yod pa dang/ brtson po'i bar du bya'o// gangasu zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/ des mi spyod do zhes skyes shig/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/
nyon cig/ brgyad po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das dos mkhyen cing gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'din rab tu byung zhing/
bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma rnams la dgag cing ma 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir blama'ichos subacas te/ dal bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// brgyad gang zhe
na ming 'di zhes bya ba budamed kyi dge slong rnams las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur bar rab tu rtogs par bya// ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan
'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma'i chos dang bor bcas te// de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par
bya'o dge slong ma rnams kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing dge slong pa rnams las ston pa'i lung rjes su bstan pa btsal bar bya'o// ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams
'khaM la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma'i chos gnyis par bcas// de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// dge slong med pa'i gnas su dgo slong mas dbya/
tshul du ma 'jug cig/ ming 'di zhes bya pa bcom ldan 'dasakyis 'din bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma'i chos gsum du bcas te/ de la bud med rnams kyis
ma 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// dgeslongams dbyar tshul nas byung ba'i tshe/ dge 'dun sde gnyis la mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dogs pa'i gnas gsum du skabs dbye bar bya'o//
ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i bud med rnams la dgagacing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma'i chos bzhir bcas te/ de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par
lhakhya'o dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams sam/ lta pa nyams sam/ spyod pa nyams sam/ 'tshob nyams kyang rung/ mi gling zhing dran par m byed cig/ dge slongams/
dge slong pha tshul khrims las nyams sam/ lta pa mas sam/ spyodab nyams sum/ 'tsho ba nyams kyang rung/ glangazhing dran par byed pa ma gnang ngo// dge slong pas nai dge slong ma tshul khrimA
nyams sam/ lta ba nyams sam/ spyod pa nyams sam/ 'tsho bams pa la gleng ba dang dran par byed pa la maM gnang ba med de// ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud meda rnamA
la dgagacing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ blama'i tshes lngar bcas te/ de la bud med rnams kyisanam 'tsho'abar du bslab par bya'o// dge slong mas dge slong la kha ngan ma bya/ khro bar/
mi bya bsdigs pang ma bya/ dge slong mas dge slong la kha ngan dang/ khro ba dang/ bsdigs pan mi gnang ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba btsus ldan 'das kyis 'di bud med rnams la
dgagaci mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma'i chos drug tubacas te/ de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// dge slong ma la blama'i chos shig byungan des dag
'dun gnyis ka la zla'akhyodakyi bar du A dmagu bar bya ba spyod cig/ ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni budached rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ bloma'i tshes
bdun du bcas te de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// bsnyen par rdzogs nas 'bargya 'tsho ba'i dge slong mas/ dgabrod bsan par rdzogs pa'i dge slong pha la tshig
sdug pa dang/ bstod pa dang ltang ba dang/ thal mo sbyar ba dang/ phyag bya ba ste/ ming 'di zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i bud med rnams la nyes pa ]
dgag cing mi 'da' bar byang 'i phyiro/ blama'i tshes brgyad du bcas te/ de la budamed rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o// ni bla ma'i chos 'di brgyud yang dag par bzung ste
'a spyod dam/ spyod do// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi bo 'di dag ni snga ma bzhin te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis zhes
byaba'i bar du sbyar ro// bzhi gang zhen/ deng pa na chad ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ngan par smra ba la spur ma smra/ khros pa la slar m khro zhig/ brdegapa la slar mi brdeg/ 'phya ba las
ma'aphru ming 'di zhes bya pa khyod nyon cig/ khyod sngon 'di ltar bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogasanas/ dge slong ma'i dngos por zhog
ga ces sngonapa de ni khyod rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/ mkhan mo tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang/ slob dpon tshul khrimaMs dang ldan pa dang/ dge 'dun gnyis ka tshogs shing 'dus
pas gsolab dang bzhi'i las kyis phyir bya ba med pa dang/ gzhagapar bya ba med pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyenapar rdzogs so// ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyonacig/ gang bsnyen par rdzogason
labargya lenaba'i dge slong mas bslabasapa de ni deng bstan par rdzogs bas kyang de bsub par bya'o// gang dengabasen par rdzogs pas bsub pa de la bstan par rdzogs nas le brgya lenapas kyang
de bslab par bya'o// gang tshul khrims mtshungs par bslab pa mthun pa dang/ so so thar ba'i mdo kha tonaklog khar mtshus pa la deng na tshad khyod kyis mnyes par bya'o mamanyes
par mi bya'o/deng phan chad mi 'di zhes bya ba'imakhan me la mar 'du shes gzhag par bya'o// mkhanamos kyang de la bu mo'i 'du shes bzhag par bya'o/ deng phanAchad khyod kyis
mkhan mo la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bku dur byas shig/ mkhan tshos kyang khyod la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen pa kur byos shig/ deng ban chadaming 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis 'jigs pa'i dbang
dubyas shing/ blam dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang/ gnas brtanam dang/ bar mdang/ gsar bu rnams la rimor byos shig/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod deng phan chad
lung nos shig/ lhogs shig/ kha ton gyis shig/ phung po la mkhas/ khams la mkhas/ skye mched la mkhas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas/ gnas dang
ba nas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya'o// khyod kyis ma thob pa thob pa'i phyir/ khong dum chudapa khong du chud pa'i phyir/ mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma gtang zhig/
'di dag ni nges khyod la chen ba'i tshe ba rnams bslab pa'i gzhir bshad do// gzhan ni khyod kyis slob dpon dang/ mkhan mo dang/ slob dang 'gacig pa dang/
mkhan mo gcig pa dang/ smra ba dang/ kun smra ba dang/ bstod pa dang/ mdza' ba dag gis kyang de bzhin du ston to// zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa la nyon cig/
bsgyu 'di ltar bsnyen par rdzogs pan// shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la// rwa nibasnyan par khyod rdzogs te// khom pa phun sum tshogs red dka'// 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig/ bzang
chos lasun reb tu byung/ yongs su drag pa bsen par rdzogs/ bden zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// rab tumakhyon nas gsungs pa'o// ming 'dazhis bya ba khyod bsun par
rdzogs kyis 2[“]bag yod par spyod cig / grong bzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasakyis 'go'u tu ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
'khor shAkya mo lnga brgya rnams kyis bloma'i tshes kyi yi dam 'chab ste/ rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong ma'i dngos po la rjes su yi rang ba da'i tsho/ de dag gis gzhan/
dag dge slong mar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so// de dag gis gzhan dag rab tuphyang ste/ da na dge slong ba'i dge 'dunamamang zhinge 'phral bar gyur to// de nas dge slong
ma gnas brtan dang/ gnas brtanam de dag 'go'u dum skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ 'go'u ta ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so
ama' 'phags ma duge slom gnas brtan ma 'di dag la/ gang dge slong pha gsar bu dang/ bar ma dang/ gzhon nu rab tu byunas ring pom len pa de dag gcig la gcig rgan mas
su phyag 'tshal 'dad ces 'di skad smras pa dang/ 'go'u tamaskye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos/ dge slong ma de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// de bsananumo dag sdod cig dang/ bdag gis
'phags pa kun dga' bo la zhus ta bya'o// de ltar gyur pa 'go'u tag skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos/ tshodang ldan pa/nadag 'bol smras so/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan
kun dga' bos 'go'u tam skyo dga' badag mo chen mo la de bsan 'go'u ta la sdod cig dang/ bdagagis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lozhes smras nas/ bcom ldan badas ga la ba der song
sta phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcomo ldan 'das la
ma'o/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma'i gnas brtan dang/ gnas brtanam de dag la/ gang dag sring pha lags r bu dang/ bar tsho dang/ gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa 'di dag gcig/
la gcig ji ltar rgan rims su phyag 'tshal yang mi sto'o zhes gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' ba
ba khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig phyin chadum smra zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ gal te kun dga' bo bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul pa la rang dam byung bar gyuranani/ da dung yang dad pa'i
tsha bram ze dang khyim bdag dgagis dge slong la bsod sems dra ba bkang ste/ thog drod kyis ster ro// kun dga' bo bud med dag legos par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab ma byung na ni/
da dung yang bram ze dang khyim bdag gis ma bgos pa'i gas gsar pa kha tshar rang ba dag srung gnang du bting ste/ 'di skad ces smabar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dag las gsar pa kha tshar ring po
btingab 'di'i steng du gshegs shig dang/ bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// gal te kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i tshes
kyi 'dul pa la rab tu ma byung bar gyuranan/ da dung yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis yan lag gi mchog las skyes pa'i sgras la bting ste/ dag sbyong dag sgra 'di'i steng du gshegs/
shig dang/ don bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro zhes smra'o// gal takun dga' po bud med rnams legs par bshad po'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tum/

byung bar gyur na ni/ da dung yang nga'i na thos dag gi 'od kyis zla ba dang nyin 'di ba nyis lta buramabru che ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul che ba yang khril gyis gnonan/ ro dang 'dra ba'i mu stegs can rnams lta ci
smos kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tam byang nani/ da dung yong nge'i bstan pa la stong tshang bar nyes pa med cing nyams pa med par gnas par
'gyur ro// da lta bsan kun dga' bo bsen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas kyang/ da gabod bsan par rdzogs pa'i dge slong pha la tshig snyan pa dang/ bstod pa dang ldan pa
dang klal mo sbyar ba dang/ phyag byang la sogs pa'i las byos shig
gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ dge slongs rnams las stabazhi 'dus pas bya ba dang/
sde lnga 'dus pas bya ba dang/ sde bcu gnyis 'dus pas las bya ba yang yod de/ de dag gis dge 'dun gnyis ka bsdus pa dang/ bya ba mang por gyur to// bya ba mang pos bshad pa dang/
klog pa dang/ bzlas pa dang/ rnal 'byor dang/ yid la bya pa rnams kyi par chad du gyur to// de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan
shig ces bka' stsal te// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pan ste/ de'i dusanamanyan du yod pan khyimabadag gzhan zhig 'dug ste/ rigs
mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod de// de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las dus phyizhig na/ de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ do
'adz+ha blo ba dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig btsas nas/ de btsas ma thag tu phadus las 'das so// dems gsos shing bskyod de chen mor gyur pa dang/ de'i ma dus las 'dus so// de nas dus
phyi zhig na sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang/ des de srang zhig tu mthong ste/ bumo khyod su'i zhes smras pa dang/ des 'phags ma su'i yang ma lags te// mgon med pa'o/
zhes smras pa dang/ des bu mo de ste de bzhin na ci'i phyir rab tumi 'byung zhes smras pa dang/ des su zhig gis bdag rob tu 'byin ces smras pa dang/ des bu mo ngas rab tudabyung gis tshur shog
'dong zhes smras pa dang/ legs so zhes zer te/ de dang lhan cig tu dbyaramo khang du dong nas/ sbom dga' mos rab tuphyung ba dang/ de kanangs pas gzir nas slar babs sa//
sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ mthong nas des bu ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang/ des rkangapa la phyag byas te smras pa// 'phags ma sdug bsal zhing 'tsho'i
bu mo de lta de bzhin na ci'i phyir yang rab tum 'byung/ des smras pa// bag sa ma su zhig mar babs pa la rab tu'abyin bumo bdag gis rab tu dbyung ma/ legs so zhes smras pa
dang des rab 'byung stobasod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas ma legs so// dge sbyongashAkya'i bu lo dag ni chos la ngal bsos shing pa bsos shing
chos la spyod de zhes 'phya'o/ da ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis/ dge slong la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
dgos po/ gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyurapani/ dge slong ma dag babs shing slarerab tubyung ba'i phyir te/ da lta bsan dge slong ma dag gis babs pa las slar rab tum dbyung bar
gongs nas/ dge slong rnams 'khabaka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdaga rnams ni rigs par 'phya ste/ de lta bas na dge slong ma dgagis lan cig babs pa ma med pa dag
slong mas rab tumadabyung zhig/ rang tu' zhin 'das pa dang bcas bar 'gyur ro////'dul ba phra mo'i dngos po/// bam po sum cu
[“]sdemani 'phyan pa dag dang 'dod chen dang// gshe ba dang yang 'ju ba ste// dge slong la na ka sle/ bya ba dge slong dge tshul
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasamanyan du yod pa 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r pan bzhugs// de'i tshe na yul 'khor
mo 'jig na khyim bdag 'go'u tam zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa phyagapa/ no mang pa/ longs spyod chen po zhig ste/ des rig so mAtams pa 'as chung ma zhig blangs nas/ de dang lhan cig
turtse dga' yos su spyod do// de dus phyi zhig zhatho khyanas yul rdo 'gatusong ste/ khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang/ des do la bde bar 'os sam zhes bya pa'i
tshig snyan pa brjod nas/ ngal bsos tagacig la gcig byams pa 'as/ khyim bdag 'go'u ta ma de dang lhan cig mdza' bor gyur to// khyim bdag 'go'u tams bong rnams
ba btsos te/ slar brong rnams khyer nas grong khyer 'khoramo 'jig song ngo// yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag kyang phyi shugan thong khyer nas 'khor mo 'jig tu 'ongs te/ de yang khyim
wA bdag 'go'u ta ma'i khyim du phyin pa dang/ des kyang de larim dang mdza' bu'i tshig gis bde bar 'ongs sam zhes sbas nas/ ngal bsos so// de gnyis gcig la gcig mdzad pa
las mdza' babaskyos bar gyur to// yul rdo 'jogon gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis khyim bdag 'go'u tamal grogs po bdag cag gnyis dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu bu dang/
tsha bo dang/ yang tsha dang/ sumatshadag mdza'aba'i rgyunami gcad par bya ba'i thubus ci yod ces smras pa dang/ 'go'u tams smras pa/ grogs pa legs rgyu/ bdag gis kyang de gar
bsams so// de bsan tshur shog bum byung ba nas gnyen du byas to/ de ste bdag la bu po zhig byung la/ khyod la bu mo zhig byungan khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig/ 'on to
khyod la bu pho zhig ste/ badrage la bu mo zhugan bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no// des smras pa/ grogs po legs kyis de bzhin bya'ozhis thenas/ yul rdo 'jogan gnas
pa'i khyim bdag dang/ khyimabadag 'gro'u dmaganyis lhan cig tu bum byungab nasag nyin du 'thamasanas/ des bong btsongs te slar gyi thong khyer nas yu'o rdo 'jo ga tasong ngo//
des de na chung ma dang lhan cig turtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las/ phyi zhogani chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyuranas/ du zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas btsas na bu pho zhig byung ngo//
de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas po'i btsas ston chen po rgyas po byas te/ de rigs dang mthun pa'i ming zhig btags so// 'khor mo 'jig gi khyimar dag
gis yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag las bu pho zhig btsas pa khros nas/ des bdagagi grogs po la khu bo zhig btsas/ khye'u de ni bdag gi dmag par 'gyur yang srid kyis/ rdo'i gos dang
rgyan rnams bskur ro snyam bsams nas/ dus de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur te/ yul rdo 'jog na gnas ba'i khyim bdag de la grogs po khyod la bu pho zhig
btsas so zhes thosanas/ grogs po'as bu btsas pas bdag la shin tu dga' ba skyes te/ khye'u'i phyir gos dang rgyun zhig bskur gyis loshig ces smyung ngo// des spring yig bklags
ti slar gyi lan spring ba dang/ khyim bdag 'go'u ta mas de bklags nas bu mo zhig byung du smon te/ chung ma dang lhan cig rtsa dga' yongs su spyod do// de rtsi dga' yongs su spyod pa las/
ba chung sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang btsus na bu mo zhig byung ngo// gzugs legs shing blta na sdug ba/ bzung ma zhigan tsung thad du rid cing nyam chung ba
zhi gnas / dazhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tubatsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyus por byas nas/ ming 'dogs pa la zhugs u0f7a/ bumo 'di'i ming cir godags zhes bgros pa dang/
gnyanadag gis smras pa/ bu 'di dacing nyam chung la ma bdag 'go'u ma'i bu mo ste/ de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming ni skem me 'go 'u tami zhes ming du gdagasas// yul rdo 'jog
gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis 'di ltar 'khoramo 'bag gi khyim bdag 'go'u tam 'bumashog btsas so zhes sanas/ des bdag gi grogs po las bum zhig btsas te/ bu mo din bdag
gumana' mar 'gyur par nges kyis/ de lags dang rgyan rnams bskurab 'i rigs so snyam bsams te/ khyim bdag 'go'u ta ma la grogs po bdag gisani khyod la bu mo zhig btsas so zhes
thos nas bdag shin tu dga' ste/ grogs po'i bu mo la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur gyisa'ang zhig ces des yi ge spring ngo// des yig bklags nas/ slar grogs po mdza' bos byas
pa de ni legs te/ bdag dang gnyen byas te/ bum skyes nas bslang bar bya'o zhes lan smreng ngo// khyim bdag 'go'u tums yig klogasanas/ bu mo de bud med kyi bslab pa rnams
slob tubcug/ yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdagagis kyang bu de bslab pa slob tu bcug ste/ des smad 'tshong ma dag dang sngon lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug padi 'bu mo 'di la bslab pa
rnams slobs shigang ra gtad do// des de la bslab par brtsams so// des ji srid cig tubaslabs pa dang denare bdag gis bslab pa rnams lebs kyis dan 'gro zhes smras pa dang/
bud med des bu legasakyis lobs par byas da dungam 'gro zhig ces smras pa dang/ desamam bdag gis legs par lobs thin gyis da 'gro'o zhes zer ro// des rgya skyegs kyi thum po zhig
thogs te/ bu de ste khyod bshol bzhinadu 'gro bar 'dod na/ bdag gi mgo bo brdung ngo zhes smras pa dang/ desam ma de ltar ma byed cigadang bdag mi 'gro bar bya'o// de 'dug pa dang/
ga/ mos smras pa/ bkren pa khyod na re ngas bslab pa rnams la bas so zhes then/ khyod kyis 'di tsam yang m shes so// gzhan gyi bu'i ra bdag gi ni'i phyir mge bi
ba rdung khyodani shesarab can ma yen no// de yang ji srid cig tu'adu gnas alam 'gro'o zhes zer ba dang/ mos bu 'dug cig ces smras kyang/ de'adug dum gtub pa dang/ mos bu
das khyodabashol bzhin du yang 'gro bar 'dodan/ bdag gi lus khronabar mchong ngo zhes ms pa dang/ des mam de ltar na bdwagam 'gros ma byed cig 'dug go zhes smos pa dang/ mos smras M
ba bkren pa khyodan ro sa bslab pa rnams lobs brin to zhes zeran/ 'di tsam yang khyod kyis mi shes te/ 'di ltar gazhan gyi bu'i phyir bdag nyid khron par ci'i phyir mchong ste/
khyod 'dug tu ma btuban bdag gis khron pa'i nang du glod bcas pa der padag 'dug tubad kyi/ khyoda shes rab can ma yin gyis 'dug cig/ des ji srid cig tu'adu gnas / ma ma mchi'onyis
zla smras pa dang/ mos smras pa// bu de ste 'di lta dus kyis thanan sdod la'o thugabatses te 'thung la song zhig de 'dug pa dang/ des 'o thug bcos te de nyid kyi mdun dusnod du ma dang sbrang rtsis
tab ste 'thungs nas/ snod de nyid du slar skyugs so// skyugasanas yang rje'u de nyid du blugs nas/ chos khu tshur shog 'di 'thung zhig ces smras pa dang des smras l/ mam 'di ni
0 skyugs pa yin nadziltar btung zhes smras pa dang/ mos du ba ltar byas pa dang/ khyimA tshes de dag gis thes nas/ de dag krams cad 'dus te/ kyecu'i phyir pu zhes dris pa dang/ des ji
stor gyur pa thams zhib tusmos nas/ dedag gis bu khyod kyi phyir thug pa 'di sbyar na ci'i phyirami 'thung zhes smras pa dang/ des kyi 'di'i skyugs pa yin na skyugs pa ji ltar gzhung zhes smras
so de'i phyir brang brdus tangu zhing 'dug nas/ kye ci'i phyir kho mos 'di la skyugs pa rgyud ces smras pa dang/ de 'khor gyi khyim tshes de dgagis nan gyis rgyud nas des 'thung par brtsams
bdang mos de'i lag pa nas bzung ste/ gdong du thal mo gcig brgyab nas smras pa/ bkrin pa khyod na re ngas bslab pa rnams lobs so zhes zer na/ jiltar n khyodakyis bslab pa rnams
lebs 'di ltar khyod kyis mngon sum du skyugs pa mthong yang 'thung ba sheman/ khyod ni shes rab can ma yin no zhes smras nas/ des de bsad de de btang ngo// de dus phyi zhig na tshodapa
lnga brgya dang lhan cig tubong khyer tayul gyi dbus su deng ngo// des chod pa de dag gi mdun du phyi phyir zhing budad la smodad// de dag rims bzhin du 'khor mo 'jig tuphyin to// tshong pa

de dag sngon gyi smad 'tshong ma de dag dang lhan cig turtse dga' yosu spyod do// de dag kyang dodang bsten pas kyang bud med smod de smad 'tshem gang gi khyim du yang mi dngab dang/ smad 'tshong ma de dag
gcig la gcig gros byed do/ de dag las cig gis zhe sngon yul rdo 'jog gi tshong ba dag lhags nas/ de dag yu bu cag dang lhan cig yongs su spyod
par 'on/ da ni thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ su yang bdag cag dang lhan cig yos sumi spyodaces smras pa dang/ gzhan gyisacha zhi bdagagisan di dag gi ded dpon de'i
'a ga le ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas bud med 'angashin [E]spyod do zhes thos so// de dang bstan bsanAde dag kun kyapadag cagadang lhan cig tum spyod do zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gi nangs
zla smad 'tshong ma rganamo zhig gis smras pa/ bu mo de skyes pa yin nam 'on tam yi/ dedag gis che zhed niskyes pa de ni skyes ba ste skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan no zhes smras pa dang/ de lta
bdag gi bu mos de bsgyuran/ da ste khyad kyi dbon mor gzhug gam zhes smras pa dang/ de gags gzhug tun rungan/ da snyam gyuran khyod kyis ci sbyin zhes smras ba dang/ mos smras pa/
kar sha pa du lha brgya khyed la sbyin// de dag gis smras l/ legs kyis de bzhin bya'o// de nas khud med rgan mo des de dag dang nyiba'i khyim zhig glas nas snod spyad mang du bsegs
ba dang de ded dpon de'i khye'od g der 'ongs shing lhags te/ snod spyad dgakhamanano// des de dag la bu khyadasu zhes dris pa dang/ de dag gis smras pa/ man padagocagan yolardo
'jog gi ded dpon gyi'o// des smras pa/ bu bdag gi bu yang ded dpon yin te/ brong khyer nas yul gzhan du songan/ de'i khye'u dag kyang ji ltar khyod bzhin du de dag kyang gzhan las
snod banapa snyam bgyid/ de bas na khyim 'di na snod yod pa de dag kun khyed cag nyid kyi dang 'dra bas ci bde bar spyod cig/ de dag gis de nas snod spyad kyi nagacig bzhin du bslangs shing
'os ba dang/ de dag la ded dpon gyis kya khyed la nyi gcig bazhin snod spyad dang yo byad sus byin zhes dris ba dang/ de dag gis ded dpon gnas 'din ded dpon spyi ma zhig 'dug
ste de na rebadag gi bu yang yul gzhan du bong khyer te song na/ de'i khyo' dag kyang 'di ltar khyad bzhinadu gzhan las snod sbyadabarnyan gdon mi zas/ de lta bsan khyim 'din
snod spyad yod pa de dag kun khyed nyid kyi dang 'drab r tsabader spyod cig ces mchi// de nas snod spyad 'tshal zhing mchi'o zhes smras pa dang/ des de la byams pa skyasanas/ kyi khyed la
de lta'i byamasab khyadan debadagagi yang ma yin no zhes smras so// de dgagis de la smras pa/mam ded dbonan khyod la yonen shin tubarjod/ 'di ltar khyod la kun sbyar bdo bdag
gi yangs yin no zhes zer ro// mos da ltar n bu mthong yang ci ma rung zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis kyang ma ma lags kyis ded dbonal bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ de dag gis de
la ded dbonam ma ni khyod la blta bar 'tshul 'go zhes smras pa dang/ des kyang spu legs kyis 'dong ngo zhes smras nas// dus de'i khyim du song ngo// mos
debasti stang du bcas pas bdo bar 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'itshig snyan pa brjod de/ bu bdag gi bu yang khyod ci 'dra ba bzhin no zhes smras pa dang/ des kyang ming smos so// mis smras pa//
bu de'i ming yang de bzhin te/ mdor na khyod dang doganyis bdag gis bur khyad par med kyis/ khyod gzhan du ma sems shig ces smras so// sa smras b/ ma ma de lcangan de bzhin te/
de nyid bdag nyid khyodakyi bu dang khyad par mad do// de nas khyim bdag gi dungs des bum bos te/ bu mo tshur shog mang po'i zhabs la phyag tshol cig ces bos so// de phyir byunganan tshod
dang des de'i gzugs bzung bo dar la bab cing mdzes pa mthong nas/ rlung gi shugs bzhin du 'dod chags kyi mthu yogapas nA/ bdag nyidam tshor bar gyur te/ des de la tshun tu brtags
nas ma ma bumo 'di su'i zhes dris ba dang/ mos smras l/ bu khyod nyid kyi sring mo yin no zhes smras pa drang/ mam gzhan la byin namam na/ mos smras pa/ bu 'di su la yang ma byin no//
sa de stod ltar na kholo laci'i phyir ma sbyin zhes smras pa dang/ mos smras la/ bugazhan su zhig la sbyin/ cung zad du gang khyod la nyes pa zhig yod do/ khyodani bshes mi brtan pasachung
mar blangs shing blangs nas bor zhing dong ngo// des smras pa/ ma mastsol cig dang mi dor bar bgyi'o/ mtho dman du khrid de 'tsho'o// mos smras pa// bu khyod kyis bdag gi rdzas thams
cad 'di'i bskyas togazhagan/ gdod mtho dman du khrid cing bgro bar kho ma yid ches so// des smras pa// mam de ltar na gzhag par bya'o// des de'i khyim du sdus rnams bskyas na/ de'i
khyim gnyis yod de/ dasa'i sgo gcig nas nang du skyas na/ mos kyang sgo gnyis po nas gud du bskyas so/ nam desanor rdzas thams cad bskyas pa dang/ mis kyang dud du bsus nas/
gdade la bu mo byin no// des zhag dang tshes grangs mnapar sbyar te/ bag ma len pa'i tsha mos smad 'tshong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa kun mgron du bos te/ des bgam blong ba'itshon
ban tshun du rgyu zhing 'khod pa dang/ da dpon des smras pa/ mo 'di thams cad kyang budamed de/ skyes pa gcig kyang med dam/ des bskyangs so// gzhan zhig gis de'i na dung du gsang
ste dpon 'di ltar gyur pa khyod kyis mi shes sam/ bdag cag kun kyang smad 'tshong ma yin na/ skyes pa ga la yod ces smras pa dang/ des bdag gisan smad 'tshong ma zhig blangs pa lta
ste mdor na 'dasin bdag bslus so snyam du bsams so// bu mo de yang de dang lhan cig ji srid cig tu yongs su spyod de/ jo bo kar sha pa Na sol cig cesasmras pa dang/ des smras pa/
bathang mo bdag gi nor rdzas ci yod do cog thams cad 'dir bsus te 'os na/ bdag la ka shu ba cha gzhan ga la yodaces smras pa dang/ de gnyid kyis shin
tuleg pa dang/ mos re lde'inang na bkri ste tshong dus kyi dbus su bor// nangaparanamanangs pa dang/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skya bomang po dag 'ong zhing 'dodibs sad par byas nas/ bdag
wa gis bltas pa dang/ des bdag nyid mi rigs par mthong nas/ soms dang sems las byung ba'i rgyu ba rnams nyams dmagamachims gang nas/ 'khor mo 'jig gitsheng sa dang/ srang
dang lam gyi bzhi mdedung/ sum mdo dgan 'khyam pa las/ bkres pas gzir tu blos 'tsholo ba'i phyir glam dag gnas par song nas 'dug go/ de'i tshe na khyim bdag 'go'utu
ma'i khyim brtsig ste/ des gla mi rnams 'tshol ba las/ der mi gzhan zhig gis khyim bdag 'go'u ta ma'i drung du khrid pa dang/ des de mthong nas kye 'di'i ba tu gzhon zhing shin tug zhon
zla pazhig sta/ sngon su'i las kyang ma byas pa zhig gis gzhan zhigatshol cig ces smras pa dang/ de'i mig mchi mas gong bzhin du khyim bdag 'go'u tama'i gdong du lho'o/ de la khyim bdag
zla 'go'u tams bu khyod su yin/ gnas 'dir 'os pa smos shig ces dris pa dang/ de snying rje zhing dman la sdug bsngal bsamib/mtshims gang sta/ tshig kyang nangs bzhin du bal nas
[z]/smras pa phabadag ni byang phyogs rdo 'jog gi grong khyer de nas sngon gyi las kyis 'dir bde bar phyin na/ de ni garamachi yang m 'tshal ste bar m der dus las 'da' ba zhig tu'agyur yang ma/
'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang/ des de'i nyams dang tshig gi rgyud thos kyi/ khyim bdag 'ga'u tams de la yid kyis sdug par gyur te/ bu rdo 'jog na gnasapa'i skya bo mang po dag khyod kyis/
shes sam zhes dris so// 'tshal lo// bu khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis shes khas pa de ni bdag skal ba nyams pa'i gas ta'atshal lo// khyim bdag 'go'u ta ma'i yid
la yang sdug par gyur nas/ bu mi dga' bar du mi dgos kyis ma duzhig/ khyod ni nga'i dmag par 'gyur te/ khyim 'di dag khyed nyidakyi yin no zhes smras te/ de yang sprobasrings te//
de yang mi dga' pa dang bral la// khyim bdag 'go'u tams phyug pa dang/ bza' ba dang/ patung ba dang/ gos dang/ rgyun dang/ khyim dang/ mal stan dang/ g.yog dang/
dga' ba'i tshig gis la bsos te/ chadama' smras pa/ bzang mo khyod kyi dmag pa 'ongs te/bum babamar gtangagasastagenagyis shig/ dus de'i nyi ma dang/ tshogs dang//
skad cig mang/ skar ma dag brtags te/ rims bzhin du bshams nas/ phu nu dang/ mdza' bo dang/ gnyen pa shes su bcas pas bu mo 'ang yi gces smras pa dang/ des skad cig mi bangagi/
nor rnams phebatsal bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ des bu khyiman nor yod pa 'di dag thams cad khyod kyi Anan/ noragyisazhig bya zhes smras pa dang/ des yang smadu
'tshong ma de la khon lan glon par 'dod nas smras pa/ pad nadi ltar 'gas mod kyi/ bdagam ma bsabazhin du bgom mi len nozhes smras pa dang/ cung mo zer bar 'dug go/
'khor mo 'jigs byung ste/ yan man du 'khyam zhing 'dug pa las chu 'gram du song ba dang/ chu de'i nang nas mi ro zhig khyer ta'os te/ bya rogracig chu'i 'gram den 'dug nas mir
bza' bar 'dodon mtshus ma slebs so// donas mamudangashing bu zhig la brdar ba dang/ ripo zhig tu gyur tedas ro de thes so// de nas yang dos shing gzhan zhig lumachu badzarab dang/ ji
ltar snga ma bzhin du gyur to// ded dpon des kyang lag bsashi bu de gnyis blangs takhyim du song ngo// de nas kungashar Na lnga brgya byung nas smad 'tshong ma de'i khyim du song ste/ bzang
mo khyod kyis bdag 'o kar shapa chamed pa'o zhes bsadan/ da ni karashapaN 'dir yongs su spyad kyis tshur shog ces smras pa dang/ de yang kar shapaNal chags nos de dang lhan cig
tu yongs su spyad de// de nas ded dpon des de la yongs su spyad de/ 'i snashi bu des brdar ba dang/ shin tu ring ba'i rgyungs/ des sman pa thams cad bkug ste bstan na yang/ da
bdag gis sman dpyad bya bar nus te/ de ltar de sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang/ des ded dpon la jo bsagasobar gsol/ 'di'i sman dpyad mdzod cig ces smras pa dang/ des
smras pa/ das khyar ba dekun slar sbyin par dam 'cha'an gdod bya'o// mas rje ba nyis rim du yang slar dbul gyis mdzod cig ces smras pa dang/ des shing bu gnyis pas brdaran
ji ltar sdom bzhin du gyur to/ des zing ci khyerab zams cad de lasar byin no// de nas ded dpon des bu mo skam mo 'go'u tam dpalatshon po dang sbyar tubag mar bsusaso// khyim
bdago'ago'u tamarobrag kyi grongagazha' zhig na zhing rmad de/ sa dmag pa de la smras pa// bu khyod kyisachung ma 'di khrid lari brags kyi grong 'di zhes bya par bdagacig/ dasad
la ri bragasakyi grong gi zhing thams cad byin nas/ desasemamo 'go'u tami shing rta la bskyon to/ der song nas 'dug go/ dedang lhan cig rtse dga' shos su spyod// de de la rtse
dga' yongs su spyod pa las/ dus po zhig na skamatsho 'go'u tami sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ du bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang/ jo bo bdag bu bcol nas/ bdag
gnyen gyi khyim dumachi'o/ der bdag lams bdag gi g.yog bgyid dozhes smras pa dang/ des kyang legasasi zhes smras nas/ des tshog nyen gyi khyim du bskyal ba dang/ de la
der btsas na bu khye'u zhig byung nas zhag bdun gsum tishu gcig tubacas pa'i btsas ston rgyas bar byas te/ rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btagasanas/
des khye'u de khyer yar ra brags de nyid du 'ongs so/[° ]/de phyis yang sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ bu 'byung ba'i dus su bab pa dang/ job bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab kyis gnyen
'a gyi khyim dumachi'o// der bdag la mas bdag gi g.yog bgyid do zhes smras ba dang/ des kyang bzang mo legasakyis dongabar bya'o zhes smras pa dang/ desam dbur bcas ta shing rta la bskyon nas
dong ba dang/ du lam gyi phyed dubu btsas par gyur to// des bu btsasapor mthong nas/ shing rta las babs shing gzhan zhigigi drung du'adug pa dang/ de nyid du gnyid kyis logagro/
de gnyid kyis cher log pa dang/ sbrul gdug pas zin nas dus las 'das so// mo yang shing rta'i steng du nyid du khye'u zhig btsasaM to/ de shing rta las babs nas shing drung du songs/
ngobo khyod kyi bu khye'u zhig btsasakyis dgyes pa skyed cig ces smras pa dang desems madapas nam blono// des lag pas bskul tabartagasan dus las 'das par mthong/
mod du bar gyur ba dang/ ba glang yang ma byin par lenapas phrogs so// de nas ring zhig tu sus mdega' ba skyes te/ phyogs bzhir bltas nas des bu da gzod btsas ba 'di pang du thog
ba sngamani lag pa nas bzung song ba dang/ don dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po las to/ des mtshodang/ steng dang khron pa dag chus gang nas/ de'i lam ga na chubo rgol dgos par gyu gnas /
des bsams 'a/ daste khyobudang lhan cig turgalon ni bdag kyang med/ khye 'u yang med par 'gyuran/ rozhig khye'u je bsgral lo// phu bo de chu bo'i 'gram du bzhag ste/ chung du khyer te
rgal lo// de nas de yang 'gram du bzhag ste bu phu bo'i phyir yang chu la te/ tshuba'i phyed du phyin pa dang/ khyi'u chung ngu de tshos khyer ro// de nas mos chu bo'i dbus su 'dug ste 'og
ba g.yabs nas ku ku zhes bos pa dang/ khyobu phu bo de ma bdag la 'bod dogs bsams nas de chu'i nang du mchongs pa dang/ chu'agram yang gad pa chad pa zhig ste/ lhung ma thag tu dus
las 'dasanas/ donasamo rings shing myur bar byung sku/ wa de'i rjes bzhin du bsnyags pa dang/ sad bor te song nas de la bltas dus las 'das par m byed ba dang/ mis dus nas ri
churaber to/ de nas khu chen b ra yang tshus khyer ba mthong nas/ mi dag 'khachen por gyur te/ duzhing brgyugs pa dang/ de yang dus las 'das par mthong ngo// de khyo dang bu las bral
bas yi chad par gyuranas/ gcig pu gos gcig gis smad g.yogs te/ chu bo'i 'gayon rlung dang/ nags chen po dang/ chu bo rnams kyi sgra dang/ bya'i sgra dum rnams mnyan cing thosanas/kyi
da khyo/ kyi hud bu chen bo/ kyi hud bu chung ngum zhes zer zhing snying rje zhing brtse bas/ mchi mas brnangs bzhin du du ste/ sa la phan tshun 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang/
las kun rgyas shing rdzogs pas nges par gdonami za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ dam thag tu'adi'i pa dang/ ma dang/ khyim gyi skye bo mang po dag gnam lcags kyis bog shi'o//
de'i nang nas skyes pa gcig cig thur te/ snying rje shing brtsi bsamatshimasabarnangs bzhinadu myur bar 'gro zhing de'i mdun legs su 'os pa dang/ chos de skyag pa lta bur mthong nas/
kyi skyes bu ci'i phyir ranges par rgyug ces dris pa dang/ des de'i mdun du rang gi lus brngubs nas ngu zhing mchims brnangs bzhin du smras pa/ khyodakyil dang/ ma dang/ khyim gyi skye bom
po naganam lcags babs pas phog ste/ bdag gcig pu ni las kyis thar lo// de thos nas phyi phyir mya ngan rmongs shing du bar gyur ba dang/ bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs su sdig ci zhig
byas nas dus gcig tu khyodang bu la sogs paganyen bshes dang bral/ de bsan khyiman gnas pas ci zhig byas/ skal bamadapas gdadu ci redapa// khyo dang gnyen bshes dang yang ba dag
bralab bdag 'gro khyiman gnas par mi rigs te// dgon pa rnam par dben pa de dag dang// khyim stong de dag tun gnas pa bla// khyim na gnas pa sdig ste ci la rung//
ngan sdug bsngal rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur// ra phyogs gcig tu zhugs te son gnas / phan tshudu 'khyam 'khyam pa las rims kyis grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas/ dazhabudached rgan/
mo gzhan zhig sa 'khal ba zhig 'dug ste/ de de'i drung du song ba dang/ des de la ngal bsosanas de dang lhan cig tu las 'khal pa la zhugs so// don thag pa khye'u gzhonan gzhan zhig
rang gi bzos 'tshe ba la zhugs te/ de la budame rgan mod dus dus su ras kyi skud pa de la'atshongango// donas gzhan zhig tudes skud pa phra mo zhig khyer to/ de'i drung du song btang/ des
mam khyod kyis sngon ni sbom por 'kha lan/ da 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang/ das 'dini bdag gis ma bkal go[° ]/mam 'on susabakal/ bubodagagi khyim na budagad/
gcig cig 'dug ste/ des bkal ba 'di yin nozhes smras pa dang/ des ma ma khyod kyis ci'i phyir na bdag la dgi sbyin/ bdag la yang chungam mad de/ bdag gis de'ibabra'ab
dang bgo ba dang/ 'tsho ba'i yakhyad dag sbyaro zhes smras pa drang/ mos khu ro zhig de la gsal bar ng ste/ tsazur ba sa lan phyir sbyin zhes smras pa dang/ des de'i skudapa'i
na rgyal bar byin/ gzan yang byin nas/ donas dri dang me tog gis brgyan tabatang ba dang/ skam mo 'go'u tamis smas ba/ ma la skud pa su la btsos na rgyal zhing legs te/
khyod kyang dri dang me tog gis sus brgyan/ des bu mo dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa 'ba' zhige ma yin gyi bas kyang spyi'i no zhes smras pa dang/ de'i phyir 'di lta bu
galas byung zhes 'dri'o// des kyang ji ltar gyur pa zhing dusmosanas/ khya'u tha ga pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par bsnyadapa brjod de smras pa/ bumo khyabu khrig pa de khyod slong ste/ da'i chung
mamed kyi bas long zhig dang/ bde bar 'gyur ro// desamamo tshog gis phyin chad 'di skadam smra zhig/ bdag ni khyim na gnas pas skyes// ji ltar ya darung de lta bu'i 'tsho ba mi bya'o zhes
smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bumo bud med rten med pa ni sdug bsngal ba'i gnas ni 'dug ste/ phyi rol gyi skyes pa dag glags lta bar yang 'gyur gyis/ gnasasu sems la khas long/
'dus shig des khas ma bla sas/ des de la rkyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur bar smras pa dang/ gded des khas blangs so// de nas khye'u bgapas de nyim dang tshes grangs
dang skar ma'i rigs dang sbyar te khyim du blangs so// de yang mi bsun cing mo la khri bas rtag tu de dbyug pa dang bral chos rdeg ste/ des bud med rgan mo de la smras pa/ mam khyod kyis bdag
srin po la phul to/ des bdag la nyin cib bzhin du dbyug pa dang bralatshos rdegan dzilhar sumangashas go/ bu mo nam khyod la bum byung gi bar du khyod la kho rdeg go/ khyod kyang bu mthur gyur
ba dang khyim de yang khyod nyid dbang byed kyis mi dga' ba ma byed cig/ des dus phyi zhigan de sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ khye'u tha ga pa de mo la byams par gyur to// blo yang de la
bas ba byed do// des kyang sdod cig ces byas nas mnagasaso// de nas dus phyi zhigan khye'u de thag pa'i grogs po rnams kyis chang mang du blud pasar ro nas smyo zhing khyim du 'ongs so// de
mang sgo bcad de bu 'byung zhing 'dug pa'i tshodis sgo bla zhes byas na/ dbu 'byuba'i sdug bsngal kyis kun tugawi nas sgo ba phye ba dang/ de rab tu khro bo skyes nas phyogs gcig tu seng
ste 'dug go des bu byung nas sgo phye ba dang/ donang du 'os pa la gus par byas te smras pe/ ngo bo dbyis pangamadzod cig/ khyod kyi bu phozhig btsas so// des de la khro bas
kun tu babs pa danam srol gyi/ gnod sems kyis kun tu khebs par gyur to/ desabum byung bar yang bdag 'khas bar byed na/ gang gi tsho 'di bu skyes par gyur na/ 'didang bu
gnyis bsgoms nas bdag la gdon mi za bar gasod par byed dosnyam du bsams nas/ des smras pa/ bzamo brag tum dus lo zas tshugs shig/ ngas thagatumakhus te srangasabatsugs
pa dang/ smras pa/ yungs mar blugs la skol cig/ des ungs mar blugs te bskol ba dang/ des bu chung 'dis chug la skal gces smras pa dang/ chos ngosaM 'di khyod nyid kyi bu yin
na 'dis cizhig nyas/ gzhon nu ma bsad ces smras pa dang/ des de la dbyig pas brdegs so// bdag las sdug pa med pas des skrag ste/ de yungasam
khol ba'i nang du bcug pa dwang/ dus las 'das so// nam de tshos bar gyur na/ des smras r/ daphyang zhes bsgo pa dang/ sa dbyung ba dang/ smras pa// brazhig sabasgogo/ dis
'tsho/ smras pa ngo bo ba'ishaji ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang/ des de nyid kyi lus thams cad perdzogs rab tu brtags pa dang/ de des brdzogasabs bu'i sha yang zos so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa/ 'dod chags kyi khan ma thobachung mod kyi 'khrul pa dka'a'o// zhe sdang gi kha na ma thobo che la 'bral bar ma bas/ thag pa'i khye'u de phyis 'gyod pa'i mas gdungs te/ ring
zhig ma log pas na gtidakyis myos te/ doshin tu'ag par 'go'u ta mis rig nas bsamasal/ 'di bubasad nas bdag la yang bu'isha bar bcug ste/ mi 'di ni srin po minakyi
'bros so snyam nas/ rgyagasaru thig cig khyer te bros pa dang/ byaphyogs kyi lam grogs gcig yul 'khor mo 'jig tu brong rnams btsongs te/ slar gyi thong rnams khyer nas byang phyogs
kyi lam du zhugs tadongab dang lhan cig tusong ngo// ji tsaman ded dpon gyis de'i gzugs mdzes pa mthong ngo// mthong nas de 'chags des khyod su'i/ dgang du 'gro zhes dris pa
dang mos smras pa/ ded dbonabadag gi khyo ni sbrul gdug pas bros so// bu gnyis las gcig n was zos so// gcig ni chu'inang du dus las 'das so// pha drang mnigAnam
lcags kyis bsod do// bdaganamagonamed pas gar dga' bar 'gro ste/ 'gron pa mang po de dag gar dong ba de mchi'o/ des bsams pa ring du gar song yang 'di 'dra ba'i bud
tshod dang lhan cig yas su spyod do snyam nas/ des de chungamarangs te/ ritsam zhig na 'gron pa mang ba de dag mi rgod kyis bcom ste/ ded dpon de yang 'thabs pa'i s bsad do//
skom mo 'go'u tamini'i rgod kyi ded dpon gyis chung mar byas pa dang/ margod kyi ded dpon de yang byang phyogs kyi rgyal pos bsad do// skam mo 'go'u tamin rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur
pa 'inang du bcug go/ byang phyogos kyi mi rnams durarku ste/ de dag gi sumachad po brus pa dang/ skamamo 'ga'u tami snar rdul sen gnas des [”]sbrid pa byung ba dang/ dur chub 'i mi rnams
'gog ma dang lhan cig tu bkur ste ri byas temachad
sgragaso/ rolangs so snyam nas de dag bros pa dang/ skyim go 'go'u tam khung bu brusanas byung ngo// des sdugabasngal rnam pa dumar brtags pas rlung rab tu las shing kha zas med pa'i/
rkyen gyis smyon par gyur nas des smad g.yogs bor te/ lag pa dang rku ba gas shing nub sgraring skya mo bseng bsang mor gyur te/ ban tshuna'akhyam 'khyam las
mnyan du yod par byin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa na bsam gyisami khyab bo// des sngon las byas pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam
'a bar sminapaskyong bar gyur nas/ sngon gyi las kyis 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin to/
de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong brgya stong duma'imadunan chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa
