snaskum mo 'go'u tamig rgyang ma nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po 'a mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyisani yang dag par brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cusani sku rnam par spras/
bod kyi dkyil 'khor nyis stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba rinapo tsho'i 'gro ba bzhin khor khor yu gnas abazang ba mthong ngo// mthong nas bdag gi dran pa sa thob ste/ de ngo tshaba'i
tshul du gyur nas phyogs gcig tu tsog pur 'dug ste/ de'i bar du yang sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyisami mkhyen pa 'as/ mi gabrigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi rig
bas su med// gtis su mi smab/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa// chu bo bzhi las brgal ba// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'imathil rab tu
bstar/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyams pa med pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dgapar 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tuphyin pa drug yongs
su rdzogs pa/ gnas drug la rtag tu gnas pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyanapA/ lam gyi yan lag bdun 'chadapa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
mkhas pa// stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan par grags pa rnams brgya phrag bcu'i dbang du gyur pa las rab tungos pa rnams mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum gyi bar du sangs
rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jigs rten la gzigs nas ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'byung ste// gang la nyams/ gang la 'phel bar 'gyur/ gang lasdug bsal bar gyur te/ gang dag par 'gyur/
gad gnod par 'gyur/ gang la sdug bsngal dang/ dog pa dang/ gnod par 'gyur/ gang na song la gzhol/ gang ngan songal 'ongang/ gang ngan song la rab tu'ababs/ ngas
gang ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya/ gang dge ba'i rtsar ma bskyod ba rnams dgaba'i rtsa ba bskyed rabya/ gang bskyod pa rnams yos su smin par bya/ gang smin pa rnams
rnam par grol bar bya/ yang gsungs pa/ rgya mtsho chu srin gnas de yang// gal te dus las yo' yang srid// gdul bar 'gyur ba'i sras rnams la//
sangs rgyas dus las 'dwa'ami 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshedang ldan pa kun dga' bo labaka' stsal bA/ kun dga' bo ded dpon gyi chung ma/mtsho 'go'u tami la bla
gos phyin cigo dang 'di la chos bshad par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ded dpon kyi chum skum mo 'go'u tam la bla gos phyin no// de nas ded dpon gyi chung ma skam mo 'go'u ti
mis bla gos gyon nas/ bcom ldan 'das gan pa der song sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ga rung/ lag ye// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/
ny+nyo de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsams pa dang/ bag la tul ba dang/ khams dang rang bzhin rnams mkhyenanas/ 'phugs ya nga dag pa rtogs par 'gyur pa
sku de lhabu'i chos ngashad de/ gang thos pas ded dpon gyi chung maskamamo 'go'u mis/ 'jig tshogs la ltaba'i ri'i rtsam til rgyun las ba sa pa sabcomanas/ rgyun du zhugs/
zla pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so// de bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su yul mi spung/ de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skod
ces gsol to// btsun pa legs par bshad pa'ichos 'dul ba las rab tu byung zhing/ bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur zhing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du/
bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad nas/ des rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen pa ra rdzogs par byas nas/ 'dul ba la
bslabs te lung bsgob byin nas de brtson par byas/ nan tan du byas/ bsgrub par byas pas na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g.yo ba dngam ba g.yo bar shes te/ 'asadus kyi rgyun thams cad
zhig pa dang/ lta ba dang/ rnam par gyes pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis rab tu bcom ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom par gyur to/ na kha dang chung nang na sa nags khag
gsum gyi 'dod chagos dang bral ba/ bong bu dang gser du 'dra ba/ nam mkha' la lag mthil ltar chagasal 'gagyi gsalam da pa bzhin du sems rang// sU'u dang tsan dan du 'du ba
mdzodabcom pa rig pa dang/ mngon par shes pa yang dag par so sor rig pa thob/ srid pa'ired pa dang/ chags pa dang/ bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs te/ dbang po dang/ dadabang po
dang lhar bcas pa rnams kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang/ tshig snyan par brjod par gyur to/ debcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong
rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ma'i dge slongag 'dul ba 'dzin pa'inang na 'di lta ste/ mchog ni dge slong ma sgom tsho 'go'u tami'o/ dam
bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skam mo 'dul ba 'dzin pa 'inang na mchog go zhes gsus pa dang/ 'i tshe de 'i dung du dge slong ma rnams dong ngo// des 'os pa de dag skyo
las kyi rgyun rnams brjod do// dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong dag la de ltar gyur pa zhig tusmras so// de nas dus phyi zhig na skamatsho 'go'u tami/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal/
ba'i phyir song ba dang/ dge slong dag gis mthong nas gcig la gcig de'i las kyi rgyud rnams brjod do// de nas skam mo 'go 'u tamus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo// mkhyen bzhin du 'drib ni/ bcomo ldan 'das te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'a[']ci'i phyir na/ kun dga'/
bo dge slong rnams phan tshun rna bar shub ces smras pa dang/ des zhib tugasal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang las kyis nus
bar smi pan bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ 'jig rten pa'i ni rangagi las so// las ni skyo gnas so// lasani nyi mtshams so// lasan rjes su 'jug pa ste/ gang gis ji ltar las byas pade
la de rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang/ the tshom brams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa dge
slom skyemamo'ago'u ta masolas mizhig bgyis na/ de'i phyir 'di'i kho sprul gyis zos te dus las 'das/ bugacig las bkum/ gnyis pa ni chu bos 'tshal te dus las 'dus/ ba ma
gtisani gnam lcags lhung bas bkum par gyur/ bu'isha yang 'atshalanosarkyes shing ga yongs pa'i sems kyis/ de dang de dag tu 'khyam 'khyams pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
rab tubyus nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang nAmatshog ga zhes ci'i slad du bka' sul zhes zhus
pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma skyes ma 'go'u mi nyid kyi las byas shing 'tshogs pa red cung/ rgyanasmin pa ni chu bo bzhin mngon du 'byung skye nges par
gyur ro// skem mo 'go'u tamis las byas la bsagasapa gzhan gyis myong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par ma
smin chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams lam yan/ rlung khams lam yin gyi/ zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba las bas//
pa rnam par smin to// las rnams stong bar mi 'gyur ba/ bskal pa dga' po lenakyang/ dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa'i// lus can rnams ni 'bras
bur smin// dge slong dwag sngon byung pa nA ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag cig 'dug ste/ phyug la nor mang zhing longs spyod cho/ gnas yangs shing rgya che ba ni/ ngal bso po'i nir dang
'dra sku pal bso po'i nor la sde bzhigs/ rigs dang mnyam pa zhig las chung ma zhugs/ dudang rtse dga' shos su spyad pa spyod do// des rtse dag la yongs su spyad kyang bu'o/
yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ bdag gi khyim du nor dum zhig 'dus na/ nga la bu po yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ bdag ga 'das pa dang/ bdag gi dbang ba thams cad du med pa'o zhes zer
la/ tu rgyug po'i dkor du 'gyur ro zhes de 'gram pa lag pas bstan te/ rab tusems shing 'dug pa de'i chung mas mthong nas/ jobo khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram la 'barten te/ rab tu
uts+tshA sems shing 'dug ces smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bzang ma bdag gi khyimananoradum zhig 'dus kyang bu bo yang med/ bu mo ya medan/ bdag 'das pa dang/ bdag gi dbang
ba thams cad bumad pa'ozhis zer ta rgyal pe'idakor du 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu sams shing mi 'dug/ des bsams pa ci 'di'i skal pa chung ma/ bu ga yang med/ bu mo yang med/
ci bdag gi skal ba chungangs/ 'di ni ga zhan ma yin gyi/ bdag la nyes pa'i skyon ba gas te chung ma gzhan len par 'dod do/ de'i phyir bdag gi mdun du 'gram par lag pa gtad de/
rab tusems shing 'dug la/ 'di skad du bdag gi khyim na nor dum 'dus kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pas/ bdag 'das pa dang/ bdag gi dwabang ba brams cad ngumed pa'o zhes zer//
rgyal bo'i dkor du bzhes kyis/ da bsan bdag nyid thar par bya'o zhes bsams nas smras pa/ ngob dri ltar b dagasal ba chud pas khyod kyi bu pho dang mo med kyis/ chung ma gzhan
zhig lung zhig dang/ de las bu pho dang bu mo yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzang mo khyod kyis skyes bu gang la chung ma gnyis yodan/ de ni nam yang chug me'i skyems
'thung// rtag tu de'i khyim na 'thab pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ mi 'dum pa dang/ rtsod pas nang gi skye ba rnams dkrug par byas te/ rangagi las la brtson par mi 'gyur zhes
ma thos sam/ mos smras r/ deb re zhig 'bazhig dang/ de lta bu nu mo tsam du gyuran ni phu nu mo'i 'du shes kyis bskyang bar bya'o// 'on te bu mo tsam zhigan ni bu mo'i 'du shes kyis
bskyang bar bya'o// dis de la g.yo byas te smras pas/ de yang bu 'tshol ba la zhugs so// de nas ri gragasakyi grongo gzhan zhigan/ khyim bdag cig gi bumo zhig btsas nas/
bya// skyes pa dang pha ma gnyis dus las 'das pa zhig ste/ des de'i ming bo las de bslangs nas/ dpal chen po dang sbyar tribab ma bslas so// thams cad kyang tshes nyid/
@# kyis sar bas rnying pa zil gyis gnon pas/ de de la shin tu byams shing sems zhugs par gyur to// de nas de 'i chuman pa de rang bzhin gyis phrag dog gis mang 'gyis gnas dag par gyur/
'bata sems can dang ldan paragyuranas/ de dag 'ab sbyos te/ de la smras ba/ ngob dga' bskyed cigabadagan sems can dang ldan par gyur to// des smras pa// bzang mo lags
so da du po zhig btsas nani bdag 'das pa dang/ khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// mos smyos pa/ jo bo khyod kyi chung mas mngal nas lhung ba'itsho ga zhig sbyar te/ lhung bar ma
byas na ni khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// des smras pa// bzang mosren yang bdag gis 'di lta bu'i phyir smras na/ da dungabu cung zad kyang med par khyod kyis brtsams mam/ de lan med de cang
ts+tsom brar par 'dug go/ de sgrub brgyud dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u zhig btsas so// de btsas pa'i nus ston rgya cher byas te/ rigs dang mthun pa las ming btags so// de sngonagyi las kyis
'di patsasan sems can 'dim yar mo 'dis mi gsod la phan gyis/ de bas na 'di nyid la gzharar zhes bsams nas/ des de la skyes pa/ che zhes khye'u 'di khyod dang bdeg gi yin gyis/
'di bdag cag gnyis kas bskyed do// des legs kyis 'di bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas/ de spyod pa la zhugs so// des de bskyedan log par rtog pa skyes te/ gang ba pus pa'i
khyim ste/ de bas na 'dir skyod kyang 'di ltar khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang/ bgani bran mor 'gyur gyis 'din pasad de sumanaso/ de leg par rtogs pas bskyod pas bskyod pas
khye'u de'i khar smugama'i thur ma zhig btsugs pa dang/ dosdug bsngalagyis gzir bsang bar gyur nas/ des smras pa/ cha zhi khye'u 'di ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang/ des smos pa/
tsha zhaci'i phyir du ba so 'tshal to// des de blangs ta dga' ba bya bar brtsams te/ log pas 'khyudade 'obyas se pangar blangs kyang mi btubanas/ des de nu ma bludanas/ ji
tsam bltas pa dang/ smyug ma'i thur ma zhig khar btsugs par mthong nas/ des myur du kha phye ste log pas drangs pa dang/ khye'u de dbugasamed de dus las 'das nas/ desazung
brdungs te du zhing sa la 'gyil ba dang/ khyim gyi skya bo dang/ khyim tshes rnams brgyugs nas/ 'di ci nyes zhes dris pa dang/ des snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du
smras pa kyam yar ma sdug pa'i chos spyod pa 'di phrag dog gis khros nas/ bodag gi bu'i khar smug ma'i thur ma btsugs te bsad do// de dag kyang du bar gyur nas/ 'khor gyi
khyim tshes dag gis klosanas/ de dag gis kyang bsgrugs pasmras pa/ e ma'o 'di na go pur zhig byas te/ byis pa 'di nyis pa med cing gnodapamed par bsad
do zhes zer nas/ de de la skye bo mang po dag gis e ma'o zhes zerazhing kun tu skor ro// de ni brang rdung zhing du sku/ mna' 'dor ba de stabadag bas khyod kyi bu bsad par gyur na/ bdag gi
'a khyo yang sbrul gyis thos te dus byed par shog cig/ bu gcig ni las bros par shog cig/ gnyis pa chu ngoralhang stadus byed bdashog cig/ pha ma gnam lcags kyis gsod bshog
cig/ bu'i sha yang bros la smyo zhing 'phyar ba'i sems kyis phan tshun 'khyam par shog cig ces mna' dor dgi slong dag jisnyam du sems/ khyim bdagade'i chung ma gnyis pa ni
'di bzhin dgaslong ma skamago 'ogo'u dmo 'di'o/ 'di shin tuDon mongs pas kun tu khebs pas na/ khye'u bsadon yang brdzun du smra zhing mna' bor bde'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/
[W ]'di'i khyo sbrul gyis zos te dus las 'das so// bu ci gnas bsad do// cig zhi chu bor lhung ste dus las 'das so/[” “]kho man ba nam lcags lhung bas shi'o bu sha thos
so sgronamor smos shing yanamanadu g.yengs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du 'khyams so// thagazhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od sungs las rab tubyung bar gyur te der
0 'as tshog cig tutshangs par spyad pa spyod kyang yon tanagyi chos mang bo gang yang ma chud de// gang la rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyusakyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnamos kyin na mchog tu gsungs so// den 'dis 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab/ gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od sus bla na med pa yin gnas kyi drung
du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan mang po gcig kyang ma chud de/ bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
bram ze'i bu bla ma la/ bramo bra'i khyi'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lab thub pan/ shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i
bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/ ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo 'di la[”]bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saMngasargyas kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa'in na mchog tu gsus pa de bzhin du/ bdagakyang bcom ldan s shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po des 'dul ba 'dzin pa'inangana mchog
tugasung bar shog cig/ 'dis de na tshe gcig tutshangs par spyod pa spyad pas na da pa'i bstan pa la rab tubyung zhing nyon mos pa thams cad sngas nas dgra btsim pamadzenadu byas so// gang
@#// 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu shog cig ces smon lam btabaste/ smon lam de'i mthus/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba 'dzinapa'i nangan
mchog tu gsungs so/ gzhan yang dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa skam mo 'go'u li'i pham gnyis kyis las ci zhigabagyis na
las gang gi rnam par smin pas gnam lcags lhung stegum par gyur/ khyos las ci zhig bgyisan sbrul gyis 'a tshal nas dus las 'das/ bu gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/
sbya gcig ni lus 'tshal/ gcig ni chu bo lhung ste dus las 'dasaM par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas tshogs pa red
cing rkyen sminapan/ chu bu bzhin du lta bar gnasaM pa nigadonami zu par 'gyur ro// de dag gis las byas shing bsags pa ni gzhan sus kyang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ dge slong rnams las
byas shing bsags pani/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ ma'o khams lam yin/ rlung gi khams 'am yanagyi/ zinapa'i phung bo dang/ khams
dang skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dag pa'i las byas pa rnam par smin to// las rnams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ba// bskal pa dag ni brgya len kyang// dus dang 'phrodanas thob pa
ni lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba na bskal pa bzang po 'di skyatsho lo khri phupa pa na/ 'od srungs zhes bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rte nadu byung ste/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyal ga po dang rkang par ldan// bde bar gshegasapa/ 'jig rtenam khyenapa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i khalaMskyar ba/
blun med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul 'khoramo 'jig grong khyer gyi drang srong bzhin gyi ri dwags gsan bzhugs so// do'i dus na yul 'khor
mo 'jig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig ga nas te/phyug pa/ noramangal/ longs spyodache ba/ gnas yangs shing rgyas pa/ ngal bso po bzhin nor 'du ba/ ngal bso po'i nor la sde ba des/
chu bo bar ka ya'i pha rol tus gtsug lag khang zhigyi brtsigs te/ dar yul so sosan gnas pa'i dge slong drag gnas te/ khyim bdag de las skye bo grong mi dag gis bong bslangs shing 'dong
ngo de la gcig gis lan gsum gyi bar du zong chud gsan pa dang/ des de la smras pa// 'di ltar drin med pa khyod kyis brnags te/ padag gi khrong lan gsum du rud gsan gyis nor
min gyi par dum 'grozhig des smras pa/ khyim bdag lan cig gsol 'di chud gsan/ bdag gi bu gsum dang bdge chung mar bcas pa khyod kyi bran du snyems shig/ des yang
tshig rgya brisanas da la thong ba no// de yang nyung zad kyang minus pa zhig ste/ des yang zong dudags nas khyim bdag des de chung ma dang bur bcos te/ gtsug
lab khang de'i las byed rasu'ago de yul la khor mo 'jig na gnas pas nyi ma re re zhing tshuborgalanas gtsug lag khang der dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'bras chan 'tshad de/ rlung
tsa ma dang bu dag naphyag tshong byed de// gtsug lag khang de na dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig dge 'dunagyi zhal ta byed de/ de nas dus phyi zhin char ba babs pas/ chu bo par kachus gang ste/
rnalaso da pakhu dang chung mar bcas te ri du thogs pa dang/ dge slong dgra bcom pa de khos nas smyos pa/ kyi skyes bu gdugs tshod 'di tsam 'das kyi bar du da dung yang khyodami 'ongan/ ci dge
la slong gi dge 'dun bshos rnams gcad pa'i bya 'am/ daskad smras pa dang/ chung ma dang bcas nas khros tismras pa// 'di 'ong banaklad par ci'i phyir gnam lcagasAmi bab/ bu chen pos smras
ba 'disbrul gdugapasaci'i phyir la thos/ bu 'bring pos smras pa/ 'di ci'i phyir chuboralhung ste dus las ma 'das bu chung ngus smras pa 'di las tsa'iphyiram zos/ dge slong dog/
ma bdge chung mar bcas ba de ga nyisan sgomamo 'go 'u mi'i pho mgo gang bu chen po de ni 'di'i khyo'i/ gang bu 'bring bo de ni 'di'i bu chen po'o// gang
bu tha chung de ni 'di'i bu chung du ste/ de ltar dgra bcom pa la ngan sogs kyis tshig rtsub po byung ste/ de'i las rnam par smin bas gnam lcags dang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ lnga la sogs pas
bsadachu bor lhung ba dang bzhi char dus las 'das so// de lta bas na dge slongadag zhin tuganag pa'i lasakyi rnam par smin pa 'ang shin tu gnageg/ shin tudakar ba'i lasani shin
tudakar ba'o// 'dus pa'i lasan 'dres pa'o// de lta bsan dge slong dgashin tuganag pa dang/ 'dres pa'i las spras te/ shin tu dkar ba'i las la nan tan du bya'o// de
bzhin du dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par byos shigo bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsungs pa dang/ dge slong de dag yi rangs to/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis gsungs pa la
man par dga' 'o/// 'dul ba phramo'i das de////bam po bzhi bcu pa// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod
ba ste/ skyes bu glanab 'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams la nyes pa med cing gnodopa med par bsad pa dang/ kya'i chung ma rnams kyi mang po dang/ khyo dang/ pa rnams las bralaphor/
gyur// sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs te/ legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tubyung ngo// sdug bsngalan dril bu'i sgra dang 'dra ste/ nam de dag mya ngan dang bral ba dang/
de'i tsho 'dod chags rab tum pa'i nyon mongs pas gzi'i tapakhod par bya ba ma nus so// bcom ldan bas kyis gsungasapa/ sbya'anag bo nyas pa'i dmigs
lnga skye lnga gang zhen/ khro ba can dang/ khon du 'dzin pa can dang/ sing gi ba dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang/ dug rno ba'o// de ltar dbazhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes pa'i
dmagos lta sku/ lnga gang zhen/ khrobacan dngo/ khon du 'gapa can dang/ snying ring ba dang/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang/ dug rnaba'o// de 'khud med kyi dug rnob gang zhen/ bud med
ni phal cher 'dod chags ches/ de dag gcig lag cig gros byas nas/ dge slongam sbom dga' tshon ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ spom dga' mo'i rkangapo la phyag byas te/ mdun du
'khod nas 'phagasam nyon mongs pa rnams/gzung ba dka' sto/ chu med rnams la slu bar bgyidan/ ji ltar b dagagis bzlog par bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ nubo dag
del shes par khyabaci zhig yod/ khyod caganan chung dar la bab pa yin gyis/ dngol khrims phul te nor can dang/ tshong dpon dang/ ded dpon dang/ gzhan yonganal gyi bu dang/
wA su'ibu rtol med ba rnams dang lhan cig tuyos su spyod cig/ de ste yang gzhon nakhyod cag dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o// des dedag bsus pa dang/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ dang
0 sa yang smras pa/ tsha'i gsal sgrol dga' mo'i/ 'di shes par bya ba'i zhig yod ces zer ro// de dag kha cig gis ga des smras pa legs kyis 'dong la longs su spyad do zhes
smras pa dang/ kha cig gis smras pa/ de dag skyes tsho 'go'u tami'i drung du deng sku/ rkang pa la phyag byas nas/ gsum nyonamos pa'i gzung bar daka'aste/ bud mdo rnams la
slu bar byed na/ bdag cag gis ji ltar b zlog par bgyis bshad du gsolo/ des smras pa// tshozhi dag 'dod pa rnams kyi ming yangs 'dzin cig/ deci'i phyir zhen/ 'dod pa
bde ba chung la sdug bsngala'o// nyes pa'i dmags mang ngo// bcom ldan 'dusakyis gsungs pa// nyes pa'i dmigs la yang dag par mthong zhing mkhas pas ni 'dod pa 'bu bstan
banami sogs go lnga gang zhen/ 'dod pani dga' ba chung la sdug bsngalatshab tas pa'i dmigs mang por yang dag par mthong ba'imakhas pas 'dod pa la bstanangadzami rigs so/[”]
'dodapa la bstan pas sbyor ba rnams 'phel bar 'gyur par mthong pa'om/khas pas 'dod pa 'batsun par mi rigasaso// 'dod pa bsonan gtongab dang/ ngoms pa dang/
go ba med par mthong bo'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bstan par mi rigs so// 'dod pa la bstan yon/ sdig pa'i lasam byed pa ni cung zad kyang med par thob mkhas pas 'dod
pa la bsnyen par mi rigs so// 'dod na rnam grangs dum las kyang/ sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang/ mkhas pa dang/ yang dag par song
ba'i skyes bu dam pa dag gis smad par mtho ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la khasonapar mi rigs so// yon tan lnga mthob mkhas pa ni reb tubyung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so//
lnga gang zhen/ rang gi don ma 'dres pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung la mos par bya ba'i rigs so// bdag gang bran tsho dang/ mig gzhug ma dang/ skyob/
da dbamadu pa dang/ gar dgar 'khrol med po las de dag gis mchod pa dang/ bsngags par mthong ba'imakhas pas rab tu 'byung ba 'amos par bya ba'i rigs so// bla namad
pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba dang/ rgya las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba mthong ba'imakhas pas rab tu 'byupa la'os par byaba'i rigs so// bdag namad pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba
dang rgyan las 'das pa thob pa dga' thobanayang l skyo ba'i 'gyur ro zhes mthong ba'i mkhas pas bag tu 'byung ba la mos par bya'o// rnam grangs dum las kyanag tu 'byung ba
ni sangs rgyasodang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang/ mkhas pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ skyes bu dam pa dag gis stanang ro mthong ba'i mkhas pas lob tu 'byung ba la mos par bya
@# ba sa so/ chu bo dag gis tshe gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyi'i sdug bsngalamyob dmatanapar 'dod pa/ 'on te tshe 'di la skyo ba'i rnams m nyan par 'dod/ de dag gis 'phags ma khyod kyi tshe
gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal myong bani zhig zhig la/ gangatsho 'di la myong ba rnams gsungs shig ces smras pa dang/ sa de dag la pha dang/ ma dang/ khro dang/ b rnams las
bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ bungashathos pa'i sdug bsngal ji ltar gyur pa zhibatusmras pa dang/ de dag skyonas baspu kun gyi khung bu yang g.yos te/ rna ba nas skam mo 'go'u tama'i gdong
dubaltas pa dang/ dus de dag gi bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin rnams shes nas/ 'phags pa 'i bdenang kha yi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
chos bshad do// dethosazhas de dag gi 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtsamo nyi shu rkyen du 'byung ba la shes kyi rodzes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bumanodu byas go/ de dag bden
bamathengasgyu/ 'phags ma bdag cag de zhig go// bdag la rab tu do zhig go/ 'phagasam sbom dga' mos bdagacog 'dodapa'i 'dam du de bcug go zhes smras pa dang/
skamamo'ago'u tamasakhum dag ci byas zhes dris pa dang/ dodagagasakyang zhib tusmras so// desazhumo dag 'di la ci zhig bya/ na nyis pa sbom po spyod pa ste/ des bcom ldan 'das
kyi bstan pa chu 'gram gyi gdu ba bzhin do zhes smras pa dang/ don nyung ba'i dge slol dag la 'phya spong ste/ kha nadu zer ban dgeslongams/ dge slongs
bdag slar khyim du bskyed pa ga la srid ces bri/ de ltar gyur pa dge slongam dgags/ dge slong dag la smras so// dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsolanas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/ de bas na dge slong mas dge slong ma khyim du 'jug par m byed cig/ 'jug par byed na shes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//
gleng gzhi la nyan du yod panaste/ dge slongs pa zhan zhig gis dge slong 'gyos pa dang/ dge slong de skrag par gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulapa/ de ltabasan dge slongamos dgeslong la spro bar ma byed cig/ skyobar byed na 'os pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// ngag dge slong mas dge slong
bal mi bya ba bzhin du/ dge slongam dang/ dgeslob ma dang/ dge tshul na dang/ dge tshul ma mi bya'o// dge slob mas dge slong dung/ dge slong ma dang/ dge slob ma dang/ dge
tshul ba dang/ ge tshulamalamakhyago/ dge tshul mas dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag slob ma dang/ dgatshub pa dang/ dgatshulam la yang mi bya'o/
a sdomani/ mdun du 'gro bar m bya rgyu// ldang pa khyu 'o dge slong ma// zhus nas 'dug par bya ba dang// skyil mo krung dang rnam grangasamed// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mnyan du yod pa 'jo ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po mnyan du yod pa'i sngon gyi skyed mos tshalar dag sasgra'i khang ban
'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sde drisham thabs dang chos gos gyon/ lhung bzed khyer te/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyomasakyi phyir zhugs so// dge slongamasgrom
dga' mo yang skadro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon// lhung bzed khyer nas mnyan du yod pa'i bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ dusatshe dang ldan pa 'od sus mthong nas/ glen pa 'di lam
dga' bar bya'osnyam bsamasanas/ khyim dang dutshodang ldan 'od srungs chen po 'gro ba der cha thogam so sgyu/ sgo 'azhing logs su 'dugs/ 'bags pa da ltar n sbyarab cung
zad kyang mad kyis song zhig ces smras pa dang/ dbyigagazhan du song/ der yumasngar songs sngam bzhin du gtsos so// 'di bzhin duyang gcig nas gcig tu byas pa dang//
ma dgongs pa ni bcom pa'i yi shes gzigs pas 'jug ste/ su zhig bdag la 'tsho sam dgosanasgrom ga'amo yin par gzigs s/ des smras pa/ srimo khyod kyis ma sa
kyis tshodang ldan pa na dga' sa tas to/ 1sa pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs
nas dge slong ma'i dngos bor gnang bar byas bas nyes so// de ltar gyurab dge slong dag gis thosonas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos ba/
gad cung zad dag glongams dge slongs spyod yul du 'gro ba'i mdun du singan nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/ de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms mi bslang bar
gongasanas bka' su'ang/ dgo slong dag dag klong 'od sungs kyis dge slong la rigs par smyos so// de lta bsan dge slong mas dag slog spyod yul du bsod snyomasam bsu zhig/
dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms bslangasan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod
snyomasam bsang zhig gsungs pa dang/ dge slongamag dge slong gi spyod tshul smras pa dang/ dedag bsod snyoms kyis 'phongs par gyur nas/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma rnams kyis//
dge slong rnams la smras pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltobasan/ dge slongams dge slong spyod yul du 'dong
ma ba'i mdunadu 'gro bar mi bya'o/ gang spyod tshul dge slong dag gis sbyangs par dge slong ma de dag deng bar byos shig ces bka' stsal to/ gleng bazhi ma nyan du yodapa
na ste sgromo dga' mo 'khor brgya stong du ma'i mdun na 'dug cing chos 'chadade// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po lam der song ba dang/ 'khor de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa do sus
chen mthong nas langs so// sbomo dga' khoni nubam bskyodapa dang/ de dag gis 'phags pa 'od srungs chen po lha dang mi'i mchod gnas de mthong ba dang/ bdag cagan 'angs na khyod
stan las kyang 'phags ba nim legs so zhes smras pa dang/ des 'di nimu stegs can las rab tubyung ba ste/ blunapa/ rab tungunang/ glen pa/ rab tun bas na/ bdag kyi
malas rab tu byung ba/ sde snod gsum pa/ chos kyi gtam can/ rigs pa dang grol ba la slobs pos ci'i phyir 'dis thob dang/ stan las ldang zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis
thos te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab/ dge slong dag dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni rigs bar 'phya'o// de lta bas na dge
slong mas dge slonga mthong s gtusnyan las 'a sa shig// ma langasan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// dge slongams
dge slong mthom btustan las longs shig ces gsungs pa dang/ dus phyi zhig na dge slongs ut+pala'i kha dog ma dbyar mo khang gi phyi rolon 'khor
brgya stong du ma'i mdunan 'dug ste chos 'chad do// tshid ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro shamakhabs dang chos gos gyon lhung babred khyor te/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs/
sgyu las mnyan du yodapanas bsod sems las slar bsko// gang na dge sloma'i dbyar mo khang yod pa der song po dang/ dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog mas tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bo mthong ste/ mthong ma thag stan las langs pa dang/ tshodang ldan ng kun dga' bos ston la 'dug go 'dug nas sring mo khyod kyisamado sde gang zhig brtsams zhes dris pa dang/
des smras pa// 'phags pa 'di zhes bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bosamado sde rgyas par bshadupar brtsams pa dang/ ut+pala'i kha dog ma 'greng bzhin du na ba khyo sa ta no//
dang ldan na dga' bo chos 'chad pa la chags pas de la 'dug cos ma smras pa dang/ de ring zhig 'greng bas ma'i 'od zer tsha bsarma sku brgyal bar gyur nas sa la 'gyel ba dang/ mdad
ba dag gis smras pa/ kye dge slom ut+pala'i kha dogam 'dod chags dang bral lazhes son/ shAkya gzhonanu gzugs sdug pa mthong ba dang/ 'dod chags kyis bskyod pa'i rtog
bas sa la 'gyil le zhes zer ba/ dge slong dag gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das gsolanas/ bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag
'phya pa rigs par 'phya ste/ de lta bsanadage slong chos 'chadan/ 'phags ma 'dug cigaces smos shig/ de stadage slong brel tam dranan/ dge slong ma zhus la 'dug cig/ 'thag
ba mkhyenaparamadzod cig bdag mchis so zhes rjod cig sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pan 'dzita'i tshal mgon me dwa dras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra/
ban bzhugs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag la bka' su lapa// dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar/ byareg ni skad 'byin/ shing ni zhing mdo mi rgod ni 'o//
de lta pason dge slong dag don 'dinidapa yin par ng shes par bya'o// de'i don yong 'di ltar blta'o// dge slong dag nyi sharozhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom
ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig bla dgas// bya rog sgra 'byin to zhes bya pa'i/ chos 'chad pa'i gang zag gi tshig bla dgas so// zhing pani zhing snod ces bya ba
ni gtong ba sbyin bdag gi tshig bla dgasaso/ mi rgodoni ngu'ozhes bya ni bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig bla dgas so// dalta bsan dge slong dag 'di ltar ston pa rjes su brtse ba/
u@#/// can thugs rjecan don du bzhed pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ thugs brtse bor gyur pas nyan thos khyed rnams la bya ba ni byas zin gyis/ dan khyed cag gis dgon
bdang shing dud pa dang/ khyim skyong ba dang/ lung pa dang/ brag phug dang/ sogam spungs pa bla gab med pa dang/ dur khrod dang/ gas dang/ dang/ bas mtha' 'di dag tu
gnas nig shing sgoms shig/ dge slongadag bgamadu par ma byed cig phyis 'gyodapa can du gyur ta re/ zhi 'i bstanapa'o// gaslong dag 'tsho dang/ stongaka dang/ brag phug
dang skyed mos tshal dang/ chumig dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bus brgyanapa'i sho di lta bu'i steng na khyad par can du dga' kha'i gnas su don gnas / yid la byed pa bsgrub pa la
rtsomamo dge slong ma yang rgyal po'i kun dga' rab dang nye ba'i tshal stug por/ gzhan yang budamad dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tudong ste/ yid la byed pa bsgrub pa la rtsom
mo dasngonagyi las rnamA par smanang las gyur pas/ bud med ces bya ba'i rma'i sgo'i srog chags zhugs par/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas bka' stsali pa/ dalta bas
yon dge slong dgag slong ma yid la byed pa bsgomo pan/ skyil mo krungabacas tam 'dug par/ skyil mo krung phyed du chos la 'dug pa yid la byed pa sgoms shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
dge slong ma skyil mo krung phyed du chos ra 'dug pa yid la byed pa sgoms shig ces gsungs nas/ dge slomadag gis spyil mo krung phyed du bcas ta'adu gnas / yid la bya ba bsgom pa la
rtsom bu dang/ 'on kyang de'i mtshan du srogachags phra ma zhugs pagasan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sulo pa/ gnas der 'dab ma 'am lo ma srab mo lhung bas glonalaskyil
mo krung phyed du chos la 'dug ga cig gleng g zhinamanyan du yod pan sta/ tshodang ldan pa u pa lis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus// btsun baoM dge slong mas
khrims bu 'anas babs par gyur pas/ legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la slar rab tu byung sto/ bsnyen par rdzogasanas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tsha lan rab tu 'byung
ma rab du ma 'byung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul ba/ u pa la rab tu 'byung// u pa la' na cig babs pa'i dge slong mas phyis legs par bshad pa'i chos
kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung/ bsanapar rdzogs nas dge slongama'i dngos por dpyod du skyid do// gleng gzhinamanyan du yod pan ste/ tshedang ldan ng u pa 'dis/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsunarab ng bcom ldan 'das kyisano/ 'di ltar dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ ltab nyams pa dang/
spyod pa nyams pa dang/ 'tshob tams pa'ozhes gleng bar mkhya/ dran par bya'onas gsungasan/ btsun pa ci dge slong mas dge slong pha la tshul khrims
nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod btams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng bar bgyi ba dong/ dran bar bgyi ba'i rnam grangs 'ga'atsam mchis sam/ bcom
sbruldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ su pa'i dge slong mas dge slong pa tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ spyod pa nyams pa dang/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng
bar bya ba dang/ dran par bya ba'i rnam grangs gang yang med do/// sdomani tshong dpon gyis kyang thos lhagam/ khazhagapa dag nim sgang sto// bar
i chadachoganami dri ba'i// gzhan phyir dag dang khrag 'dzag pa'o/ gleng gzhi nimanyan du yod pan ste/ mnyan du yod na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas ba phyug la
! nor mang shing los spyod che ba ste/ gsamanyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/ de de dang rtse dga' yongs su spyod de// del rtse dga' yongs su spyod kyang bu tho yamad bumo dang
zem byung ngo// de dus phyi zhigananorathad par gyur/ khos spyod kyang zad bar gyur nas/ des chung ma la bathami dbadag rgas pas btsal ba'ominusakyis/ 'dze ta'itshal du song/
starab tu 'byung ngozhes smras pa dang/ sa ngo bo de su khyod rab tu byun bdag su'i drung na 'dug gis/ bdag kyang rab tu'abyung zhes smras pa dang/ dus bzang mo lags kyis 'dang zhes
smras nas da khrid de 'go'u tam skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rkang po la phyag byas te/ 'phagosami rang gi las kyis 'di legs par bshad pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba
la rab 'byung bar 'tshalu lags kyis/ rab du byung zhig bdag kyang 'dze ta'i tshal du mchis la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smasanas/ des smras pa/ bu khyod chung ma dang bcas
sams bskyodopani legs te/ rab tu byung ba nibcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// yon tan lnga mthong ba'imakhaMs pas rab tu 'byung pa la mos par bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba nas/
sdum bzhin du sangs rgyas dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang/ mkhas pa dang/ yang dag par song ba dang/ skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas kyang rab tu byung ba ni bstod
kyis legs te rab tu dbyung gis song zhig ces smras nas/ de rab tu phyung ngo// de yang 'dze ta'i tshal du song nas/ dge slongo dag la rab tu byung ste/ demanyin du yod pa'i tshong
dbon zhig rab tu byung ngo zhes grags par gyur te/ bsod nams chen po thob pan chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal cha dang/ nadakyirkyen smon spyad dang/ lo khyed rnams so//
de dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de'i chung ma de yang bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang/ de'i dus na mu kheg chen pos de bsod snyoms kyis 'bo
so des de mthong nas smras pa/ sri mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug M/ des 'phags pa mu ge'i dus la bab pas bsod snyoms kyi zas su yang mo sterato/ sdug bsngal zhing 'tsho yod
ces smras pa dang/ des srimo ngal bsod sems 'byor pa yod med kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nabasod snyoms kyi phrad sbyin no zhes smras pa dang/ decangam zer bar dbyaramo khang du
so naso/ ji ltar gyur pa dge slongs dug la smras pa dang/ de dag gis dge slong dag lasmras pa/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
k+Sha kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slongam la gang dge slong gos bsod snyems shig 'byoran/ dge slong des mu ge'i dusan/ de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed spyan par bya ste/ de de la the tshom ma byed cig
ces bka' su la to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'drab 'i dge slongs la/ dgo slong dag gis bsod sgoms shig 'byoran dag mo dus chuga'i dus la bab pa
dang / de la bsod snyoms kyi phyud byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/ des de la bsod snyoms kyi phud bzhag pa dang/ sa de za zhing song// de dus phyizhigana'aphral la byin pa'i
wa thabasod snyoms shig redade/ dge slong de'i drud du ma song pa dang/ dge slong des bsams pa/ den gudanas bras rnyed du nges te/ de'i phyir 'di ma 'osan/ 'di su'i phyir bzhag snyam
du bsams nas/ des de ma bzhugapa dang/ ji tsam zhig na dag slog de yang 'ongs te des sringamo khyod ma 'ongs nas/ bdag gis bsod snyoms ma bzhag ste zas 'di ni bzhi g pa
zhigan da stabcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nan 'di bdag gis sbyin zhes smras pa dang/ des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas/ dbyaramo khangadusangaste/ des ji ltar gyur ba dge slong ma
dag lasmras nas/ de dag gis dag slobadag la smras te/ dge slong dag gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dis kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge
slong dag gis bzhag pa dge slong mas byin lanabyos labaza' bar gnang ngo// gang yang dge slongamasa bzhi g pa de ni dge slong gis byin len byos shig/ 'di la thatshomamakhyadang ra dge
slongams na dge slong la byin len bya'o// dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma la byin len bya'o/ gle nga gzhinamahran du yod pan ste/ dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i
dge 'dun gyi dbus su thunamongam yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dris pa dang/ de ngotshan so gdong smod de 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan
'dus kyis bka' su la/ dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dri bar mi bya/ dge slongam khrid kyis dris shig/ dge slong
dag gis dge slong ma la dge slong ma de la thunamong ma yin pa'i kharatshad kyi tshos drisan bdage ba dang bcas par 'gyur/ dge slong dag gis thunamong ga bar chad kyi chos
dri bar brtsamasazhu/ 'on kyang ngo tshemasam smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa// dge slong ma drung du zhog 'dris gu/ des nadag slob ma la smyos shig dge slob
ma des kyang dge slongam 'a smyos shig /gleng gzhinamanyan du yod pan ste/ tshod ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dge slong ma zhig bsnyen par rdzogs te/ 'diltar khyod shes rab
mtshog gi bstan pa la bstanabar rdzogasanas/ tshiltar khom pa phun sum tshogs pa redwapar dka' ba 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig ces bsgo ba de'i bar du khrag khragasanas/ de la tshodang ldan pa
shA ri'i bus sringamo langs tasong zhig ces smras ba dang/ de khrag zags tengo tsha nas yidi laganong bsam langs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bus de shosanas song ngo// de la dge slong
ma dag gis bu mo dkyil 'khor nyid du khyod kyis slob dpon lam dad par bya sa/ los zhes bsgon khyod ci'i phyir mi ldang zhes smras pa dang/ des bu numo dag 'di'i yon tanachen po'o//
bdag la 'di ltabu bsam na khyed kyang 'di skad smyo 'am/ bdagacog pur 'dug par khrag zagasan/ ziltar ldang zhes smras pa dang/ de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de ltar gyur pa
dedag gis dge slong dag la byas nas/ dgong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ltabasan dag slom bsan par rdzogs
par byed pa tsog pu ma 'dug par phagu ma/ rtswa 'am/ stanAnang tshangs can gyi steng dugazhag par bya ste/ bud med ltos ba'i phyir ro// sdeman dag slo
ma ladung mi rung ste mi bcang bskod chings dang / nuchings dang yanu rtenagyis// bar chad de dag bcang mi bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod
pa 'dzita'i tsha'amagonamed bras sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs te/ de nas 'go'u mi skye dgu'i bdagamo chen mo/ 'khor lnga brgyadang ljongs rgyu shi dob las/ nyi nub kA'adze
ta'i tshal du phyin nas/ samanyan du yod par 'dong dun dus las yo'an 'di kidadu 'di ji lta bu de lta bu nub mo gnas te/ nang gnamanosanos 'dong ngo ma bsams to/ des 'a
tal bas de'i sa gos rnams rdul gyis gos par gyur to// den par namanangasanas phyir yang 'ong dgos kyis/ cig car ston pa la phyag byas ta'adong ngosnyam bsamasanas/ deta
bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te spyan sngar 'khodapa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas kyis de'i chos
gos rdul gyi gos par gzigs nas/ 'go'u tan khyod kyi chos gos la rdul sus bsgos zhes smras pa dang/ des ji ltar gyuradra zhib tugasol te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis/
tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sul la/ kun dga' bodage slong dag groso dge slong ma la dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma byin nam/ mastsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka'asu la pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bsan gnang bzhi dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhagam dge slong ma labyin cig/ de la the tshom ma byed cig khacom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis dge
slongagi mol stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig ces bka' sulapa dang/ dge slong gzhan gyis ma la stan shin tu bzang bo blangs te/ de'i lhag ma dge slong dag gis dge slongam de dag
Sh+Tha lasbyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal// bzang po las ma phyin par gos rnying ba'am/ snam bu ma/ ngas lta bu las byin cig/ gleng g zhin
mnyan du yod ran ste/ tshe dang ldan b 'od srungs chen po snga dro sham thabs dang po chos gas gyon lhung bzed thogs te/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/ dge slong ma
sa sbom dga' mo yang gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ ston gyi dus su gyur pas chu bo rnams chus gang bsan/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po tham pa la rgyal ba dang sbom dga' mos
mtho nas/ des bsams pa/ blun po 'dis dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o snyam nas/ de 'gros mgyogs shing myur du song sto/ de zam brgal ba des bram pa de bskul ba dang/
tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungasachen po lhung nas/ de'i sbyar ma dngashom thabs dag chusagashar/ lhung bzed shor ba chu nuba'o// 'khar gsilan khyer// des smras pa/
srimo khyod kyisam sakyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skyes te/ 'di ltar 'os pa sprosgo po spyod pa'i bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i tshos 'dul ba la rab tu byung
bsnyen par rdzogs nas/ dge slong ma'i dngos por rjes su yi rang bas lanano// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dog gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das 'a gsol nas/ bam ldan 'das
kyis dgongs la// gdusu zhig dge slong ma dang dge slong lhan cig tu zam pa gcig la rga lan nyis pa'i dmigs yin te/ de lta bsan dge slongoms de'i bal zhib ga slob dang lhan cig tu
zam kha gcig lam rgal cig/ rga lan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dge slong dang lhan cig tu tham pa gcig la ma rgal cig ces bka' stsal pa
dang zam pa brtan pa zheng chen po gzhan la yang de dgam rgal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thamapa gangabartan zhing zhing che ba 'an di dag/
'bargal bar bya ste de la the tshom du ma byed cig/ glingagazhinamanyanadu yod panas/ de nadge slongam sbom dga' m sngadro mthalA dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs
tshe tu/ mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ rims bzhin du btsun mo 'phrang ldan ma'i drud dusong pa dang/ des bde bar 'ongaseb 'tshig snyan par smrasunas stan bting ngo//
dragatam zur zhing skad cig 'dug nas/ 'phreng ldan khyod kyi skadapa sra zhingapra'o zhes smras pa dang/ dos 'phags ma khyod kyis 'di dris ci dgos/ bdagoni cis kyang rnam pa gang
gis lha'i sems mnyes par byed de zhes smras pa dung/ das 'phreng ldan m da bzhin mod kyi/ 'on kyang bratshom dgrolapa tsam du dris smos shig ces byas pa dang/ sa 'phags ma bdag gis
skadachings bcangs so zhes smras pa dang/ des labs te/ de'i phyir khyod la skye bo mang po dag gis yid magu ba dang dga' bar byed de zhes smras pa dang/ de cangam zir par 'dug go/
spomo dga' modabyaram khang du song nas sked chings bcangs sa/ dus phyi gan sbom dga' mo chubo a dzi'i ba ta'i drung na dge slong ma dag dngo khrus byed pan/ de dag gisa mthong nas/
sA0 'phags ma bdag cag gi sked pa ni slom zhing sbom la/ khyod kyi phra zhing phra ba 'di ci zhileg gi phyir zhes dris pa dang/ des nu mo dag bdag gis ni sked chings bcings so// de bsan bdag gi
skad pa 'di 'dra'i zhes smras so// de dag gis 'phags ma khyod skyedachings bcad du rung ngam zhes dris pa dang/ desanu mo dag rung yang bla ma rung sla ste// bdag gisan bcings so
zhes smras pa dang/ de slom dag 'phru zhing snod// nadu zer bani dge slong mas medachis 'tshong ba lta ga la srid/ dolcoragyur pa de dag gis/ dge slong rnams la smras pa dang/
dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bas na dge slong ma saM skudachisam 'chang zhig/ dge slong mas skyedachis
bcasun 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhinamanyan du yod pan ste/ de nas dge slong ma sgrom dga' mos snga dro sham thabs dang chos khagos lhung bzed
thogs te/ snga ma bzhin du skad cig 'dug pa'i bar du gtam byas pa dang/ 'phreng ldan m khyod kyin m ci'i phyiram khro zhing 'grong zhes dris pa dang/ 'bagasam 'di dris te khyod la ci dgos//
bdag ni rnam bcad ng cis kyang lha'i sems mnyes par byed de zhes smras ba dang/ das 'phreng ldan m de bzhin modakyi the tshom dgrol ba'i phyir dris ba smos shig ces smras pa dang/ des
'phags ma bdag ninu na 'chang bozhes smras so// dus legs so// de lta bsan lha mo khyod ni bud me du rin po che 'ozhes smras pa dang/ de cung ma khrir bar/
'dug go/ sprom dag bamo dbyang mo khang du song/ des dbyar mo khang du song nas niu na bcangs pa nas/ snga ma dung 'dra ba'i bar du ste/ de lta bas na dge slong dag mtshams la dge slong bas nu
ma 'chang zhig/ dge slongamasazhu ston bsungasan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// glangagazhinamanyan duyodapan// de nas dge slongam sbom dga' mos sngo
ngo sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te/ sngam dang 'dra bas skud cig gtam zer zhing 'dug pa'i bar du/ 'breldan m la ci'i phyir khyod kyi num 'phyar zhes dris pa
dang des 'phags ma 'di dris te khyod la ci dgos/ bdag ni rnam pa ci danyis lha'i sems mnyes par byed do zhes smras pa dang/ 'phreng ldan m de bshin modakyi the tshom dgrol ba'i
phyiro dris pa smyos shig ces smras pa dang/ des 'phags ma bdugani ma'i bar chada'achang ngo zhes smras pa dang/ des legs so zhes byas nas/ khyod la gang gi btsunam dag dga' zhing yid
zla ]mgu'o zhes smos pa dang/ decang mi zer bar 'dug go/ sgom dgo'amo dbyar mo khang du song ngo// des dbyar mo khang du song nasonu ma'ibar chad bcas panas/ sdom dang 'dra ba'i
bar du ste/ de lta bas na dge slongams numa'i bar chadam 'chang zhig/ dge slong mas numa'i bar chad bcasan 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod
pan ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skadachings ma 'chang zhig ces gsungs pa dang/ sbom dga' maras ci dang ci yang rung/ desaMskud pa bcings pa dang/ de nas dus phyi zhig na sbom
ga'amo chu bo a dzir ba der dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu khrus byed bdedug gis domatho nas/ 'phagasam dge slong ma'i skadwapa skad chings kyis bcing du/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis mi gnangan/ khyod

kyi yod pa bro ba bra ba zhes dris pa dang/ des zhu mo bdag nisaci dang ci yang rung bas dkris so zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis khyod ngas ci dang ci yang tshang bas dkrir rung ngam zhes dris pa dang/ des
kumo dag rung ya nga ba mi rung yang bla ste/ bdag gis nubacings so zhes zer ba dang/ dge slong ma dag 'phya smod ngan du zer ba ni/ dge slong masaras ci dang cis kyang skad pa dkri ba ga la rigs/
da ltar gyurapa de dag gis snga ma dang 'dra ba'i bar du sku/ dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rung med pa ma dkri zhig/ dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rung skadang dkrisan 'das pa dang bcas
par 'gyur ro/// sdoman btsog pa'i gnas sumi dor te// mal dang mi gtsang mi btub ngo// bdag gi bu la reg par bya// gzhan gyi bu la reg mi
sasargyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' r pan bzhugs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od sus
chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs to/ mnyan du yod par bsod sogs kyi phyir zhugs so// dge slongom sbom dga' mo yabasod sems kyi phyi zhugs pa dang/
tsho dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po bshang ba sa'i du khung dang 'bazhig mar song ba dang/ sbom dga' mos mtho ste/ des bsams ba/ thunabo 'di la ma dga' bar 'gyur bzhig bya'o snyam
nas myur zhing rings par seng ste/ bshang ba sa'i du khung nang du bgu 'phangs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'i chos gos dang bsodisoms kyi snod thams cad ma rung par byas nas//
des smras paM/ sring mo khyod kyis ni ma nyes pa nas snga ma bzhin te/ da ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis gros nas/ bcom ldan 'das lagasolakha'i bar du sku/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
bya ba[“]de lta bas na dge slong dag dgislong mas dge slong pha 'amagatsang bsamarong ba'am byed cig/ dge slob lami gtsang bsam rung bar byed n 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur/
gleng gazhinamanyanadu yodakhan ste/ mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig phyugatsanganoramang ba longs spyod chem sa 'dug ste/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung yaM zhig blangs te/
de dang lhan cig/ dga' yongs su spyod do// de dus phyi zhig na khro khyer nas yul gzhan du song ba dang/ des chung ma lasmras ba/ bzagong tho khyer te yul gzhan du 'gro yis/ khyod
ma g.yang zhing bag yod par khyim sos shig/ dos jo'i legs te/ de bzhin du bgyi yis dus dus su gtamasprings shig ces smras so// de bong khyer tatshulo'i zhan du song ba dang/
de'i chung ma de gos dang zas bzang ba'i phyir kronamongs pas gzir bar gyur ta/ des skyes ragazhan zhig dang lhan cig tuyas su spyad pas sems can dang ldan bar gyur nas bsams pa/
malan gnas pa gsad do// bdag gi khyo 'ongs pa dang ma rung bar byed do sum nas/ desama' na gnas pa bsad nas lhung bar byas te/ 'di ji ltar doragang du dor mi
shes te/ rab tu sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang/ sbom dga' mo khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ des mtshan bo bsam bsod snyoms byin cig ces smras pa dang/ des bdag
mi dag 'byas gzir bas bsod smoms sbyin dusu yungamed kyis/ bzhudaces smras pa dang/ des smras pa// mtshan bzangs mami shi 'am/ cogamed dam/ das 'phags ma su
yang ma shi med kyi bdag las bu zhig byung ste/ ji ltar dor gang du dor ba bdag gis ma shes so zhes smras pa dang/ des smras ba/ mtshan bzas ma de bdag gis don bdag la
bsod snyoms sbyin nam/ 'phags ma gsol lo// phyibazhin 'brang ba'i dge slong ma la yang sbyin nam/ gsol lo// dge skos la yang sbyin nam[）]
la gsol lo// legasakyis der// dus de lhubazedachen por bzhugaste/ khang ba stong par khyer nas der dol la zhugs pa dang/ khyim stong pa der sngar skyes ba zhi gzhugs pa des
mthong nas/ des mgo reg dge sbyongam ci byed ces dris pa dang/ des khyod cag lha bun la gyi khu dang su'i bu rtol med pas/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med 'di 'dra ba'i las byas te dor
rozhes smras pa dang/ des de la brgyudabakag ste songang// de dge slong ma zhig mthong nas/ dgeslongam mi sunab khyedakyi sbom dga' mos 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so zhes smras
pa dang/ de'an med nas cang mi zerab r 'dug go/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong ma dag gis/ dge slongal dag la smras te/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis dgos pa 'dit+tar dgeslong mas lhabazed chen bo 'tshan nyes pa'i dmigs yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzedachepo ga bcadra kharamakhyen
nas dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dag sbyong mam yin pa'i sgrom dag 'chos/ dge slongamam yin pa byas te/ da lta bsanadage slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i las mi
ma ]bya ste lhung bzed chen po yang ma 'chang zhig/ dge slong mas de 'dra ba'i las byed dam/ lhungabazed chen po'an 'dus pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka'
sol/ dge slong mas lhung bzed chen pom 'chang zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol ba// gang dge slong gi lhung bzed chung ngu ni dgaM slong ma'ichen pa'o//
gleng gazhi ni mnyan du yod pano// nam dge slong ma gu tas gcinagyi thigs pa gcig ni khar blugs/ gcig namadel gyi sgor bcug pa dang/ sems can gyi las kyi rnam pa bsam
gyis mi khyab pas gzhon nu 'od srungs byung ste/ de la gub tas ma reg pa dang/ de nas de'i gnyen bshes dag gis ma gub tasani khye'u ci'i phyir zhes dris pa dang/ decang mi zer
nas dge slong ma dag gis/ tshering ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcas te/ dge slong mas skyes ba 'amareg cig 'dis de la ma reg sta/ de lta bas na du'o
zhes smras pa dang/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'dasan klugasarjecan na/ ci'i phyir na rang gi bu la reg pa 'gog par 'gyur/ byis pa khye'u 'di la de snyem regan 'di dus byed par nges so
zhes smos pa dang/ de dag gis legs kyis/ de pa son bcom ldan 'dasamakhyen par bya'o zhes smras so// de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dgagis/ dge slong la smras pa dang/ dge slong
tsaka@#// dgis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de lta bsan gnang gis reg par bya'o// bstod par bya'o//
gso bar bya'o// khaskyed par bya'o// glogazhi ni mnyan du yod pan sta/ bcom ldan 'dasaMkyisabasnyod par bya'o// gsobar bya'o// bskyod par bya'o zhes
gsungs pa dang/ budamadani sridapa can te/ dge slong ma dag gis panga gnas apang ba la khyer te/ de pang pa nas pang pang spesapas rid cing nyam chung ste/ rkunos lus smra zhingos rtas par gyur
pa dang/ de'i gnyen bshes dgagis mthong nas/ de dgagis ci'i phyir khye'u 'dirid cing nyam chung la zla ste lusum rtas par gyur ces dris pa dang/ des de dag la zhib tusmras na/ gnyon
dadagabyams pas 'ju ba la zhugs pa dang/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gso thosanas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge
slong dag dge slong mas gzhan gyi bu la ma reg cig/ gzhan gyi bu la regan 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// phrumo'i sgo drug pa rdzogs so/// 'dul
bramo'i das gi/ ]bam bo zhi gcig pa/// bsdus pa'i sdomani/ the tshom dang yang dgon pa la// sang khIdang gnyis kyi phyir//
dge slong chang 'tshong dag 'ga'am// dge slong ma dang phyi rol phyi// sdomani tshom lhan cig nyal ba yang// gzhan du gcugapu ma gnas shig/ khye'u
dang bu mo de bzhin te// nya gnas dang yung rang du 'o sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na 'dze ta'itshal mgon med zlasasbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
so bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skyes pa dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tul tacig ces bka' stsal pa dang dge slong mgu ta'i bu 'od srungs gzhon na phyi rol tu bsnyal
ba dang degacig bung nas de'i gnyen pa shes dag gis thos te/ de dag gis gub to la khye'u 'od srungs gzhon nu ci'i phyir du zhes dris pa dang/ decungami bor bar 'dug nas/ dge slong
ma dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyisani dge slong ma skyes pa dang lhan cig khyim gcig ginang du nyal dus rung bar bslab pa'i gzhibacas pas gubo ta 'di dang lhan cig
khyim gcig gnang du nya la dum rung ngo/ de dag gis 'phugasam/ bcom ldan 'dasan thugs rje can te/ daso gzhon nu 'od srungs gubatadang lhan cig tu khang bo gcig tu nyalam
dge slong la smras dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal/ de lta bas naganang gis/ dge slong
ma gub tu bu dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las sdom pa gsol cig/ gsol ba yang 'diltar bya'o// stan bting la 'gatsAbardungs te/ dge slong
ma'i dge 'dunam thams cad 'dusashing 'khod pa dang/ dge slong ma grub kyis ji ltar rgan rimasanas phyag byas te/ rganamo'i drung du pha khu 'am/ rtswa ma/ stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du
'dug ste thal mo sbyar la 'di skad rjod cig ga son cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams bdagagub tu khas bu khye'u zhig btsas taM/ bdag bu dang lhan cig khang
bgacig tu nyal bo'i sdom pa 'thagasama'i dge 'dunam rnams la gsolan/ 'phagasama'i dge 'dun gyis gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tunyal ba'i sdem pa bde ba can du
pa'i phyir stsolag 'dibazhin 'anaganyis 'anagasum du bya'o// de'i 'og dag som gcig gis grub te thos pa'i nye 'khor nas spyas ta/ mthong ba'i gnas su zhig la
'di skad smos shige/ gson cig 'phags ma'i dga' dunam rnams gub ta 'di las khya'u zhig btsas te/ de yang bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i sdom pa 'phagasama'i dge 'dun
ma 0ma rnams las sdom pa gsolan/ de ste 'phagasama'i dge 'dunam rnams kyis dus la bab cing bzodanaganong zhig/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun pa rnams kyis gupa ta bu dang lhan cig tu khang pa
gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa stsal te/ 'din gsol ba'o/ las na 'di bzhin bya'o// gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams/ gub tu 'di las khyobu zhig btsas te/ 'di bu
dang lhan cig khang pa nga cig tunyal ba'i sdom pa 'phags ma'i dge 'dunam rnams la gsol te/ de'i slad du 'phagasama'i dge 'dunama rnams kyis gub ta 'dobu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig
tu nyal ba'i sdom pa gsolan/ 'phags ma rnams las gupa tabu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa su la bar bzod pa de rnams nicangam gsung zhig ma bgrod pa rnams ni
gsungs/ 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tutal ba'i sdom pa la te/ dge 'dun gyis bgrod cing gnang bsan cang mi gsung ste/
de de bzhin du 'dzin to// dge slongam gang la 'phagasama'i dge 'dunam rnams kyis bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur ba deni/ bu dang lhan
cig tu khang pa gcig na ta la bar dung ste/ 'di the tshom ma byed cig/ gub sa dge slong ma gzhan zhig kyang de nyid dubasnyal ba dngo/ de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la
@#// slas pa dge slong rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong mgang gi bu de nyid du lhan cig tu khang pa
gcig tu1'bar rung ste gcig bu'o// der dge slo ma gzhanim gnas shig gnas ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gub tasanama gzhon nu 'od srungs
chen por gyur pa de'i tshayang de dang lhan cig tu'angapa gcig tunyal bar byed do// de ltar gyur pa dge slongam dgags/ dge slong dag la smras pa dang/ dge slong dag gis/ bcom
ldan 'das la gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slongams nam bu chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/ de dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu las gar 'cham mkhan a las nyal bar mi bya ji ra
bslab pa bcas pa bzhin slobs shig ces bka' stsal to/// gangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bo'i khab kyi 'od Mma'itshel bya ka lan ta ka la gnas pa na bzhugs
so de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas ta zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin zhig gnas te/ de yul mnyam dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po btsunamo dang gzhon nu/
dang blon po dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul gyi mi rnams la srung dngo/ bskyang ba dang/ skyob par byed do// de'i mthus yulamanyam dga'i rgyal bo mkhas pa can gzugs can/
sangapo btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/ grong khyer dang/ yulagyi mi rnams la longs spyod 'phel bar gyur cing/ de dag la rtag tu shing gi ma tog dang 'bras bur ldan/ char
pan dus dus su 'bab/ sani 'bru dang ldan par gyur te/ thos bslang ba rnams med pa dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul dang/ pho brang 'khor de dang/ de dgag dang//
yul si son gnas pa'i dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dong/ bkren pa dang/ 'bongs pa thams cad yulamanyam dgar lhags te/ de dag la yang gnod sbyin sa tas srung ba dang/ bskyang
ba dang skyob par byed do// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma byas te/ da de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod de// u'agat+ta ngan yang pany+tsa la zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin zhig
gnas te/ des kyang yul tara'i rgyal bo dang/ btsunamo dang/ gzhonan dang/ blon po dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul gyi mi rnams la srung pa dang/ skyob ba dang/ skyob par byed
da de'i mthus yul gad+ha ra'i rgyal bo dang// btsun mo dang/ gzhonon dang/ blon podang/ grong khyer dang/ yul gyi mi rnams la sa spyod 'khril bar gyur cing/ do dag
la ltag tushing gi ma tog dang 'bras bur ldan chapa ni dus dus su bab/ sani 'bru dang ldan par gyur te/ zasabaslang b rnams ni med bas na/ der yang grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul
dang pho brang 'khor de dang/ de dag gi dang/ yul so so na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ bkrenapa dang/ phongs pa thams cad yul ga d+ha
ra lhags to/ de dag la gnod sbyin pa cu las srung ba dang/ bskyang b dang/ skyob par byed do// des kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/ de yang de dang lhan cig rtse
ts+tso dga' yongs su spyod de/ da nas dus phyi zhige na kIrd sbyin sa tadangoganod sbyin pastsol gnyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'dus par 'odong nas/ de gnyis phan tshunamadza' bar gyur te/
gnod sbyin s tas di la dus dus su yul mnyam dragakhrim tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa skyasasu bskur ro// gnod sbyin pany+tsa 'as kyang gnod sbyin s ta la yulag rwa'im tog dang
'bras bu skyes su bsu'o// de gnyis 'ad bten phan tshun du rab tu mdza' bar gyur nas/ de gnyis phyir yang gnod sbyin 'dus par 'dong ste/ gnod sbyin sa tas grogs
pa 'o bu gnyis dus kyis 'das kyang/ bu dkya cha nga dang/ nga tshe dang/ sur tsharnapa mdzA pa u pad+ha wa na pa na bas ci yod sa spus pa dang/ gnod sbyin pany+tsalas
smras pa/ grogs po legasas// bdag kyang 'di snyam sems/ delcagasanar skyes pa 'dus gnyanango bya kaste nga la bu pho zhig btsas la/ khyed la bu mo zhig yod pa dang/
khyed kyis bdag gi bu 'byin cig/ 'on te khyod la bu pho zhig ste/ bdag la bu mo zhig na/ bdag gi yod [… ]/ da nga [”]la 'khyi de bzhin bya'o/
do gnyis phan tshun dum btsas nga ra gnyan byas te dong ngo// nga nas dus phyi zhig na ba gnad sbyin sa rtag pa sems can dapa da nga ra gyur// darlung dbaku nas pad ma zhig bcas te/
dbyibs legasangashing ba lta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig ste/ da btsas pa da/ gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur to/[“ ]/de bdag gi rigs dang 'dra ba dang/ rgyud gcig pa
rnams kyis btsas nga 'i btsas ston n pobyas te ming 'dogs pa bzhugs so/ bu mo 'di ming nir gdugs zhes gros byas na gnyen bshes dag gshis 'di btsas pa'i tshe/
gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur gyis/ de bsan bu mo 'di'i ming dga' pyadamar gdags so zhes smras te/ de'i ming dga' byed mar btags so// yul gcu ra'i gnod
sbyin pastsolas 'di ltar rgyal po'i khab tuganod sbyin sa ta las bum zhigeg btsas so zhes thos nas/ des bsams pa// bdag gi grogs po la bu mo zhig btsas te/ bu de bdag gi man
mar 'gyur yang dag gis/ rgyana rnams bskur ba'i ri yis so snyam nas/ des gnodasbyin s yul grogs de mdza' ba/ bdag gis khyodakyi bu mo btsas pa rathos nas 'in tu dga' ste/
bdag gis grogs po'i bu mo lags dang rgyun rnams 'dra ba 'di blangaba'i rigasas zhes yi ge sbrang ngo// des yi ge bklags te/ slar yang grogs po bdag/
cag gnyen yin gyis/ de ste khyod la bu po zhig btsusan 'din de nyid kyi no zhes song ngo// gnod sbyin pakyu las debaklags nas/ bunam red ces rtag tu sems shing chung ma dang
ts+tso lhan cig turtse dga' stsa yongs su spyod do// de la rtse dal/ sa pa[%]tsas tade yang bdaMg gi rigs dang mthun pa rgyud gcig pa dag gis btsas pa'ibacas
sten cher byas te/ ming 'dogs pa la zhug pa sa// lta bye 'u 'di'i mipe ba dang sku des/bgos pa las/ gnangashes dag gis khye'u 'di gnod sbyin pany+tsa la'i bu ste/ de bas
ne bu 'di'i mingapAny+tsikur gdwags so zhes smras nas/ pas su sogs kyi gnod sbyin s sa/ 'di ltar yul d+ha ra'iganod sbyin pany+tsi la'i
bu pho zhub btsas pa thos te/ des bdag gi grigs pha las bu pa zhig patsas gdenamatha bar bdag gi dmagapar 'gyur snyam bsams nas/ des de la gos dang rgyun rnams
bskur te/ grogs po bdag gis khyod kyi bu pho zhig btsas so zhes thos nas kin dga' sta/ bdag gis grogs po'i bu la gso dang rgyan zhig bskur gyis/ dablangaba'i rigs so zhes
wa/ spying ngo// des yi ge bklags te/ slar gyis lan babam blang ba'i ston mo sta gon gyis shig ces spring ba dang/ gnod sbyin sa tas yi ge bklags te/ legs kyis bu mo dga' byed mani/
bdag gis sngar bzhin sAm bsams nas/ des de skyod cing chungam dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do// de la rtso dga' yongs su spyad pas/ chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/
nam gyi tshe sems can dang ldan par gyur pa de'i ny+dzinam nyidadu/ ri las khrung khrung gis skad phyung ngo// da zla ba dgu 'das pa dngakhye'u zhig btsas te/ gzugs legs shing bltan sdug pa
bzung ba zhig ste/ btsas ma thug tuyang las khrung khrung gi skad phyung ngo/ debadago gi rigs dang mthun rgyud gcig pa thams cad kyis btsas pa'i btsas ston cherabyas te/ ming
'dogasapa la zhugs so// khye'u 'di'iming ni gdags zhes bgros na/ gnyen bshes dag gis 'di mngal du zhugs na yang ri las khrung khrung gis skad phyung/ btsas pa na
yang khrung khrung gos skad phyung la/ pha yang sa ta zhes 'byung ste/ dbasan khyabu 'di'i ming yangs ta kA rir gdagasiso zhes smras nas/ de'i mingos taki rir botags so// khya'u
sa taki ridi gsosabaspyad di cher gyur ba dang/ ji tsam dus phyi zhigan gnod sbyin sa chung ma dang bcas par dus las 'das nas/ sa dki ri khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang/ gnod sbyin
@#/// gyi bu mo dga' byed mas sa ta ki ra u0f7ala/ mi po rgyal po 'khab na gnas pa'i spyi bo mang po dag gi yu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs te/ phrogs nas zabar 'dod de
zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ sringamo yu bu cag gi las yul mnyam dga'irgya' re la khas pa can gzugs can snying po dang btsun mo dang/ gzhon nu dang/ blon po dang/
srongadang/ grong khyer ba dang/ lam rnams lo rtag tu srung pa dang/ skyengang da/ smrags datsA pa ti sna dus/ yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya bar rigs te/ 'di ni yu
bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyis/ 'di la gzhan dag cig gis kyal ka byed na yang/ de nas pu bya ga pa dgag pa'i rig san/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis dA bzhin byas/ mi rigs par
N+NaM khyod kyis goms bskyed pa de slar zlog cigacan// dag pa'in 'ang bde ka gyis spro kun bcos su btab ste/ yang sa dki ri lami bo rgyal po 'khab na gnas
pa'i skya ba mang po dag du btsas shing btsas pa ka praka 'a/ phrogs nas nga
a nAtsha'apo zhes sman pa dang/ sat+taki ris de'i dus kyis rtenang lan bcos sum btub par
tshur gzhigs la bgam phreng zhig ces yi ge spyi'i dang/ gnod sbyin bany+tsi la des gnod sbyin gzhon nam dga' byed med pa' chen po dang sbyar tobagamar blangs nas yulagad+harar khrid do//
gonod sminagazhen na pAny+tsi ka de dang lhan cig turtsa dga' yongs su spyod de// yi nam mnga' zhing spyi pa'i ng dang dga' zhing yid bde bo mang por gyur ba de'i tshe/ gos jo'i rgyal po'i
khabana gnas ba'i sa bamang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phyogs shing/ brag sa de bzu'angar natshal lo zhes smras pa dang/ des smras pa/ bangamo den khyod kyi gnyen
gyi gnas yin te/ dar gzhan dag cig kyalaka byed n yang/ de bdag cag gis dgagar 'i rigasan/ khyodakyis ci'i phyir de ltar byaso/ khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed
pa de slar zlog cig ces bsgron/ da sngon gyi log pa'i smon lam gyis bag chags bsgos pas sdod cig cas smras te// cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de gnod sbyin gzhon nu brtsika
dang lhan cig turtse dga' yongs su sbyadapepas bu pho zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas ta/ rigs dang mthunanga'i ming btags so// de bzhin lan gnyis
lan gsum nas/ bu lnga brgya'i bar du btsas te/ de dag thams cad kyi tha chungs kyi ming dga' byed du btags so// de nam du las mthu redapar gyur na/ den pany+tsi kas
bzlog kyang ma bzlogs nas de mi dga' bar gyur tami smra bar 'dug go/ de nas gnod sbyin mo dga' byed ma gar dga' par rang nyamadu 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang gnas
par gyur to// des rgyal po'i khaban skye bomang po dag gi bu btsas shing bcas pa dag phrogasashing/ phrogasanas bza' bar brtsams pa dang/ rgyalaposribaban gnasaM pa'i skya bamang
[？]po dag gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po// lha bdagacug de rgyu bcas shing gtsas lag tig gis phyogs na su ldeg ka ka la gnod nga bgyid rma ba'i rigs// gso' ra dang/
rgyal po gnas thams cad la dbang ba rnams la/ kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye pa dang/ gi pu pa ca/ di pa tsas pa dag sus phral/sas la dwacas pa sgra/ dka ga nga gis
nan tan du nga ga yod pa nga rmad pa la shugasapa dang ji tsaman yang de dag gis yang phrogs par gnang pa kanod pa me a ra/ sung cung mang/ ma ngang ldan ng gnang des
yul grazhin du phyung ste bzhag lnga dang/ blon [']ma las sa pa/ sa sa pa sa pa/ bdag ka ba dang bu dang/ song na pur pur/ / na su la kAn
du phyung stabazhigo ge zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal ngo sa lhasamakhan bkug ste gan/ de dag gis lha gnyid sbyin pas/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas tong ma sa / mchod pa dang
ma bkur stiramadzod cig ces gsol to// rgyal pos blon po rnams la// kya sengal rgyal re 'i khab kyi ge bar du dril bsgrags par byas shika/ rgyal po'i khaban skye bo mang bo thums cad/
dung yul so so na gnas pa thams cad kyis/ gnadasbyin gyi gnas su phagata mtsha da na sa shigaces bsgo ba dang/ de dag gis de bzhinadu dril bsgrags te/
kyi rgyal po'i khabadang/ grong khyer dang/ yul so sanas lhags pa'i sku de nyon cig/ lhas 'di skad bko/ stsal te/ bdag gi yul dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul so so nas lhags
pa'i skyabamang po gnas pa rnams kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du gtor ma byin la na tshod dag pa kung ste byos shig ces bsgo ba dang/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po
dgagos grong khyer de dag rdo pa dang/ gyo mi dang dosardo dgaphyags te/ rten dan gyi chas gag pa ba nas/ drishir po'i pog por dgaso sar spyas/ rgyal mtshan dang lha'i 'phan
bsgreng/ dar gyi lda ldi mang ngasan spyas te/ me tog sna tshogs kyisagaton gnas / lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal dang/ 'a ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so// de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams
cad dugator ma byin zhingamachod pa dang bkur sti byas te/ 'on kyang dga' khyedam zhi bar ma gyur to// de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas ba'i lha dag gis/ rgyal po'i khaban gnas pa'i skye
dbo mngapo dag/ nga khyed la gnod sbyin me dga' byed pas khyed kyi bu rnams a sa/ khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung dudong ba dang/ bcos ldan 'das
kyis de 'dul bar mdzad de zhes bstan to// da dpag gis skye 'di [”]ningaga' byed pa ma yin gyis/ de re raya/ mA me/ des bdag cag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams phyogs pa zhes smras pa/
dang/ de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba blog ste/ gamed pasbyir la par pas da gyur te/ ka kha gnas pa'i skya pa ma log/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ye tsA dang sten
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs 'dus sgo sa pa na/ kunom ldan 'das gdod nas pa de' po 'i baban bo/ nas pan+ti skya ba mang po la yun ring po nas ma khon nga
T+Tha dang bon/ dgraram gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur/ snying mi ring nga la ni spyi rim par gyur/ rkyen du tshudang a/ gsan/ bcom ldaya'adas zung/ sa cad po bsdu ba gi phyir gtong
sbyin m 'phrol mdzadul b.ri pa nang len pa 5 [, ''']ga ti ya pa phye mar pa skye ba dang// da naN la pakhab
nob gnas pa'i skye bo mang de dag gis/ patse malhan da tsa ra sma pas/ tsaklasas 3das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bco ldan 'das kyi drung
nas song ngo// de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham grangs dang chos gos mnabs lhung babud bsnyabs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tubasod sems kyi phyiragashegasaso// rgyal po'i bang
nabasod snyoms las slar bskor nas byas kyikhyab byas te/ bsod snyoms phyis len pa spangs te gshags nas// gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma'i gnas gang na ba der gshegs so// de'itshe na
gnod sbyin m 'phrog mas bu dga' khyed khyim du bzhag ste spyod yul du song ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisade lhung bzed kyis bkab ste bzhag nas/ ji ltar bubu be dag gis ni de mi mang
gi/ des dedag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// dam thag tu gnod sbyin mi 'phrog ma spyod yulanas 'ongasapa dang/ bu dga' byed mi sna nas/ de
sdangs pa phan tshunakhyim kho ra khor yug tubaltasan 'onakyang mi snan gnas / bu thams cad la bu dag bu dga' byed mi snang nag ro/ de dag gisam bdag cag gis kyang ma mthong ngo zhes smras pa/
dang des srang brdungs nasamadego nyams shing mi dga' ste/ mas/mchi mas gang 'gros myur bar brgyugs te/ rgyal po'i khabakyi grong dang/ tshong dus dang/ sra dang/ lam gyi
bzhi mdodang/ 'an gyi sum mdo dang/ kun dga' rab dong/ skyed mos tshal dang/ saMtshodang [0f7c]lteng ka dang/ rdzing dang/ lha khang dang/ mdun khang dang/ gzhan yang khyimabadog/
pa'i gnas dbatung tsal ded pas red de// des klu yi gos med dor byed nas du zhing smyung/ kyi dud bu/ kyi dudapa kyi hud dga' byed/ cas yang dang
yang sgra 'byin cing/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ pa 'das dang pho brang dang/ ngo brang 'khom+b+ha rams su bltas te/ 'on kyang m red do// de nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por song/
lho phyogs dang/ nub phyog dung/ byang pa ga song ngo// shar phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byung phyogs de dag na yang mi snang ngo// de nas
skrag cing smanamor gyur/ 'gros kyang 'khyeng ya/ maralhung/ sa la bgro'o// pus mos 'gro/ tsog pur 'dug pa de lta bu'i thabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi ri nag
blong pa dun rga 'a/ ka dgu/ rgyun da dpad+hi dang/ ma dris pa'i mtsha nanged dang/ ri dri sa ra yang btsal to/ de nas de skad cher du king/ ltar phyogs kyi
lus 'phags gling dang/ nub phyogasaM ba blazung spyodaM dang/ byang gi sgrum snyan rnams kun btsal yang m red di// da nas yang sos dang/ thig nag po dang/ 'dus gtubo dang/
'o dod 'bod pa dang/ 'a dedachor 'bod pa dang bsreg pa dang/ rab tu bsreg pa dang/ mnar med pa dang/ chu bur dang/ shin tuchu bur dang/ a haha zhes zer ba dang/ ha/
tha ba dang du du ba dang/ ut+pal lta bu dang/ pad+machen po lta bu la sogs pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu btsal na yang m red de/ [”]de nas ri rab kyi bang rim dang por 'dzegs
nas gnyis pa dang gsum pa ra 'jogs/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po nga' sa der dris/ par/ sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su btsal to/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna
tshogs zhes bya ba dang/ rtsub por 'gyur ba dang/ 'dres pa dang/ dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du yang bacal to/ pa ri ya drago byin d+ha ra'i drung du yang song ngo// de nas
lha'i 'dunas chos bzangasazhis bya ba grong khyer bzang po'i nang du zhugs te/ de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal du 'gro bar brtsams pa dang/ der gnod sbyin lag
nadorjel sogs pa// gnodasbyin du ma dang/ lha stong gis bzung ba dang/ demyur du mgyogs pa grong khyer bzang po'i nang nas byung ste/ phyogasagazhan zhib/nguring zhig tu gnas
nas mdor na yi chadapar gyur to/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdagapo ngal bso po'i drung du song nas/ rdo 'ab 'a bdag gi lus brdabosanas/ kyi hud du/ kyi hud pa/ kyi hud
dga' byed ces sme zhing smra sgo/ sde dpon chen po sus phyogs mi dga' na/ bu slongan saMl du gsol zhes smras pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso pos smras pa/ cho zhi
myanathong mchim phyis shig/ khyod kyi gnas su zhi bar gnas shing su'o la soms shig ces pa dang/ des smas pa/ sde dpon dge sbyong go'u tan lags so// des//
des de bzhin songal/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song zhig/ khyod la bu dga' byed debcom ldan 'das kyis ston to zhes smras pa dang/ desrog skyor ba las slar redapa bzhin du
ris shing myur du rang gi gnas su song pa dang/ gnod sbyin m 'phrogams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan/ dpe byad bzang
pos sku spus/ nyi zer stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang gis brgyanapa rin po che'i'i 'gro ba bzhin kho ra khor yu gnas bsruba mthong ma thog tu dga' ba skyes so// bu dga' khyod
red de saMm nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas/ gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyago'u tam khyod kyis bdag gi bu dga' byed bstan du gsol/ bdag gi bu dga'
byadama mthong onas ring zhig lon no zhes smras pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo'abrogam la/ 'phrog ma khyod la bumang zhen/ ji nyid yod cesaMrmasapa dang/ des smras pa//
bcom ldan 'das su lnga brgyamachis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'brog mad ste/ khyed kyi bu lnga brgya las gcig cig med pa lta ci nyis zhes rnasapa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gi riga'abyed m mthon/ khrag dron gas te gdon mi za bar dusabgyidado zhes gsol pa dang/ 'phrogam khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las gcig ma mthong anayang 'di 'dra bar stag
bsngalan/ gang la bu gcig pu yod pa yang khyodakyis bsad de bos na/ de'i sdug bsngal ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ sa bcom ldan 'das de bas sdug bsngal ba rab tu che'o zhes
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su'ang/ 'brog ma khyod bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra bar shes bzhin dugazhanagyi bu rtse'i phyir waM/ des bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba'i bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshur shog nga la skyabs su song ste slab pa'i gzhi zung la/ rgyal po'i khaban gnas
skye bo mang po la ma 'jigs pa byin cig dang/ gal ta'adi nyid na 'dug bzhin du dga' byed mthong bar gdonami bro'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ des btsun pa 'di ltar debanachad/
bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi bzung sto/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la yang mi 'jigasang stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i bu dag 'byed bstananas/ des kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs susong nas bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste/ rgyal po'i khaban gnas pa'i skye bom pa lami
'jigs pa byin no// nam gyi 'phrogam bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste/ bslab pa'i gzhi bzung nas/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i bomapo rnams lami
ts+tshA 'jigs pa sbyin pa de'i tshe/ dge slong dag the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ btsun pa gnod sbyin 'brogams las ci bgyis/ las gang
na/ mdangs 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin mor skyes la/ 'dilas bu lnga brgya btsas zhes zhus pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gnod
sbyin mo 'phrog mas las byas shing bsags pas tshogs red pa dang/ rkyenasminapa na chu bo bzhin par gnas te gdonami bra bar 'gyur ro// 'brogams las byas shing bsags pa
ni gzhan gyis myong par ma 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnamapar smon/ chu'i khams lam yin/ me'i khams lam yin/
y+Yo rlung gi khams log yin gyi/ zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched 'anyid la dag pa dang mi dge pa'i las byas pa rnam par smin to// las rnams stor bar 'gyur la//
wa bskal pa dag na brgya lan kyang// dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni// lus can rnams la 'bras khur gyi// dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba ni/ rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid na grong khyer
gzhan zhig tu bgang rje bo zhig gnas pa des/ rigs dang mnyam pa las chungam zhi blangs te/ 9 pa lhan cig turtsa dga' yongs su spyod do// de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas/
dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ sangs rgyas mi 'byungabanArang sangs rgyus 'ag[–] du 'byung ste/ nyams shing dman pa la thugs brtse ba gnas pasamatharotshab
'jig rtenapa'i yon gnas gcig pu'o// ji tsaman rang sangs rgyas gzhan zhig yul rgya 'de/ 'a po rilab tshugashigs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i khabakyi grong khyer du dus ston to bar gyur
to/ dur sdun zan pa lnga brgya tsam zhig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba khyer to/ gos sna tshog sakyis klubs/ mi tog ku su ma dri zhim pos brgyan to/ gar byed/ glu len/
ngordung zhing skyid mos tshal gyi sar dongaba'i bar du ba glang dri mo zhig dar ba bum pa gang thogs tre/ lam din ra sel dang/ spun zanapa do dag gis de mthong nas/ grogs mo tshur shog/

gru blo ngozhes smras pa dang/ des kyang de dag ga ji ltadiltar byasnga ba de lta de lta byas bas/ yab zhi pu gyur/ da khros nas rang sangs rgyas la a ma'i 'bras bu smin pa lnga brgya bulazhas smon lam
btapapa dgaba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin mo zhig tu skyel/ rgyal po'i khab kyi rnams kyi bu dang bu/
mo bdag gis phrogs te brab r gyur cig/ bdag 'khu lta rgyu bas par gyur cig ces smras so// dpag slong dag de'i tshib glang rdzi'i chung mar gyur pa de ltar 'phrogam 'di yin te/ smon
lam btub pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bur skyes pa yin no// 'dul ba phra mo des ga bam po zhiganyis pa/
gleng gzhi'i mnyan du yod pan ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dgon pa la gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang/ dedag tshong 'dus dang/ srang dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dag tu/
bsam gtan la zhugs pa dang/ de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te// de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsalanus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bsan/
wa dge slong ma dag dbyigamo khang du gnas par khya'ozhis ka'asu latso dang dka'agram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la dbu mo kha gnang ngo
k+Sha zhes thos nas/ de dag gis grongakhyer gyi phyi ro'atudage slong ma 'i dbyaramo kha brtsigs pa dang/ dge slong ma dag la de bzhin du mi rgod dang/ nal gyi budang/ su'ibugatol med pa dag/
0 glags lta bar gyur nas/ de ltar gyur ba dge slong dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma'i dbar mo khang grong khyer gyi phyi 'o ma
rtsig par/ grong khyer gyin du brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod ban ste/ dge slongam sbom dga' mos dbyang mo khang gi sgon 'dug skyo
ma bre dang khyim bdag la 'jus pa dang/ de dug 'phyo zhing spyod na du zer/ de ltar gyurang dge slong dag gis/ btsem ldan 'adas la kasal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
ba gang nyes pa'i dmigos su gyur pa ni/ dge slongamadabyaramo khang gi sgo na 'dug pa'i phyir te/ de lta bsan dge slong ma dbyaramo khangagi sgron 'dug par mi bya bar dgongs nas/ dge
slong rnams la bka' sul pa/ dge slong rnams bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'phyab ni gnas yin te/ de bas na dge slongam dbangamo khang gisgenadug par mi bya'o// dge slong mas
dbyang mo khang gi sgon 'dug n 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro// gleng gzhi rim du dban ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgron 'dug
