k+Sha bar bya'o// de dag gis ma sbyar zhing bsregs par brtsams pa dang ma sgyu mnusas dge slong rnams kyis shes ldan dag gad kyis sbyar bar bya'o zhes smras te/ de dag gis ma sbyar nas 'bar bar gyur ba dang/

de dag de bzhin du slebs pa med cing cangami lcapar 'dug go/ de nas skye bo mang po rnams kyis tshar gcad pan dong ngo// grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams ng mtsheracher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher mngon par
mtha dad bar gyur to// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das tham 'i gzims malan gnad rnams ni chad/ tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du/ rab bzang ni de gru bcom

pa la bzhag par gyur/ grong khyer rnacan gyi gyad mang bon chos la bkod pa'i dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhusab/ btsun pa gang gi tshe bcom

ldan 'das gnad rnams ni 'chad/ tshigs rnams ni byi ba 'tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las btote/ de gcig Mzhugrub pa dang bde ba mthar phyin par
mdzad nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bkod pa la la/zigs/ bam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag cing da ltar 'dod chags dang bral/ zhe sdang dang bral/ gti mug dang phral/ skyob dang
ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las kun tu grol te thams cad makhyen pa dang/ rnam ba thams
cad mkhyen pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang shes bar s pas/ kun tugyurab bzong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bton te/ dgacig tu grub pa dang/ bde pa mthar phyin par mdzad nas/ mya ngan las 'das

ba la rab tu bzhi g pa lta ngo mtshar ci/ gang nga sngon 'das pa'i dusan 'dod gos dang bcas/ zhe sdang da nga bcas/ gti mug dang bcas/ skyob dang/ rgyab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ smra
[@]/ sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las kun khyim grol/ brtag cing 'jig nus pa dang ni bral/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ni skyes/ rang gi srog la yang

lta ban/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang gi skyabasabyas shing/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la grol sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing/ nyon mongs pa los kyang kun tu skyabs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung

zhig dang bshad par bya'o/ dge slongadag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ lung pa zhig gi nang na de degs kyi bya dngod ri dgas ma 'i tshogs steng bsang sol/ mkhasapa'i ngo gsal ba yid gzhungs ba zhig
gags te/ ri dgas kyi khyu dpon de rngon pas btsugs nas rgyal po la smras pa dang/ de nas rgyal po dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi dang chas te byung nas rigs kyi khyu dbon de thams cad bskor ro// de
'a sa ri dgas kyi khyu dpon des bsams pa/ ma la bdag gisa'i dgas 'di rnams ma bsusan thums cad med par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas ri dgas kyi dbyu dbon gyis phyogs pa/da du ri dgas kyi tshogs rnamA

zla 'byung bar 'gyur pa kun tubartags na/ lung pa de na chu bo zhig 'bab pa des mthong ste shubo'irgyun de yang ngag pa 'phrog cing rab tu 'phrog pa zhig la/ ri dogs de dag kyang nyam chung nas/ de nas khyu
dbon gyis mod la chu bo der zhugs nas dbus su 'dug ste/ skad phyung nas khyed cag tshur shog/ 'grom lonanas pa'i rgyab tukang lag zhig la/ pha rol gyi 'gram du song zhig dang/ 'tsho ba'i thabs ni
med de gzhan du na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas ri dgas des de bzhin du byas pa dang/ de'i rgyab turmig pa dag gis log ste bags pa yang ral/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dag byung yang 'ad

kyang brtson 'grus ma pa tadango// de nas thams cad kyis rgal nas gapa kha cig slar rgol bar ma gyur tam zhes de dag la snying rjebaspyod de/ slar rgyab tub ltas ba dang/ ri dgas kyi phru gu gcig mo rgal bar des

mthong nas/ de nas khyu dbon gnad rnams ni chad/ tshigs rnams 'du ba'i tshorab gnad du ba ba ba byung zhing/ chu 'gram 'dir tshogs rnams la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas pa'i dra/ ri dgas kyi phrug gu de rgyab tu
bkalanas chu bo las bsgral te 'gram du bzhag go/ desari dgas kyi tshogs mang bo rgal bar gnasaM/ 'chi ba'i dus su smon lam ba/dab par brtsamasaM pa/ ji ltar bdag gis ri dgas 'di dag dang/ ri dgas

kyi phrug gu 'di la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byasushing/nyon mos ba las kyang kun tu bskyabs pa 'dis/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na yang/ 'khor

pa'i rgya mtsho las 'don cing gcig tu grub pa dang/ bde ba mthar phyin par khyod ci mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji/
snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dusanaro dgas kyi khyu bon gang yin pa de ni nga yin no// ri dgas de dag na grong khyer can gyi spyod 'di rnams yin no// ri dgas kyi thub tshugs yin pa de na re ba bzang
'di nyid yin// dge slong dag gzhan gang gang gi tshi/ brtag cing 'jig nus pa dang/ dus 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang/ gnad rnams ni chad/ tshigs rnams ni

'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du/ kun tu rgyu rab bzang gi skyabs byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das ba'i dus na/ yul wA rA NA sir rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig
rgyal po byed pa 'byor ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legos pa dang/ skya bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ 'brug pa rnams rab tuzhib//

rkun ma dang/ nad dang bral ba dang/ 'bras dang/ bu ram dang/ ba glang dang/ ma he phun sum tshogs ba/ chos kyi rgya la po tshos dang ldan pa/ chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pa de'i cang shes shi ba dang

khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis 'di ltar/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rta cang shes shi'o zhes thos te/ de dag gis der pho nyapa dang nas/ yang na ni de dugartsol cig// yang ni grong khyer gyi sgrom 'byung zhig/

[– ]gzhan dun nges par skye nas btags la 'dir dgug go zhes bsgo ba dang/ des dpya yung ma bcal/ grong khyer gyi skor la nga ma byung med kyi 'on kyang grong khyer nyidan gnas shing rta cang shes tshol lo// de dus

ga zhan zhing don rta cang shes redanas/ de de la zhon te dpyad kyi dus la bab bo dang/ shing rnams me tog gis rgyas shing/ ngang nga dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang/ ne tso dang/ skags dang/ khu byag dang/

shang shang te'u'i sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yo sa su bskor te dong nas/ da de na rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgu cha pa'i sbyor bas bag med par gnas te/ grong khyer

du yang la zhugs/ ji ltar rgyal po tshangs sbyin skyed mos tshalan bag med par gnas shing/ grong khyer du yang ma zhugs so zhes/ khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis thos te/ do dag gis gros byas nas/ dpung gi tshog

yan lag bzhi dang chas te yul wArANA si'i sgobaskor pa dang/ blon pos rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/ lha khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo bskor 'gasan/ bde bar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol/

rgyal pos thos nas shes ldan rta cang shes gang na 'dug pa yang le zhig/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi yang go skon ci'i/ de dag dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par bya'o zhes bsgo/ des rta ca nga shes kyang bsnyon//

dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba yang go bskon te/ de de dag dang lhan cig g.yul bshams te/ g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa dang/ khams kyi rgyal phran gzhan zhig gis/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rta cang shes kyi

glor mdung zhig bsnan nas/ de'i rgyu ma dag phyung ste/ sdug bsnga la gyi tshor bas gzir nas/ gnad rnams kyang chad/ tshigs rnams kyang 'bya ba'i tshong pa gnad du bab pa byung bzhin du/ des sems sran bskyod pa/

ma la 'di ltar rgyal po nisdug bsngal dogog pa nyam par phyin la/ bdag gis dor bar bya ban bo dag gi tshul ma yin pas/ brtson 'grus kyis sdug khasngal bzlog la/ thabasi dngas sgorung nas grong khyer duphyin par
khya'o snyam du bsam nas/ ban tshun du grong khyer du 'gro ba'i glags bltasan/ wArANAsi'i skyed mos tshal gyi bar na rgyal bo tshangs sbyin gyi rdzing bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba/ me tog ul/

dang pad+ma dang/ kuchu de dang/ bad+ma dkar bo dag gis brgyan pa dang/ ngang pa dang/ byi ran da ba dang/ ngur ba dag gis mtsho gling brgyan pa/ kho ra khor yug tu me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang/

skyo nags tshang tshing gis brgyan pa/ bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin pa zhig yod de/ deshugs drag pos nags tshal stug po de'inang du song ste/ rdzing bu tshangs ldan gyi pad+ma'i 'dab mas/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i

stong du skung pa bzhag nasargal te sga 'a chung nas byung// de nas rgyal po babs pa dang/ doyongasaka'agyal tu dus las 'das so/ de nas rgyal po blon po de rnams kyis phan tshun kun tu btsal par brtsams

sa kha cigami spyod mos tshal du song/ gzhan dbang gis phyogs bzhir brgyugs nas/ gang gis kyang de ma rid nas rang rang gi rtadang glang po che dag bzung nas sar song ngo// rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis srog

'byin pa'i phyir/ de yul wA rA NA si na gnas pa'i grong mi dang/ ltos kyi'i dong/ blon po lhagam dag bsdus nas smras pa/ ga rgya 'jigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog khyed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par
bya de dag gis smras pa/ lha rgyal srid kyi byed btsal bar bgyi'o// des smras kha/ ba'i srog 'byin pa ni tacangashos yin na de ni dus las 'das to/ de 'khyil ba des ci zhig byas yod/ de dag gis smras

0 la lha de 'i spyod du grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa dag btang bar bgyi zhing/ dus ston ma yin ba'i mchod ston dag khagyis la bsod nams dag bgyi'o// rgyal bos smras ba/ shes ldan dag legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o

de nas rgyal po'i btsunamo dang/ gzhon tshu dang/ blon po dang/ mul mi dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs sa de bslogs so// gzhan yang grongakhyiragyi sgo bzhi sbyin gatogi khang ba brtsigs nas/
grong khyer de na rdo dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyom dag sel du bcug ste/ tsan dan gyi chusani gachag bab/ dri zhim po ripog bong dag/bzhag/ gdugs dang rgyala mtshonan bsgreng/ dar gyi lda lding nang
bo nib tags/ lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sil ma nyams dga' ba ni bkram ste/ dus stenAm yin pa'i mchod ston byas nas/ grong khyer du 'di skad

dril bsgrags pa/ shes ldan yul wArANas na gnas pa'i gros rnams dang/ tshul sna tshogs nas 'os pa'i skya bo'i tshigs dag nyon cig/ 'dir lha'i cangashesakyi phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa bted/
zhing dus ston m yin pa'i mchod ston dang bsod nams khyed kyis de'i phyir khyed cag rnams kyis gos sna tshogs dang/ rgyun dang/ 'phreng ba dwang/ 'byor pa mchog gis chos la byung zhig ces bsgolo

denas grong mo dag dang yul mi dag lo so nas/ dus ston m in pa'i mchod ston chen po byas te/ grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir yang 'dod pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa dag sbyin no// dge slong dag 'di jisnyam du sems//
rta cang shes gangayin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yang ng gnad rnams nichad/ tshigs rnams ni byi ba'i tshor ba gang du bab ba byung bzhin du de'i srog gi skyabs byas so//
bam po nga drug pa// de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes ta/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun ba tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang
ts+tsha gis las ci zhig bgyis na/ desan nyan thos rnams kyi thamar mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag dge slong ra bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa
pa dang tshogs re dab/ rkyen yongs su bskyar ba/ bod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ myong bar nges pa rab ba bya bas las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ gzhan su zhig gis nyams sumyo bar 'gyur/ dge slong
dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/ tshu'i pams la ba yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams ma yin med kyi/ zin pa'i phu bo dang/ khams dang/

k+Sha skye mched rnams la las byas pa'i dge ba dang mi dge pa dag rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// las rnams bskal pa bsgyur yani/ chudamikhab 'ang tshogs dang dus// rtod na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu nyid du

smin par 'gyur// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskul ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe le khri thub pa na/ ston pa 'od sus zhes bya ba 'ji'i tedu rgyu ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/

ny+tsa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen ba/ blan med pa/ skyes bu 'dul pa'i bag lesgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yul wA ra NA si'i grong khyer ri dgas 'dzin gyi tshal na

bar rten cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi dbon po mya ngan medacas[”]bya ba de thar par bya ba'i don du/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srusalas rab tubyung ste/ de thar cing rang dbang thob bo snyam nas

'bad pa bskyod do// jitsam na dus shin tu ring ba zhig na/ mya nganamad ces bya ba ldengs rgyu zhing 'dug par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad/
bam lus par mdzad nas/ bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du tha ma'i gzims/mal du gzhigs so// dgo slong mya ngan med shing a shoka'i drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la banas te/ ji tsam shing a sho ka de la
lha zhig gnas pa des/ bcom ldan 'das 'od sus mya ngan las 'das par thos nas ngus te/ de dus pa'i mchil thigs pa gcig mya ngan med kyi lus la lhung bar gyur pa dang/ de nas mya ngan med kyis gyen du

bltas na lha de ngu zhing 'dug nas/ lhaci'i phyir ngu zhes smras pa dang/ lhas deg mtshan ma'i gung thun la/ bcom ldan 'das 'od srus mya ngan las 'da'o 'o zhes smras so// de nas mya ngan med lha'i tshig/

thos nas gnad du phog pa bzhin 'gyel te/ de snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing 'dug par gyur to// de nas lhas ci'i phyir nga zhes dris pa dang/ mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ gnyen dang bral ba dang bla ma dang bral ba'i
phyir te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs ni bdag gi zhang po yin no// bdag gis shin tu sbyangs pa shing gnas pa la ma 'bad bas bdag so so'i skya bor gyur la/ lag
shin tu ring bas blta ma nus so// lhas smras pa/ btsun ba gal te de ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkrin/ ci khyod bar rtogs par nus sam/ mya ngan med kyis smras pa/ dziltar lhas bcom
sgyu ldan 'das kyi zhal mthobar bgyison/ bodag gi blon nasmi ta/ de bzhin du khyad par rtogs par bgyi'o/ de nas lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mya ngan med rdzu 'phrulagyis khrid de/ des bcom

ldan 'dasa mthong nas dad pa skyes so// dad pa skyes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis chos rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ngashad de/ de thos ma thag tu dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dang por tsho dang ldan
lcebatsan las 'das so// danas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'od srungs// de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das bar mthong ste dga' ba skyes nas/ des
bsams ba/ tshodang ldan pas gang cung zad khyad par rtogs pa de thams cad bdag las brtan pa yin gyis/ bdag ma 'os pa'i dusan gang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma bcom ldan 'das 'od srus kyis bram ze'i

khye'u skye dgu rnams kyi tshi lo brgya thub pan/ ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan pa de za ma'i gzimasamal
du gshegs ban/ bdag de'i nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar mngon sum du byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon logs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig
sa smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asul pa/ ga slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/ lha gang yin pa de rib bzang 'di nyid yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
gang gi phyi'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan pa dang/ dge ba dang gcig gnas pa dang/ dge ba la bstan par bya zhing sdig pa'i grogs po lam ston/ sdig pa dang lhan cigami gnas/ sdig pa la mi bstan par
dge slong rnams kyis de ltar bslab bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gcig bu dben pa zhig tu mchis te/ nang du
gang dag 'jog la gnas pagitsho/ sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la pasten pa dang/ dgo ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang/ dge ba la bstan nas sdig pa'i grogs la
mi bston/ sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/ sdig pa lam bston na/ 'din tshangs par spyod pa'i phyid lags so/ kun dga' bo khyod 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bstan pa dang/ dge ba dang lhan cig
gnas pa dang/ dbeg pa la bstan nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi bstun/ sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/ sdig pa la ma bstenan/ 'di ni tshongs par spyod pa'i khyad yin no zhes de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i
@#// phyir zhen/ kun dga' bo da ni tshangs bar spyod pa kun mthur phyin pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs ba/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yin// 'di lta ste/ dag pa'i
bshes gnyen la bstan pa dang/ dag ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang/ dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po lamakhaston/ sdig pa grogs po dang lhan cig ma gnas/ sdig pa'i grogs po la bsten bar
bya'o// kun dga' bo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyenang la bstan bas/ sems can skye ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams/ skyakha'i ches las rnam par grol bar gyur to// rga ba dang na ba
dang 'chi ba dang/ chu ngan dang/ smra sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ sems can 'khrug pa'i chos dang ston pa rnams/ 'khrug pa'i chos las rnam par grol bar gyur to//

kun dga' bo rnam grangs de lta bu de shes par bya'o// gang tshangs par spyod pa mthar phyin pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su byung ba 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtson
ba dang dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang/ dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bston/ sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/ sdig pa la bsten par mi bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar bslab
bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag de lta bas na/ deng phan chad nyo du shAkyi dam kha ral pacan m kha togs pa/ mu stegs kun tu

00rgyu gzhan rnams 'dag tu dbyung bar mi bya/ bsnyen pa ra rdzogs par mi byago/ 'du shAkya rnams mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan chos te 'ongs nas/ gal te legs pa dragasus ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung

zhi bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong gi dngos bo thob par 'dod na/ ga slong rnams kyis de rab tu dbyung bar bya/ bstan pa rdzogs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ dge slong dag de ni bdag cag gi 'du rnamA
la 'du'i gnang ba yin pa'i phyir ro// mu stegs kun tu gzhan dag khros nas/ gal te legs par gsungs pa'i tshos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/ dge slong gi dngos po thob par
'dedan/ de la dge slong rnams kyis mkhan khos gos sbyin zhing zla ba bzhi'i bar du gzhag par bya'o// de bsnyen bkur byed cing dge slong rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nusan/ dge slong rnams kyis rab

dbyung zhing bsen par rdzogs bar bya'o// dge slong dag mo ba ral ba can yang 'gatudabyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/ dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhen/ ma ba ra' ba can ni las su smra ba yin no// dgo/

slong dag gam ba ral pa can ni byed par smra ba/ rgyur sgrub/ brtson 'grus su smra ba yin no// de lta bas na dge slong dag gis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang las su skya pa dang/ byed par smra ba dang/ rgyur smra ba dang/

brtson 'grus su smra bar 'gyur ba de ltar/ dge slong khyed kyis kyang bslab par bya'o// de lta bas na dge slong khyed kyis chos gang zhig mthong ba'i chos ni la phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur khe dang/ tshe bas gzhan
[z]@#// du phan ba dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba de dge slong rnams kyis gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya'o// ji lta jilta bzung zhing bcas pa dang bklags pa de ltar tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du gnas par

gyur zhing/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams la phan ba dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang/ dbyangs

kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang/ lung du bstan pa'i sde dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang/ ched du brjod pa'i sde dang/ gleng gzhi'i sde dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang/ de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang/ skyes pa'i

rabs kyi sdo dang/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang/ rjed du phyung ba'i chos kyi sde dang/ gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde 'di dag ni/ dge slong mthong pa'i tshes dri la phan pa dang/ mthong ba'i chos 'di lo bde bar 'gyur
ba dang tshe bas gzhan du phan pa dang/ bde bar 'gyur ba dag ste/ dge slong dag gis gzung bar bya/ kun chub par bya'o// jilta dziltar bzung zhing btsas ba dung bklags pa de ltar tshangs bar spyod pa

yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing/ skye bo mang bo laphan pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'gi rten la snying brtse ba dang/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro// dge slongo dag/

zla khyed kyis ston pa nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das temed pa'i 'og tu/ bdag cag gi ston pa dang/ ston pa med do snyam du de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir ngas zla ba khyad cing so sor thar ba'i mdo gdon par bstan

pa de dang phyin chad khyod kyi ston pa dang/ ston pa yin na/ dge slong dag bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo dang/ phran tshegs gang yin pa de dag dag pa 'dun tshogs nas skabs dbye zhing bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o/dge

slong dag de lta bas na deng phyin chad dge slong gsar du dag gis dge slong rgan rabs rnams la ming nas bod par mikhya/ rus nas bod par mi bya ste/ btsun pa zhes brjod pa dang/ tshed bldan pa zhes brjod pa ma
gtogs par du tu spyad par mi bya'o// dge slong rganarabs rnams kyis/ dge slogasar bu rnams la lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ dra ba dang/ borakhu dang/ ska rags dag gis bsnyad par bya
nye bar gnas par bya/ klog pa dang/ kha ton dang/ lung bsgo nas rnal 'byor yid la byed du gzhug par bya'o/ dge slong dag gis sa phyogs 'di bzhi rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dod pa can/
rnams kyis srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su dran par 'gyur bar bya'o// bzhi bo bzhin/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na khrus so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di'i lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i na phung bo lhag ma ma lus ng ni
mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yos bumya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu 'diri mtshod rten bskor ba dang/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba khong gis/ de dag la 'di skad ces
0 @#// brjod par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni 'khrungs so// bam ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas go// bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di'i lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'dire na phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las
'dasas zhes bya ba'i bar dag yin te/ khacig nga'asams dad pas dus byas pa de thams cad mthongs su 'gro// kha cig ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas par ro// dge slong dag sa phyogs 'di bo'i rigs
kyi bu 'am/ gas kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur bar bya go/ bzhi gang zhen/ bcom ldan 'das 'dadi ni 'khrungs so// bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni sman med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sas rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni lan gsum bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni

phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su lo sumya ngan las 'das pa ste/ dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod rten bskor ba dang/ mchod rten la phyag 'tshal du 'od pa rnams la 'di
skad ces brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dir 'o khrus so/ khacom ldan 'das 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ bcom ldan 'das
[p]kyis 'dir ni lan gsum bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor le rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba'i par dag
yin/ kha cig gnang 'asoms dad pas dus byas te/ de thams cadramatho ris su 'gro'o/ kha cig ni phung bo lhag ma dang bcas par lo/ jiltar mngon du 'gro bar bya ba de ltar rjes su dud par bya'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge dun dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/

lam rnams la gang som nyi dang yid gnyis yod pa la dgag par zhus shig dang// dris pa de ngas lung bstan par bya'o// khyod kyis 'di ji ltar bdag cag gi ston pa'i spyan sngar an sum du lan gdab par ni mi
globs so snyam du blta bar mi bya sta/ dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la/ gas dag gis rogs dag la smra bar bya zhing dris na de lung bstan par bya'o// de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khasungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ dge slong 'khor dri da 'dus shing mchis pa 'di rnams las/ gang dag
slong gcig la yang sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ bgog pa dang/ lam rnams la gang som nyi dngayid gnyis su gyur pa ma mchis lags so//
kun dga' po legs so legs so// kun dga' bo khyod na dod pas 'di skad smra mod kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis gathig pa ni bla na med par 'jug pa yin te/dge slong

'a gi 'a khor jisnyad 'dus shing nga la bod pa rnams la ni/ gang dge slong btsog la yang sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam rnams la som nyi dang yid gnyis med med kyi/ 'on kyang 'di'i
dgos pa na dus phyi ma'i sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs brtse ba'i phyi re go/ de nas btso ldan 'das kyis rang gi sku las stod g.yogs bsil te/ ge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/
dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ltos shig/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku la rnam par ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa gis sa
rgyas khalta bani rnyed par dka'aste/ dpon ma tog u dum wa ra bzhinano// dge slong dbar zhi cang ma smra zhig dang/ 'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/ de la 'di ni de bzhin
I gshegs pa'i gsung tha ma'o zhes gsungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs go bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs
so pasam khagatan gnyis ba las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam ba/tan bzhi pa soms par zhugs go/
bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la bzhengasanas// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par/
zhugs so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las bzhes nas/ su yang med pa'i mched la soms par zhugs so/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched las bzhengs nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man skyo
mchod la snyoms par zhugs so// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las bzhi sanas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshodang
ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan ba ma 'gags pa/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam [7 ]tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma yin te/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das
ning du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so// tshe dang ldan bam 'gags pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na bsam gtan bzhi pa'i snyoms par zhugs te/ zhi ba mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang
ldan pa brnyesanas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o zhes/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'dras las mngon sum du thos shinge 'angon sum du bzung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa las bzhes
ti bdu shes med 'du shes med min skyemachod la snyoms par zhugs so// 'du shesamed 'du shes med min skye mched las bzhes nas/ ci yang med pa 'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/ ci yang med
kha'i skye mched las ba zhes zhus/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la sogs par zhugs so// rnam shes ma lnga yas skye mched las bzhengasanas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
la snyoms par zhugs so// nam ma khamatha' yas skye mched las bzhes nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la soms par zhugs so/ bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhes nas/ bsam gtan gsum pal
blo snyoms par zhugs so// bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengasanas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs
ltaso bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs sago/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengasanas/ bsam gtan/sum pa la sems par zhugs so// bsam
gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa la soms par zhugs s/ zhi ba'i g.yo ba'i spyan dang ldan pa

sh+tsa brnyes tu yos su mya ngan las 'das so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu/ sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur/ skar tshoda' la nga lhung/ phyogasakya tshig/ bar snang
za las lha dgagis rnga'i sgra yang bsgrags so/// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan taka gnas ban 'dug pa de sa g.yos pas sad de/ 'di ci'og ces/

bsamasan/ bcom ldan 'das yo sa sumya ngan las 'das par mthong ngo// des 'das byas kyi chos thams cad de 'dra'o zhes chos nyid la brten nas/ des bsams pa// 'di ltar lus 'phagasama'i bu myang bo ma skyes

dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa des/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de thos par gyur na/ khrag dron bor skyugs nas 'tshiba'i dus byed pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar rig nas/ de la thabs shig
bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lul ma ga d+ha'i snachen la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la 'diskodaces smras so// dbyor byed shes par gyisag/ bcom ldan 'das ni yongs sumya ngan las 'das/

bar gyur te/ gal ta lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal bo ma skyes dgurtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa des/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thosan/ de khrag dron poskyags nas 'chi ba'i dus byed/
par 'gyuran/ de la khyed kyis thabs bsgrub par rig par gyis shig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa thabs gang lags pa rims bzhin du gsungs shig/ des smras pa/ dbyar byed tshung shig/ khyod myur ba
myur bar rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal du song tshe/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs shing gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsom du

sbyong ba mdzad nas/ glang po cher bstan te yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang/ gshegs nas ji ltar byang chub kyi shingungadu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
pa dang ji ltar bcom ldan 'das yul wA rA NAsur lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba dang/ ji ltar mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan

ba nga rdzi ltar sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su bskrun pa'i yum gyi thad du gshegs nus chos khaMshad de grong khyer sa can du babs pa dang/ riltar phyogs ga nga dang gangan gdul ba de dang de dag btul nas/

zla sangs rgyas kyi mdzad patshathar phyin te/ grong khyer rtswa tsan du tha ma'i gzim mal du gshegs pa de lta bu gi ri mo dag bri bar bya zhing/ khyod kyis gzhong ris bdun ni mar gyi mar sar gyis/ brgyad pa ni tsin
kha dan 'go shing shas bkang// skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs dor gzhag go/ dzitsamanargya la bo sgor byung bar gyur ba dang/ dol lhar zhig skyed mos tshal gzigs su gsol zhes smras nas/ gal tar
mo mtho nas dbyar byed 'di ci yin zhes 'dri ba dang/ rgya cher bshad par bya ste/ lha 'din grong khyer ser skya can lags te/ phyogs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'khrus gro/ 'di ni chu bon pa 'dzana'i
'gram lags te/ phyogs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das derdzo'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'din yul wA rA NA
si'i grong khyer lags te/ phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bsko'o// 'di'i mnyan yod kyi grongakhyer lags te/ phyogs
wa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen bo bstan to// 'di ni grong khyer sgra can 'gas te/ phyogs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas nas babs so// 'di ni grong khyer
rtswa can lags te/ phyogs 'di ni phyogs gang dang gang na gdul ba de dang de dag btul nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin te thama'i gzimasamal du gshegs so zhes gyis dang/ thos nas thos ma

thag tu lha brgyal tes la lhung bar 'gyur gyis/ de la khyod kyis gzhong ringes mar sa gyis bkang ba'i nang du gzhug par bya'o// gang gi tshemasar de zhu bar gyur pa dang/ de gnyis pa nas bdun pa'i bar

du gzhug bar bya'o// de nas phyung ste tsan dan bgo shing shas bkang ba ' gzhong rings su chug cig dang/ de gos par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ tshedang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po grong khyer rtswa can du song ngo//

dbyar byed kyang gyur ba myur bar rimolas thams cad rgya cher bris te/ brisanas rgyal po rol du byung ba dang/ lha skyed mosatshal du gshegs shes smras te/ de skyed mos tshal du zhugs pa dang ri mo dag mthong nas/

dbyar gyod 'di tsayin zhes dris te/ das 'di na grong khyer rtswa can 'gas te/ phyogs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das thama'i gzims mal du gshegs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bshad do// des smras

kha dbyar byed ci bi/ ci bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras pa dang/ decang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra brgyal tas la lhung ba dang/ bya byed kyis gzhomings
dmar gyis bkang ba'i nang du lan bdun gyi bar du bcug nas/ de nas phyung ste tsan dan 'go shi roshas bkaba'i gzhob mings kyi nang du bcug pa pad sos par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom/

ba ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thag tushings la zungab tis kyitshol sa la'i ljon shing mtshig las ma tog 'thor ba'i du du/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge lta bur gzims pa dang/ de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig
zla gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa la zungani reb mdzes pa'i// ljon shi mchog gi tsho'abu 'di// ston pa mya ngan 'dus pa la// me tog dag giso rab tugar// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
dmya ngan las 'dasam thagatu/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyom 'ad byed mi rtag ste/ skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin// skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur pa ste// de dag nye
par zhi ba bde// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thug tu/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'byung po kun gyis 'jig rten 'dir ni bsogs pa'i mtha'/
'dor 'gyur 'jig rten 'di na gang brag zlamed cing// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams b.res pa spyan ldan pa// ston pa 'di tshu yang yoso sumya ngan 'das// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs
'o/ sumya ngan las 'das ma thagatu tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad de smras la/ brtan pa'i thugs kyi sa skyob mdzad cing// mgayo zhi ba brnyes gyur ba// dbugs dbyung ba dang du
'gags nas// spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa/ gang tshe ston pa dus mdzad de// de tshe rab tusungs gyur cing// de tshe spu yang langs par gyur// zhum pa med pa'i
thugs kyis ni// tshor ba dag la lhag par gnas// du yi lugs ni rnam grol ba// sgron ma de 'ang mya ngan 'das// sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya yig las 'das ma thogatu/ gi gling gcig
sa la 'gre ldog/ kha cig ni dbyar la bzung nas ku co 'donaM/ gcig ni sdug bsngal gyis khams gzir cing 'dug bciga'i tshes la bsten nas gung 'di ltar bdag cag la bcol ba'adas

kyis zhib tu bstan te/ thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing bangs la dga' ba yid du 'ong ba dung bral nas/ med pa dang/ zhig pa dang/ bya bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan ba ma 'gags pas/ tshe dang ldan
pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'bu/ dge slong rnams rim gyis dul du dal bus zil gyis ma mnanAno/ tshebaskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa'i lha rnams 'di ltar

khal lha ji snyed yod pa shes sam zhes dris pa dngo/ kun dga' bo ji tsam grong khyer rtswa can gyi ba nas/ chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang/ ji tsam shis la bung gnyis kyi tshal gyi ba nas/ gyad kyis dbu rgyan
bdabadas/
btags pa'i mchod rten gyi ba dpag tshad bcu gnyis kho ra khor yug tu/ dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis ma khyabacings gang ba su bud kyang med de/ chungadun ga bar pa
gzugs pa'i khyon tsam yang med par lha kha ci'i na sa la 'gre ldeg/ khacig ni dpung ba nas bzung nas ku co 'don/ kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gab cing 'dug/ kha cig ni chos nyid la brtan nas gang

rgyu da ltar bdag cag 'bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar kun tu bstan to/ thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing bas ba/ dga' ba yi da du 'ong ba dang bral nas/ med pa dang/ zhig pa dang/ gyes bar gyur

to deb nub mo tsho dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ tsho dang ldan pa kun dag ba po la rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam smras nas/ 'phags pa'i ngo bor cang mi smra bar 'dug go [“ ]denas de'i tshemtshan monam
nangs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos la grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams la 'di skad ces/ gnas 'go

ga de gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la/ ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su longs sumya ngan las 'dasakyis khyod kyi bya ba dang bsgrub ba dag der byos la/ da phyin chad 'di skad

ces grong gi nya' khor ba dag bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su longs su mya ngan las 'das te/ bdag cag gis de la mchod par bya zhing brtson par bya bar nus so/

[o]zhes yid la/rtags bar ma byed cig ces smyos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de skad smras nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ tshe dang ldan bam 'gags pa'i ltar manyananas snam sbyar byas te/

dge slongagazhan dag dang/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dag dang grong khyer rtswacan gyi khyada rnams kyi mdun khangag la bar song staphyin pa dang/ de'i tshigrong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod rnams kyi mdun khangan

gyud lnga brgya tsam zhig byub dgacig gi phyir 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ donas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grong khyer can gyi gyad
kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus bshes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig/ dung gi mtshan mo'i gang thun la ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyis/

ga khyed kyis bya ba dang bsgrub pa dag der byos la phyin chad 'di skadas/ grong ga ta 'khor ba dag bdag cag gi ston pa phung bo lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyis su yos su mya ngan las 'das te/
bdag cag gis de la 'dicing brtson par byed ma nus so zhes yid la gcags bar m byed cig ces smras nas/ grong khyer tsatsan gyi gyad bcig nas la 'gre ldog/ kha cig ni dbung bas bzung sta ku ce'adi/
kha cigan sdug bsngal gyis sems gaba'i tshong ba// kha cig ni chos nyid la brten nas gang 'di ltarebadag cagal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar kun tu bstan te/ thams cad kyi snyid du sdug
@#/// cing yangs pa dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang bralanas/ med pa dang/ rig pa dang/ bya bar gyur to// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams jitsam du grong khyer rtswa can gyi dri dang/
phung pa dang/ bdug spos dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i cha byad dag thogs te/ de dag gi bu dang/ chung ma dang/ bran po dang/ branamo dang/ las byed pa dang/ shas 'tshob dang/ de dag gi mdzub
sgyu bshes dang/ tadu dang/ blon bo dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams grong khyer rtswa can nas byung ste/ shing sa la zung gnyis kyi tshal ga la ba der gshegs te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge
lta bur gzims pa la/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug spos dang/ phyis dang/ rol mos bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas// ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so// de nas gzhan yang grong khyer rtswa
can gyi spyod gtso bo gtsobo rnams kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/ bdag cag rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba dang/
brtson pa ji lta bur bsgrub bar bgyi lags/ gnas 'jog dag 'di lta ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal po la bya ba bzhin no/ btsun kun dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo la ji ltar bgyid lag
gnas 'jog dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ni/ lus shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkri zhing/ shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris nas/ sa zu ba lnga brgyas dkri bar bya'o/ ras chung lnga brgyas dkris nas
lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste/ 'bru mar gyis bkangs steng nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste/ drizhim po ri yi thams cad spyas te/ des bsregs nas ma de dag 'o mas bsad de/ de'i rus pa
gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug nas/ lam po che bzhi mdor rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs nas/ gdugs dang/ rgya la mtshon dang/ ba dan btsugs te/ dradang/ phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/
phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ tshodapa' byed cing/ dus ston chen po yang byed de/ gnas lag dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo bya ba de bzhin du/de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la da ngas kyang lhag par bya'o// btsun pa kun dga' bos bgasungs ba'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltan/ gang gi phyir bdag cag
gis gdugs gcig gam gnyis sam/ gsum gyis mi tshogs te/ sbyar par dga' n zhag bdun tshunachad kyis bdag cag gis de ba zhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das snying ga'i khri la gzims la
la dri dang/ 'breng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgros bkur par bgyi/ blam bgyi/ tshor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyis gces tshodang ldan pa kun
dga' las thos nas/ grong khyer rnacan gyi khyada rnams kyis nyin bdun pa tidal/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba dag bsags te/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba dag bsags nas/ sa zung lnga brgya zhing bsags/sa/
zung lnga brgya bdu bsags nas/ lcags kyi sgrom yadu bshams/ lcags kyi sgrom bshams nas/ drizhim po'i shing thams cad kyang spungs/ dri zhim po'i shing thams cad spungs nas/
gsar gyi bum pa yang sta gon byas/ gser gyi bum pa sta gon byas nas/ gsar gyi phyogs dag kyang bshams te/ gser gyi khyogs bshams nas/ grong khyer rtswa can nas/ chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar
blo dang/ shis la zung ga tsholas/ gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dang gAtshad bcuganyis thobag brag/ dzitsam dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ byam dang/ rol mo'i cha byad
dag thogs nas/ grong khyer nyananas byung sta/ shis la zung gi tshal ga la bar song ste phyin pa dang/ seng ge 'i khri la gzims pa 'dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol
mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so// ga zhan yang grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyod gtse ba gtso bo dag gis/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams la 'di skad ces
zla sa so// grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khong mang bo tshogs shing 'dus pa/ shes ldanu gnas 'jog dag nyon cig/ gyad kyi chung ma dang rgyud kyi bu mo dag gisani/ bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi
blo'i dag khres shig// gyad kyi chung ma dang gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs bung zhig/ nged cag gis ni dri dang/ 'phrang ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i

00sgras bkur sti bya/ bla mar bya/ rikhor bya/ mchod par bya ste/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub sgronas/ dbus thog zab tuzhugs nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung ste/ chu bo dbyig ldan rga 'a nas/ rgyud kyis

dbu rgyun btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsolal/ zhugs la bzhin par bya'o/ denus grong khyer can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes maMnyananas/ rgyad kyi chung ma dang rgyud kyi bu mo
dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi gdugs dag khres/ rgyud kyi chung ma dang rgyudag zhon nu dag gisani/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg bar 'dodan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg bar m

nus pa dang/ tsho dang phra ba la 'gags pas// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' kho 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs
gdeg par ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no// tshodang ldan pa ma 'gags pa lha rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu yin/ lha rnams kyis spyad kyi chungs dang gyad kyi bu mo
dag gisani/ bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla re bro zhinge/ gyad rnams dang gyod gzhon nu dag gisan/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs la bzung nas/ bdag cag gis lha'idri dang/ 'brang ba dang/ bdug

ba dang bya ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod po byas te/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/ dbus thog thag zhugs la/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi ra sgonas/
mar bya/ ri d mtshon zhu dag gse/ bdags ba sgyu ma kyi bsam pa can gyi khyad rnams kyi lha 'das kyi phyogs gag pa
'byung ste/ chu bo dbyig ldan rga nas/ gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol la/ zhugs la bzhin par bya'o zhes bsams so/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag

ba rtsa rnams kyis ji ltar nga sams pa de bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'a bos/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyid rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ shes ldan gnas 'go dag bcom ldan 'das

ts+tsha kyi khyogs 'degs nus ba de ci'i phyir yin/ lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no// btsun pa kun dga' bo lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams lags/ lha rnams kyis khyod kyi chung ma dang gyad kyi bu mo dag gis
khacom ldan 'das la gos kyi re bri zhing/ rgyud rnams dang rgyud gzhon nu dag gis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs bteg ste/ bdag cag gis lha'i dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ gdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/

zla rol mo'i sgras bkur sti'i bya/ dmar pya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par byas nas/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas dbus thog thag zhugs la/ grong khyer can gyi bar sgor byung ste/ chu bo dbyig ldan
zlargalanas khyad kyis dbu rgyun btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol/ zhugs la bzhin par bya'o zhes sematsho/ btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsoms pa de bzhin du
khacu'o// de nas gyad kyi chung ma dang gyod kyi bu mo dag gis no/ bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi blar bris/ khyod rnams dang gyod ga zhon nu dag gis ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs btag ste/ khyogs bag

00 ma thag tu bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dag gis/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma dkar po dang/ ku mu da dang/ a ka ru'i phyi ma dang/ ta la'i phyi ma dang/ lha'i ma tog man da ra la sogs

pa dag gis nigator/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag ni blas/ gos mang bo dag ni bor ro// gzhan yang grong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod gtso bo gtso bo dag gis/ grong khyer rtsacan gyi spyod rnams la 'di skad ces smras
so shes ldan gnas 'jog dag bdagacug gi mi'i 'tsho'i cha byad dgag bor la/ bdag cag gis lha'i dri dang/ 'phreng pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyom dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/ byamar

khya rimor bya/ mchod par byas la/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung la/ chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas rgyud kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du
bzhugs su gsol 'a/ zhugs la gzhen bar bya'o zhes smras so// bam po nga bdun pa// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod rnams kyis mi lo la
mo'i pyad dag khor te/ lha'i dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras ba kung sir byas/ bram r byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas [$ ]/grong khyer rtswa can gyi nubasgo nas

dbus thog thag zhugs te/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung nas chu bo dbyig ldan gal te/ gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa bi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol go/ de'i grong khyer rtswa can du lha'i
me togazhan da ra pa mang bo bus mo nub tsam du bab par gyur to// de'i tshe 'tshob can gzhan zhig gis lha'i mi tog man da ra ba de las mang du blus te/ yul sdig pa can du khyab zhig

gi ched du song pa dang/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srus chen po'i khor lnga brgya dang sa te/ tshul sdig can gyi bar nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyamApa la

phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srus chen pos 'bo can de 'am kar mthong ngo// mthong nas 'tshob can de la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'tsho ba can khyod gnas 'di 'ong/

gang du 'gro/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po ba dgan grong khyer rtswa can nas 'dir mchis te/ bgyi ba zhig gi ched la yul sdig pa can du mchi'o// tshodang ldan pa 'tshob can khyod kyis nga'i ston bshes sam/
mi 'gas pa 'tshal lags te/ dge sbyong go ta ma lags so// 'phags pa 'od srusachen po ston pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas deng du dgung bdun lags te/ de'i sku gdung la mchod pa bgyis
zla pa'i lha'i me tog man dar ba bdag gis blangs pa 'di lags so// de'i tshargan zhugs ga zhan zhagi tshul ma yin pa'i tshig 'di skad du smra ste/ 'di ltar bdagan 'gyod pa dang/ rgan zhugs kyis
'di ltar/ kye dge slong dag 'di ni bya ba'o// 'di'i bya bam yin pa'o zhes smra ba las thar par gyur te/ dan bdag cag gis gdanus pa de ni bya/ gang minus pa de na mi bya'o zhes de skad du mi rigs bar

smra ba dang/ bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dag gis bsgribs te/ ji byung tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ma gtogs khra/ dge slongagi 'khor de gcig gis kyang thos par ma gyur to// de nas tshed nga ldan pa 'od
gusachen bos tshu ma yin pa'i tshig da lta du smra ba gdul ba'i don du lam las rgyu ste/ doge slong ba dge 'dun gyi gung la sten bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ 'du nos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen
pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa// gyi brtan ba/ yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te/ drisrid du 'di ltar
'dus byas kyi chos thams cad la yodi byung bar bya/ rnam par grol bar bya'o kye tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa ba par nges pa ris par 'gro'o// de nas
grong khyer rtswa can gyi rgyud rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris ga/ shing ba le gyi 'da' bas dkras nas/ sa khung lnga brgyas dkris so// su zung lnga brgyas
dkris nas/ lcags kyi slob du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang/ lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'brum gyis bkang nas/ stong nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste/ dri zhim po'i gong
thams cad spungs nas zhugs la bzhin par 'dodon/ me sbar bar ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags bas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
@#/ gab grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/ com ldan 'das kyi sku gdung zhugs la brten bar ma nus so// daci'i phyir zhen/ lha rnams kyis bsams pa bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa ma

k+kha bgags pa lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te yul sdig pa can gyi bar nas/ grong khyenacan gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das

phyogs kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa yin no// tshe dang ldan po ma 'gags pa ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi
gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi'i khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa/ shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cika/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi sku gdung zhugs la brten bar ma nus

la ba deci'i phyire zhan/ lho rnams kyis bsams pa yin no// tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo lho rnams kyis ji ltar bsams lags/ de ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang yul sdig can
gyi bar nas/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa yin no// de dag gis smras r/ btsun pa kun dga' bo lta lha

za rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po grong khyer rtswa can du phyin ba dang/ 'khor dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rgya ring po nas mthong ngo//mtho ba/

nas kyang dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i byad dag thogs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tsho dang ldan pa 'od srusachen po'i rkang pa la

mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ngo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungasachen bo 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang/ 'khor stong phrag dum dang/
'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ dri zhim po rishing thams cad bsal le/ dri zhim po 'ashing thams cad bsal nas/ lcags kyi sgrom kha phye'o//
lcags kyi sgrom kha phye nas/ sa zung lnga brgya ba zhus so/ ras zung lnga brgyabashus nas/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba yang bshus so/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba yong ba shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku

gdung ma nyams pa la phyag byas so// de'i tshon sa chen po 'di'i steng na nyan thos chen po bzhi yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di chu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa stobu
bcu 'od srungs dang/ tshad ldan ba 'od srungs chen po'o// de dag gi na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ye shes dang ldan pa/ bsod nams che ba/ chos gos dong/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/

na ba'i rkyen sman dang/ yo byad dag rnyed pa yin no// de nas tshedang ldan pa 'od srus chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya'osnyam du spro ba bskyed
nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srus chen pos shing bal gyi 'da' ba gzhan dag lta gon byas te/ shing bal gyi 'dul ba gzhan dag sta gon byas nas/gzhan yang ras phung lnga brgya lta gon byas

sa tshe dang ldan pakhad susacham so ras chung lnga brgya gzhan ga sta gon byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la shing bal gyi 'o da' bas dkris so// shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris nas/ ras chung lnga brgyas dkris so//
ras thung lnga brgyas dkris nas/ lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'brumar gyis bkang// lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang nas/ steng du lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste//

dri zhim bo thams cad sbyangs so// spus nas phyogs gcig tusong ba dang/ ji ltar de sa sargyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ lha rnams kyi lha 'amathus de rang 'bar bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung sbyangs pa de dag la bskor ba byas nas/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad de smras pa// rnam par 'dren pa rin chen skumanga' ga/ rdzu 'phrul chen po tshangs
pa'i 'jig rten gshegs// sangs rgyas sku longs chung lnga brgya dang// chos gos stong nyid kun tu dkris gyur ba/ nyid kyi gzi brjid kyis ni sku gdung dang// shin tu dkris po rab tu tshig par
gyur de la chos gos gnyis ni mtshig khaM// nang rim dang phyi rim 'di rnam gnyis/ donas grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams kyis ma de dag 'oms bsad pa dang/ des 'og 'as shing bzhi skyes

[z]bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ gser can dang/ ser skya dang/ rta don dang/ u dum wa ra zhes bya ba yin no// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod rnams kyis/ de'i kha dung gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug
ste gsar las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du bzhag nas/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ bya ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas
te grong khyer rtswa can du phyin nas/ der grong khyer mchog gi dbus su bzhugs su gsolanas/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyam dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur byas/ bla mar
byas ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas so// de nas yul sdig pa can gyi spyod rnams kyis/ grong khyer rtswa can du bcom 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas deng du 'go bdun lon nas/ sku gdung
la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed do zhes thos so// thos nas kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba/ glang bo che'i tshogs dang/ rta tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs

go bskyin te/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams ga la ba der song staphyin nas/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi rgyud rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang bo tshogs shing 'dus
pa shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das ni nged la yun ring po nas langs shing sdug pa yin te/ de khyod kyi grong gi nyi 'khor du rten pa las yongs sumya ngan las 'das nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i
sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba nged la byin cig dang/ de nged kyis yul sdig pa can du bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba

ka ngan gzugs shing/ dri dang 'phrong ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ba dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/ bla ma'i bya/ rimor bya/ mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa byas nas/ dus ston chen bo lang bya'o// gnas

'jog dag bcom ldan 'as de ni nged la yang phangs shing sdug pa yin la/ nged kyi grong gi nye 'khor du rten pa las yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das de ni sku gdung sha rim gyi skal

tshab nged kyis sbyin par mi bya'o// gal te byin na de lcan ni logs/ ji ste ma byin par gyur na dmag gis dbrog go grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhis ma nyan to/ yul rtog pa g.yo

rab na gnas pa'i rgyal gas bu lu ka dang/ grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas ba'i rgyal rigs sprod rgyu dang/ khyab 'jug gling na gnas pa'i bram ze dang/ grong khyer ser skya na b gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang/
yul yangs pa can n gnas pa'i rgya larigs li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang thos te/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po 'us 'phags ma'i bum skyes dgras kyang/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ yul

N+NaM sdig pa can gyi khyad rnams dang/ yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs du ru ka dang/ grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyalags kod rgya dang/ khyab 'jug gling gi khram ze dang/ yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs

tsa shAkya dang/ yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs li tsa byi rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer rtswa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing/ der sku gdung gi skul ba len du song ngo zhes thos
so thos nas kyang yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs ba bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so// dbyar byed ngas ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ sdig pa can gyi rgyud
rnams dang yul rtog pa g.yo ba'irgyalarigs bu lu ka dang/ grong khyer sgrasgrogs kyi rgyal rigs sprod rgyu dang/ khyab 'jug gling gi bram bu dang/ yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rig sa shAkya dang/

yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal sa la tsa byi rnams/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/ grong khyer rtswa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing/ der sku gdung gi skal ba len du song ngo zhes thos
na khyed kyis shes sam/ de bas na bdag cag kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag pa zhi ba go bskon te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi skal ba blang bar bya'o/ des lha de bzhin du go bgon par bgyi'o
zhes smras nas/ das da dung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskonati/ rgyal bo ma skyes dgra yang glang po che la zhon pa dang/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas brgyal bar gyur to//
de nas glang po che las rab skyo/ rta la bskyon pa dang/ der yang brgyal bar gyur te/ des sa ba/ dbyar byed sa ni mi nus kyis/ khyod nyid dpung gi tshigs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te song
grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la nga'i bkas/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa la nga ngam/ 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad

dris la 'di skad ces/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de ni nga la yun ring bonas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/ de khyed kyi grong gi la 'khor du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na/ shes
blo ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung shari ram gyi skal ba nga la byin cayig dang/ desan pas rgyal po'i khabi tu bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsegasal/ gdugs dang/ rgyal
mtshan dang/ ba dan gzugs shongo/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stari/ blatsher bya/ dri mor bya/ mchod pa bya ste/ mchod pa byas nas/
sgyur/dus ston chen po yang bya'o zhes sgo zhig/ lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes yulam ga d+ha'i snachen bo 'gatogs de bram zo dbyar byed kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs yan

lag bzhi pa go bsten te/ grong khyer rtswa can ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod rnams la 'di skad ces sa so// grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing
'dus ba shes ldan dag nyon cig/ shes ldan dag la yul ma gadz+ha rgyal bo lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal bo ma skyes dgra gnod bachung so/ nyam nga ba chung sa/ bskyod pa ya ngang ma/ 'tsho'am/ stobs

dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad 'dri zhing 'di skad ces/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de ni nga la yun ring po nas bangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/ da khyed kyi grong gi nya 'khor du yos
su mya ngan las 'das pa rgyun/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha mgyi skal ba nga la byin cig dang/ des na ngas rgyal po'i khab tu bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs
la gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gzugs shing/ dridong/ 'brangab dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyam dang/ rolamo'i sgras bkuran+tir bya/ blamar bya/ yor bya mchod par
khya'o mchod pa byas nas/ dus ston chen po la dbya'o zhes bka' stsal to// dab byed bcom ldan 'das de ni nged la yang yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/ denged kyi grong

gnyi ba khod du longs su mya ngan las 'das pas/ nged kyis de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba sbyin par mi bya'o// de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis/ khro khyer rtswa can

gyi khyada rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te byin na de lhan cig gas/ ji stam byin par gyur na dmag gus dbrog par bya'o// grong khyer rtswa can gyi rgyud rnams kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyananas/

de dag gis rgyal po'i 'khor mang po 'dus pa mthong nas gyad kyi chung ma dang/ gyad gzhon nu dag kyang mda' 'bong bslabs so// jitsaman yul sdig pa can gyi khyad rnams dang/ yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal
rigs bu bu ka dang/ grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgya la gegs khrod glu dang/ khyab 'jug gling gi khram khro dang/ tshul sar skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs kyi dang/ lul yangs pa can gyi rgyal
rigs li tsa gyi dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i snachen po la gtogs po bram ze dngar byed rnams kyis dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ dpa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/

zla dbu dang bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi rgyud rnams kyi drung du dmag brgal ba'i phyir lhags so// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams kyis/ rgyud kyi chung ma dang rgyud gzhon nu drug
grong khyer gyi phyirar bkod de/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po tsho'igs dang rta ba'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dbung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon to ba la po'i dmag gi/

tshogs bdun bo dag gi drung du dmag brgal ba'i phyir byung ngo// de'i tshe bram ze'i gas khro bo dang ma nyam pa 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'os te/ de nas bram ze'irigs bra bo dang ma nyam pa phan tshun gnyis ka
nas g.yul mang po bshags 'thabs bar gyuran/ ring po ma thogs par gcig la gcig 'chi bar 'gyur bar ga nas g.yang gzhi bgon te/ grong khyer ran+tan gyi rgyug la ba der song ste phyin nas/

grong khye ma can gyi khyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grong khyer tsacan gyi gyad kyi 'khoramang po tshog sangashing 'dus pa shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam de ni yun ring bonas bzod pa
dang ldan pa bzod pa ni bsngags rjod pa yin no// shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'dus go'u ma de bgrod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags brjod pa yin/ sku gdung gi phyir gcig la gcig gsod pa ni mi

rigs bas/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das go'u tag de'i sku gdung cha brgyad du bgo bar spro bar byas/ gang gi phyir bum pa'i sku gdung ba nug pa'i bum pa de kho bo la byin cig dang/ desan kho bos bra bo'i grong khyer
du bcom ldan 'das gab tam de'i sku gdung gi mtshod rten brtsigs la/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gathugasangashingo/ dri dang 'phrangab dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i
sgras bkur stir bya'o// bla mar khyo'o// rimar bya'o mchod pa bya'o// mchod pa byas nas/ dus ston chen po yang bya'o// grong khyer rtswa can gyi rgyud rnams kyis bram ze'i rigs bye ba dang/
ma nyam pa la de bzhin du bya'o zhes ma nyan to// de nas bram ze'i rigs bra bo dwangs nyam ba/ yul sdig pa can gyi rgyud rnams dang/ lul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal ragis bu lu ka dang/ grong khyer sgra
sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs spyod rgyu dang/ khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang/ yu'asur skrun gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs li tsa byi dang/ yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po

la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yul ma gad+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs ba bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so// dbyar byed shes bar gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das go'u
tam de ni yun ring bon bzod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das go'u tam debazod pa dang ldan zhing bgrod pa'i bsngags pa rjod pa yin na/ shes

ldan dbyakhyed khyed sku la dung gi phyir phan tshun gcig la gcig gsod par byed pa ni mi rigs bas/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de'i sku gdung de cha brgyad du bgo bar spro bar byas// khang gi phyir bus par
blo sku gdung gcug ba'i bum pa de kho bo byin cig dang/ des na kho bos bo'i grong khyer du bcom ldan 'das go'u tam de'i ta ma de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/
ba don gzugs shing/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya'o// bla mar bya'o// tshor bya'o// mdo par bya'o// dus ston chen bo yang bya'o//

yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar khyod la sogs bas/ bram pa'i rigs khro bo dang mnyam ba la de bzhin du bya'o zhes bstan to// de nas bram ze'i rigs khro bo dang ma nyam bas/ bcom/

ldan 'das kyi sku gdung cha brgyad du bgos te/ cha gcig grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la byin// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi khyad rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigasanas/
sgo gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan btsugs nas/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'isgras bkur stir byas/ blamar byas/ tshor byas/ mchod pa byas te/

0 dus ston chen po yang byas so// cha gnyis pa ni yul sdig pa can gyi khyad rnams la/ cha gsum pa ni yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu luka la/ cha bzhib ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs khrod rgya la/

cha lnga ba ni khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze la/ tshadrug pa ni yul sa skyan gnas pa'i rgya la rigs shAkya rnams la/ cha bdun pa ni yul yangs pa can na gnas pa 'irgyal rigs lo tsa byi rnams la/ cha brgyud pa ni
yul ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram zo dbyar khyod la byin ti/ de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes degras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung mchod rten brtsigs te//
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan btsugs nas/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas M/ rimor byas/ mchod pa byas te/
dus ston chen po yang byas so// de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/ gang gi phyir bum bar sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de/ bram ze rigs bra bo dang mnyam pa la byin// de nas bram
po'i rigs bye bas bye ba dang ma tam pa'i grong khyer du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dan btsugs nas/ dri dang 'phrangab dang/
bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ rol mo'i sgras bkur sti byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas mchod pa byas te/ dus ston chen po yang byas so// de nas de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u rgya gro d+ha skyes 'khor 'dus
gapa de nyid du 'os te/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u na grod+has/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// grong khyer can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang bo tshogs shing 'dus pa

shes ldan dag nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam de ni yun ring po nas bdag la phangs pa'ing sdug pa yin te/ de khyed kyi grong khyer du yongs su mya ngan las 'dasan/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung
tshugs la bzhin pa'i sol ba de bdag la byin cig dang/ des na bdag gis yul du gro d+hu can du/ bcom ldan 'das go'u tam de'i sol ba'imachod rten brtsigs la/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/
ba dan gzugs shing/ sridang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ la mo'i sgras bkur stir bya'o/ blamar bya'o/ kamor bya'o// mchod par bya'o/ mchodabar byas nas/ dus

ston chen po la dbya'o// grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya gro d+ha la sku gdung ga sol ba byin te bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+has yul rgya gro d+hacan du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sol ba'imachod/
rten brtsigs te/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan btsugs nug/ dro dang/ 'brong pa dang/ bdug pa dang/ phyam dang/ rol mo'isgrus bkurastir byas/ bla mar byas/ mor byas/

mchod pa byas te/ dus ston chen po lang byas so// de'i tsho 'dzam bu 'i gling du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brgyad dang/ bum pa mchod rten dang dgu/ sol ba'i mchod rten dang bcur gyur to//

spyan ldan sku gdung bra bo brgyud dag las// bdun ni 'dzam bu gling ba'i mchod par thob// skyes bu mchog de'i dri ba gang zhig ni// grong khyer sa smogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod// skyes mchog de yi mche ba
bzhi dag 'os// mche ba gcig rtsa gsum 'jig rten mchod/ khaganyis pa tshig 'dzin grong khyer yid 'ong na// gsum pa ka la rgyal po'i yulan ste// skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi pa ni// grong
khyar sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mched// mya ngan med rgyal skya snar bu gnas bas/ mchod rten bdun po rgya cher spel byas te// de yi mthu yis dbyig 'dzin 'dir yang ni/ smon lam dngos pos
mngon par brgyan gyur to// 'di ltar spyan ldan sku gdung de 'ani// lha dbang klu dbang mi yi dbang po dang// mi dang klu dang gnod sbyin bdag po yis// rab tu bkur nas bkur sti mchod pa byas//

rab mkhyen thugs rjer ldan pa stobs mnga' ba// shaka 'khrungs ma ga d+har byang chub ste/ kashi ri chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur nas// grong khyeran na brten nas mya ngan 'das// gang gi tshe tshod ldan

pa shA ri'i bu yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa de tshe/ dge slong brgyad khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yi ngas su mya ngan las 'dus pa de'i tsho/ dge slong

bdun khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ dge slong khri brgyad stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ lhagi tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang
kho thub pa dag/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung ba'i dud patsam du gyur te/ dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/
ba ma mo dgami sgrogs so zhes 'ju bar byed/ spyod par byed// kha zer bar byed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ dge slong mas la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag shes

par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa tsho/ dge slong brgyad khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i

tsho dge slong bdun khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// da 'dir bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'i tsha yang/ dge slong khri brgyad stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ dge slong de snyad cig

yongs su mya ngan las 'dus pas/ lha'i tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub ba dag/ ci bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab ni byed pa tsam du gyur to/ dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'a das nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi bde sde dang/ 'dul ba dang/ ma mo dag kyang mi sgrogs so zhes 'phya bar byed/ smod par byed/ kha par bar byed pas de lta bas na 'dir shog la 'dus shig/ dgag slong dag gis legs

kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so// dge 'dun gyi dge skos gang yani/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'gas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//

gang bo tshur shog/ khyod kyis gaN+Di brdungs la/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sdus shig/ tshodang ldan pa 'od susachen pos de skad sgo ba dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gang posatshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs kyi ltar mnyan nas//
rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas/ jitsam yishas mthong ba la zhugs pa de tsam du rnam par bltas nas denas ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas gaN+Di brdung bar brtsams so/
des gaNibardungs pa dang/ gcig ma gtogs pa yul tha dad na gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dgra bcom pa lnga brgya 'dus nas/ dge slong 'dus shing 'dug pa la/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di

skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa las gang dag ma 'ongs pa rtogs shig/ drag slong dag gis yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i dge slong dag la phan tshun rnam par bltasanas/

tshedang ldan po 'od srus chen po la tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag ma gtogs la/ dge slong mang po thams cad 'dus shing mtshasi lags so zhes smras so// de'i tshon tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag shing shi rasha ka'i

gzhal med khang stong ba na 'dug go/ donas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa gang bo la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po tshur shog/ tshe dang ldan pa ba glangabadag ga la ba der song la phyin/
nas tshe dang ldan pa ba glang ba dag la 'di skad ces smos shig// 'od srungs la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'di skad du nad med par cig/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad cig yod pas myur du babs
kha/nyes byas kyi// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs kyis de skad smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs las mnyan nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na grong khyer

rtswa can nas mi snang zhing/ shing gi rig ka'i gzhal med khang stong pan 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang bo tsho dang ldan pa ba glang bag ga la ba der song ste

rgyuphyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag gi rkang ba gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshed nga ldan pa ba glang bdag la 'di skad ces smras so// 'od srungs la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams/
tshodang ldan pa ba glang bdag nad med par gyur gi/ dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad cig yod kyis myur du babs pa bod ces de skad tha'o// de 'dod chags dang bral ba yin yang/ byams pa'i bag chags
N+NaM kyis bsgos pas/ tshodang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don du 'jig rten gzhin du ma gshegs sam/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ mtshami
g+ha 'du ma/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mu stegs kyis kun tul bzlog gam/ de dag 'dus nas de bzhin ga shogs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnod pa ma byas sam/
de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dang 'dra ba la nyon mongs pas dkris pa'i dbang du gyur ba/ dag sbyong dang/ bram ze dang/ spyod pa dang/ kun tu rgyudag gis brnyas bar ma gyur tam/ mi rigs ba'i mun
bas log pa'i blo gros can dag gis dge 'dun 'dus ba'i dbyen ma byas sam gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la/ chos dang 'dra ba'i tshig dang/ yi gu dang lta ba'i dra ba ma byung
A tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag/ klag ba dang/ 'don pa dang/ yid la byed pa dag las blo bsgyur nas/ 'dus shing phra mo'i gtam byed par ma gyur tam/ gang the tshom dang yidi gnyis la zhog
ba'i sems kyis/ chos ma yinopa la nichos su/ chos lan tshos ma yin par/ 'dul ba ma yin pa la ni 'dul bar/ 'dul ba la ni 'dul ba ma yin bar Mm bshad dam/ dge slong dag ser sna'i dri
mas log pas/ tshangs pa mtshungs pa glo bur du 'ongs ba rnams la/ kun tu dga' bar bya ba'i chos drug la sogs pa ma byed cing/ khyad du gsod par mi byed dam/ gang rab tu byung ba ngan ba dgagis/

bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag bstan pa la ma dad par byas nas/ mu stegs can la ston par ma gyur tam/ gang dag log par 'tsho ba kun tu spyod ba zhing rmo ba dang/ nyotshong byed po dang/ rgyal po la rten
ci 'tsho ba ltos par ma gyur tam/ gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blasanas/ bas mtha'i gnas mal du rten pa las/ sbyas po'i yon tan de dag bor bar ma gyur tam/ dag sbyongs yani

ba dag sbyong du khas 'ches nas/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'khrug par mi byed dam/ de lta bod kyi tshe gang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag bdun zhes smra ba'i gsan/ 'od srungs la sogs pa
@#// zhes smra 'am/ thugs rje chen po la goms par gnas pa// kun du spyod pa la zhugs pa'i ston pa// phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
la 'das pa la ma zhugs sam/ 'gro ba'i ru sku 'an pa med nas 'jig rten 'khrugs par ma gyur ma/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa mi rtag ba'i stobs kyis non par ma gyur tam/ sems can thams cad kyi ston
sgyu pa bdag cag sad par byed pa'imagon po ma gzims sam/ sangs rgyas nyin byed mchub bam/ thub pa'i dbang po'i zla ba sgra gcan bdegyis btsemanas snang ba med par ma gyur tam/ sum cu rtsa gsumun

dbang phyug dang bsam gyi shing dri zhim po byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gis mdzes par byas ba/ dag sbyong gi 'bras bu bzang pa bzhi dang ldan pa ma rtag pa'i glangapo che skyon pas ma bcom mtsha/ ya shes

tho kyi sgron ma mi rtag pa'i rlung gis bdas nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das sam zhes smras so// de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo ldan bstan pa ba nas bya phyir// nyan thos

zladage 'dun tshogs nas ni// de dag de pa ni 'dus gyur to// khyod la sdod cing de brtson byed// gu tshanarkyal pa de zhag ste// ya shas ri yang rnam par snyi'i// bstan pa rab mchog ldan pa yi// dge slong
mang po rnam par zhi// gyi na ma 'gas legs par ni// bdag ni pho nyar 'a di'i 'osan// bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir// de bas khyodananges par bzhud// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba glang ba dag/

gis cha dang ldan pa gang pa la 'di skad ces smras so// gang po tshog gis de skad ma smra zhigo/ 'gro ba'i dus ma yin no// 'on kyang decu gang bo/ 'gro ba'i sgron ma 'gen re bzhugs pa de ra// bdag ni 'akra
bar bya ba'i blo yod kyang// de nas pha rol be zhi gshegs gyur na// blo ldan gang zhig 'jig rten de dag 'gro// lhung bzed chos gos rnam gsum mchog 'di dag/ khyod kyis dge 'dun dog la dbul
bar gyis// bdagan zhi ba yang srid med nga ra 'gros// bdag gis bsams pa 'phags la bzod par gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag gis spar ba dang/ dro ba dang/ char dbab pa dang/ gsal

ba mchog gi cho 'phrul chen po bstan te/ phung bo lhabag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de'i lus rang las byung ba'i me'i khams kyis rnam par tshig sta/ de las chu'i rgyun rnam pa
bzhi ba ba bo// chu'i rgyun gcig las sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs kyis rjes su bstan pa/ da ltar dus rnams ngan gyur to// sems can rang gi las la rten// 'gro ba'i sgron ma de 'das pas// thams
cad 'gro bar 'jug par rtogs// gnyis des smras pa/ 'dus byas bsags pa skad cig 'jig 'gyur to// skye la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyon mongs ldan// so so'i skye bo bdag tung rgyal te//
de dag khyad pa med par rig par bya// gsum pas smras pa// mkhas pas rtag tu dgongs pa bag yod cing// bsod nams yid la bya ba de brtson bya// 'byung po'i tshogs kun song zhing 'jig 'gyur te//

srog dang bcas pa'i das lanagagad+hA/ srog dang bcas ba'i dpal na g.yo bar gyur// bzhi bas smras pa/ thub pa de la slob mchog gang dag btud// rang gi dgos pa ma lus thams cad byas/ gusangashing rab tu dad pas

ya bla ma de'i/ phyi bzhin ba glang bdag kyang de ltar song// de nas tshodang ldan pa gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa ba glang bdag gi rus pa la/ rus pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te/ ji ltar

zla sems ma nyam par gzhagan/ shing pa'i risha ka'i gzhal med khang nas mi snang zhing/ grong khyer rtswa can gyi spyod rnams kyi bar rten pa dang/ shing sa la zung gi tshal du gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la sogrwa

tsa par zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'od srungs la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya ga la ba der song da phyin nas/ ji ltar rgan rims la phyag 'tshal te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa la byin nas 'di skad
cas smras so// mgon po'i sku ni mad par des thos nas gabasod nams las kyis rang tu zhi bar song// de yi lhung bzed chos gos 'di yin te// des bsams dge 'dun dag la bzod pa gsol//
de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ dge slong dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par sbyod pa dag nyon cig/ ji ltar de ni 'phags pa'i tshulakyis 'das// gzhan gyis de

bzhin rab zhir 'gro mi bya// de bas ji srid dgos pa'i don bya zhing// dbang can tshogs nas de srid bgro bar ga de nas ya nga tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ dge slong de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir
[smras ba/ ji ltar bsod nams las kyis zhi gyurag/ ri ka'i sems mchog ba glang bdag/ de ltar khyed kyis de bzhin mi bsam sku// 'gro don dgos phyir tshogs nas blo gros bya// de nas tshe dang

ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la khrims su bcas nas smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa dag bdag ji skad smra ba gsonacig ji ltar bdag cag gis tshes kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin bshad dang/
dbazhin gshegs pa dang rnam par bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyi dag slo phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag gis thos nas 'dir 'os to/ de dag gis bdag cag gi sems g.yeng bar byed mod
kyi 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+har byang chub cing/ gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pa der chos kyi tshul bgro bar bya'o// den dge slong gcig gis legs kyis de bzhin du

bgyi 'o zhes smras so// gzhan zhig gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa ci byang chub shing drung du 'dong ngam/ tshe dang ldan po 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa yul ma ga d+hA'i rgya la b.lus 'gas ma'i khu

ma skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan ba de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang/ chos kyi tshul rab tu sbyor byed cing/ zhol tayang byed pas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ngo// de dag gis smras

pa legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi na de lta na yatshe dang ldan pa na dga' bo ni slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa yang yin na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde 'di mtha' dag gtad na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par
bgyidenas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag gal ted ldan slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa'i dge slong gzhan 'khod ba de dag kyang 'khrug bar 'gyur/
bas/ de la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig byas la/ 'di chu'i zhal ta bar bsko ba'i spro bas bsos la/ lhag ma ni bzlog par bgyi// de dag gis smras pa// legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas

glu tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/ tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod dag slengag dge 'dunagyi chu'i zhal ta byed par spro 'am/ des smras
