za ]gnas brtan 'di ltar yadra pacan gyi dge slong rnamA kyis jisrid 'tsho'i bar gyi tshwadus su rung ba dang lhan cig bsres nas yas su spyod cing mo dus su rung bar bgyid do// tsho dang ldan pa dung bam yin// gang bcas/rgyal

po khaba'o// gang 'gab rten tshad ldan pa shAri'i bu lus so// ltung ba ci 'gyur/ltung byed do// gnas brtan 'di ni gzhibazhi pomado sde las 'das/'al ba las 'as/ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/mdo sde lami

'jug/ 'dul ba lami snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yongs pa can gyi dge slonganams kyis lung bam yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing/ kun tu spyod rab tu dan/de khyod kyis btangasems sugazhag gamazhes smras

ba dang de cang mi smra bar 'ag go/ des smras ba/ gnas brten de ni dir bsan 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/lam gyis dung par bgyid pa rung ngam/tshe dang ldan pa lam gyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yani/gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs ba can

gyi dge slong+gan kyis dpag tshad dang dpag tshad phyed du song ste/ 'dus shing ban zos nas lam gyis rung bar bgyid do// tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no// gang du bcas/rgyal po'i khab tu'o/ gang las brten/ lha sbyin
las so ltung bcir 'gyur/ltung byed do// gnas brtan 'din be shi la ba mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/mdo sde la mi 'jug/ 'dul ba la snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal

te de dag yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin parung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing/ kun tu spyod rab tu spyod na/da khyod kyis pa tang snyoms su gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang/docai bar 'dug go/

des smras ba gnas brtanadenadir ngasan/'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ sor mo gnyis kyi rung bar bgyid parung ngam// tshe dang ldan pa sor mo gnyis kyis dung ba zhes bya ba ci yAni/ gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs ba can gyi dge slong
rnams kyiso/lhag mar ma byas pa'ibatha'abad bcab sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar byas te blosanas sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar bgyid do// tshe dang ldan pa du bal yin// gang du bcas
mnyan yodadu'o// gang las bstan/ dge slong mang po las so// ltung ba cir 'gyur/ltungakhyud do// gnas brtan 'din gzhi drug pamadosde las 'das/'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral ti/mdo

rgyu sde las 'jug/ 'dul ba la mi snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal// de dag la yangs pa tsan gyi dge slong rnams kyis rub ma yin par rung ngo zhes yongs ston/ kun tu spyod rab tu spyodan/ de khyod kyis btang soms

su gzhab kha dam zhes smras pa dang/ de na mi smabar 'dug go/ des smras pa/ gnas brtan de ni der bas na/ 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ nad pas rung bar bgyid pa rung mo/ tshe dang ljon pa nad ngas rung pa zhes bya pa ci
yin gnas brtan yanges pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis srin bu pad+ma bzhin du chang bzhings te 'thus nas/ nad ngos rang bar bgyid do// tshod ldan ng rungabam yin no// gang du bcas/mnyan yod du'o//

gang las brten/tshe dang ldan pa legs 'os 'as so// lta ba cir 'gyur/lta byed do// gnas brtan 'di'i gzhi bdun pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// de na de bsan/'di zhu bar bgyi ste/bsras ngas 'du bar bgyid pa du ba

! ga tshodang ldan pa bsres pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/gnas brtan 'di lta boyasapa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi 'o ma bre gang dang zho breg nga dkrugs nas dus ma yin par za zhing/dkrugs bas rung bar bgyid/tshe dang ldan dang

ba ma yin// ga nga du bcas/ mo nyan yod du'o/ gang la sa ba na/dge slong mang po 'dus so/ khyu la ba ti'i 'gyur/lta byed do// gnas brtan 'di na ga gi brgyad nga bdo grwa las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan

kha dang bral te/mdo sde la ma 'gug/ 'dul ba la sneng/ chos nyid dang 'ag la te/de dag la las pa can gyi dog slong rnams kyis rung bag yin parung ngo zhes les su ston cing// kun tu spyod ba tu spyodan/ de khyod kyis btung

sogs su gzhag bgam zhes smras pa dang/ decung mi smra bar 'dug go/ des smras kha/ gnas brtan de 'dir bsan 'di 'u bar bgyi ste/ gding bas rung bar bgyid pa dung dam/ tshodang ldan pa gding bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/

gnas brtan 'di ltar yas po can gyi dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mthog/ngags 'khor bas gding ba sar ba lam glan par longs spyod par byed cing/ gding bas rung bar byed de/ tshedapa
ldan pa rangasam dono// gang du bcas/ mnyan yod du'o// gang las brten/ dge slong mang po las so// ltung pa cir 'gyur/ ltung byed do// gnas brtan 'di gzhi dgu mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/

ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde lami 'dug/ 'dul ba la mi snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yongs ba can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yino pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing/ kun tu spyod dag tu spyod

na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam zhes smras ba dang/ de cangami smrab r 'dug/ des smras ba/ gnas partan de ni de ra bas na 'dizhu bar bgyi ste// gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid pa dung ngam gser dngul gyis
du ba zhes bya ba ci yani/gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed gang dag zlum po dag pa spyad par 'os pa de dag dris bskus nas/bdug pa dri zhim bos bdugs te/me tog

@# dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ dge sbyogi mgo ba la khri'i stan dang bcas pa'i snying du bzha gnas / 'kha bo che dang/ sra dang/ bzhimado dag bsod nas 'di skad ces bsgrags so// grong khyer dang yul sna tshogs nas 'od

'tsha ba'i skye bo mang po yangs pa can na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/ lhung bzed 'di'i lhung babad bgrang bo yin te/'dir gnam/shin tu byin/ gang gis 'dir klugs pa byas bas/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ phan yon che ba

rgyudang brtson pa che ba dang/ rgya che bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang/ der dbyig dang/ gser dang/ rin po che gzhan de dag kyang redacing theb nas/ de la 'phos spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid do// tshodang ldan pa rung bam yino

gang du bcas/ 'dul ba las te/ spang ba'i ltung byed dang/ yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang/ sas rgyas kyis bshad pa ma gtogs pa dang/ gtsug na nor bu'i mdo sde dang lung ring bo dang/ tshul khrims kyi phung por

gtogs pa dang/ lung ba ma dang/ bu du gtogs po dang/ sra brkyang gi mdo sde dang/ gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang/ bzhi pa dang lnga par gags pa de dag las// gang las brten/drug sde dang/ dge slong gzhan dag dang/

khyim na gnas ba dag las te/ gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bcu pa mdo sde las 'das/'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/mdo sde lam 'jug/ 'dul ba lami snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal te/de dag la yangs ba

can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa lung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing/kun tu spyod bag tu spyodan/ de khyed kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/ des tshe dang ldan pa da song la phyogs tshol cig dang/ ngasachos bzhin du grogs byas

zhes smras pa dang gnas brtan de bzhin du bgyi'ozhes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas/ gnas brten thamasacad 'dod pa las mnyan nas/ ba kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gnas so//

de'i tshigrong khyer nor can n tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan g.yo ldan/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas gnas ba/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad pa sgom pa zhig gnas te de nas tshe dang sngon ba grags pas/

gnas brtan g.yo ldan gang na bar song ste phyin nas tsho dang ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi ngang gnyis lamago bos phyag byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan A la la zhes rung bar bgyid pa/

dung ngas/tshe dang ldan pa a la la rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci li'i gnas brtan yangs pa can yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams ma mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang/ mthun pas chos ma yin ba dang/ mimathun pas tshes kyi las

byas te/ a la la zhes ru bar bgyid de// tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no// gang du bcas/tsam pa go gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde dag las so// ltung ba cir 'gyur/nyes byas so// gnas brtan 'di na gzhi dang

bo mdo sde las 'das 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo sde lami 'og/ 'dul ba la ma snang chos nyid dang bgal te/de dag la yongs ba can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung bas lan pa rung ngo zhes

[7 ]@#// yongs su ston cing/ kun tuspyod dag tu spyodan/de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/gas brnyan de ni der bas na/'di zhu bar bgyi ste/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa rung ngam/tshe dang ldan pa rjes su

yarang ba zhes bya ba yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/gzhi bcu po de dag rgyas bar brjod pa dang/ de tshe dang ldan pa phyogs tshol cig dang/ satshes bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan b grags pas/ tsho

da ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis lamago bos phyag 'tshal te/grang byar sang kAsha zhes bya bar song ngo// de'i tshe grong khyerasang kAsha zhes bya ba na tsho dang ldan pa gnas brtanoracan/ tshe dang ldan pa kun

dga' bo dang lhan cig kha nas gnas// dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa zhig gnas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas/ tshe dang ldan pa nor can gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshe dang

ldan ba/ rican la 'di skad ces smras so// gnas brtan a la la zhes ru bar bgyid nga rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung ba ci yin/ gnas brtan grong khyer yangs pa can na/yangs pa can gyi dge slong

rnams mi mthun pas chos ma yaning dang/mthun pas tshes ma yin pa dang/ mthunangs tshes kyi las byed de/ a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid do// tshe dang ldan parung ba ma yin no// gang du bcas/ tsam par
ro gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde dag las so// khyung bcir 'gyur/ nyes byas so/ gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/mdo sde/

la mi 'jug/ 'dul ba lagasnang/ chos nyid dang 'gal te/de dag la yas pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa lung par yongs su ston rung/ kun tu spyod rab tu spyodan/de khyod kyis btang snyoms su

gzhag gam/ gnas brtan de ni der bsan/ 'di shu par bgyi ste/ rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa lu a/ tshe dang ldan pa tshes su yi rang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i yin zhes bya ba snga mabazhin te// gzhid cu po

de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang/ des song phyogasatshol cig dang/ sa tshes bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes sa so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas/ tshe dang ldan banor can gyi dang ba gnyis lamago bas phyag
'tshal song nas/ grong khyer dmar ducand 'os so// de'i grong khyer dmar bu can na tshe dang ldan pa bla skur gnas te/de dag de'i tsho 'gog pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs nas/ de nas tshe

dang ldan pa yid dga' la gzhib cu po rtsachar brjod nas/tshe dang ldan pa yid dga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas suganar son pa dang/ de'i tshe thuganan tshe dang ldan pa mi pham pa gnas te/

des gzhi bcu bo rgyas par brjod sa/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ de la ha ldan du song ba dang/ de'i tshomahe ldan n tshe dang ldan pa yang dag skyes gnas te/ des de la yang gzhi

bcu po rgyas bor brjod nas/ de'i rkang ba gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal song nas/ lhan cig skyes su son pa dang/ de'i tshe lhan cig skyes n tshe dang ldan panamagru gnas te/ des de'i rkang pa gnyis la
mang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gnas brtan a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid b.rung na/ tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/ gnas brtan yangs pa can/

@# nags pa can gyi dge slong mas/ mi mthun pas chos ma yini ba dang/ mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang/ mi mthun bsachos kyi las byas te/ a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/ tshed nga ldan pa rung ba ma yin no//
rgyu de gang du bcas/ tsam par ro/ gang las brten/ drug sde las so// ltung bcir 'gyur/nyes byas so// gnas brtan 'din go'i dang bo mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa 'i bstan pa dang bral te/

mdo sde lami 'jug/ 'dul ba 'am snang/ chos nyid dang gal te de dag la yAngs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa du bar yongs su ston cing/ kun tu spyod rab tu spyodan/ da khyod kyis btang

snyoms su gzhag gam/ gnas brtan ri ni der bas na/ 'di shu bar bgyi ste/ rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa du ma/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yon zhes bya ba snga ma

bzhin du gzhi khacu bo rgyas par brjod pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa'i magrus citshe dang ldan pa 'di deng bor bdag gi drung du 'ongs sam snyam du bsams pa dang/ jitsaman gzhan du yang so bar mthong nas des bsams

kha tshe dang ldan pa de 'kharing po nas 'os ngas la so zhang de 'dug tubocug la/ bdag phyob satshol du 'gro'o snyam du ri'i nas/ tshodang ldan pa grags ba la 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pa khyod lam
gos los pas khyod la go// gas pa'i lugs srobran pa dag gnas tshul bya'i/ ston pa 'das ba de las bdun bas yi pagang ba la zhugs pa/ de dag zlog nas
[n]nga bo nas 'ongs pas khyod ngal sol/ sa phyogs btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas de la gor bcug ste/ tshe dang ldan par ma gru phyogs tshol zhing song ngo// de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams//

tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dge slongagang na ba der song staphyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa tshe dang ldan pa'i mkhan po bgar song zhes dris so// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de phyogs tshol du

gong ngo// tshe dang ldan pa de ci'i phyir phyogs tshol du song/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ga gnasas dbyung ba'i las bya ba'i phyir ro/ tshodang ldan pa nged kyis ci zhig byas na/ des nged rnams gnas nas dbyang ba'i las bya

des rgyas bar ba zlas pa dang sna de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa de legs pa ma yin pa zhig byed de/ ston pa 'das ba de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gis 'tsho bar rung na/ da rnams ci'i phyiri mthong atsam/

de dag las gzhan zhig gis drang bo'i sems dang phan pa'i brlang go gso de dag la smras ba/ tshodang ldan pa dag khyed narjes su mthun pas yin pa dang/ rung ba ma yin pa dang/ dge sbyong gatshul ma yin pas spyod
de ded kyis bam ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la stong du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes sngon thosan/ khyed kyis ma 'os pa'i bstan pa nyid kyang mi snang bar byed pa la zhugs pa dang ltar gzhan kyang gang dgo
spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas gcig nas gcig tusong ste gtam brjod par brtsams pa/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pa phyogasatshol du song nas/ bdu cag
gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed na/ ci'i phyir sems las chung dung dug/ ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba smras tshe// de nas gcig cig gis smras pa// ci zhig sgrub tu yod/ gang de phyogs
tshol du song na/ bdag cag gis kyang phyogs btsal yodo/ ci'i phyir nga dag cag nyidakyis bdag cag bo nas bar bya/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa de dang bdag cag rtsod
bar 'gyur bas bris te 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan zhig gis smras bu/ bdag cag gang du 'gro ste/ gang du song ba der yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs su 'gyur pas ba byed pa gsol bar bya'o//
gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis bgrod pa gas lo mi nus kyidakris bzhin du 'dug go/ gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ do 'di ltar de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas mang ba de
dag/ dze lhung bzed dang/ chos gos dang/ drapa dang/ phor bu dang/ ska rags dag gis bsdus la/ phyi'i gar ragis par bya'o// gzhan zhig gis bzang sku de ba zhin du
bya'o zhes smras nas/ de rnams kyis de dag la kha cig la ni snam sbyar byin/ khacig lan bla gos kyin/ kha cig la ni thang gos byin/ bcig la ni rngul gzan ni/ khacig la ni ga dang
byin/ kha cig la ni lhung zad byin/ pa ci la nang tshugs byin te/ de bzhin du de dag thams cung bsdus nas de dag bar na gnas par gyur to// jitsaman tshe dang ldan pa grags pa ris kyis
phyogs btsal nas yangs ngo 8 nadu 'as pa dang/ de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rta gnas dgag 'ongs nas @#/ yangs pa can dag gi grong du ma song bar der lam gyi ngal bso ba dang/ lhan cig gnas
ba'i gnas dag gis smyos nga/ mkhan po phyogs de dag btsal tam/ bu phyogs de dag ring po ma thogs par 'ong ngo// mkhan po 'tshal te// thugs de lta bu kun bzlog pa'i rigs te// ston pa
'das pa de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gas 'tsho bar rangan/ ci'i slad du de dag la kha gnod pa bgyi/ des bsams/ 'di dag sngon ma byung ba'i blog gcig smra ste/ nges par 'di dag gis
de dag las rang gi bya ba blangs par rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag sngon ma byung ba'i tshig smra ste/ tshodang ldan pa dag gso de dag las rang gi bya ba blangs so zhes smras pa dang/ de dag cang ma
ra'angagag/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas/ jiltar gros byas pa de dag la smras kha/ bslab pa lhod pa'i phyogs dag 'phul bsangs par 'ong ba'i rigs pas//
bstan pa'i dgos pa 'a ba shol bar ma byed cig gi dus tshigs su bcad bas smyos pa/ gang gis bshob bya ba'is byed rings pa shel byed pa// tshul bzhin bya ba rab spangs byis pa da ni sdug bsngal
'gro// den grogs pamed pa'i skal ldan grogs kyis rnam par spangs// de yi don ni mo'i pha la mar gyi ngo yi zla ba bzhin// gang gis dgos pa de bzhin ra sapyad
blo ldan mi shel ba// tshul bzhin ma yin rab spangs mkhas pa de ni bde ba theg/ den grags pa skal ldan grogs bo rnams kyis spangs mi 'gyur// de yi donani 'phel ba yar rgya de ya gle ba
bzhin de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa 'khor gyi khyams su zhugs te/ rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon nas shes bas brtags te gti
brdus pa dang/ dgra bam pa bdun brgyar gcig gi sa la tshang ba de dag thams cad kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas pa dag 'dus so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldal
zla sgyur 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti'i sgra ma thos so// de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus shing tshogs pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de dag gi ming
nas phyung su brjodon ni 'khrug pa chen por 'gyurabs/ ma la bdag gsemang nas mi debad bar b rjed par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ des ji ltar rgan rims su 'dud pa byas nas/ rgan pa'i
mtha'o legs su thal mo sbyor byas nas stan la 'dug go/ dgra bcom pa bdun brgyaragacig gis mtshang bas don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang/ de'i tshitshe dang ldan pazla sgar yang 'gog pa'i sems
0bar 'jug pa las langs te/ de la lha zhig gis 'phags pa klu sgrub ci'i phyir thugs las chung du bzhugs/ khyod dang mkhan po gcig pa dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ban u0f7a/ yas

pa can n bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed pos ris par bazhud cig rtsis spyis kho dang/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer dmar bu can nas mi snang bar gyur te yangs pa can du phyin nas
'khor gyi khyams kyi sgor 'dug ste sgo la brdungs pa dang/ dge slong dag gis khyod su yin zhes dris so// des tshogos su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag dmar bu can n gnas pa yi// ga sbyong
mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin// de dag las gzhan zhig 'di'i 'os te// dbang bo dul zhes bya ba sgron 'dug dge slong dag gis smras pa/ dbang po dul ba ni gzhan dag kyang yod na
khyod suld smos shige/ des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang dag dmar bu can n gnas pa ya// yo sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba'ani// de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/ shrI
tshem bcad ces bya ba smon 'dug/ dge slong dag gis tho tshom bcad pan gzhan dag kyang yod de zhes smras pa dang/ des yang tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ gang dag dmar bu can n gnas pa yi// dge
sbyo mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin// de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te// 'gyod pa med ces bya ba sgo na 'dug/ dge slong dag gis 'gyod pa med pa ni gzhan dag kyang yodan su yin zhes smras pa
dang des yang tshigs su bcad de smras ba/ bgang dag dam bcartan gnas pa ya/dge sbyong mang du thos ba 'dul ba 'dzin// de dag las gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs zla skur
yanas nii bya ba sgron 'ag/ dge slong rnams kyis legs par 'os sam 'gas par 'os mnang du zhugs shig ces smos pa dang/ denang du zhugs so// de nas dge slong rnams 'khoratsho khyamasanas byun gnas /
tshe dang ldan pa zla skur dod du gnyer par bskos te/ de'i 'og tu 'khorakhums su zhugs nas/ 'di ltar rang rang gi ston la 'dug go tshodang ldan pa grags pas de bzhin na rigs su 'dug pa lo dngos

bo bcu bzlas par zhugs to/ tshodang ldan pa dal a la la zhes rung bar byed pa dung dam tshe dang ldan pa sa la la zhes zhu ba zhes bya ba yo dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar dge slong kha cig gis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang/
zla mthun pasas ma yin pa dang/ mi mthun pas chos kyi 'os byas te/ a la la zhes rung bar bgyidad// tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin// gang du bcas/ tsha khar ro// gang las brten/ dge slong drug sde
dag lasaso// ltung ba cir 'gyur/ nyes byas so// tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/ 'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/ mdo
ny+nyo lami 'jug/ 'dul ba lami snang/ chos nyid dang 'gal te/ de dag la yangs ba can gyi dge slong 'di rnams kyis rung ba ma yin parung ngo zhes yongs su bsgragasanas/ kun tu spyod rab tu
09 spyod de/ de dag bdag cag gis da bar bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni rim pas na/ gzhan dag zhu bar bgyi'o// rjes su sa ru bar bgyid nga rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi

bag lung par byed pa ci bzhin bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin rug bcu brgyus bar brjod de/ de dag go ra de la/ na nasdur zhan dub/zha bcu brgyus par brjod do// dodag gis yang dag par brjod nas 'khor gyi khyams nas byung ste/
can na gnas pa'i dog slong du dris pa'i tshig gis bsdus nas yang gat+tabardasanas/ de dag dang lhan cig tu'adug pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa grags pas de ltar rims su 'dag pa la gzhi bcu po mang

nas phyung ste bzlas pa bya bar zhugs tshe dang ldan pa dag e 'a la zhes rung bar byed pa rung ma/ tsho dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/ tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa can
gyi deg slong 'di rnams kyis/ mthun pas tshes ma yin pa dang/ mthunapas chos ma yin pa dang/ mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te/ a la la zhes bya pa rung bar bgyid do// tshe dang ldan
pa rung ba ma yin no// gang du bcas/ tsam par ro// gang las bton/ dge slong drug sde dag las so// ltungabcur 'gyur/ nyes byas so// tshe dang ldan pa 'dini gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/
'dul ba las 'das/ ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral to/ mdo sde la ma 'jug/ 'dul ba la snang/ tshes nyid dang 'gal te/de dag la yangs pa can kyi dge slong 'di rnams kyis rung ba ma 'di pa dang de zhes yo
su bsgragasanas/ kun tu spyod rab tu spyod de/ de dag bdag cag gis derab r bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni der bas na/ bdazhu bar bgyi'o// tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su/

yal bas rung bar byed pa rung ngam/ tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yo'ong bas rung bar byed pa ce ni zhes bya ba 'bar snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu bo rgyas par brjod do/ de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bya'o zhes
dgra bcom pa bdun brgyus yang dag par brjod pas/ bdun brgyas mang dag par brjod pa/ bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/// bar sdom ni/
zlaa la la dang rjes su yi rang spyod pa dang// brtags pa dang ni'an tshu dag dang ma dang ni// sor mo gnyis kyis rung dang dkrugs dang gding ba dang/ gsar dngul byas pa 'di ni bar sdom yang
dag bsdus/ grong khyer yangs pa can dang nor can dang// lha las babs dang de bzhin dmar bu can// srugan du ni ma he ldan pa dang// lhan cig skyes gyur pa ni phyi ma yin/
thams cad 'dod dang grags dang g.yo ldan dang// nor can dngani yide dag lo dag dang yang// bla skur dang ni de bzhin ma pham pa// yang dag 'byung dang dam gru la sogs
'dul la phun tshogs kyi gzhirdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bdu ka ra pra b+ha dang/ d+harma shI pra b+ha dang/ letsapa ban d+he dpal 'byor gyiso bsgyur/ dus rag
